169 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
170 struct Event {
171  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
172  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
173  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
174  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
175  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
176  epiworld_fast_int queue;
177  EventFun<TSeq> call;
178  int idx_agent;
179  int idx_object;
180 public:
197  Event(
198  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
199  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
200  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
201  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
202  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
203  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
204  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
205  int idx_agent_,
206  int idx_object_
207  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
208  new_state(new_state_),
209  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
210  return;
211  };
212 };

254 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
255  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
256 
257  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
258  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
259 
260  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
261  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
262 
263  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
264  for (auto & v : vect) \
265  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
266  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
267 
268  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
269  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
270  for (auto & v : vect) \
271  { \
272  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
273  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
274  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
275  }
276 
277  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
278  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
279  for (auto & v : vect) \
280  { \
281  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
282  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
283  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
284  }
285 
286  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
287  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
288  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
289  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
290  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
291  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
292  }\
293  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
294  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
295  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
296  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
297  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
298  { \
299  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
300  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
301  _j, \
302  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
303  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
304  } \
305  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
306  }
307 
308  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
309  if (a) \
310  {\
311  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
312  }
313 
314  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
315 #else
316  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
317  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
318  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
319  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
320  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
321  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
322  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
323  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
324  if (a) \
325  return false;
326  #define epiexception(a) a
327 #endif
328 
329 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
330  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
331 #else
332  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
333 #endif
334 
335 #endif

364  epiworld::Agent< tseq > * p, \
365  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus< tseq >> v, \
366  epiworld::Model< tseq > * m\
367  )

375  [](epiworld::Tool<tseq> & t, \
376  epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
377  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus<tseq>> v, \
378  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> epiworld_double
379

394  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m )

399  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v, \
400  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void

406  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m\
407  )

411  [](epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
412  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v , \
413  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void

418  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v, \
419  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m\
420  )
421

423  epiworld::VirusFun<TSeq> funname = \
424  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, \
425  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> & v, \
426  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> epiworld_double
427 
428 #define EPI_RUNIF() m->runif()
429 
430 #define EPIWORLD_RUN(a) \
431  if (a.get_verbose()) \
432  { \
433  printf_epiworld("Running the model...\n");\
434  } \
435  for (epiworld_fast_uint niter = 0; niter < a.get_ndays(); ++niter)
436 
437 #define EPI_TOKENPASTE(a,b) a ## b
438 #define MPAR(num) *(m->EPI_TOKENPASTE(p,num))
439

441  (funname)(epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m)
442

445  [](epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void

448  (funname)(epiworld::Model<tseq>* m)

462 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
463 // and the pointer is not needed
464 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
465  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
466  tseq, \
467  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
468  >::type
469 
470 #define EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(tseq) \
471  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
472 
473 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
474  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
475  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
476  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
477  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}
478 
479 #endif

493  Start of -include/epiworld/misc.hpp-

499 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MISC_HPP
500 #define EPIWORLD_MISC_HPP
501 
502 template<typename TSeq>
503 class Model;
504 
505 template<typename TSeq>
506 class Agent;
507 
508 // Relevant for anything using vecHasher function ------------------------------
513 template <typename T>
514 struct vecHasher {
515  std::size_t operator()(std::vector< T > const& dat) const noexcept {
516 
517  std::hash< T > hasher;
518  std::size_t hash = hasher(dat[0u]);
519 
520  // ^ makes bitwise XOR
521  // 0x9e3779b9 is a 32 bit constant (comes from the golden ratio)
522  // << is a shift operator, something like lhs * 2^(rhs)
523  if (dat.size() > 1u)
524  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
525  hash ^= hasher(dat[i]) + 0x9e3779b9 + (hash<<6) + (hash>>2);
526 
527  return hash;
528 
529  }
530 };
531 
532 template<typename Ta = epiworld_double, typename Tb = epiworld_fast_uint>
533 using MapVec_type = std::unordered_map< std::vector< Ta >, Tb, vecHasher<Ta>>;
534 
547 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
548 inline TSeq default_sequence(int seq_count);
549 
550 // Making it 'static' so that we don't have problems when including the
551 // header. This is important during the linkage, e.g., in R.
552 // See https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/storage_duration#Linkage
553 // static int _n_sequences_created = 0;
554 
555 template<>
556 inline bool default_sequence(int seq_count) {
557 
558  if (seq_count == 2)
559  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
560 
561  return seq_count++ ? false : true;
562 }
563 
564 template<>
565 inline int default_sequence(int seq_count) {
566  return seq_count++;
567 }
568 
569 template<>
570 inline epiworld_double default_sequence(int seq_count) {
571  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++);
572 }
573 
574 template<>
575 inline std::vector<bool> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
576 
577  if (seq_count == 2)
578  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
579 
580  return {seq_count++ ? false : true};
581 }
582 
583 template<>
584 inline std::vector<int> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
585  return {seq_count++};
586 }
587 
588 template<>
589 inline std::vector<epiworld_double> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
590  return {static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++)};
591 }
593 
602 template<typename Ta>
603 inline bool IN(const Ta & a, const std::vector< Ta > & b) noexcept
604 {
605  for (const auto & i : b)
606  if (a == i)
607  return true;
608 
609  return false;
610 }
611 
625 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ, typename TDbl = epiworld_double >
626 inline int roulette(
627  const std::vector< TDbl > & probs,
628  Model<TSeq> * m
629  )
630 {
631 
632  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
633  TDbl p_none = 1.0;
634  std::vector< int > certain_infection;
635  certain_infection.reserve(probs.size());
636 
637  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
638  {
639  p_none *= (1.0 - probs[p]);
640 
641  if (probs[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
642  certain_infection.push_back(p);
643 
644  }
645 
646  TDbl r = static_cast<TDbl>(m->runif());
647  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
648  // uniformly
649  if (certain_infection.size() > 0)
650  return certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
651 
652  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
653  std::vector< TDbl > probs_only_p(probs.size());
654  TDbl p_none_or_single = p_none;
655  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
656  {
657  probs_only_p[p] = probs[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - probs[p]));
658  p_none_or_single += probs_only_p[p];
659  }
660 
661  // Step 3: Roulette
662  TDbl cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
663  if (r < cumsum)
664  {
665  return -1;
666  }
667 
668  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
669  {
670  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
671  cumsum += probs_only_p[p]/(p_none_or_single);
672  if (r < cumsum)
673  return static_cast<int>(p);
674 
675  }
676 
677 
678  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
679  printf_epiworld("[epi-debug] roulette::cumsum = %.4f\n", cumsum);
680  #endif
681 
682  return static_cast<int>(probs.size() - 1u);
683 
684 }
685 
686 template<typename TSeq>
687 inline int roulette(std::vector< double > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
688 {
689  return roulette<TSeq, double>(probs, m);
690 }
691 
692 template<typename TSeq>
693 inline int roulette(std::vector< float > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
694 {
695  return roulette<TSeq, float>(probs, m);
696 }
697 
698 
699 template<typename TSeq>
700 inline int roulette(
701  epiworld_fast_uint nelements,
702  Model<TSeq> * m
703  )
704 {
705 
706  if ((nelements * 2) > m->array_double_tmp.size())
707  {
708  throw std::logic_error(
709  "Trying to sample from more data than there is in roulette!" +
710  std::to_string(nelements) + " vs " +
711  std::to_string(m->array_double_tmp.size())
712  );
713  }
714 
715  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
716  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
717  epiworld_fast_uint ncertain = 0u;
718  // std::vector< int > certain_infection;
719  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
720  {
721  p_none *= (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]);
722 
723  if (m->array_double_tmp[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
724  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + ncertain++] = p;
725  // certain_infection.push_back(p);
726 
727  }
728 
729  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
730  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
731  // uniformly
732  if (ncertain > 0u)
733  return m->array_double_tmp[nelements + std::floor(ncertain * r)]; // certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
734 
735  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
736  // std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p;
737  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
738  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
739  {
740  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p] =
741  m->array_double_tmp[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]));
742  p_none_or_single += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p];
743  }
744 
745  // Step 3: Roulette
746  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
747  if (r < cumsum)
748  return -1;
749 
750  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
751  {
752  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
753  cumsum += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p]/(p_none_or_single);
754  if (r < cumsum)
755  return static_cast<int>(p);
756 
757  }
758 
759  return static_cast<int>(nelements - 1u);
760 
761 }
762 
779 template <typename T>
780 inline std::map< std::string, T > read_yaml(std::string fn)
781 {
782 
783  std::ifstream paramsfile(fn);
784 
785  if (!paramsfile)
786  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
787 
788  std::regex pattern("^([^:]+)\\s*[:]\\s*([-]?[0-9]+|[-]?[0-9]*\\.[0-9]+)?\\s*$");
789 
790  std::string line;
791  std::smatch match;
792  auto empty = std::sregex_iterator();
793 
794  // Making room
795  std::map<std::string, T> parameters;
796 
797  while (std::getline(paramsfile, line))
798  {
799 
800  // Is it a comment or an empty line?
801  if (std::regex_match(line, std::regex("^([*].+|//.+|#.+|\\s*)$")))
802  continue;
803 
804  // Finding the pattern, if it doesn't match, then error
805  std::regex_match(line, match, pattern);
806 
807  if (match.empty())
808  throw std::logic_error("Line has invalid format:\n" + line);
809 
810  // Capturing the number
811  std::string anumber = match[2u].str() + match[3u].str();
812  T tmp_num = static_cast<T>(
813  std::strtod(anumber.c_str(), nullptr)
814  );
815 
816  std::string pname = std::regex_replace(
817  match[1u].str(),
818  std::regex("^\\s+|\\s+$"),
819  "");
820 
821  // Adding the parameter to the map
822  parameters[pname] = tmp_num;
823 
824  }
825 
826  return parameters;
827 
828 }
829 
830 #endif
831 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
833 
834  End of -include/epiworld/misc.hpp-
835 
838 
839 
840 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
842 
843  Start of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
844 
847 
848 
849 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
850 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
851 
852 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
853 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH 80
854 #endif
855 
859 class Progress {
860 private:
861  int width; ///< Total width size (number of bars)
862  int n; ///< Total number of iterations
863  epiworld_double step_size; ///< Size of the step
864  int last_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
865  int cur_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
866  int i; ///< Current iteration step
867 
868 public:
869  Progress() {};
870  Progress(int n_, int width_);
871  ~Progress() {};
872 
873  void start();
874  void next();
875  void end();
876 
877 };
878 
879 inline Progress::Progress(int n_, int width_) {
880 
881 
882  if (n_ < 0)
883  throw std::invalid_argument("n must be greater or equal than 0.");
884 
885  if (width_ <= 0)
886  throw std::invalid_argument("width must be greater than 0");
887 
888  width = std::max(7, width_ - 7);
889  n = n_;
890  step_size = n == 0? width : static_cast<epiworld_double>(width)/
891  static_cast<epiworld_double>(n);
892  last_loc = 0;
893  i = 0;
894 
895 }
896 
897 inline void Progress::start()
898 {
899 
900  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
901  for (int j = 0; j < (width); ++j)
902  {
903  printf_epiworld("_");
904  }
905  printf_epiworld("\n");
906  #endif
907 }
908 
909 inline void Progress::next() {
910 
911  if (i == 0)
912  start();
913 
914  cur_loc = std::floor((++i) * step_size);
915 
916  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
917  for (int j = 0; j < (cur_loc - last_loc); ++j)
918  {
919  printf_epiworld("|");
920  }
921  #endif
922 
923  last_loc = cur_loc;
924 
925 }
926 
927 inline void Progress::end() {
928 
929  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
930  printf_epiworld(" done.\n");
931  #endif
932 
933 }
934 
935 #endif
936 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
938 
939  End of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
940 
943 
944 
945 
946 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
948 
949  Start of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-bones.hpp-
950 
953 
954 
955 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_HPP
956 #define EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_HPP
957 
958 enum class DiagramType {
959  Mermaid, DOT
960 };
961 
962 class ModelDiagram {
963 private:
964 
965  std::map< std::pair< std::string, std::string >, int > data;
966  std::vector< std::string > states;
967  std::vector< epiworld_double > tprob;
968 
969  void draw_mermaid(std::string fn_output, bool self);
970  void draw_dot(std::string fn_output, bool self);
971 
972  void draw(
973  DiagramType diagram_type,
974  std::string fn_output = "",
975  bool self = false
976  );
977 
978 
979  int n_runs = 0; ///< The number of runs included in the diagram.
980 
1000  void read_transitions(
1001  const std::string & fn_transition
1002  );
1003 
1011  void read_transitions(
1012  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition
1013  );
1014 
1021  void transition_probability(bool normalize = true);
1022 
1023  void clear();
1024 
1025 public:
1026 
1027  ModelDiagram() {};
1028 
1029  void draw_from_data(
1030  DiagramType diagram_type,
1031  const std::vector< std::string > & states,
1032  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & tprob,
1033  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1034  bool self = false
1035  );
1036 
1037  void draw_from_file(
1038  DiagramType diagram_type,
1039  const std::string & fn_transition,
1040  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1041  bool self = false
1042  );
1043 
1044  void draw_from_files(
1045  DiagramType diagram_type,
1046  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition,
1047  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1048  bool self = false
1049  );
1050 
1051 };
1052 
1053 #endif
1054 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1056 
1057  End of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-bones.hpp-
1058 
1061 
1062 
1063 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1065 
1066  Start of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-meat.hpp-
1067 
1070 
1071 
1072 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_MEAT_HPP
1073 #define EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_MEAT_HPP
1074 
1075 inline void ModelDiagram::read_transitions(
1076  const std::string & fn_transition
1077 ) {
1078 
1079  // Checking if the file exists
1080  std::ifstream file(fn_transition);
1081 
1082  if (!file.is_open())
1083  throw std::runtime_error(
1084  "Could not open the file '" +
1085  fn_transition + "' for reading."
1086  );
1087 
1088  // Reading the data
1089  std::string line;
1090  int i = 0;
1091  while (std::getline(file, line))
1092  {
1093 
1094  // Skipping the first line
1095  if (i++ == 0)
1096  continue;
1097 
1098  std::istringstream iss(line);
1099  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
1100  int t;
1101  iss >> t;
1102  #endif
1103 
1104  int i_;
1105  std::string from_, to_;
1106  int counts_;
1107 
1108  iss >> i_;
1109 
1110  // Read the quoted strings
1111  iss >> std::quoted(from_) >> std::quoted(to_);
1112 
1113  // Read the integer
1114  iss >> counts_;
1115 
1116  if (counts_ > 0)
1117  {
1118  auto idx = std::make_pair(from_, to_);
1119  if (data.find(idx) == data.end())
1120  data[idx] = counts_;
1121  else
1122  data[idx] += counts_;
1123  }
1124 
1125  }
1126 
1127  // Incrementing the number of runs
1128  this->n_runs++;
1129 
1130 }
1131 
1132 inline void ModelDiagram::read_transitions(
1133  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition
1134 )
1135 {
1136 
1137  for (const auto & fn: fns_transition)
1138  this->read_transitions(fn);
1139 
1140  return;
1141 
1142 }
1143 
1144 inline void ModelDiagram::transition_probability(
1145  bool normalize
1146 )
1147 {
1148 
1149  // Generating the map of states
1150  std::set< std::string > states_set;
1151 
1152  for (const auto & d: data)
1153  {
1154  states_set.insert(d.first.first);
1155  states_set.insert(d.first.second);
1156  }
1157 
1158  // Generating the transition matrix
1159  states = std::vector< std::string >(states_set.begin(), states_set.end());
1160  size_t n_states = states.size();
1161  tprob.resize(n_states * n_states);
1162  std::fill(tprob.begin(), tprob.end(), 0.0);
1163 
1164  std::vector< epiworld_double > rowsum(n_states, 0.0);
1165  for (size_t i = 0; i < n_states; ++i)
1166  {
1167 
1168  for (size_t j = 0; j < n_states; ++j)
1169  {
1170 
1171  auto key = std::make_pair(states[i], states[j]);
1172  if (data.find(key) != data.end())
1173  tprob[i + j * n_states] = static_cast<epiworld_double>(
1174  data[key]
1175  );
1176 
1177  if (normalize)
1178  rowsum[i] += tprob[i + j * n_states];
1179 
1180  }
1181 
1182  if (normalize)
1183  {
1184  for (size_t j = 0; j < n_states; ++j)
1185  tprob[i + j * n_states] /= rowsum[i];
1186  }
1187 
1188  }
1189 
1190  return;
1191 
1192 
1193 }
1194 
1195 inline void ModelDiagram::clear()
1196 {
1197  data.clear();
1198  states.clear();
1199  tprob.clear();
1200  n_runs = 0;
1201  return;
1202 }
1203 
1204 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_mermaid(
1205  std::string fn_output,
1206  bool self
1207 ) {
1208  // Getting a sorting vector of indices from the states
1209  // string vector
1210  std::vector< size_t > idx(states.size());
1211  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0u);
1212 
1213  std::sort(
1214  idx.begin(),
1215  idx.end(),
1216  [&states = this->states](size_t i, size_t j) {
1217  return states[i] < states[j];
1218  }
1219  );
1220 
1221  std::vector< std::string > states_ids;
1222  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1223  states_ids.push_back("s" + std::to_string(i));
1224 
1225  std::string graph = "flowchart LR\n";
1226 
1227  // Declaring the states
1228  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1229  {
1230  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + "[" + states[idx[i]] + "]\n";
1231  }
1232 
1233  // Adding the transitions
1234  size_t n_states = states.size();
1235  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1236  {
1237  for (size_t j = 0u; j < states.size(); ++j)
1238  {
1239  if (!self && i == j)
1240  continue;
1241 
1242  if (tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states] > 0.0)
1243  {
1244  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " -->|" +
1245  std::to_string(tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states]) +
1246  "| " + states_ids[j] + "\n";
1247  }
1248  }
1249  }
1250 
1251  if (fn_output != "")
1252  {
1253  std::ofstream file(fn_output);
1254 
1255  if (!file.is_open())
1256  throw std::runtime_error(
1257  "Could not open the file " +
1258  fn_output +
1259  " for writing."
1260  );
1261 
1262  file << graph;
1263  file.close();
1264 
1265  } else {
1266  printf_epiworld("%s\n", graph.c_str());
1267  }
1268 
1269  return;
1270 }
1271 
1272 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_dot(std::string fn_output, bool self) {
1273  std::vector<size_t> idx(states.size());
1274  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0u);
1275 
1276  std::sort(
1277  idx.begin(),
1278  idx.end(),
1279  [&states = this->states](size_t i, size_t j) {
1280  return states[i] < states[j];
1281  }
1282  );
1283 
1284  std::vector<std::string> states_ids;
1285  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1286  states_ids.push_back("s" + std::to_string(i));
1287 
1288  std::string graph = "digraph G {\n\trankdir=LR;\n";
1289 
1290  // Declaring the states
1291  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1292  {
1293  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " [label=\"" + states[idx[i]] + "\"];\n";
1294  }
1295 
1296  // Adding the transitions
1297  size_t n_states = states.size();
1298  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1299  {
1300  for (size_t j = 0u; j < states.size(); ++j)
1301  {
1302  if (!self && i == j)
1303  continue;
1304 
1305  if (tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states] > 0.0)
1306  {
1307  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " -> " + states_ids[j] +
1308  " [label=\"" +
1309  std::to_string(tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states]) +
1310  "\"];\n";
1311  }
1312  }
1313  }
1314 
1315  graph += "}\n";
1316 
1317  if (fn_output != "")
1318  {
1319  std::ofstream file(fn_output);
1320 
1321  if (!file.is_open())
1322  throw std::runtime_error(
1323  "Could not open the file " +
1324  fn_output +
1325  " for writing."
1326  );
1327 
1328  file << graph;
1329  file.close();
1330 
1331  } else {
1332  printf_epiworld("%s\n", graph.c_str());
1333  }
1334 
1335  return;
1336 }
1337 
1338 inline void ModelDiagram::draw(
1339  DiagramType diagram_type,
1340  std::string fn_output,
1341  bool self
1342 )
1343 {
1344  switch (diagram_type) {
1345  case DiagramType::Mermaid:
1346  return draw_mermaid(fn_output, self);
1347  case DiagramType::DOT:
1348  return draw_dot(fn_output, self);
1349  default:
1350  throw std::logic_error("Unknown how to dispatch DiagramType.");
1351  }
1352 }
1353 
1354 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_file(
1355  DiagramType diagram_type,
1356  const std::string & fn_transition,
1357  const std::string & fn_output,
1358  bool self
1359 ) {
1360 
1361  this->clear();
1362 
1363  // Loading the transition file
1364  this->read_transitions(fn_transition);
1365 
1366  // Computing the transition probability
1367  this->transition_probability();
1368 
1369  // Actually drawing the diagram
1370  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1371 
1372  return;
1373 
1374 }
1375 
1376 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_files(
1377  DiagramType diagram_type,
1378  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition,
1379  const std::string & fn_output,
1380  bool self
1381 ) {
1382 
1383  this->clear();
1384 
1385  // Loading the transition files
1386  this->read_transitions(fns_transition);
1387 
1388  // Computing the transition probability
1389  this->transition_probability();
1390 
1391  // Actually drawing the diagram
1392  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1393 
1394  return;
1395 }
1396 
1397 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_data(
1398  DiagramType diagram_type,
1399  const std::vector< std::string > & states,
1400  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & tprob,
1401  const std::string & fn_output,
1402  bool self
1403 ) {
1404 
1405  this->clear();
1406 
1407  this->states = states;
1408  this->tprob = tprob;
1409 
1410  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1411 
1412  return;
1413 
1414 }
1415 
1416 #endif
1417 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1419 
1420  End of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-meat.hpp-
1421 
1424 
1425 
1426 
1427 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1429 
1430  Start of -include/epiworld/math/distributions.hpp-
1431 
1434 
1435 
1436 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MATH_DISTRIBUTIONS_HPP
1437 #define EPIWORLD_MATH_DISTRIBUTIONS_HPP
1438 
1439 // Implementing the factorial function
1447 inline double log_factorial(int n)
1448 {
1449  if (n == 0)
1450  return 0.0;
1451  return std::log(static_cast<double>(n)) + log_factorial(n-1);
1452 }
1453 
1464 inline double dpois(
1465  int k,
1466  double lambda,
1467  int max_n = 100,
1468  bool as_log = false
1469  )
1470 {
1471 
1472  if (max_n < k)
1473  throw std::runtime_error("max_n must be greater than k");
1474 
1475  double res = k * std::log(lambda) - lambda - log_factorial(
1476  std::min(k, max_n)
1477  );
1478 
1479  return as_log ? res : std::exp(res);
1480 }
1481 
1502 inline double dgenint(
1503  int g,
1504  double S,
1505  double p_c,
1506  double p_i,
1507  double p_r,
1508  double & p_0_approx,
1509  double & normalizing,
1510  int max_contacts = 200,
1511  int max_days = 200
1512  ) {
1513 
1514  if ((g < 1) || (g > max_days))
1515  return 0.0;
1516 
1517  if (p_0_approx < 0.0)
1518  {
1519 
1520  p_0_approx = 0.0;
1521  for (int i = 0; i < max_contacts; ++i)
1522  {
1523 
1524  p_0_approx += std::exp(
1525  dpois(i, S * p_c, max_contacts, true) +
1526  std::log(1.0 - p_i) * static_cast<double>(i)
1527  );
1528 
1529  }
1530  }
1531 
1532  double g_dbl = static_cast<double>(g);
1533 
1534  if (normalizing < 0.0)
1535  {
1536 
1537  normalizing = 1.0;
1538  double log1_p_r = std::log(1.0 - p_r);
1539  double log_p_r = std::log(p_r);
1540  double log_p_0_approx = std::log(p_0_approx);
1541  for (int i = 1; i <= max_days; ++i)
1542  {
1543 
1544  double i_dbl = static_cast<double>(i);
1545 
1546  normalizing -= std::exp(
1547  log1_p_r * (i_dbl - 1.0) +
1548  log_p_r +
1549  log_p_0_approx * (i_dbl - 1.0)
1550  );
1551  }
1552 
1553  }
1554 
1555 
1556  return std::exp(
1557  std::log(1 - p_r) * (g_dbl)+
1558  std::log(p_0_approx) * (g_dbl - 1.0) +
1559  std::log(1.0 - p_0_approx) -
1560  std::log(normalizing)
1561  );
1562 
1563 }
1564 
1565 // Mean of the generation interval
1577 inline double gen_int_mean(
1578  double S,
1579  double p_c,
1580  double p_i,
1581  double p_r,
1582  int max_days = 200,
1583  int max_n = 200
1584  ) {
1585 
1586  double mean = 0.0;
1587  double p_0_approx = -1.0;
1588  double normalizing = -1.0;
1589  for (int i = 1; i < max_days; ++i)
1590  {
1591  mean +=
1592  static_cast<double>(i) *
1593  dgenint(
1594  i, S, p_c, p_i, p_r, p_0_approx, normalizing, max_n, max_days
1595  );
1596 
1597  }
1598 
1599  return mean;
1600 
1601 }
1602 
1603 #endif
1604 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1606 
1607  End of -include/epiworld/math/distributions.hpp-
1608 
1611 
1612 
1613 
1614 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1616 
1617  Start of -include/epiworld/math/lfmcmc.hpp-
1618 
1621 
1622 
1623 #ifndef EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_HPP
1624 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_HPP
1625 
1626 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1628 
1629  Start of -include/epiworld//math/lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
1630 
1633 
1634 
1635 #ifndef EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1636 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1637 
1638 #ifndef epiworld_double
1639  #define epiworld_double float
1640 #endif
1641 
1642 
1643 template<typename TData>
1644 class LFMCMC;
1645 
1646 template<typename TData>
1647 using LFMCMCSimFun = std::function<TData(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1648 
1649 template<typename TData>
1650 using LFMCMCSummaryFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const TData&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1651 
1652 template<typename TData>
1653 using LFMCMCProposalFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1654 
1655 template<typename TData>
1656 using LFMCMCKernelFun = std::function<epiworld_double(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,epiworld_double,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1657 
1665 template<typename TData>
1666 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
1667  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
1668  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
1669  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1670 );
1671 
1684 template<typename TData>
1685 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
1686  epiworld_double scale,
1687  epiworld_double lb = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::min(),
1688  epiworld_double ub = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::max()
1689 );
1690 
1702 template<typename TData>
1703 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
1704  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
1705  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
1706  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1707 );
1708 
1719 template<typename TData>
1720 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
1721  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
1722  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
1723  epiworld_double epsilon,
1724  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1725 );
1726 
1738 template<typename TData>
1739 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
1740  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
1741  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
1742  epiworld_double epsilon,
1743  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1744 );
1745 
1751 template<typename TData>
1752 class LFMCMC {
1753 private:
1754 
1755  // Random number sampling
1756  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > m_engine = nullptr;
1757 
1758  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
1759  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
1760 
1761  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
1762  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
1763 
1764  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
1765  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
1766 
1767  // Process data
1768  TData m_observed_data;
1769  std::vector< TData > * m_simulated_data = nullptr;
1770 
1771  // Information about the size of the process
1772  size_t m_n_samples;
1773  size_t m_n_stats;
1774  size_t m_n_params;
1775 
1776  epiworld_double m_epsilon;
1777 
1778  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_initial_params; ///< Initial parameters
1779  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_params; ///< Proposed parameters for the next sample
1780  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_params; ///< Most recently accepted parameters (current state of MCMC)
1781  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with proposed parameters
1782  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with most recently accepted params
1783 
1784  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
1785 
1786  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_params; ///< Parameter samples
1787  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_stats; ///< Statistic samples
1788  std::vector< bool > m_all_sample_acceptance; ///< Indicator if sample was accepted
1789  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif()) for each sample
1790  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each sample
1791 
1792  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution of parameters from accepted samples
1793  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution of statistics from accepted samples
1794  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each accepted sample
1795 
1796  // Functions
1797  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> m_simulation_fun;
1798  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> m_summary_fun;
1799  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> m_proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
1800  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> m_kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
1801 
1802  // Misc
1803  std::vector< std::string > m_param_names;
1804  std::vector< std::string > m_stat_names;
1805 
1806  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_start_time;
1807  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_end_time;
1808 
1809  // Timing
1810  // std::chrono::milliseconds
1811  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> m_elapsed_time =
1812  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
1813 
1814  inline void get_elapsed_time(
1815  std::string unit,
1816  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
1817  std::string * unit_abbr,
1818  bool print
1819  ) const;
1820 
1821  void chrono_start();
1822  void chrono_end();
1823 
1824  // Progress
1825  bool verbose = true;
1826  Progress progress_bar;
1827 
1828 public:
1829 
1830  void run(
1831  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
1832  size_t n_samples_,
1833  epiworld_double epsilon_,
1834  int seed = -1
1835  );
1836 
1837  LFMCMC() {};
1838  LFMCMC(const TData & observed_data_) : m_observed_data(observed_data_) {};
1839  ~LFMCMC() {};
1840 
1841  // Setting LFMCMC variables
1842  void set_observed_data(const TData & observed_data_) {m_observed_data = observed_data_;};
1843 
1844  void set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun);
1845  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
1846  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);
1847  void set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun);
1848 
1849  void set_params_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1850  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1851 
1858  void set_rand_engine(std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & eng);
1859  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & get_rand_endgine();
1860  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
1861  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1862  epiworld_double runif();
1863  epiworld_double rnorm();
1864  epiworld_double rgamma();
1865  epiworld_double runif(epiworld_double lb, epiworld_double ub);
1866  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
1867  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1869 
1870  // Accessing parameters of the function
1871  size_t get_n_samples() const {return m_n_samples;};
1872  size_t get_n_stats() const {return m_n_stats;};
1873  size_t get_n_params() const {return m_n_params;};
1874  epiworld_double get_epsilon() const {return m_epsilon;};
1875 
1876  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_initial_params() const {return m_initial_params;};
1877  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_params() const {return m_current_proposed_params;};
1878  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_params() const {return m_current_accepted_params;};
1879  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_stats() const {return m_current_proposed_stats;};
1880  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_stats() const {return m_current_accepted_stats;};
1881 
1882  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_observed_stats() const {return m_observed_stats;};
1883 
1884  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_params() const {return m_all_sample_params;};
1885  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_stats() const {return m_all_sample_stats;};
1886  const std::vector< bool > & get_all_sample_acceptance() const {return m_all_sample_acceptance;};
1887  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_drawn_prob() const {return m_all_sample_drawn_prob;};
1888  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_sample_kernel_scores;};
1889 
1890  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_params() const {return m_all_accepted_params;};
1891  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_stats() const {return m_all_accepted_stats;};
1892  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_accepted_kernel_scores;};
1893 
1894  std::vector< TData > * get_simulated_data() const {return m_simulated_data;};
1895 
1896  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_params();
1897  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_stats();
1898 
1899  // Printing
1900  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_off();
1901  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_on();
1902  void print(size_t burnin = 0u) const;
1903 
1904 };
1905 
1906 #endif

2053 template<typename TData>
2054 class LFMCMC {
2055 private:
2056 
2057  // Random number sampling
2058  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > m_engine = nullptr;
2059 
2060  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
2061  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
2062 
2063  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
2064  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
2065 
2066  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
2067  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
2068 
2069  // Process data
2070  TData m_observed_data;
2071  std::vector< TData > * m_simulated_data = nullptr;
2072 
2073  // Information about the size of the process
2074  size_t m_n_samples;
2075  size_t m_n_stats;
2076  size_t m_n_params;
2077 
2078  epiworld_double m_epsilon;
2079 
2080  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_initial_params; ///< Initial parameters
2081  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_params; ///< Proposed parameters for the next sample
2082  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_params; ///< Most recently accepted parameters (current state of MCMC)
2083  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with proposed parameters
2084  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with most recently accepted params
2085 
2086  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
2087 
2088  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_params; ///< Parameter samples
2089  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_stats; ///< Statistic samples
2090  std::vector< bool > m_all_sample_acceptance; ///< Indicator if sample was accepted
2091  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif()) for each sample
2092  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each sample
2093 
2094  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution of parameters from accepted samples
2095  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution of statistics from accepted samples
2096  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each accepted sample
2097 
2098  // Functions
2099  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> m_simulation_fun;
2100  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> m_summary_fun;
2101  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> m_proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
2102  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> m_kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
2103 
2104  // Misc
2105  std::vector< std::string > m_param_names;
2106  std::vector< std::string > m_stat_names;
2107 
2108  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_start_time;
2109  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_end_time;
2110 
2111  // Timing
2112  // std::chrono::milliseconds
2113  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> m_elapsed_time =
2114  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
2115 
2116  inline void get_elapsed_time(
2117  std::string unit,
2118  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
2119  std::string * unit_abbr,
2120  bool print
2121  ) const;
2122 
2123  void chrono_start();
2124  void chrono_end();
2125 
2126  // Progress
2127  bool verbose = true;
2128  Progress progress_bar;
2129 
2130 public:
2131 
2132  void run(
2133  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
2134  size_t n_samples_,
2135  epiworld_double epsilon_,
2136  int seed = -1
2137  );
2138 
2139  LFMCMC() {};
2140  LFMCMC(const TData & observed_data_) : m_observed_data(observed_data_) {};
2141  ~LFMCMC() {};
2142 
2143  // Setting LFMCMC variables
2144  void set_observed_data(const TData & observed_data_) {m_observed_data = observed_data_;};
2145 
2146  void set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun);
2147  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
2148  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);
2149  void set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun);

2152  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
2153 
2160  void set_rand_engine(std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & eng);
2161  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & get_rand_endgine();
2162  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
2163  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
2164  epiworld_double runif();
2165  epiworld_double rnorm();
2166  epiworld_double rgamma();

2168  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
2169  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
2171 
2172  // Accessing parameters of the function
2173  size_t get_n_samples() const {return m_n_samples;};
2174  size_t get_n_stats() const {return m_n_stats;};
2175  size_t get_n_params() const {return m_n_params;};
2176  epiworld_double get_epsilon() const {return m_epsilon;};
2177 
2178  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_initial_params() const {return m_initial_params;};
2179  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_params() const {return m_current_proposed_params;};
2180  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_params() const {return m_current_accepted_params;};
2181  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_stats() const {return m_current_proposed_stats;};
2182  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_stats() const {return m_current_accepted_stats;};
2183 
2184  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_observed_stats() const {return m_observed_stats;};
2185 
2186  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_params() const {return m_all_sample_params;};
2187  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_stats() const {return m_all_sample_stats;};
2188  const std::vector< bool > & get_all_sample_acceptance() const {return m_all_sample_acceptance;};
2189  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_drawn_prob() const {return m_all_sample_drawn_prob;};
2190  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_sample_kernel_scores;};
2191 
2192  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_params() const {return m_all_accepted_params;};
2193  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_stats() const {return m_all_accepted_stats;};
2194  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_accepted_kernel_scores;};
2195 
2196  std::vector< TData > * get_simulated_data() const {return m_simulated_data;};
2197 
2198  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_params();
2199  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_stats();
2200 
2201  // Printing
2202  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_off();
2203  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_on();
2204  void print(size_t burnin = 0u) const;
2205 
2206 };
2207 
2208 #endif
2209 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2211 
2212  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
2213 
2216 
2217 
2218 
2226 template<typename TData>
2227 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
2228  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2229  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2230  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2231 ) {
2232 
2233  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2234  new_params[p] = old_params[p] + m->rnorm();
2235 
2236  return;
2237 }
2238 
2251 template<typename TData>
2252 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
2253  epiworld_double scale,
2254  epiworld_double lb,
2255  epiworld_double ub
2256 ) {
2257 
2258  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun =
2259  [scale,lb,ub](
2260  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2261  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2262  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2263  ) {
2264 
2265  // Making the proposal
2266  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2267  new_params[p] = old_params[p] + m->rnorm() * scale;
2268 
2269  // Checking boundaries
2270  epiworld_double d = ub - lb;
2271  int odd;
2272  epiworld_double d_above, d_below;
2273  for (auto & p : new_params)
2274  {
2275 
2276  // Correcting if parameter goes above the upper bound
2277  if (p > ub)
2278  {
2279  d_above = p - ub;
2280  odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_above / d)) % 2;
2281  d_above = d_above - std::floor(d_above / d) * d;
2282 
2283  p = (lb + d_above) * odd +
2284  (ub - d_above) * (1 - odd);
2285 
2286  // Correcting if parameter goes below upper bound
2287  } else if (p < lb)
2288  {
2289  d_below = lb - p;
2290  int odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_below / d)) % 2;
2291  d_below = d_below - std::floor(d_below / d) * d;
2292 
2293  p = (ub - d_below) * odd +
2294  (lb + d_below) * (1 - odd);
2295  }
2296 
2297  }
2298 
2299  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
2300  for (auto & p : new_params)
2301  if (p < lb || p > ub)
2302  throw std::range_error("The parameter is out of bounds.");
2303  #endif
2304 
2305 
2306  return;
2307 
2308  };
2309 
2310  return fun;
2311 }
2312 
2324 template<typename TData>
2325 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
2326  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2327  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2328  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2329 ) {
2330 
2331  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2332  new_params[p] = (old_params[p] + m->runif(-1.0, 1.0));
2333 
2334  return;
2335 }
2336 
2347 template<typename TData>
2348 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
2349  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
2350  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
2351  epiworld_double epsilon,
2352  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2353 ) {
2354 
2355  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
2356  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2357  ans += std::pow(observed_stats[p] - simulated_stats[p], 2.0);
2358 
2359  return std::sqrt(ans) < epsilon ? 1.0 : 0.0;
2360 
2361 }
2362 
2363 #define sqrt2pi() 2.5066282746310002416
2364 
2376 template<typename TData>
2377 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
2378  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
2379  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
2380  epiworld_double epsilon,
2381  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2382 ) {
2383 
2384  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
2385  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2386  ans += std::pow(observed_stats[p] - simulated_stats[p], 2.0);
2387 
2388  return std::exp(
2389  -.5 * (ans/std::pow(1 + std::pow(epsilon, 2.0)/3.0, 2.0))
2390  ) / sqrt2pi() ;
2391 
2392 }
2393 
2394 
2395 template<typename TData>
2396 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun)
2397 {
2398  m_proposal_fun = fun;
2399 }
2400 
2401 template<typename TData>
2402 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun)
2403 {
2404  m_simulation_fun = fun;
2405 }
2406 
2407 template<typename TData>
2408 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun)
2409 {
2410  m_summary_fun = fun;
2411 }
2412 
2413 template<typename TData>
2414 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun)
2415 {
2416  m_kernel_fun = fun;
2417 }
2418 
2419 
2420 template<typename TData>
2421 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::run(
2422  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
2423  size_t n_samples_,
2424  epiworld_double epsilon_,
2425  int seed
2426  )
2427 {
2428 
2429  // Starting timing
2430  chrono_start();
2431 
2432  // Setting the baseline parameters of the model
2433  m_n_samples = n_samples_;
2434  m_epsilon = epsilon_;
2435  m_initial_params = params_init_;
2436  m_n_params = params_init_.size();
2437 
2438  if (seed >= 0)
2439  this->seed(seed);
2440 
2441  m_current_proposed_params.resize(m_n_params);
2442  m_current_accepted_params.resize(m_n_params);
2443 
2444  if (m_simulated_data != nullptr)
2445  m_simulated_data->resize(m_n_samples);
2446 
2447  m_current_accepted_params = m_initial_params;
2448  m_current_proposed_params = m_initial_params;
2449 
2450  // Computing the baseline sufficient statistics
2451  m_summary_fun(m_observed_stats, m_observed_data, this);
2452  m_n_stats = m_observed_stats.size();
2453 
2454  // Reserving size
2455  m_current_proposed_stats.resize(m_n_stats);
2456  m_current_accepted_stats.resize(m_n_stats);
2457  m_all_sample_drawn_prob.resize(m_n_samples);
2458  m_all_sample_acceptance.resize(m_n_samples, false);
2459  m_all_sample_params.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_params);
2460  m_all_sample_stats.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_stats);
2461  m_all_sample_kernel_scores.resize(m_n_samples);
2462 
2463  m_all_accepted_params.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_params);
2464  m_all_accepted_stats.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_stats);
2465  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores.resize(m_n_samples);
2466 
2467  TData data_i = m_simulation_fun(m_initial_params, this);
2468 
2469  m_summary_fun(m_current_proposed_stats, data_i, this);
2470  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[0u] = m_kernel_fun(
2471  m_current_proposed_stats, m_observed_stats, m_epsilon, this
2472  );
2473 
2474  // Recording statistics
2475  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_stats; ++i)
2476  m_all_sample_stats[i] = m_current_proposed_stats[i];
2477 
2478  m_current_accepted_stats = m_current_proposed_stats;
2479 
2480  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2481  m_all_accepted_params[k] = m_initial_params[k];
2482 
2483  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2484  m_all_sample_params[k] = m_initial_params[k];
2485 
2486  // Init progress bar
2487  progress_bar = Progress(m_n_samples, 80);
2488  if (verbose) {
2489  progress_bar.next();
2490  }
2491 
2492  // Run LFMCMC
2493  for (size_t i = 1u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2494  {
2495  // Step 1: Generate a proposal and store it in m_current_proposed_params
2496  m_proposal_fun(m_current_proposed_params, m_current_accepted_params, this);
2497 
2498  // Step 2: Using m_current_proposed_params, simulate data
2499  TData data_i = m_simulation_fun(m_current_proposed_params, this);
2500 
2501  // Are we storing the data?
2502  if (m_simulated_data != nullptr)
2503  m_simulated_data->operator[](i) = data_i;
2504 
2505  // Step 3: Generate the summary statistics of the data
2506  m_summary_fun(m_current_proposed_stats, data_i, this);
2507 
2508  // Step 4: Compute the hastings ratio using the kernel function
2509  epiworld_double hr = m_kernel_fun(
2510  m_current_proposed_stats, m_observed_stats, m_epsilon, this
2511  );
2512 
2513  m_all_sample_kernel_scores[i] = hr;
2514 
2515  // Storing data
2516  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2517  m_all_sample_params[i * m_n_params + k] = m_current_proposed_params[k];
2518 
2519  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2520  m_all_sample_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] = m_current_proposed_stats[k];
2521 
2522  // Running Hastings ratio
2523  epiworld_double r = runif();
2524  m_all_sample_drawn_prob[i] = r;
2525 
2526  // Step 5: Update if likely
2527  if (r < std::min(static_cast<epiworld_double>(1.0), hr / m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i - 1u]))
2528  {
2529  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i] = hr;
2530  m_all_sample_acceptance[i] = true;
2531 
2532  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2533  m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] =
2534  m_current_proposed_stats[k];
2535 
2536  m_current_accepted_params = m_current_proposed_params;
2537  m_current_accepted_stats = m_current_proposed_stats;
2538  } else
2539  {
2540 
2541  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2542  m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] =
2543  m_all_accepted_stats[(i - 1) * m_n_stats + k];
2544 
2545  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i] = m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i - 1u];
2546  }
2547 
2548 
2549  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2550  m_all_accepted_params[i * m_n_params + k] = m_current_accepted_params[k];
2551 
2552  if (verbose) {
2553  progress_bar.next();
2554  }
2555  }
2556 
2557  // End timing
2558  chrono_end();
2559 
2560 }
2561 
2562 
2563 template<typename TData>
2564 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif()
2565 {
2566  return runifd->operator()(*m_engine);
2567 }
2568 
2569 template<typename TData>
2570 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif(
2571  epiworld_double lb,
2572  epiworld_double ub
2573 )
2574 {
2575  return runifd->operator()(*m_engine) * (ub - lb) + lb;
2576 }
2577 
2578 template<typename TData>
2579 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm()
2580 {
2581  return rnormd->operator()(*m_engine);
2582 }
2583 
2584 template<typename TData>
2585 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm(
2586  epiworld_double mean,
2587  epiworld_double sd
2588  )
2589 {
2590  return (rnormd->operator()(*m_engine)) * sd + mean;
2591 }
2592 
2593 template<typename TData>
2594 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma()
2595 {
2596  return rgammad->operator()(*m_engine);
2597 }
2598 
2599 template<typename TData>
2600 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma(
2601  epiworld_double alpha,
2602  epiworld_double beta
2603  )
2604 {
2605 
2606  auto old_param = rgammad->param();
2607 
2608  rgammad->param(std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta));
2609 
2610  epiworld_double ans = rgammad->operator()(*m_engine);
2611 
2612  rgammad->param(old_param);
2613 
2614  return ans;
2615 
2616 }
2617 
2618 template<typename TData>
2619 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::seed(epiworld_fast_uint s) {
2620 
2621  this->m_engine->seed(s);
2622 
2623 }
2624 
2625 template<typename TData>
2626 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_engine(std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & eng)
2627 {
2628  m_engine = eng;
2629 }
2630 
2631 template<typename TData>
2632 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
2633 {
2634  rgammad = std::make_shared<std::gamma_distribution<>>(alpha,beta);
2635 }
2636 
2637 template<typename TData>
2638 inline std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & LFMCMC<TData>::get_rand_endgine()
2639 {
2640  return m_engine;
2641 }
2642 
2643 // Step 1: Simulate data
2644 
2645 // Step 2: Compute the sufficient statistics
2646 
2647 // Step 3: Compute the hastings-ratio
2648 
2649 // Step 4: Accept/reject, and go back to step 1
2650 
2651 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
2652  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
2653  m_end_time - m_start_time).count(); \
2654  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
2655 
2656 template<typename TData>
2657 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::get_elapsed_time(
2658  std::string unit,
2659  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
2660  std::string * unit_abbr,
2661  bool print
2662 ) const {
2663 
2664  // Preparing the result
2665  epiworld_double elapsed;
2666  std::string abbr_unit;
2667 
2668  // Figuring out the length
2669  if (unit == "auto")
2670  {
2671 
2672  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
2673  static_cast<int>(floor(m_elapsed_time.count()))
2674  ).length();
2675 
2676  if (tlength <= 1)
2677  unit = "nanoseconds";
2678  else if (tlength <= 3)
2679  unit = "microseconds";
2680  else if (tlength <= 6)
2681  unit = "milliseconds";
2682  else if (tlength <= 8)
2683  unit = "seconds";
2684  else if (tlength <= 9)
2685  unit = "minutes";
2686  else
2687  unit = "hours";
2688 
2689  }
2690 
2691  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
2692  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
2693  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
2694  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
2695  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
2696  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
2697  else
2698  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
2699 
2700 
2701  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
2702  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
2703  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
2704  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
2705 
2706  if (!print)
2707  return;
2708 
2709  printf_epiworld("Elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
2710 }
2711 
2712 #undef DURCAST
2713 
2714 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2716 
2717  Start of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
2718 
2721 
2722 
2723 #ifndef LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
2724 #define LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
2725 
2726 template<typename TData>
2727 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::print(size_t burnin) const
2728 {
2729 
2730  // For each statistic or parameter in the model, we print three values:
2731  // - mean, the 2.5% quantile, and the 97.5% quantile
2732  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_params(m_n_params * 3, 0.0);
2733  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_stats(m_n_stats * 3, 0.0);
2734 
2735  // Compute the number of samples to use based on burnin rate
2736  size_t n_samples_print = m_n_samples;
2737  if (burnin > 0)
2738  {
2739  if (burnin >= m_n_samples)
2740  throw std::length_error(
2741  "The burnin is greater than or equal to the number of samples."
2742  );
2743 
2744  n_samples_print = m_n_samples - burnin;
2745 
2746  }
2747 
2748  epiworld_double n_samples_dbl = static_cast< epiworld_double >(
2749  n_samples_print
2750  );
2751 
2752  // Compute parameter summary values
2753  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2754  {
2755 
2756  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
2757  std::vector< epiworld_double > par_i(n_samples_print);
2758  for (size_t i = burnin; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2759  {
2760  par_i[i-burnin] = m_all_accepted_params[i * m_n_params + k];
2761  summ_params[k * 3] += par_i[i-burnin]/n_samples_dbl;
2762  }
2763 
2764  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
2765  std::sort(par_i.begin(), par_i.end());
2766 
2767  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u] =
2768  par_i[std::floor(.025 * n_samples_dbl)];
2769  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u] =
2770  par_i[std::floor(.975 * n_samples_dbl)];
2771 
2772  }
2773 
2774  // Compute statistics summary values
2775  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2776  {
2777 
2778  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
2779  std::vector< epiworld_double > stat_k(n_samples_print);
2780  for (size_t i = burnin; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2781  {
2782  stat_k[i-burnin] = m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k];
2783  summ_stats[k * 3] += stat_k[i-burnin]/n_samples_dbl;
2784  }
2785 
2786  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
2787  std::sort(stat_k.begin(), stat_k.end());
2788  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u] =
2789  stat_k[std::floor(.025 * n_samples_dbl)];
2790  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u] =
2791  stat_k[std::floor(.975 * n_samples_dbl)];
2792 
2793  }
2794 
2795  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
2796  printf_epiworld("LIKELIHOOD-FREE MARKOV CHAIN MONTE CARLO\n\n");
2797 
2798  printf_epiworld("N Samples (total) : %zu\n", m_n_samples);
2799  printf_epiworld("N Samples (after burn-in period) : %zu\n", m_n_samples - burnin);
2800 
2801  std::string abbr;
2802  epiworld_double elapsed;
2803  get_elapsed_time("auto", &elapsed, &abbr, false);
2804  printf_epiworld("Elapsed t : %.2f%s\n\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
2805 
2807  // PARAMETERS
2809  printf_epiworld("Parameters:\n");
2810 
2811  // Figuring out format
2812  std::string fmt_params;
2813 
2814  int nchar_par_num = 0;
2815  for (auto & n : summ_params)
2816  {
2817 
2818  int tmp_nchar;
2819 
2820  if (std::abs(n) < 1) {
2821  // std::log10(<1) will return negative number
2822  // std::log10(0) will return -inf and throw a runtime error
2823  tmp_nchar = 0;
2824  } else {
2825  tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(n)));
2826  }
2827 
2828  if (nchar_par_num < tmp_nchar)
2829  nchar_par_num = tmp_nchar;
2830  }
2831  nchar_par_num += 5; // 1 for neg padd, 2 for decimals, 1 the decimal point, and one b/c log(<10) < 1.
2832  std::string charlen = std::to_string(nchar_par_num);
2833 
2834  if (m_param_names.size() != 0u)
2835  {
2836  int nchar_par = 0;
2837  for (auto & n : m_param_names)
2838  {
2839  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
2840  if (nchar_par < tmp_nchar)
2841  nchar_par = tmp_nchar;
2842  }
2843 
2844  fmt_params = std::string(" -%-") +
2845  std::to_string(nchar_par) +
2846  std::string("s : % ") + charlen +
2847  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
2848  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
2849  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") +
2850  charlen + std::string(".2f)\n");
2851 
2852  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2853  {
2854  printf_epiworld(
2855  fmt_params.c_str(),
2856  m_param_names[k].c_str(),
2857  summ_params[k * 3],
2858  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
2859  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
2860  m_initial_params[k]
2861  );
2862  }
2863 
2864 
2865  } else {
2866 
2867  fmt_params = std::string(" [%-2ld]: % ") + charlen +
2868  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
2869  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
2870  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") + charlen +
2871  std::string(".2f)\n");
2872 
2873  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2874  {
2875 
2876  printf_epiworld(
2877  fmt_params.c_str(),
2878  k,
2879  summ_params[k * 3],
2880  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
2881  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
2882  m_initial_params[k]
2883  );
2884  }
2885 
2886  }
2887 
2889  // Statistics
2891  printf_epiworld("\nStatistics:\n");
2892  int nchar = 0;
2893  for (auto & s : summ_stats)
2894  {
2895  int tmp_nchar;
2896  if (std::abs(s) < 1) {
2897  // std::log10(<1) will return negative number
2898  // std::log10(0) will return -inf and throw a runtime error
2899  tmp_nchar = 0;
2900  } else {
2901  tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(s)));
2902  }
2903 
2904  if (nchar < tmp_nchar)
2905  nchar = tmp_nchar;
2906  }
2907 
2908  nchar += 5; // See above
2909 
2910  std::string nchar_char = std::to_string(nchar);
2911 
2912  // Figuring out format
2913  std::string fmt_stats;
2914  if (m_stat_names.size() != 0u)
2915  {
2916  int nchar_stats = 0;
2917  for (auto & n : m_stat_names)
2918  {
2919  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
2920  if (nchar_stats < tmp_nchar)
2921  nchar_stats = tmp_nchar;
2922  }
2923 
2924  fmt_stats = std::string(" -%-") +
2925  std::to_string(nchar_stats) +
2926  std::string("s : % ") + nchar_char +
2927  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
2928  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
2929  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
2930  std::string(".2f)\n");
2931 
2932  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2933  {
2934  printf_epiworld(
2935  fmt_stats.c_str(),
2936  m_stat_names[k].c_str(),
2937  summ_stats[k * 3],
2938  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
2939  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
2940  m_observed_stats[k]
2941  );
2942  }
2943 
2944 
2945  } else {
2946 
2947  fmt_stats = std::string(" [%-2ld] : % ") +
2948  nchar_char +
2949  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
2950  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
2951  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
2952  std::string(".2f)\n");
2953 
2954  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2955  {
2956  printf_epiworld(
2957  fmt_stats.c_str(),
2958  k,
2959  summ_stats[k * 3],
2960  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
2961  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
2962  m_observed_stats[k]
2963  );
2964  }
2965 
2966  }
2967 
2968  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
2969 }
2970 
2971 #endif
2972 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2974 
2975  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
2976 
2979 
2980 
2981 
2982 template<typename TData>
2983 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_start() {
2984  m_start_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2985 }
2986 
2987 template<typename TData>
2988 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_end() {
2989  m_end_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2990  m_elapsed_time += (m_end_time - m_start_time);
2991 }
2992 
2993 template<typename TData>
2994 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_params_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
2995 {
2996 
2997  if (names.size() != m_n_params)
2998  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of parameters in the model.");
2999 
3000  m_param_names = names;
3001 
3002 }
3003 template<typename TData>
3004 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
3005 {
3006 
3007  if (names.size() != m_n_stats)
3008  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of statistics in the model.");
3009 
3010  m_stat_names = names;
3011 
3012 }
3013 
3014 template<typename TData>
3015 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_mean_params()
3016 {
3017  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->m_n_params, 0.0);
3018 
3019  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
3020  {
3021  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
3022  res[k] += (this->m_all_accepted_params[k + m_n_params * i])/
3023  static_cast< epiworld_double >(m_n_samples);
3024  }
3025 
3026  return res;
3027 
3028 }
3029 
3030 template<typename TData>
3031 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_mean_stats()
3032 {
3033  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->m_n_stats, 0.0);
3034 
3035  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
3036  {
3037  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
3038  res[k] += (this->m_all_accepted_stats[k + m_n_stats * i])/
3039  static_cast< epiworld_double >(m_n_samples);
3040  }
3041 
3042  return res;
3043 
3044 }
3045 
3046 template<typename TData>
3047 inline LFMCMC<TData> & LFMCMC<TData>::verbose_off()
3048 {
3049  verbose = false;
3050  return *this;
3051 }
3052 
3053 template<typename TData>
3054 inline LFMCMC<TData> & LFMCMC<TData>::verbose_on()
3055 {
3056  verbose = true;
3057  return *this;
3058 }
3059 
3060 #endif

3063

3065

3082 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

3086 
3089 
3090 
3091 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
3092 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
3093 
3094 template<typename TSeq>
3095 class Model;
3096 
3097 template<typename TSeq>
3098 class DataBase;
3099 
3105 template<typename TSeq>
3106 class UserData
3107 {
3108  friend class Model<TSeq>;
3109  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
3110 
3111 private:
3112  Model<TSeq> * model;
3113 
3114  std::vector< std::string > data_names;
3115  std::vector< int > data_dates;
3116  std::vector< epiworld_double > data_data;
3117 
3118  epiworld_fast_uint k = 0u;
3119  epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u;
3120 
3121  int last_day = -1;
3122 
3123 public:
3124 
3125  UserData() = delete;
3126  UserData(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m) {};
3127  UserData(Model<TSeq> * m) : model(m) {};
3128 
3135  UserData(std::vector< std::string > names);
3136 
3144  void add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x);
3145  void add(
3146  epiworld_fast_uint j,
3147  epiworld_double x
3148  );
3150 
3159  epiworld_double & operator()(
3160  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3161  epiworld_fast_uint j
3162  );
3163 
3164  epiworld_double & operator()(
3165  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3166  std::string name
3167  );
3169 
3170  std::vector< std::string > & get_names();
3171 
3172  std::vector< int > & get_dates();
3173 
3174  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_data();
3175 
3176  void get_all(
3177  std::vector< std::string > * names = nullptr,
3178  std::vector< int > * date = nullptr,
3179  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data = nullptr
3180  );
3181

3183  epiworld_fast_uint ncol() const;
3184

3189 
3190 #endif

3195 
3198 
3199 
3200 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3202 
3203  Start of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
3204 
3207 
3208 
3209 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
3210 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
3211 
3212 template<typename TSeq>
3213 class UserData;
3214 
3215 template<typename TSeq>
3216 inline UserData<TSeq>::UserData(std::vector< std::string > names)
3217 {
3218 
3219  k = names.size();
3220  data_names = names;
3221 
3222 }
3223 
3224 template<typename TSeq>
3225 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x)
3226 {
3227 
3228  if (x.size() != k)
3229  throw std::out_of_range(
3230  "The size of -x-, " + std::to_string(x.size()) + ", does not match " +
3231  "the number of elements registered (" + std::to_string(k));
3232 
3233  for (auto & i : x)
3234  data_data.push_back(i);
3235 
3236  data_dates.push_back(model->today());
3237 
3238  n++;
3239  last_day = model->today();
3240 
3241 }
3242 
3243 template<typename TSeq>
3244 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x)
3245 {
3246 
3247  // Starting with a new day?
3248  if (static_cast<int>(model->today()) != last_day)
3249  {
3250 
3251  std::vector< epiworld_double > tmp(k, 0.0);
3252 
3253  tmp[j] = x;
3254 
3255  add(tmp);
3256 
3257  }
3258  else
3259  {
3260 
3261  this->operator()(n - 1, j) = x;
3262 
3263  }
3264 
3265 }
3266 
3267 template<typename TSeq>
3268 inline std::vector< std::string > & UserData<TSeq>::get_names()
3269 {
3270  return data_names;
3271 }
3272 
3273 template<typename TSeq>
3274 inline std::vector< int > & UserData<TSeq>::get_dates()
3275 {
3276  return data_dates;
3277 }
3278 
3279 template<typename TSeq>
3280 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & UserData<TSeq>::get_data()
3281 {
3282  return data_data;
3283 }
3284 
3285 template<typename TSeq>
3286 inline void UserData<TSeq>::get_all(
3287  std::vector< std::string > * names,
3288  std::vector< int > * date,
3289  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data
3290 )
3291 {
3292 
3293  if (names != nullptr)
3294  names = &this->data_names;
3295 
3296  if (date != nullptr)
3297  date = &this->data_dates;
3298 
3299  if (data != nullptr)
3300  data = &this->data_data;
3301 
3302 }
3303 
3304 template<typename TSeq>
3305 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
3306  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3307  epiworld_fast_uint j
3308 )
3309 {
3310 
3311  if (j >= k)
3312  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than k - 1.");
3313 
3314  if (i >= n)
3315  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than n - 1.");
3316 
3317  return data_data[k * i + j];
3318 
3319 }
3320 
3321 template<typename TSeq>
3322 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
3323  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3324  std::string name
3325 )
3326 {
3327  int loc = -1;
3328  for (epiworld_fast_uint l = 0u; l < k; ++l)
3329  {
3330 
3331  if (name == data_names[l])
3332  {
3333 
3334  loc = l;
3335  break;
3336 
3337  }
3338 
3339  }
3340 
3341  if (loc < 0)
3342  throw std::range_error(
3343  "The variable \"" + name + "\" is not present " +
3344  "in the user UserData database."
3345  );
3346 
3347  return operator()(i, static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(loc));
3348 
3349 }
3350 
3351 template<typename TSeq>
3352 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::nrow() const
3353 {
3354  return n;
3355 }
3356 
3357 template<typename TSeq>
3358 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::ncol() const
3359 {
3360  return k;
3361 }
3362 
3363 template<typename TSeq>
3364 inline void UserData<TSeq>::write(std::string fn)
3365 {
3366  std::ofstream file_ud(fn, std::ios_base::out);
3367 
3368  // File header
3369  file_ud << "\"date\"";
3370  for (auto & cn : data_names)
3371  file_ud << " \"" + cn + "\"";
3372  file_ud << "\n";
3373 
3374  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
3375  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
3376  {
3377  file_ud << data_dates[i];
3378 
3379  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
3380  file_ud << " " << data_data[ndata++];
3381 
3382  file_ud << "\n";
3383  }
3384 
3385  return;
3386 }
3387 
3388 template<typename TSeq>
3389 inline void UserData<TSeq>::print() const
3390 {
3391  // File header
3392  printf_epiworld("Total records: %llu\n", n);
3393  printf_epiworld("date");
3394 
3395  for (auto & cn : data_names)
3396  {
3397 
3398  printf_epiworld(" %s", cn.c_str());
3399 
3400  }
3401 
3402  printf_epiworld("\n");
3403 
3404  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
3405 
3406  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
3407  {
3408 
3409  printf_epiworld("%i", data_dates[i]);
3410 
3411  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
3412  {
3413 
3414  printf_epiworld(" %.2f", data_data[ndata++]);
3415 
3416  }
3417 
3418  printf_epiworld("\n");
3419 
3420  }
3421 
3422  return;
3423 }
3424 
3425 #endif

3428 
3429  End of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
3430

3436 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3438 
3439  Start of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
3440 
3443 
3444 
3445 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
3446 #define EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
3447 
3455 template<typename TSeq>
3456 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher(const TSeq & x);
3457 
3458 template<>
3459 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<int>>(const std::vector<int> & x) {
3460  return x;
3461 }
3462 
3463 template<>
3464 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<bool>>(const std::vector<bool> & x) {
3465  std::vector<int> ans(x.size());
3466  size_t j = 0;
3467  for (const auto & i : x)
3468  ans[j++] = i? 1 : 0;
3469  return ans;
3470 }
3471 
3472 template<>
3473 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<int>(const int & x) {
3474  return {x};
3475 }
3476 
3477 template<>
3478 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<bool>(const bool & x) {
3479  return {x ? 1 : 0};
3480 }
3481 
3489 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
3490 inline std::string default_seq_writer(const TSeq & seq);
3491 
3492 template<>
3493 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<int>>(
3494  const std::vector<int> & seq
3495 ) {
3496 
3497  std::string out = "";
3498  for (const auto & s : seq)
3499  out = out + std::to_string(s);
3500 
3501  return out;
3502 
3503 }
3504 
3505 template<>
3506 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<bool>>(
3507  const std::vector<bool> & seq
3508 ) {
3509 
3510  std::string out = "";
3511  for (const auto & s : seq)
3512  out = out + (s ? "1" : "0");
3513 
3514  return out;
3515 
3516 }
3517 
3518 template<>
3519 inline std::string default_seq_writer<bool>(
3520  const bool & seq
3521 ) {
3522 
3523  return seq ? "1" : "0";
3524 
3525 }
3526 
3527 template<>
3528 inline std::string default_seq_writer<int>(
3529  const int & seq
3530 ) {
3531 
3532  return std::to_string(seq);
3533 
3534 }
3535 
3536 
3537 
3538 #endif
3539 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3541 
3542  End of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
3543

3590 template<typename TSeq>
3591 class DataBase {
3592  friend class Model<TSeq>;
3593  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3594  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3595  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3596  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3597  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3598 private:
3599  Model<TSeq> * model;
3600 
3601  // Variants information
3602  MapVec_type<int,int> virus_id; ///< The squence is the key
3603  std::vector< std::string > virus_name;

3611  std::vector< int > tool_origin_date;

3614  std::function<std::string(const TSeq &)> seq_writer = default_seq_writer<TSeq>;
3615 
3616  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
3617  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_virus;
3618 
3619  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
3620  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_tool;
3621

3623  std::vector< int > today_total;
3624

3626  int today_total_nviruses_active = 0;
3627 
3628  int sampling_freq = 1;
3629

3632  std::vector< int > hist_virus_id;
3633  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_virus_state;
3634  std::vector< int > hist_virus_counts;
3635 
3636  // Tools history

3638  std::vector< int > hist_tool_id;
3639  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_tool_state;
3640  std::vector< int > hist_tool_counts;
3641 
3642  // Overall hist

3644  std::vector< int > hist_total_nviruses_active;
3645  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_total_state;

3817  * beginning of the simulation.

4056 struct Event {

4058  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
4059  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
4060  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
4061  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
4062  epiworld_fast_int queue;

4064  int idx_agent;
4065  int idx_object;
4066 public:
4083  Event(
4084  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
4085  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
4086  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
4087  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
4088  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
4089  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
4090  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
4091  int idx_agent_,
4092  int idx_object_
4093  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
4094  new_state(new_state_),
4095  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
4096  return;
4097  };
