4140 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4141  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
4142 
4143  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
4144  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
4145 
4146  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
4147  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
4148 
4149  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
4150  for (auto & v : vect) \
4151  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
4152  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
4153 
4154  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
4155  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
4156  for (auto & v : vect) \
4157  { \
4158  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
4159  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
4160  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
4161  }
4162 
4163  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
4164  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
4165  for (auto & v : vect) \
4166  { \
4167  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
4168  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
4169  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
4170  }
4171 
4172  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
4173  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
4174  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
4175  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
4176  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
4177  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
4178  }\
4179  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
4180  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
4181  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
4182  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
4183  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
4184  { \
4185  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
4186  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
4187  _j, \
4188  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
4189  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
4190  } \
4191  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
4192  }
4193 
4194  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
4195  if (a) \
4196  {\
4197  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
4198  }
4199 
4200  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
4201 #else
4202  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
4203  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
4204  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
4205  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
4206  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
4207  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
4208  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
4209  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
4210  if (a) \
4211  return false;
4212  #define epiexception(a) a
4213 #endif
4214 
4215 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
4216  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
4217 #else
4218  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
4219 #endif
4220 
4221 #endif

4318  { \

4320  } \
4321  for (epiworld_fast_uint niter = 0; niter < a.get_ndays(); ++niter)

4348 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
4349 // and the pointer is not needed
4350 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
4351  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
4352  tseq, \
4353  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
4354  >::type
4355 
4356 #define EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(tseq) \
4357  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
4358 
4359 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
4360  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
4361  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
4362  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
4363  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}

4384 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MISC_HPP

4387 template<typename TSeq>
4388 class Model;
4389 
4390 template<typename TSeq>
4391 class Agent;
4392 
4393 // Relevant for anything using vecHasher function ------------------------------
4398 template <typename T>
4399 struct vecHasher {
4400  std::size_t operator()(std::vector< T > const& dat) const noexcept {
4401 
4402  std::hash< T > hasher;
4403  std::size_t hash = hasher(dat[0u]);
4404 
4405  // ^ makes bitwise XOR
4406  // 0x9e3779b9 is a 32 bit constant (comes from the golden ratio)
4407  // << is a shift operator, something like lhs * 2^(rhs)
4408  if (dat.size() > 1u)
4409  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
4410  hash ^= hasher(dat[i]) + 0x9e3779b9 + (hash<<6) + (hash>>2);
4411 
4412  return hash;
4413 
4414  }
4415 };
4416 
4417 template<typename Ta = epiworld_double, typename Tb = epiworld_fast_uint>
4418 using MapVec_type = std::unordered_map< std::vector< Ta >, Tb, vecHasher<Ta>>;
4419 
4432 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
4433 inline TSeq default_sequence(int seq_count);
4434 
4435 // Making it 'static' so that we don't have problems when including the
4436 // header. This is important during the linkage, e.g., in R.
4437 // See https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/storage_duration#Linkage
4438 // static int _n_sequences_created = 0;
4439 
4440 template<>
4441 inline bool default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4442 
4443  if (seq_count == 2)
4444  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
4445 
4446  return seq_count++ ? false : true;
4447 }
4448 
4449 template<>
4450 inline int default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4451  return seq_count++;
4452 }
4453 
4454 template<>
4455 inline epiworld_double default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4456  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++);
4457 }
4458 
4459 template<>
4460 inline std::vector<bool> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4461 
4462  if (seq_count == 2)
4463  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
4464 
4465  return {seq_count++ ? false : true};
4466 }
4467 
4468 template<>
4469 inline std::vector<int> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4470  return {seq_count++};
4471 }
4472 
4473 template<>
4474 inline std::vector<epiworld_double> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4475  return {static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++)};
4476 }
4478 
4487 template<typename Ta>
4488 inline bool IN(const Ta & a, const std::vector< Ta > & b) noexcept
4489 {
4490  for (const auto & i : b)
4491  if (a == i)
4492  return true;
4493 
4494  return false;
4495 }
4496 
4510 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ, typename TDbl = epiworld_double >
4511 inline int roulette(
4512  const std::vector< TDbl > & probs,
4513  Model<TSeq> * m
4514  )
4515 {
4516 
4517  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
4518  TDbl p_none = 1.0;
4519  std::vector< int > certain_infection;
4520  certain_infection.reserve(probs.size());
4521 
4522  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4523  {
4524  p_none *= (1.0 - probs[p]);
4525 
4526  if (probs[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
4527  certain_infection.push_back(p);
4528 
4529  }
4530 
4531  TDbl r = static_cast<TDbl>(m->runif());
4532  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
4533  // uniformly
4534  if (certain_infection.size() > 0)
4535  return certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
4536 
4537  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
4538  std::vector< TDbl > probs_only_p(probs.size());
4539  TDbl p_none_or_single = p_none;
4540  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4541  {
4542  probs_only_p[p] = probs[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - probs[p]));
4543  p_none_or_single += probs_only_p[p];
4544  }
4545 
4546  // Step 3: Roulette
4547  TDbl cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
4548  if (r < cumsum)
4549  {
4550  return -1;
4551  }
4552 
4553  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4554  {
4555  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
4556  cumsum += probs_only_p[p]/(p_none_or_single);
4557  if (r < cumsum)
4558  return static_cast<int>(p);
4559 
4560  }
4561 
4562 
4563  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4564  printf_epiworld("[epi-debug] roulette::cumsum = %.4f\n", cumsum);
4565  #endif
4566 
4567  return static_cast<int>(probs.size() - 1u);
4568 
4569 }
4570 
4571 template<typename TSeq>
4572 inline int roulette(std::vector< double > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
4573 {
4574  return roulette<TSeq, double>(probs, m);
4575 }
4576 
4577 template<typename TSeq>
4578 inline int roulette(std::vector< float > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
4579 {
4580  return roulette<TSeq, float>(probs, m);
4581 }
4582 
4583 
4584 template<typename TSeq>
4585 inline int roulette(
4586  epiworld_fast_uint nelements,
4587  Model<TSeq> * m
4588  )
4589 {
4590 
4591  if ((nelements * 2) > m->array_double_tmp.size())
4592  {
4593  throw std::logic_error(
4594  "Trying to sample from more data than there is in roulette!" +
4595  std::to_string(nelements) + " vs " +
4596  std::to_string(m->array_double_tmp.size())
4597  );
4598  }
4599 
4600  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
4601  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
4602  epiworld_fast_uint ncertain = 0u;
4603  // std::vector< int > certain_infection;
4604  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4605  {
4606  p_none *= (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]);
4607 
4608  if (m->array_double_tmp[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
4609  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + ncertain++] = p;
4610  // certain_infection.push_back(p);
4611 
4612  }
4613 
4614  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
4615  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
4616  // uniformly
4617  if (ncertain > 0u)
4618  return m->array_double_tmp[nelements + std::floor(ncertain * r)]; // certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
4619 
4620  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
4621  // std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p;
4622  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
4623  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4624  {
4625  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p] =
4626  m->array_double_tmp[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]));
4627  p_none_or_single += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p];
4628  }
4629 
4630  // Step 3: Roulette
4631  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
4632  if (r < cumsum)
4633  return -1;
4634 
4635  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4636  {
4637  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
4638  cumsum += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p]/(p_none_or_single);
4639  if (r < cumsum)
4640  return static_cast<int>(p);
4641 
4642  }
4643 
4644  return static_cast<int>(nelements - 1u);
4645 
4646 }
4647 
4664 template <typename T>
4665 inline std::map< std::string, T > read_yaml(std::string fn)
4666 {
4667 
4668  std::ifstream paramsfile(fn);
4669 
4670  if (!paramsfile)
4671  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
4672 
4673  std::regex pattern("^([^:]+)\\s*[:]\\s*([-]?[0-9]+|[-]?[0-9]*\\.[0-9]+)?\\s*$");
4674 
4675  std::string line;
4676  std::smatch match;
4677  auto empty = std::sregex_iterator();
4678 
4679  // Making room
4680  std::map<std::string, T> parameters;
4681 
4682  while (std::getline(paramsfile, line))
4683  {
4684 
4685  // Is it a comment or an empty line?
4686  if (std::regex_match(line, std::regex("^([*].+|//.+|#.+|\\s*)$")))
4687  continue;
4688 
4689  // Finding the pattern, if it doesn't match, then error
4690  std::regex_match(line, match, pattern);
4691 
4692  if (match.empty())
4693  throw std::logic_error("Line has invalid format:\n" + line);
4694 
4695  // Capturing the number
4696  std::string anumber = match[2u].str() + match[3u].str();
4697  T tmp_num = static_cast<T>(
4698  std::strtod(anumber.c_str(), nullptr)
4699  );
4700 
4701  std::string pname = std::regex_replace(
4702  match[1u].str(),
4703  std::regex("^\\s+|\\s+$"),
4704  "");
4705 
4706  // Adding the parameter to the map
4707  parameters[pname] = tmp_num;
4708 
4709  }
4710 
4711  return parameters;
4712 
4713 }
4714 
4715 #endif
4716 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4718 
4719  End of -include/epiworld//misc.hpp-
4720 
4723 
4724

4727 
4728  Start of -include/epiworld//database-bones.hpp-
4729 
4732

4735 #define EPIWORLD_DATABASE_BONES_HPP

4748

4750 inline void default_add_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);

4760 
4766 template<typename TSeq>
4767 class DataBase {
4768  friend class Model<TSeq>;
4769  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4770  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4771  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4772  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4773  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4774 private:
4775  Model<TSeq> * model;
4776 
4777  // Variants information
4778  MapVec_type<int,int> virus_id; ///< The squence is the key
4779  std::vector< std::string > virus_name;
4780  std::vector< TSeq> virus_sequence;
4781  std::vector< int > virus_origin_date;
4782  std::vector< int > virus_parent_id;
4783 
4784  MapVec_type<int,int> tool_id; ///< The squence is the key
4785  std::vector< std::string > tool_name;
4786  std::vector< TSeq> tool_sequence;
4787  std::vector< int > tool_origin_date;
4788 
4789  std::function<std::vector<int>(const TSeq&)> seq_hasher = default_seq_hasher<TSeq>;
4790  std::function<std::string(const TSeq &)> seq_writer = default_seq_writer<TSeq>;
4791 
4792  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
4793  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_virus;
4794 
4795  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
4796  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_tool;
4797 
4798  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
4799  std::vector< int > today_total;
4800 
4801  // Totals
4802  int today_total_nviruses_active = 0;
4803 
4804  int sampling_freq = 1;
4805 
4806  // Variants history
4807  std::vector< int > hist_virus_date;
4808  std::vector< int > hist_virus_id;
4809  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_virus_state;
4810  std::vector< int > hist_virus_counts;
4811 
4812  // Tools history
4813  std::vector< int > hist_tool_date;
4814  std::vector< int > hist_tool_id;
4815  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_tool_state;
4816  std::vector< int > hist_tool_counts;
4817 
4818  // Overall hist
4819  std::vector< int > hist_total_date;
4820  std::vector< int > hist_total_nviruses_active;
4821  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_total_state;
4822  std::vector< int > hist_total_counts;
4823  std::vector< int > hist_transition_matrix;
4824 
4825  // Transmission network
4826  std::vector< int > transmission_date; ///< Date of the transmission event
4827  std::vector< int > transmission_source; ///< Id of the source
4828  std::vector< int > transmission_target; ///< Id of the target
4829  std::vector< int > transmission_virus; ///< Id of the variant
4830  std::vector< int > transmission_source_exposure_date; ///< Date when the source acquired the variant
4831 
4832  std::vector< int > transition_matrix;
4833 
4834  UserData<TSeq> user_data;
4835 
4836  void update_state(
4837  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4838  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
4839  bool undo = false
4840  );
4841 
4842  void update_virus(
4843  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
4844  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4845  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
4846  );
4847 
4848  void update_tool(
4849  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
4850  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4851  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
4852  );
4853 
4854  void record_transition(epiworld_fast_uint from, epiworld_fast_uint to, bool undo);
4855 
4856 
4857 public:
4858 
4859  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4860  int n_transmissions_potential = 0;
4861  int n_transmissions_today = 0;
4862  #endif
4863 
4864  DataBase() = delete;
4865  DataBase(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m), user_data(m) {};
4866  DataBase(const DataBase<TSeq> & db);
4867  // DataBase<TSeq> & operator=(const DataBase<TSeq> & m);
4868 
4877  void record_virus(Virus<TSeq> & v);
4878  void record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t);
4879  void set_seq_hasher(std::function<std::vector<int>(TSeq)> fun);
4880  void reset();
4881  Model<TSeq> * get_model();
4882  void record();
4883 
4884  const std::vector< TSeq > & get_sequence() const;
4885  const std::vector< int > & get_nexposed() const;
4886  size_t size() const;
4887 
4901  int get_today_total(std::string what) const;
4902  int get_today_total(epiworld_fast_uint what) const;
4903  void get_today_total(
4904  std::vector< std::string > * state = nullptr,
4905  std::vector< int > * counts = nullptr
4906  ) const;

4909  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4910  std::vector< int > & id,
4911  std::vector< int > & counts
4912  ) const;

4915  std::vector< int > & counts
4916  ) const;
4917

4919  std::vector< int > * date,
4920  std::vector< std::string > * state,
4921  std::vector< int > * counts
4922  ) const;
4923 
4924  void get_hist_virus(
4925  std::vector< int > & date,
4926  std::vector< int > & id,
4927  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4928  std::vector< int > & counts
4929  ) const;
4930 
4931  void get_hist_tool(
4932  std::vector< int > & date,
4933  std::vector< int > & id,
4934  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4935  std::vector< int > & counts
4936  ) const;
4937

4939  std::vector< std::string > & state_from,
4940  std::vector< std::string > & state_to,
4941  std::vector< int > & date,
4942  std::vector< int > & counts,
4943  bool skip_zeros
4944  ) const;
4946 
4957  void get_transmissions(
4958  std::vector<int> & date,
4959  std::vector<int> & source,
4960  std::vector<int> & target,
4961  std::vector<int> & virus,
4962  std::vector<int> & source_exposure_date
4963  ) const;
4964 
4965  void get_transmissions(
4966  int * date,
4967  int * source,
4968  int * target,
4969  int * virus,
4970  int * source_exposure_date
4971  ) const;
4973

4975  std::string fn_virus_info,
4976  std::string fn_virus_hist,
