4980  std::string fn_transmission,
4981  std::string fn_transition,
4982  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
4983  std::string fn_generation_time
4984  ) const;
4985 
4986  /***
4987  * @brief Record a transmission event
4988  * @param i,j Integers. Id of the source and target agents.
4989  * @param virus Integer. Id of the virus.
4990  * @param i_expo_date Integer. Date when the source agent was infected.
4991  * @details
4992  * If i is -1, then it means that the agent was assigned a virus at the
4993  * beginning of the simulation.
4994  */
4995  void record_transmission(int i, int j, int virus, int i_expo_date);
4996 
4997  size_t get_n_viruses() const;
4998  size_t get_n_tools() const;
4999 
5000  void set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names);
5001  void add_user_data(std::vector< epiworld_double > x);
5002  void add_user_data(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x);
5003  UserData<TSeq> & get_user_data();
5004 
5005 
5021  MapVec_type<int,int> get_reproductive_number() const;
5022 
5023  void get_reproductive_number(
5024  std::string fn
5025  ) const;
5027 
5041  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_transition_probability(
5042  bool print = true,
5043  bool normalize = true
5044  ) const;
5045 
5046  bool operator==(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const;
5047  bool operator!=(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
5048 
5058  void get_generation_time(
5059  std::vector< int > & agent_id,
5060  std::vector< int > & virus_id,
5061  std::vector< int > & time,
5062  std::vector< int > & gentime
5063  ) const;
5064 
5065  void get_generation_time(
5066  std::string fn
5067  ) const;
5069 
5070 };
5071 
5072 
5073 #endif
5074 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5076 
5077  End of -include/epiworld//database-bones.hpp-
5078 
5081 
5082 
5083 
5084 template<typename TSeq>
5085 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::reset()
5086 {
5087 
5088  // Initializing the counts
5089  today_total.resize(model->nstates);
5090  std::fill(today_total.begin(), today_total.end(), 0);
5091  for (auto & p : model->get_agents())
5092  ++today_total[p.get_state()];
5093 
5094  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5095  // Only the first should be different from zero
5096  {
5097  int n = static_cast<int>(model->size());
5098  if (today_total[0] != n)
5099  throw std::runtime_error("The number of susceptible agents is not equal to the total number of agents.");
5100 
5101  if (std::accumulate(today_total.begin(), today_total.end(), 0) != n)
5102  throw std::runtime_error("The total number of agents is not equal to the sum of the number of agents in each state.");
5103 
5104  }
5105  #endif
5106 
5107 
5108  transition_matrix.resize(model->nstates * model->nstates);
5109  std::fill(transition_matrix.begin(), transition_matrix.end(), 0);
5110  for (size_t s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5111  transition_matrix[s + s * model->nstates] = today_total[s];
5112 
5113  hist_virus_date.clear();
5114  hist_virus_id.clear();
5115  hist_virus_state.clear();
5116  hist_virus_counts.clear();
5117 
5118  hist_tool_date.clear();
5119  hist_tool_id.clear();
5120  hist_tool_state.clear();
5121  hist_tool_counts.clear();
5122 
5123  today_virus.resize(get_n_viruses());
5124  std::fill(today_virus.begin(), today_virus.begin(), std::vector<int>(model->nstates, 0));
5125 
5126  today_tool.resize(get_n_tools());
5127  std::fill(today_tool.begin(), today_tool.begin(), std::vector<int>(model->nstates, 0));
5128 
5129  hist_total_date.clear();
5130  hist_total_state.clear();
5131  hist_total_nviruses_active.clear();
5132  hist_total_counts.clear();
5133  hist_transition_matrix.clear();
5134 
5135  transmission_date.clear();
5136  transmission_virus.clear();
5137  transmission_source.clear();
5138  transmission_target.clear();
5139  transmission_source_exposure_date.clear();
5140 
5141  return;
5142 
5143 }
5144 
5145 template<typename TSeq>
5146 inline DataBase<TSeq>::DataBase(const DataBase<TSeq> & db) :
5147  virus_id(db.virus_id),
5148  virus_name(db.virus_name),
5149  virus_sequence(db.virus_sequence),
5150  virus_origin_date(db.virus_origin_date),
5151  virus_parent_id(db.virus_parent_id),
5152  tool_id(db.tool_id),
5153  tool_name(db.tool_name),
5154  tool_sequence(db.tool_sequence),
5155  tool_origin_date(db.tool_origin_date),
5156  seq_hasher(db.seq_hasher),
5157  seq_writer(db.seq_writer),
5158  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
5159  today_virus(db.today_virus),
5160  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
5161  today_tool(db.today_tool),
5162  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
5163  today_total(db.today_total),
5164  // Totals
5165  today_total_nviruses_active(db.today_total_nviruses_active),
5166  sampling_freq(db.sampling_freq),
5167  // Variants history
5168  hist_virus_date(db.hist_virus_date),
5169  hist_virus_id(db.hist_virus_id),
5170  hist_virus_state(db.hist_virus_state),
5171  hist_virus_counts(db.hist_virus_counts),
5172  // Tools history
5173  hist_tool_date(db.hist_tool_date),
5174  hist_tool_id(db.hist_tool_id),
5175  hist_tool_state(db.hist_tool_state),
5176  hist_tool_counts(db.hist_tool_counts),
5177  // Overall hist
5178  hist_total_date(db.hist_total_date),
5179  hist_total_nviruses_active(db.hist_total_nviruses_active),
5180  hist_total_state(db.hist_total_state),
5181  hist_total_counts(db.hist_total_counts),
5182  hist_transition_matrix(db.hist_transition_matrix),
5183  // Transmission network
5184  transmission_date(db.transmission_date),
5185  transmission_source(db.transmission_source),
5186  transmission_target(db.transmission_target),
5187  transmission_virus(db.transmission_virus),
5188  transmission_source_exposure_date(db.transmission_source_exposure_date),
5189  transition_matrix(db.transition_matrix),
5190  user_data(nullptr)
5191 {}
5192 
5193 // DataBase<TSeq> & DataBase<TSeq>::operator=(const DataBase<TSeq> & m)
5194 // {
5195 
5196 // }
5197 
5198 template<typename TSeq>
5199 inline Model<TSeq> * DataBase<TSeq>::get_model() {
5200  return model;
5201 }
5202 
5203 template<typename TSeq>
5204 inline const std::vector< TSeq > & DataBase<TSeq>::get_sequence() const {
5205  return virus_sequence;
5206 }
5207 
5208 template<typename TSeq>
5209 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record()
5210 {
5211 
5213  // DEBUGGING BLOCK
5215  EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(today_total, model->size())
5216  EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(today_total)
5217 
5218  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5219  // Checking whether the sums correspond
5220  std::vector< int > _today_total_cp(today_total.size(), 0);
5221  for (auto & p : model->population)
5222  _today_total_cp[p.get_state()]++;
5223 
5224  EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(
5225  _today_total_cp, today_total,
5226  "Sums of __today_total_cp in database-meat.hpp"
5227  )
5228 
5229  if (model->today() == 0)
5230  {
5231  if (hist_total_date.size() != 0)
5232  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_date should be of length 0.")
5233  if (hist_total_nviruses_active.size() != 0)
5234  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_nviruses_active should be of length 0.")
5235  if (hist_total_state.size() != 0)
5236  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_state should be of length 0.")
5237  if (hist_total_counts.size() != 0)
5238  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_counts should be of length 0.")
5239  if (hist_virus_date.size() != 0)
5240  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_date should be of length 0.")
5241  if (hist_virus_id.size() != 0)
5242  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_id should be of length 0.")
5243  if (hist_virus_state.size() != 0)
5244  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_state should be of length 0.")
5245  if (hist_virus_counts.size() != 0)
5246  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_counts should be of length 0.")
5247  if (hist_tool_date.size() != 0)
5248  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_date should be of length 0.")
5249  if (hist_tool_id.size() != 0)
5250  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_id should be of length 0.")
5251  if (hist_tool_state.size() != 0)
5252  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_state should be of length 0.")
5253  if (hist_tool_counts.size() != 0)
5254  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_counts should be of length 0.")
5255  }
5256  #endif
5258 
5259  // Only store every now and then
5260  if ((model->today() % sampling_freq) == 0)
5261  {
5262 
5263  // Recording virus's history
5264  for (auto & p : virus_id)
5265  {
5266 
5267  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5268  {
5269 
5270  hist_virus_date.push_back(model->today());
5271  hist_virus_id.push_back(p.second);
5272  hist_virus_state.push_back(s);
5273  hist_virus_counts.push_back(today_virus[p.second][s]);
5274 
5275  }
5276 
5277  }
5278 
5279  // Recording tool's history
5280  for (auto & p : tool_id)
5281  {
5282 
5283  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5284  {
5285 
5286  hist_tool_date.push_back(model->today());
5287  hist_tool_id.push_back(p.second);
5288  hist_tool_state.push_back(s);
5289  hist_tool_counts.push_back(today_tool[p.second][s]);
5290 
5291  }
5292 
5293  }
5294 
5295  // Recording the overall history
5296  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5297  {
5298  hist_total_date.push_back(model->today());
5299  hist_total_nviruses_active.push_back(today_total_nviruses_active);
5300  hist_total_state.push_back(s);
5301  hist_total_counts.push_back(today_total[s]);
5302  }
5303 
5304  for (auto cell : transition_matrix)
5305  hist_transition_matrix.push_back(cell);
5306 
5307  // Now the diagonal must reflect the state
5308  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < model->nstates; ++s_i)
5309  {
5310 
5311  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < model->nstates; ++s_j)
5312  {
5313 
5314  if ((s_i != s_j) && (transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates] > 0))
5315  {
5316  transition_matrix[s_j + s_j * model->nstates] +=
5317  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates];
5318 
5319  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates] = 0;
5320  }
5321 
5322  }
5323 
5324  }
5325 
5326  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5327  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < model->nstates; ++s_i)
5328  {
5329  if (transition_matrix[s_i + s_i * model->nstates] !=
5330  today_total[s_i])
5331  throw std::logic_error(
5332  "The diagonal of the updated transition Matrix should match the daily totals"
5333  );
5334  }
5335  #endif
5336 
5337  }
5338 
5339 }
5340 
5341 template<typename TSeq>
5342 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_virus(Virus<TSeq> & v)
5343 {
5344 
5345  // If no sequence, then need to add one. This is regardless of the case
5346  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5347  {
5348  if (v.get_sequence() == -1)
5349  v.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5350  static_cast<int>(virus_name.size())
5351  ));
5352  }
5353  else
5354  {
5355  if (v.get_sequence() == nullptr)
5356  v.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5357  static_cast<int>(virus_name.size())
5358  ));
5359  }
5360 
5361  // Negative id -> virus hasn't been recorded
5362  if (v.get_id() < 0)
5363  {
5364 
5365  epiworld_fast_uint new_id = virus_id.size();
5366  virus_name.push_back(v.get_name());
5367 
5368  // Generating the hash
5369  std::vector< int > hash;
5370  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5371  {
5372  hash = seq_hasher(v.get_sequence());
5373  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5374  virus_sequence.push_back(v.get_sequence());
5375  }
5376  else
5377  {
5378  hash = seq_hasher(*v.get_sequence());
5379  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5380  virus_sequence.push_back(*v.get_sequence());
5381  }
5382 
5383 
5384  virus_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5385 
5386  virus_parent_id.push_back(v.get_id()); // Must be -99
5387 
5388  today_virus.push_back({});
5389  today_virus[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5390 
5391  // Updating the variant
5392  v.set_id(new_id);
5393  v.set_date(model->today());
5394 
5395  today_total_nviruses_active++;
5396 
5397  }
5398  else
5399  { // In this case, the virus is already on record, need to make sure
5400  // The new sequence is new.
5401 
5402  // Updating registry
5403  std::vector< int > hash;
5404  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(TSeq)
5405  {
5406  hash = seq_hasher(v.get_sequence());
5407  }
5408  else
5409  {
5410  hash = seq_hasher(*v.get_sequence());
5411  }
5412  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = v.get_id();
5413  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
5414 
5415  // If the sequence is new, then it means that the
5416  if (virus_id.find(hash) == virus_id.end())
5417  {
5418 
5419  new_id = virus_id.size();
5420  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5421  virus_name.push_back(v.get_name());
5422 
5423  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5424  {
5425  virus_sequence.push_back(v.get_sequence());
5426  }
5427  else
5428  {
5429  virus_sequence.push_back(*v.get_sequence());
5430  }
5431 
5432  virus_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5433 
5434  virus_parent_id.push_back(old_id);
5435 
5436  today_virus.push_back({});
5437  today_virus[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5438 
5439  // Updating the variant
5440  v.set_id(new_id);
5441  v.set_date(model->today());
5442 
5443  today_total_nviruses_active++;
5444 
5445  } else {
5446 
5447  // Finding the id
5448  new_id = virus_id[hash];
5449 
5450  // Reflecting the change
5451  v.set_id(new_id);
5452  v.set_date(virus_origin_date[new_id]);
5453 
5454  }
5455 
5456  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
5457  if (v.get_agent() != nullptr)
5458  {
5459  // Correcting math
5460  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_state = v.get_agent()->get_state();
5461  today_virus[old_id][tmp_state]--;
5462  today_virus[new_id][tmp_state]++;
5463 
5464  }
5465 
5466  }
5467 
5468  return;
5469 
5470 }
5471 
5472 template<typename TSeq>
5473 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t)
5474 {
5475 
5476  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5477  {
5478  if (t.get_sequence() == -1)
5479  t.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5480  static_cast<int>(tool_name.size())
5481  ));
5482  }
5483  else
5484  {
5485  if (t.get_sequence() == nullptr)
5486  t.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5487  static_cast<int>(tool_name.size())
5488  ));
5489  }
5490 
5491  if (t.get_id() < 0)
5492  {
5493 
5494  epiworld_fast_uint new_id = tool_id.size();
5495  tool_name.push_back(t.get_name());
5496 
5497  std::vector< int > hash;
5498  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5499  {
5500  hash = seq_hasher(t.get_sequence());
5501  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5502  tool_sequence.push_back(t.get_sequence());
5503  }
5504  else
5505  {
5506  hash = seq_hasher(*t.get_sequence());
5507  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5508  tool_sequence.push_back(*t.get_sequence());
5509 
5510  }
5511  tool_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5512 
5513  today_tool.push_back({});
5514  today_tool[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5515 
5516  // Updating the tool
5517  t.set_id(new_id);
5518  t.set_date(model->today());
5519 
5520  } else {
5521 
5522  // Updating registry
5523  std::vector< int > hash;
5524  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5525  {
5526  hash = seq_hasher(t.get_sequence());
5527  }
5528  else
5529  {
5530  hash = seq_hasher(*t.get_sequence());
5531  }
5532  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = t.get_id();
5533  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
5534 
5535  if (tool_id.find(hash) == tool_id.end())
5536  {
5537 
5538  new_id = tool_id.size();
5539  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5540  tool_name.push_back(t.get_name());
5541 
5542  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5543  {
5544  tool_sequence.push_back(t.get_sequence());
5545  }
5546  else
5547  {
5548  tool_sequence.push_back(*t.get_sequence());
5549  }
5550 
5551  tool_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5552 
5553  today_tool.push_back({});
5554  today_tool[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5555 
5556  // Updating the tool
5557  t.set_id(new_id);
5558  t.set_date(model->today());
5559 
5560  } else {
5561 
5562  // Finding the id
5563  new_id = tool_id[hash];
5564 
5565  // Reflecting the change
5566  t.set_id(new_id);
5567  t.set_date(tool_origin_date[new_id]);
5568 
5569  }
5570 
5571  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
5572  if (t.get_agent() != nullptr)
5573  {
5574  // Correcting math
5575  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_state = t.get_agent()->get_state();
5576  today_tool[old_id][tmp_state]--;
5577  today_tool[new_id][tmp_state]++;
5578 
5579  }
5580 
5581  }
5582 
5583 
5584 
5585  return;
5586 }
5587 
5588 template<typename TSeq>
5589 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::size() const
5590 {
5591  return virus_id.size();
5592 }
5593 
5594 template<typename TSeq>
5595 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_state(
5596  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5597  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
5598  bool undo
5599 ) {
5600 
5601  if (prev_state == new_state)
5602  return; // No need to update if the state is the same
5603 
5604  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5605  // Checking ranges (should be within expected)
5606  if ((prev_state >= model->nstates))
5607  throw std::out_of_range(
5608  "prev_state is out of range in DataBase::update_state"
5609  );
5610  if ((new_state >= model->nstates))
5611  throw std::out_of_range(
5612  "new_state is out of range in DataBase::update_state"
5613  );
5614  if (prev_state == new_state)
5615  throw std::logic_error(
5616  "prev_state and new_state are the same in DataBase::update_state"
5617  );
5618  #endif
5619 
5620  if (undo)
5621  {
5622 
5623  today_total[prev_state]++;
5624  today_total[new_state]--;
5625 
5626  } else {
5627 
5628  today_total[prev_state]--;
5629  today_total[new_state]++;
5630 
5631  }
5632 
5633  record_transition(prev_state, new_state, undo);
5634 
5635  return;
5636 }
5637 
5638 template<typename TSeq>
5639 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_virus(
5640  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
5641  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5642  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
5643 ) {
5644 
5645  today_virus[virus_id][prev_state]--;
5646  today_virus[virus_id][new_state]++;
5647 
5648  return;
5649 
5650 }
5651 
5652 template<typename TSeq>
5653 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_tool(
5654  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
5655  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5656  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
5657 ) {
5658 
5659 
5660  today_tool[tool_id][prev_state]--;
5661  today_tool[tool_id][new_state]++;
5662 
5663  return;
5664 
5665 }
5666 
5667 template<typename TSeq>
5668 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transition(
5669  epiworld_fast_uint from,
5670  epiworld_fast_uint to,
5671  bool undo
5672 ) {
5673 
5674  if (undo)
5675  {
5676 
5677  transition_matrix[to * model->nstates + from]--;
5678  transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from]++;
5679 
5680  } else {
5681 
5682  transition_matrix[to * model->nstates + from]++;
5683  transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from]--;
5684 
5685  }
5686 
5687  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5688  if (transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from] < 0)
5689  throw std::logic_error("An entry in transition matrix is negative.");
5690  #endif
5691 
5692 }
5693 
5694 template<typename TSeq>
5695 inline int DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
5696  std::string what
5697 ) const
5698 {
5699 
5700  for (auto i = 0u; i < model->states_labels.size(); ++i)
5701  {
5702  if (model->states_labels[i] == what)
5703  return today_total[i];
5704  }
5705 
5706  throw std::range_error("The value '" + what + "' is not in the model.");
5707 
5708 }
5709 
5710 template<typename TSeq>
5711 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
5712  std::vector< std::string > * state,
5713  std::vector< int > * counts
5714 ) const
5715 {
5716  if (state != nullptr)
5717  (*state) = model->states_labels;
5718 
5719  if (counts != nullptr)
5720  *counts = today_total;
5721 
5722 }
5723 
5724 template<typename TSeq>
5725 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_virus(
5726  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5727  std::vector< int > & id,
5728  std::vector< int > & counts
5729  ) const
5730 {
5731 
5732  state.resize(today_virus.size(), "");
5733  id.resize(today_virus.size(), 0);
5734  counts.resize(today_virus.size(),0);
5735 
5736  int n = 0u;
5737  for (epiworld_fast_uint v = 0u; v < today_virus.size(); ++v)
5738  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->states_labels.size(); ++s)
5739  {
5740  state[n] = model->states_labels[s];
5741  id[n] = static_cast<int>(v);
5742  counts[n++] = today_virus[v][s];
5743 
5744  }
5745 
5746 }
5747 
5748 template<typename TSeq>
5749 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_total(
5750  std::vector< int > * date,
5751  std::vector< std::string > * state,
5752  std::vector< int > * counts
5753 ) const
5754 {
5755 
5756  if (date != nullptr)
5757  *date = hist_total_date;
5758 
5759  if (state != nullptr)
5760  {
5761  state->resize(hist_total_state.size(), "");
5762  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_total_state.size(); ++i)
5763  state->operator[](i) = model->states_labels[hist_total_state[i]];
5764  }
5765 
5766  if (counts != nullptr)
5767  *counts = hist_total_counts;
5768 
5769  return;
5770 
5771 }
5772 
5773 template<typename TSeq>
5774 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_virus(
5775  std::vector< int > & date,
5776  std::vector< int > & id,
5777  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5778  std::vector< int > & counts
5779 ) const {
5780 
5781  date = hist_virus_date;
5782  std::vector< std::string > labels;
5783  labels = model->states_labels;
5784 
5785  id = hist_virus_id;
5786  state.resize(hist_virus_state.size(), "");
5787  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_virus_state.size(); ++i)
5788  state[i] = labels[hist_virus_state[i]];
5789 
5790  counts = hist_virus_counts;
5791 
5792  return;
5793 
5794 }
5795 
5796 
5797 template<typename TSeq>
5798 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_tool(
5799  std::vector< int > & date,
5800  std::vector< int > & id,
5801  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5802  std::vector< int > & counts
5803 ) const {
5804 
5805  date = hist_tool_date;
5806  std::vector< std::string > labels;
5807  labels = model->states_labels;
5808 
5809  id = hist_tool_id;
5810  state.resize(hist_tool_state.size(), "");
5811  for (size_t i = 0u; i < hist_tool_state.size(); ++i)
5812  state[i] = labels[hist_tool_state[i]];
5813 
5814  counts = hist_tool_counts;
5815 
5816  return;
5817 
5818 }
5819 
5820 template<typename TSeq>
5821 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_transition_matrix(
5822  std::vector< int > & counts
5823 ) const
5824 {
5825 
5826  counts = transition_matrix;
5827 
5828  return;
5829 
5830 }
5831 
5832 template<typename TSeq>
5833 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_transition_matrix(
5834  std::vector< std::string > & state_from,
5835  std::vector< std::string > & state_to,
5836  std::vector< int > & date,
5837  std::vector< int > & counts,
5838  bool skip_zeros
5839 ) const
5840 {
5841 
5842  size_t n = this->hist_transition_matrix.size();
5843 
5844  // Clearing the previous vectors
5845  state_from.clear();
5846  state_to.clear();
5847  date.clear();
5848  counts.clear();
5849 
5850  // Reserving space
5851  state_from.reserve(n);
5852  state_to.reserve(n);
5853  date.reserve(n);
5854  counts.reserve(n);
5855 
5856  size_t n_states = model->nstates;
5857  size_t n_steps = model->get_ndays();
5858 
5859  // If n is zero, then we are done
5860  if (n == 0u)
5861  return;
5862 
5863  for (size_t step = 0u; step <= n_steps; ++step) // The final step counts
5864  {
5865  for (size_t j = 0u; j < n_states; ++j) // Column major storage
5866  {
5867  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_states; ++i)
5868  {
5869  // Retrieving the value of the day
5870  int v = hist_transition_matrix[
5871  step * n_states * n_states + // Day of the data
5872  j * n_states + // Column (to)
5873  i // Row (from)
5874  ];
5875 
5876  // If we are skipping the zeros and it is zero, then don't save
5877  if (skip_zeros && v == 0)
5878  continue;
5879 
5880  state_from.push_back(model->states_labels[i]);
5881  state_to.push_back(model->states_labels[j]);
5882  date.push_back(hist_total_date[step * n_states]);
5883  counts.push_back(v);
5884 
5885  }
5886 
5887  }
5888  }
5889 
5890  return;
5891 
5892 
5893 }
5894 
5895 template<typename TSeq>
5896 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_transmissions(
5897  std::vector<int> & date,
5898  std::vector<int> & source,
5899  std::vector<int> & target,
5900  std::vector<int> & virus,
5901  std::vector<int> & source_exposure_date
5902 ) const
5903 {
5904 
5905  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
5906 
5907  date.resize(nevents);
5908  source.resize(nevents);
5909  target.resize(nevents);
5910  virus.resize(nevents);
5911  source_exposure_date.resize(nevents);
5912 
5913  get_transmissions(
5914  &date[0u],
5915  &source[0u],
5916  &target[0u],
5917  &virus[0u],
5918  &source_exposure_date[0u]
5919  );
5920 
5921 }
5922 
5923 template<typename TSeq>
5924 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_transmissions(
5925  int * date,
5926  int * source,
5927  int * target,
5928  int * virus,
5929  int * source_exposure_date
5930 ) const
5931 {
5932 
5933  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
5934 
5935  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nevents; ++i)
5936  {
5937 
5938  *(date + i) = transmission_date.at(i);
5939  *(source + i) = transmission_source.at(i);
5940  *(target + i) = transmission_target.at(i);
5941  *(virus + i) = transmission_virus.at(i);
5942  *(source_exposure_date + i) = transmission_source_exposure_date.at(i);
5943 
5944  }
5945 
5946 }
5947 
5948 template<typename TSeq>
5949 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::write_data(
5950  std::string fn_virus_info,
5951  std::string fn_virus_hist,
5952  std::string fn_tool_info,
5953  std::string fn_tool_hist,
5954  std::string fn_total_hist,
5955  std::string fn_transmission,
5956  std::string fn_transition,
5957  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
5958  std::string fn_generation_time
5959 ) const
5960 {
5961 
5962  if (fn_virus_info != "")
5963  {
5964  std::ofstream file_virus_info(fn_virus_info, std::ios_base::out);
5965 
5966  // Check if the file exists and throw an error if it doesn't
5967  if (!file_virus_info)
5968  {
5969  throw std::runtime_error(
5970  "Could not open file \"" + fn_virus_info +
5971  "\" for writing.")
5972  ;
5973  }
5974 
5975 
5976  file_virus_info <<
5977  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5978  "thread" << "virus_id " << "virus " << "virus_sequence " << "date_recorded " << "parent\n";
5979  #else
5980  "virus_id " << "virus " << "virus_sequence " << "date_recorded " << "parent\n";
5981  #endif
5982 
5983  for (const auto & v : virus_id)
5984  {
5985  int id = v.second;
5986  file_virus_info <<
5987  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5988  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
5989  #endif
5990  id << " \"" <<
5991  virus_name[id] << "\" " <<
5992  seq_writer(virus_sequence[id]) << " " <<
5993  virus_origin_date[id] << " " <<
5994  virus_parent_id[id] << "\n";
5995  }
5996 
5997  }
5998 
5999  if (fn_virus_hist != "")
6000  {
6001  std::ofstream file_virus(fn_virus_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6002 
6003  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6004  if (!file_virus)
6005  {
6006  throw std::runtime_error(
6007  "Could not open file \"" + fn_virus_hist +
6008  "\" for writing.")
6009  ;
6010  }
6011 
6012  file_virus <<
6013  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6014  "thread "<< "date " << "virus_id " << "virus " << "state " << "n\n";
6015  #else
6016  "date " << "virus_id " << "virus " << "state " << "n\n";
6017  #endif
6018 
6019  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_virus_id.size(); ++i)
6020  file_virus <<
6021  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6022  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6023  #endif
6024  hist_virus_date[i] << " " <<
6025  hist_virus_id[i] << " \"" <<
6026  virus_name[hist_virus_id[i]] << "\" " <<
6027  model->states_labels[hist_virus_state[i]] << " " <<
6028  hist_virus_counts[i] << "\n";
6029  }
6030 
6031  if (fn_tool_info != "")
6032  {
6033  std::ofstream file_tool_info(fn_tool_info, std::ios_base::out);
6034 
6035  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6036  if (!file_tool_info)
6037  {
6038  throw std::runtime_error(
6039  "Could not open file \"" + fn_tool_info +
6040  "\" for writing.")
6041  ;
6042  }
6043 
6044  file_tool_info <<
6045  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6046  "thread " <<
6047  #endif
6048  "id " << "tool_name " << "tool_sequence " << "date_recorded\n";
6049 
6050  for (const auto & t : tool_id)
6051  {
6052  int id = t.second;
6053  file_tool_info <<
6054  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6055  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6056  #endif
6057  id << " \"" <<
6058  tool_name[id] << "\" " <<
6059  seq_writer(tool_sequence[id]) << " " <<
6060  tool_origin_date[id] << "\n";
6061  }
6062 
6063  }
6064 
6065  if (fn_tool_hist != "")
6066  {
6067  std::ofstream file_tool_hist(fn_tool_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6068 
6069  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6070  if (!file_tool_hist)
6071  {
6072  throw std::runtime_error(
6073  "Could not open file \"" + fn_tool_hist +
6074  "\" for writing.")
6075  ;
6076  }
6077 
6078  file_tool_hist <<
6079  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6080  "thread " <<
6081  #endif
6082  "date " << "id " << "state " << "n\n";
6083 
6084  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_tool_id.size(); ++i)
6085  file_tool_hist <<
6086  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6087  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6088  #endif
6089  hist_tool_date[i] << " " <<
6090  hist_tool_id[i] << " " <<
6091  model->states_labels[hist_tool_state[i]] << " " <<
6092  hist_tool_counts[i] << "\n";
6093  }
6094 
6095  if (fn_total_hist != "")
6096  {
6097  std::ofstream file_total(fn_total_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6098 
6099  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6100  if (!file_total)
6101  {
6102  throw std::runtime_error(
6103  "Could not open file \"" + fn_total_hist +
6104  "\" for writing.")
6105  ;
6106  }
6107 
6108  file_total <<
6109  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6110  "thread " <<
6111  #endif
6112  "date " << "nviruses " << "state " << "counts\n";
6113 
6114  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_total_date.size(); ++i)
6115  file_total <<
6116  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6117  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6118  #endif
6119  hist_total_date[i] << " " <<
6120  hist_total_nviruses_active[i] << " \"" <<
6121  model->states_labels[hist_total_state[i]] << "\" " <<
6122  hist_total_counts[i] << "\n";
6123  }
6124 
6125  if (fn_transmission != "")
6126  {
6127  std::ofstream file_transmission(fn_transmission, std::ios_base::out);
6128 
6129  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6130  if (!file_transmission)
6131  {
6132  throw std::runtime_error(
6133  "Could not open file \"" + fn_transmission +
6134  "\" for writing.")
6135  ;
6136  }
6137 
6138  file_transmission <<
6139  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6140  "thread " <<
6141  #endif
6142  "date " << "virus_id virus " << "source_exposure_date " << "source " << "target\n";
6143 
6144  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < transmission_target.size(); ++i)
6145  file_transmission <<
6146  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6147  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6148  #endif
6149  transmission_date[i] << " " <<
6150  transmission_virus[i] << " \"" <<
6151  virus_name[transmission_virus[i]] << "\" " <<
6152  transmission_source_exposure_date[i] << " " <<
6153  transmission_source[i] << " " <<
6154  transmission_target[i] << "\n";
6155 
6156  }
6157 
6158  if (fn_transition != "")
6159  {
6160  std::ofstream file_transition(fn_transition, std::ios_base::out);
6161 
6162  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6163  if (!file_transition)
6164  {
6165  throw std::runtime_error(
6166  "Could not open file \"" + fn_transition +
6167  "\" for writing.")
6168  ;
6169  }
6170 
6171  file_transition <<
6172  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6173  "thread " <<
6174  #endif
6175  "date " << "from " << "to " << "counts\n";
6176 
6177  int ns = model->nstates;
6178 
6179  for (int i = 0; i <= model->today(); ++i)
6180  {
6181 
6182  for (int from = 0u; from < ns; ++from)
6183  {
6184  for (int to = 0u; to < ns; ++to)
6185  {
6186  // Skipping the zeros
6187  auto counts = hist_transition_matrix[
6188  i * (ns * ns) + to * ns + from
6189  ];
6190 
6191  if (counts == 0)
6192  continue;
6193 
6194  file_transition <<
6195  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6196  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6197  #endif
6198  i << " \"" <<
6199  model->states_labels[from] << "\" \"" <<
6200  model->states_labels[to] << "\" " <<
6201  counts << "\n";
6202  }
6203  }
6204 
6205  }
6206 
6207  }
6208 
6209  if (fn_reproductive_number != "")
6210  get_reproductive_number(fn_reproductive_number);
6211 
6212  if (fn_generation_time != "")
6213  get_generation_time(fn_generation_time);
6214 
6215 }
6216 
6217 template<typename TSeq>
6218 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transmission(
6219  int i,
6220  int j,
6221  int virus,
6222  int i_expo_date
6223 ) {
6224 
6225  transmission_date.push_back(model->today());
6226  transmission_source.push_back(i);
6227  transmission_target.push_back(j);
6228  transmission_virus.push_back(virus);
6229  transmission_source_exposure_date.push_back(i_expo_date);
6230 
6231 }
6232 
6233 template<typename TSeq>
6234 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_viruses() const
6235 {
6236  return virus_id.size();
6237 }
6238 
6239 template<typename TSeq>
6240 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const
6241 {
6242  return tool_id.size();
6243 }
6244 
6245 
6246 template<typename TSeq>
6247 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::set_user_data(
6248  std::vector< std::string > names
6249 )
6250 {
6251  user_data = UserData<TSeq>(names);
6252  user_data.model = model;
6253 }
6254 
6255 template<typename TSeq>
6256 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::add_user_data(
6257  std::vector< epiworld_double > x
6258 )
6259 {
6260 
6261  user_data.add(x);
6262 
6263 }
6264 
6265 template<typename TSeq>
6266 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::add_user_data(
6267  epiworld_fast_uint k,
6268  epiworld_double x
6269 )
6270 {
6271 
6272  user_data.add(k, x);
6273 
6274 }
6275 
6276 template<typename TSeq>
6277 inline UserData<TSeq> & DataBase<TSeq>::get_user_data()
6278 {
6279  return user_data;
6280 }
6281 
6282 template<typename TSeq>
6283 inline MapVec_type<int,int> DataBase<TSeq>::get_reproductive_number()
6284 const {
6285 
6286  // Checking size
6287  MapVec_type<int,int> map;
6288 
6289  // Number of digits of maxid
6290  for (size_t i = 0u; i < transmission_date.size(); ++i)
6291  {
6292  // Fabricating id
6293  std::vector< int > h = {
6294  transmission_virus[i],
6295  transmission_source[i],
6296  transmission_source_exposure_date[i]
6297  };
6298 
6299  // Adding to counter
6300  if (map.find(h) == map.end())
6301  map[h] = 1;
6302  else
6303  map[h]++;
6304 
6305  // The target is added
6306  std::vector< int > h_target = {
6307  transmission_virus[i],
6308  transmission_target[i],
6309  transmission_date[i]
6310  };
6311 
6312  map[h_target] = 0;
6313 
6314  }
6315 
6316  return map;
6317 
6318 }
6319 
6320 template<typename TSeq>
6321 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_reproductive_number(
6322  std::string fn
6323 ) const {
6324 
6325 
6326  auto map = get_reproductive_number();
6327 
6328  std::ofstream fn_file(fn, std::ios_base::out);
6329 
6330  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6331  if (!fn_file)
6332  {
6333  throw std::runtime_error(
6334  "Could not open file \"" + fn +
6335  "\" for writing.")
6336  ;
6337  }
6338 
6339  fn_file <<
6340  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6341  "thread " <<
6342  #endif
6343  "virus_id virus source source_exposure_date rt\n";
6344 
6345 
6346  for (auto & m : map)
6347  fn_file <<
6348  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6349  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6350  #endif
6351  m.first[0u] << " \"" <<
6352  virus_name[m.first[0u]] << "\" " <<
6353  m.first[1u] << " " <<
6354  m.first[2u] << " " <<
6355  m.second << "\n";
6356 
6357  return;
6358 
6359 }
6360 
6361 template<typename TSeq>
6362 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > DataBase<TSeq>::get_transition_probability(
6363  bool print,
6364  bool normalize
6365 ) const {
6366 
6367  auto states_labels = model->get_states();
6368  size_t n_state = states_labels.size();
6369  size_t n_days = model->get_ndays();
6370  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(n_state * n_state, 0.0);
6371  std::vector< epiworld_double > rowsums(n_state, 0.0);
6372 
6373  for (size_t t = 0; t < n_days; ++t)
6374  {
6375 
6376  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6377  {
6378 
6379  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6380  {
6381  res[s_i + s_j * n_state] += (
6382  hist_transition_matrix[
6383  s_i + s_j * n_state +
6384  t * (n_state * n_state)
6385  ]
6386  );
6387 
6388  rowsums[s_i] += hist_transition_matrix[
6389  s_i + s_j * n_state +
6390  t * (n_state * n_state)
6391  ];
6392 
6393  }
6394 
6395  }
6396 
6397  }
6398 
6399  if (normalize)
6400  {
6401  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6402  {
6403  // Nothing to normalize if the row is zero
6404  if (rowsums[s_i] == 0)
6405  continue;
6406 
6407  for (size_t s_j = 0; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6408  res[s_i + s_j * n_state] /= rowsums[s_i];
6409  }
6410  }
6411 
6412  if (print)
6413  {
6414 
6415  size_t nchar = 0u;
6416  for (auto & l : states_labels)
6417  if (l.length() > nchar)
6418  nchar = l.length();
6419 
6420  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar) + "s";
6421 
6422  std::string fmt_entry = " % 4.2f";
6423  if (!normalize)
6424  {
6425  nchar = 0u;
6426  for (auto & l: res)
6427  {
6428  std::string tmp = std::to_string(l);
6429  if (tmp.length() > nchar)
6430  nchar = tmp.length();
6431  }
6432 
6433  fmt_entry = " % " + std::to_string(nchar) + ".0f";
6434  }
6435 
6436 
6437  printf_epiworld("\nTransition Probabilities:\n");
6438  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6439  {
6440  printf_epiworld(fmt.c_str(), states_labels[s_i].c_str());
6441  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6442  {
6443  if (
6444  std::isnan(res[s_i + s_j * n_state]) ||
6445  (res[s_i + s_j * n_state] < 1e-10)
6446  )
6447  {
6448  printf_epiworld(" -");
6449  } else {
6450  printf_epiworld(
6451  fmt_entry.c_str(), res[s_i + s_j * n_state]
6452  );
6453  }
6454  }
6455  printf_epiworld("\n");
6456  }
6457 
6458  printf_epiworld("\n");
6459 
6460  }
6461 
6462  return res;
6463 
6464 
6465 }
6466 
6467 #define VECT_MATCH(a, b, c) \
6468  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a.size() != b.size(), c) \
6469  for (size_t __i = 0u; __i < a.size(); ++__i) \
6470  {\
6471  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a[__i] != b[__i], c) \
6472  }
6473 
6474 template<>
6475 inline bool DataBase<std::vector<int>>::operator==(const DataBase<std::vector<int>> & other) const
6476 {
6477  VECT_MATCH(
6478  virus_name, other.virus_name,
6479  "DataBase:: virus_name don't match"
6480  )
6481 
6482  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6483  virus_sequence.size() != other.virus_sequence.size(),
6484  "DataBase:: virus_sequence don't match."
6485  )
6486 
6487  for (size_t i = 0u; i < virus_sequence.size(); ++i)
6488  {
6489  VECT_MATCH(
6490  virus_sequence[i], other.virus_sequence[i],
6491  "DataBase:: virus_sequence[i] don't match"
6492  )
6493  }
6494 
6495  VECT_MATCH(
6496  virus_origin_date,
6497  other.virus_origin_date,
6498  "DataBase:: virus_origin_date[i] don't match"
6499  )
6500 
6501  VECT_MATCH(
6502  virus_parent_id,
6503  other.virus_parent_id,
6504  "DataBase:: virus_parent_id[i] don't match"
6505  )
6506 
6507  VECT_MATCH(
6508  tool_name,
6509  other.tool_name,
6510  "DataBase:: tool_name[i] don't match"
6511  )
6512 
6513  VECT_MATCH(
6514  tool_sequence,
6515  other.tool_sequence,
6516  "DataBase:: tool_sequence[i] don't match"
6517  )
6518 
6519  VECT_MATCH(
6520  tool_origin_date,
6521  other.tool_origin_date,
6522  "DataBase:: tool_origin_date[i] don't match"
6523  )
6524 
6525 
6526  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6527  sampling_freq != other.sampling_freq,
6528  "DataBase:: sampling_freq don't match."
6529  )
6530 
6531  // Variants history
6532  VECT_MATCH(
6533  hist_virus_date,
6534  other.hist_virus_date,
6535  "DataBase:: hist_virus_date[i] don't match"
6536  )
6537 
6538  VECT_MATCH(
6539  hist_virus_id,
6540  other.hist_virus_id,
6541  "DataBase:: hist_virus_id[i] don't match"
6542  )
6543 
6544  VECT_MATCH(
6545  hist_virus_state,
6546  other.hist_virus_state,
6547  "DataBase:: hist_virus_state[i] don't match"
6548  )
6549 
6550  VECT_MATCH(
6551  hist_virus_counts,
6552  other.hist_virus_counts,
6553  "DataBase:: hist_virus_counts[i] don't match"
6554  )
6555 
6556  // Tools history
6557  VECT_MATCH(
6558  hist_tool_date,
6559  other.hist_tool_date,
6560  "DataBase:: hist_tool_date[i] don't match"
6561  )
6562 
6563  VECT_MATCH(
6564  hist_tool_id,
6565  other.hist_tool_id,
6566  "DataBase:: hist_tool_id[i] don't match"
6567  )
6568 
6569  VECT_MATCH(
6570  hist_tool_state,
6571  other.hist_tool_state,
6572  "DataBase:: hist_tool_state[i] don't match"
6573  )
6574 
6575  VECT_MATCH(
6576  hist_tool_counts,
6577  other.hist_tool_counts,
6578  "DataBase:: hist_tool_counts[i] don't match"
6579  )
6580 
6581  // Overall hist
6582  VECT_MATCH(
6583  hist_total_date,
6584  other.hist_total_date,
6585  "DataBase:: hist_total_date[i] don't match"
6586  )
6587 
6588  VECT_MATCH(
6589  hist_total_nviruses_active,
6590  other.hist_total_nviruses_active,
6591  "DataBase:: hist_total_nviruses_active[i] don't match"
6592  )
6593 
6594  VECT_MATCH(
6595  hist_total_state,
6596  other.hist_total_state,
6597  "DataBase:: hist_total_state[i] don't match"
6598  )
6599 
6600  VECT_MATCH(
6601  hist_total_counts,
6602  other.hist_total_counts,
6603  "DataBase:: hist_total_counts[i] don't match"
6604  )
6605 
6606  VECT_MATCH(
6607  hist_transition_matrix,
6608  other.hist_transition_matrix,
6609  "DataBase:: hist_transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6610  )
6611 
6612  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6613  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6614  today_virus.size() != other.today_virus.size(),
6615  "DataBase:: today_virus don't match."
6616  )
6617 
6618  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_virus.size(); ++i)
6619  {
6620  VECT_MATCH(
6621  today_virus[i], other.today_virus[i],
6622  "DataBase:: today_virus[i] don't match"
6623  )
6624  }
6625 
6626  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6627  if (today_tool.size() != other.today_tool.size())
6628  return false;
6629 
6630  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_tool.size(); ++i)
6631  {
6632  VECT_MATCH(
6633  today_tool[i], other.today_tool[i],
6634  "DataBase:: today_tool[i] don't match"
6635  )
6636  }
6637 
6638  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
6639  VECT_MATCH(
6640  today_total, other.today_total,
6641  "DataBase:: today_total don't match"
6642  )
6643 
6644  // Totals
6645  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6646  today_total_nviruses_active != other.today_total_nviruses_active,
6647  "DataBase:: today_total_nviruses_active don't match."
6648  )
6649 
6650  // Transmission network
6651  VECT_MATCH(
6652  transmission_date,
6653  other.transmission_date, ///< Date of the transmission eve,
6654  "DataBase:: transmission_date[i] don't match"
6655  )
6656 
6657  VECT_MATCH(
6658  transmission_source,
6659  other.transmission_source, ///< Id of the sour,
6660  "DataBase:: transmission_source[i] don't match"
6661  )
6662 
6663  VECT_MATCH(
6664  transmission_target,
6665  other.transmission_target, ///< Id of the targ,
6666  "DataBase:: transmission_target[i] don't match"
6667  )
6668 
6669  VECT_MATCH(
6670  transmission_virus,
6671  other.transmission_virus, ///< Id of the varia,
6672  "DataBase:: transmission_virus[i] don't match"
6673  )
6674 
6675  VECT_MATCH(
6676  transmission_source_exposure_date,
6677  other.transmission_source_exposure_date, ///< Date when the source acquired the varia,
6678  "DataBase:: transmission_source_exposure_date[i] don't match"
6679  )
6680 
6681 
6682  VECT_MATCH(
6683  transition_matrix,
6684  other.transition_matrix,
6685  "DataBase:: transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6686  )
6687 
6688 
6689  return true;
6690 
6691 }
6692 
6693 template<typename TSeq>
6694 inline bool DataBase<TSeq>::operator==(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const
6695 {
6696  VECT_MATCH(
6697  virus_name,
6698  other.virus_name,
6699  "DataBase:: virus_name[i] don't match"
6700  )
6701 
6702  VECT_MATCH(
6703  virus_sequence,
6704  other.virus_sequence,
6705  "DataBase:: virus_sequence[i] don't match"
6706  )
6707 
6708  VECT_MATCH(
6709  virus_origin_date,
6710  other.virus_origin_date,
6711  "DataBase:: virus_origin_date[i] don't match"
6712  )
6713 
6714  VECT_MATCH(
6715  virus_parent_id,
6716  other.virus_parent_id,
6717  "DataBase:: virus_parent_id[i] don't match"
6718  )
6719 
6720  VECT_MATCH(
6721  tool_name,
6722  other.tool_name,
6723  "DataBase:: tool_name[i] don't match"
6724  )
6725 
6726  VECT_MATCH(
6727  tool_sequence,
6728  other.tool_sequence,
6729  "DataBase:: tool_sequence[i] don't match"
6730  )
6731 
6732  VECT_MATCH(
6733  tool_origin_date,
6734  other.tool_origin_date,
6735  "DataBase:: tool_origin_date[i] don't match"
6736  )
6737 
6738 
6739  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6740  sampling_freq != other.sampling_freq,
6741  "DataBase:: sampling_freq don't match."
6742  )
6743 
6744  // Variants history
6745  VECT_MATCH(
6746  hist_virus_date,
6747  other.hist_virus_date,
6748  "DataBase:: hist_virus_date[i] don't match"
6749  )
6750 
6751  VECT_MATCH(
6752  hist_virus_id,
6753  other.hist_virus_id,
6754  "DataBase:: hist_virus_id[i] don't match"
6755  )
6756 
6757  VECT_MATCH(
6758  hist_virus_state,
6759  other.hist_virus_state,
6760  "DataBase:: hist_virus_state[i] don't match"
6761  )
6762 
6763  VECT_MATCH(
6764  hist_virus_counts,
6765  other.hist_virus_counts,
6766  "DataBase:: hist_virus_counts[i] don't match"
6767  )
6768 
6769  // Tools history
6770  VECT_MATCH(
6771  hist_tool_date,
6772  other.hist_tool_date,
6773  "DataBase:: hist_tool_date[i] don't match"
6774  )
6775 
6776  VECT_MATCH(
6777  hist_tool_id,
6778  other.hist_tool_id,
6779  "DataBase:: hist_tool_id[i] don't match"
6780  )
6781 
6782  VECT_MATCH(
6783  hist_tool_state,
6784  other.hist_tool_state,
6785  "DataBase:: hist_tool_state[i] don't match"
6786  )
6787 
6788  VECT_MATCH(
6789  hist_tool_counts,
6790  other.hist_tool_counts,
6791  "DataBase:: hist_tool_counts[i] don't match"
6792  )
6793 
6794  // Overall hist
6795  VECT_MATCH(
6796  hist_total_date,
6797  other.hist_total_date,
6798  "DataBase:: hist_total_date[i] don't match"
6799  )
6800 
6801  VECT_MATCH(
6802  hist_total_nviruses_active,
6803  other.hist_total_nviruses_active,
6804  "DataBase:: hist_total_nviruses_active[i] don't match"
6805  )
6806 
6807  VECT_MATCH(
6808  hist_total_state,
6809  other.hist_total_state,
6810  "DataBase:: hist_total_state[i] don't match"
6811  )
6812 
6813  VECT_MATCH(
6814  hist_total_counts,
6815  other.hist_total_counts,
6816  "DataBase:: hist_total_counts[i] don't match"
6817  )
6818 
6819  VECT_MATCH(
6820  hist_transition_matrix,
6821  other.hist_transition_matrix,
6822  "DataBase:: hist_transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6823  )
6824 
6825  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6826  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6827  today_virus.size() != other.today_virus.size(),
6828  "DataBase:: today_virus.size() don't match."
6829  )
6830 
6831  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_virus.size(); ++i)
6832  {
6833  VECT_MATCH(
6834  today_virus[i], other.today_virus[i],
6835  "DataBase:: today_virus[i] don't match"
6836  )
6837  }
6838 
6839  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6840  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6841  today_tool.size() != other.today_tool.size(),
6842  "DataBase:: today_tool.size() don't match."
6843  )
6844 
6845  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_tool.size(); ++i)
6846  {
6847  VECT_MATCH(
6848  today_tool[i], other.today_tool[i],
6849  "DataBase:: today_tool[i] don't match"
6850  )
6851  }
6852 
6853  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
6854  VECT_MATCH(
6855  today_total, other.today_total,
6856  "DataBase:: today_total[i] don't match"
6857  )
6858 
6859  // Totals
6860  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6861  today_total_nviruses_active != other.today_total_nviruses_active,
6862  "DataBase:: today_total_nviruses_active don't match."
6863  )
6864 
6865  // Transmission network
6866  VECT_MATCH( ///< Date of the transmission eve
6867  transmission_date,
6868  other.transmission_date,
6869  "DataBase:: transmission_date[i] don't match"
6870  )
6871 
6872  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the sour
6873  transmission_source,
6874  other.transmission_source,
6875  "DataBase:: transmission_source[i] don't match"
6876  )
6877 
6878  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the targ
6879  transmission_target,
6880  other.transmission_target,
6881  "DataBase:: transmission_target[i] don't match"
6882  )
6883 
6884  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the varia
6885  transmission_virus,
6886  other.transmission_virus,
6887  "DataBase:: transmission_virus[i] don't match"
6888  )
6889 
6890  VECT_MATCH( ///< Date when the source acquired the varia
6891  transmission_source_exposure_date,
6892  other.transmission_source_exposure_date,
6893  "DataBase:: transmission_source_exposure_date[i] don't match"
6894  )
6895 
6896  VECT_MATCH(
6897  transition_matrix,
6898  other.transition_matrix,
6899  "DataBase:: transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6900  )
6901 
6902  return true;
6903 
6904 }
6905 
6906 template<typename TSeq>
6907 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_generation_time(
6908  std::vector< int > & agent_id,
6909  std::vector< int > & virus_id,
6910  std::vector< int > & time,
6911  std::vector< int > & gentime
6912 ) const {
6913 
6914  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
6915 
6916  agent_id.reserve(nevents);
6917  virus_id.reserve(nevents);
6918  time.reserve(nevents);
6919  gentime.reserve(nevents);
6920 
6921  // Iterating through the individuals
6922  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nevents; ++i)
6923  {
6924  int agent_id_i = transmission_target[i];
6925  agent_id.push_back(agent_id_i);
6926  virus_id.push_back(transmission_virus[i]);
6927  time.push_back(transmission_date[i]);
6928 
6929  bool found = false;
6930  for (size_t j = i; j < nevents; ++j)
6931  {
6932 
6933  if (transmission_source[j] == agent_id_i)
6934  {
6935  gentime.push_back(transmission_date[j] - time[i]);
6936  found = true;
6937  break;
6938  }
6939 
6940  }
6941 
6942  // If there's no transmission, we set the generation time to
6943  // minus 1;
6944  if (!found)
6945  gentime.push_back(-1);
6946 
6947  }
6948 
6949  agent_id.shrink_to_fit();
6950  virus_id.shrink_to_fit();
6951  time.shrink_to_fit();
6952  gentime.shrink_to_fit();
6953 
6954  return;
6955 
6956 }
6957 
6958 template<typename TSeq>
6959 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_generation_time(
6960  std::string fn
6961 ) const
6962 {
6963 
6964  std::vector< int > agent_id;
6965  std::vector< int > virus_id;
6966  std::vector< int > time;
6967  std::vector< int > gentime;
6968 
6969  get_generation_time(agent_id, virus_id, time, gentime);
6970 
6971  std::ofstream fn_file(fn, std::ios_base::out);
6972 
6973  // Throw an error if the file doesn't exists using throw
6974  if (!fn_file)
6975  {
6976  throw std::runtime_error(
6977  "DataBase::get_generation_time: "
6978  "Cannot open file " + fn + "."
6979  );
6980  }
6981 
6982 
6983 
6984  fn_file <<
6985  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6986  "thread " <<
6987  #endif
6988  "virus source source_exposure_date gentime\n";
6989 
6990  size_t n = agent_id.size();
6991  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
6992  fn_file <<
6993  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6994  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6995  #endif
6996  virus_id[i] << " " <<
6997  agent_id[i] << " " <<
6998  time[i] << " " <<
6999  gentime[i] << "\n";
7000 
7001  return;
7002 
7003 }
7004 
7005 #undef VECT_MATCH
7006 
7007 #endif
7008 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7010 
7011  End of -include/epiworld/database-meat.hpp-
7012 
7015 
7016 
7017 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7019 
7020  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
7021 
7024 
7025 
7026 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
7027 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
7028 
7029 class AdjList {
7030 private:
7031 
7032  std::vector<std::map<int, int>> dat;
7033  bool directed;
7034  epiworld_fast_uint N = 0;
7035  epiworld_fast_uint E = 0;
7036 
7037 public:
7038 
7039  AdjList() {};
7040 
7052  AdjList(
7053  const std::vector< int > & source,
7054  const std::vector< int > & target,
7055  int size,
7056  bool directed
7057  );
7058 
7059  AdjList(AdjList && a); // Move constructor
7060  AdjList(const AdjList & a); // Copy constructor
7061  AdjList& operator=(const AdjList& a);
7062 
7063 
7074  void read_edgelist(
7075  std::string fn,
7076  int size,
7077  int skip = 0,
7078  bool directed = true
7079  );
7080 
7081  std::map<int, int> operator()(
7082  epiworld_fast_uint i
7083  ) const;
7084 
7085  void print(epiworld_fast_uint limit = 20u) const;
7086  size_t vcount() const; ///< Number of vertices/nodes in the network.
7087  size_t ecount() const; ///< Number of edges/arcs/ties in the network.
7088 
7089  std::vector<std::map<int,int>> & get_dat() {
7090  return dat;
7091  };
7092 
7093  bool is_directed() const; ///< `true` if the network is directed.
7094 
7095 };
7096 
7097 
7098 #endif
7099 
7100 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7102 
7103  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
7104 
7107 
7108 
7109 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7111 
7112  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
7113 
7116 
7117 
7118 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
7119 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
7120 
7121 inline AdjList::AdjList(
7122  const std::vector< int > & source,
7123  const std::vector< int > & target,
7124  int size,
7125  bool directed
7126 ) : directed(directed) {
7127 
7128 
7129  dat.resize(size, std::map<int,int>({}));
7130  int max_id = size - 1;
7131 
7132  int i,j;
7133  for (int m = 0; m < static_cast<int>(source.size()); ++m)
7134  {
7135 
7136  i = source[m];
7137  j = target[m];
7138 
7139  if (i > max_id)
7140  throw std::range_error(
7141  "The source["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
7142  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7143  );
7144 
7145  if (j > max_id)
7146  throw std::range_error(
7147  "The target["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
7148  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7149  );
7150 
7151  // Adding nodes
7152  if (dat[i].find(j) == dat[i].end())
7153  dat[i].insert(std::pair<int, int>(j, 1u));
7154  else
7155  dat[i][j]++;
7156 
7157  if (!directed)
7158  {
7159 
7160  if (dat[j].find(i) == dat[j].end())
7161  dat[j].insert(std::pair<int, int>(i, 1u));
7162  else
7163  dat[j][i]++;
7164 
7165  }
7166 
7167  E++;
7168 
7169  }
7170 
7171  N = size;
7172 
7173  return;
7174 
7175 }
7176 
7177 
7178 inline AdjList::AdjList(AdjList && a) :
7179  dat(std::move(a.dat)),
7180  directed(a.directed),
7181  N(a.N),
7182  E(a.E)
7183 {
7184 
7185 }
7186 
7187 inline AdjList::AdjList(const AdjList & a) :
7188  dat(a.dat),
7189  directed(a.directed),
7190  N(a.N),
7191  E(a.E)
7192 {
7193 
7194 }
7195 
7196 inline AdjList& AdjList::operator=(const AdjList& a)
7197 {
7198  if (this == &a)
7199  return *this;
7200 
7201  this->dat = a.dat;
7202  this->directed = a.directed;
7203  this->N = a.N;
7204  this->E = a.E;
7205 
7206  return *this;
7207 }
7208 
7209 inline void AdjList::read_edgelist(
7210  std::string fn,
7211  int size,
7212  int skip,
7213  bool directed
7214 ) {
7215 
7216  int i,j;
7217  std::ifstream filei(fn);
7218 
7219  if (!filei)
7220  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
7221 
7222  int linenum = 0;
7223  std::vector< int > source_;
7224  std::vector< int > target_;
7225 
7226  source_.reserve(1e5);
7227  target_.reserve(1e5);
7228 
7229  int max_id = size - 1;
7230 
7231  while (!filei.eof())
7232  {
7233 
7234  if (linenum++ < skip)
7235  continue;
7236 
7237  filei >> i >> j;
7238 
7239  // Looking for exceptions
7240  if (filei.bad())
7241  throw std::logic_error(
7242  "I/O error while reading the file " +
7243  fn
7244  );
7245 
7246  if (filei.fail())
7247  break;
7248 
7249  if (i > max_id)
7250  throw std::range_error(
7251  "The source["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
7252  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7253  );
7254 
7255  if (j > max_id)
7256  throw std::range_error(
7257  "The target["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
7258  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7259  );
7260 
7261  source_.push_back(i);
7262  target_.push_back(j);
7263 
7264  }
7265 
7266  // Now using the right constructor
7267  *this = AdjList(source_, target_, size, directed);
7268 
7269  return;
7270 
7271 }
7272 
7273 inline std::map<int,int> AdjList::operator()(
7274  epiworld_fast_uint i
7275  ) const {
7276 
7277  if (i >= N)
7278  throw std::range_error(
7279  "The vertex id " + std::to_string(i) + " is not in the network."
7280  );
7281 
7282  return dat[i];
7283 
7284 }
7285 
7286 inline void AdjList::print(epiworld_fast_uint limit) const {
7287 
7288 
7289  epiworld_fast_uint counter = 0;
7290  printf_epiworld("Nodeset:\n");
7291  int i = -1;
7292  for (auto & n : dat)
7293  {
7294 
7295  if (counter++ > limit)
7296  break;
7297 
7298  printf_epiworld(" % 3i: {", ++i);
7299  int niter = 0;
7300  for (auto n_n : n)
7301  if (++niter < static_cast<int>(n.size()))
7302  {
7303  printf_epiworld("%i, ", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
7304  }
7305  else {
7306  printf_epiworld("%i}\n", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
7307  }
7308  }
7309 
7310  if (limit < dat.size())
7311  {
7312  printf_epiworld(
7313  " (... skipping %i records ...)\n",
7314  static_cast<int>(dat.size() - limit)
7315  );
7316  }
7317 
7318 }
7319 
7320 inline size_t AdjList::vcount() const
7321 {
7322  return N;
7323 }
7324 
7325 inline size_t AdjList::ecount() const
7326 {
7327  return E;
7328 }
7329 
7330 inline bool AdjList::is_directed() const {
7331 
7332  if (dat.size() == 0u)
7333  throw std::logic_error("The edgelist is empty.");
7334 
7335  return directed;
7336 
7337 }
7338 
7339 #endif
7340 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7342 
7343  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
7344 
7347 
7348 
7349 
7350 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7352 
7353  Start of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
7354 
7357 
7358 
7359 #ifndef EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
7360 #define EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
7361 
7362 template<typename TSeq>
7363 class Model;
7364 
7365 template<typename TSeq>
7366 class Agent;
7367 
7368 class AdjList;
7369 
7370 
7371 template<typename TSeq, typename TDat>
7372 inline void rewire_degseq(
7373  TDat * agents,
7374  Model<TSeq> * model,
7375  epiworld_double proportion
7376  );
7377 
7378 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
7379 inline void rewire_degseq(
7380  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > * agents,
7381  Model<TSeq> * model,
7382  epiworld_double proportion
7383  )
7384 {
7385 
7386  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7387  std::vector< int > _degree0(agents->size(), 0);
7388  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _degree0.size(); ++i)
7389  _degree0[i] = model->get_agents()[i].get_neighbors().size();
7390  #endif
7391 
7392  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
7393  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
7394  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
7395  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
7396 
7397  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < agents->size(); ++i)
7398  {
7399  if (agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size() > 0u)
7400  {
7401  non_isolates.push_back(i);
7402  epiworld_double wtemp = static_cast<epiworld_double>(
7403  agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size()
7404  );
7405  weights.push_back(wtemp);
7406  nedges += wtemp;
7407  }
7408  }
7409 
7410  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
7411  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
7412 
7413  // Cumulative probs
7414  weights[0u] /= nedges;
7415  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
7416  {
7417  weights[i] /= nedges;
7418  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
7419  }
7420 
7421  // Only swap if needed
7422  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
7423  epiworld_double prob;
7424  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges);
7425  while (nrewires-- > 0)
7426  {
7427 
7428  // Picking egos
7429  prob = model->runif();
7430  int id0 = N - 1;
7431  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7432  if (prob <= weights[i])
7433  {
7434  id0 = i;
7435  break;
7436  }
7437 
7438  prob = model->runif();
7439  int id1 = N - 1;
7440  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7441  if (prob <= weights[i])
7442  {
7443  id1 = i;
7444  break;
7445  }
7446 
7447  // Correcting for under or overflow.
7448  if (id1 == id0)
7449  id1++;
7450 
7451  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
7452  id1 = 0;
7453 
7454  Agent<TSeq> & p0 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id0]);
7455  Agent<TSeq> & p1 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id1]);
7456 
7457  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
7458  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
7459  int id01 = std::floor(p0.get_n_neighbors() * model->runif());
7460  int id11 = std::floor(p1.get_n_neighbors() * model->runif());
7461 
7462  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
7463  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
7464 
7465  // Finding what neighbour is id0
7466  model->get_agents()[id0].swap_neighbors(
7467  model->get_agents()[id1],
7468  id01,
7469  id11
7470  );
7471 
7472 
7473  }
7474 
7475  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7476  for (size_t _i = 0u; _i < _degree0.size(); ++_i)
7477  {
7478  if (_degree0[_i] != static_cast<int>(model->get_agents()[_i].get_n_neighbors()))
7479  throw std::logic_error("[epi-debug] Degree does not match afted rewire_degseq.");
7480  }
7481  #endif
7482 
7483  return;
7484 
7485 }
7486 
7487 template<typename TSeq>
7488 inline void rewire_degseq(
7489  AdjList * agents,
7490  Model<TSeq> * model,
7491  epiworld_double proportion
7492  )
7493 {
7494 
7495  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
7496  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > nties(agents->vcount(), 0);
7497 
7498  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7499  std::vector< int > _degree0(agents->vcount(), 0);
7500  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _degree0.size(); ++i)
7501  _degree0[i] = agents->get_dat()[i].size();
7502  #endif
7503 
7504  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
7505  non_isolates.reserve(nties.size());
7506 
7507  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
7508  weights.reserve(nties.size());
7509 
7510  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
7511  auto & dat = agents->get_dat();
7512 
7513  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
7514  nties[i] += dat[i].size();
7515 
7516  bool directed = agents->is_directed();
7517  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
7518  {
7519  if (nties[i] > 0)
7520  {
7521  non_isolates.push_back(i);
7522  if (directed)
7523  {
7524  weights.push_back(
7525  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])
7526  );
7527  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]);
7528  }
7529  else {
7530  weights.push_back(
7531  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])/2.0
7532  );
7533  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]) / 2.0;
7534  }
7535  }
7536  }
7537 
7538  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
7539  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
7540 
7541  // Cumulative probs
7542  weights[0u] /= nedges;
7543  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
7544  {
7545  weights[i] /= nedges;
7546  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
7547  }
7548 
7549  // Only swap if needed
7550  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
7551  epiworld_double prob;
7552  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges / (
7553  agents->is_directed() ? 1.0 : 2.0
7554  ));
7555 
7556  while (nrewires-- > 0)
7557  {
7558 
7559  // Picking egos
7560  prob = model->runif();
7561  int id0 = N - 1;
7562  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7563  if (prob <= weights[i])
7564  {
7565  id0 = i;
7566  break;
7567  }
7568 
7569  prob = model->runif();
7570  int id1 = N - 1;
7571  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7572  if (prob <= weights[i])
7573  {
7574  id1 = i;
7575  break;
7576  }
7577 
7578  // Correcting for under or overflow.
7579  if (id1 == id0)
7580  id1++;
7581 
7582  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
7583  id1 = 0;
7584 
7585  std::map<int,int> & p0 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id0]];
7586  std::map<int,int> & p1 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id1]];
7587 
7588  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
7589  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
7590  int id01 = std::floor(p0.size() * model->runif());
7591  int id11 = std::floor(p1.size() * model->runif());
7592 
7593  // Since it is a map, we need to find the actual ids (positions)
7594  // are not good enough.
7595  int count = 0;
7596  for (auto & n : p0)
7597  if (count++ == id01)
7598  id01 = n.first;
7599 
7600  count = 0;
7601  for (auto & n : p1)
7602  if (count++ == id11)
7603  id11 = n.first;
7604 
7605  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
7606  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
7607 
7608  // Finding what neighbour is id0
7609  if (!agents->is_directed())
7610  {
7611 
7612  std::map<int,int> & p01 = agents->get_dat()[id01];
7613  std::map<int,int> & p11 = agents->get_dat()[id11];
7614 
7615  std::swap(p01[id0], p11[id1]);
7616 
7617  }
7618 
7619  // Moving alter first
7620  std::swap(p0[id01], p1[id11]);
7621 
7622  }
7623 
7624  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7625  for (size_t _i = 0u; _i < _degree0.size(); ++_i)
7626  {
7627  if (_degree0[_i] != static_cast<int>(agents->get_dat()[_i].size()))
7628  throw std::logic_error(
7629  "[epi-debug] Degree does not match afted rewire_degseq. " +
7630  std::string("Expected: ") +
7631  std::to_string(_degree0[_i]) +
7632  std::string(", observed: ") +
7633  std::to_string(agents->get_dat()[_i].size())
7634  );
7635  }
7636  #endif
7637 
7638 
7639  return;
7640 
7641 }
7642 
7643 template<typename TSeq>
7644 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli(
7645  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7646  epiworld_double p,
7647  bool directed,
7648  Model<TSeq> & model
7649 ) {
7650 
7651  std::vector< int > source;
7652  std::vector< int > target;
7653 
7654  // Checking the density (how many)
7655  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
7656  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
7657  p
7658  );
7659 
7660  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(model.get_rand_endgine());
7661 
7662  source.resize(m);
7663  target.resize(m);
7664 
7665  epiworld_fast_uint a,b;
7666  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
7667  {
7668  a = floor(model.runif() * n);
7669 
7670  if (!directed)
7671  b = floor(model.runif() * a);
7672  else
7673  {
7674  b = floor(model.runif() * n);
7675  if (b == a)
7676  b++;
7677 
7678  if (b >= n)
7679  b = 0u;
7680  }
7681 
7682  source[i] = static_cast<int>(a);
7683  target[i] = static_cast<int>(b);
7684 
7685  }
7686 
7687  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
7688 
7689  return al;
7690 
7691 }
7692 
7693 template<typename TSeq>
7694 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli2(
7695  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7696  epiworld_double p,
7697  bool directed,
7698  Model<TSeq> & model
7699 ) {
7700 
7701  std::vector< int > source;
7702  std::vector< int > target;
7703 
7704  // Checking the density (how many)
7705  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
7706  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
7707  p
7708  );
7709 
7710  // Need to compensate for the possible number of diagonal
7711  // elements sampled. If n * n, then each diag element has
7712  // 1/(n^2) chance of sampling
7713 
7714  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(model.get_rand_endgine());
7715 
7716  source.resize(m);
7717  target.resize(m);
7718 
7719  double n2 = static_cast<double>(n * n);
7720 
7721  int loc,row,col;
7722  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
7723  {
7724  loc = floor(model.runif() * n2);
7725  col = floor(static_cast<double>(loc)/static_cast<double>(n));
7726  row = loc - row * n;
7727 
7728  // Undirected needs to swap
7729  if (!directed && (col > row))
7730  std::swap(col, row);
7731 
7732  source[i] = row;
7733  target[i] = col;
7734 
7735  }
7736 
7737  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
7738 
7739  return al;
7740 
7741 }
7742 
7743 inline AdjList rgraph_ring_lattice(
7744  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7745  epiworld_fast_uint k,
7746  bool directed = false
7747 ) {
7748 
7749  if ((n - 1u) < k)
7750  throw std::logic_error("k can be at most n - 1.");
7751 
7752  std::vector< int > source;
7753  std::vector< int > target;
7754 
7755  if (!directed)
7756  if (k > 1u) k = static_cast< size_t >(floor(k / 2.0));
7757 
7758  for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
7759  {
7760 
7761  for (size_t j = 1u; j <= k; ++j)
7762  {
7763 
7764  // Next neighbor
7765  size_t l = i + j;
7766  if (l >= n) l = l - n;
7767 
7768  source.push_back(i);
7769  target.push_back(l);
7770 
7771  }
7772 
7773  }
7774 
7775  return AdjList(source, target, n, directed);
7776 
7777 }
7778 
7790 template<typename TSeq>
7791 inline AdjList rgraph_smallworld(
7792  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7793  epiworld_fast_uint k,
7794  epiworld_double p,
7795  bool directed,
7796  Model<TSeq> & model
7797 ) {
7798 
7799  // Creating the ring lattice
7800  AdjList ring = rgraph_ring_lattice(n,k,directed);
7801 
7802  // Rewiring and returning
7803  if (k > 0u)
7804  rewire_degseq(&ring, &model, p);
7805 
7806  return ring;
7807 
7808 }
7809 
7823 template<typename TSeq>
7824 inline AdjList rgraph_blocked(
7825  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7826  epiworld_fast_uint blocksize,
7827  epiworld_fast_uint ncons,
7828  Model<TSeq>&
7829 ) {
7830 
7831  std::vector< int > source_;
7832  std::vector< int > target_;
7833 
7834  size_t i = 0u;
7835  size_t cum_node_count = 0u;
7836  while (i < n)
7837  {
7838 
7839  for (size_t j = 0; j < blocksize; ++j)
7840  {
7841 
7842  for (size_t k = 0; k < j; ++k)
7843  {
7844  // No loops
7845  if (k == j)
7846  continue;
7847 
7848  // Exists the loop in case there are no more
7849  // nodes available
7850  if ((i + k) >= n)
7851  break;
7852 
7853  source_.push_back(static_cast<int>(j + i));
7854  target_.push_back(static_cast<int>(k + i));
7855  }
7856 
7857  // No more nodes left to build connections
7858  if (++cum_node_count >= n)
7859  break;
7860 
7861  }
7862 
7863  // Connections between this and the previou sone
7864  if (i != 0)
7865  {
7866 
7867  size_t max_cons = std::min(ncons, n - cum_node_count);
7868 
7869  // Generating the connections
7870  for (size_t j = 0u; j < max_cons; ++j)
7871  {
7872 
7873  source_.push_back(static_cast<int>(i + j - blocksize));
7874  target_.push_back(static_cast<int>(i + j));
7875 
7876  }
7877  }
7878 
7879  i += blocksize;
7880 
7881  }
7882 
7883  return AdjList(source_, target_, n, false);
7884 
7885 }
7886 
7887 #endif
7888 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7890 
7891  End of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
7892 
7895 
7896 
7897 
7898 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7900 
7901  Start of -include/epiworld/queue-bones.hpp-
7902 
7905 
7906 
7907 #ifndef EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
7908 #define EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
7909 
7920 template<typename TSeq>
7921 class Queue
7922 {
7923  friend class Model<TSeq>;
7924 
7925 private:
7926 
7930  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > active;
7931  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr;
7932  int n_in_queue = 0;
7933 
7934  // Auxiliary variable that checks how many steps
7935  // left are there
7936  // int n_steps_left;
7937  // bool queuing_started = false;
7938 
7939 public:
7940 
7941  void operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
7942  void operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
7943  epiworld_fast_int & operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i);
7944 
7945  // void initialize(Model<TSeq> * m, Agent<TSeq> * p);
7946  void reset();
7947 
7948  bool operator==(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const;
7949  bool operator!=(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
7950 
7951  static const int NoOne = 0;
7952  static const int OnlySelf = 1;
7953  static const int Everyone = 2;
7954 
7955 };
7956 
7957 template<typename TSeq>
7958 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
7959 {
7960 
7961  if (++active[p->id] == 1)
7962  n_in_queue++;
7963 
7964  if (p->get_n_neighbors() == 0u)
7965  return; // No neighbors, no need to add them
7966 
7967  for (auto n : (*p->neighbors))
7968  {
7969 
7970  if (++active[n] == 1)
7971  n_in_queue++;
7972 
7973  }
7974 
7975 }
7976 
7977 template<typename TSeq>
7978 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
7979 {
7980 
7981  if (--active[p->id] == 0)
7982  n_in_queue--;
7983 
7984  if (p->get_n_neighbors() == 0u)
7985  return; // No neighbors, no need to add them
7986 
7987  for (auto n : (*p->neighbors))
7988  {
7989  if (--active[n] == 0)
7990  n_in_queue--;
7991  }
7992 
7993 }
7994 
7995 template<typename TSeq>
7996 inline epiworld_fast_int & Queue<TSeq>::operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i)
7997 {
7998  return active[i];
7999 }
8000 
8001 template<typename TSeq>
8002 inline void Queue<TSeq>::reset()
8003 {
8004 
8005  if (n_in_queue)
8006  {
8007 
8008  for (auto & q : this->active)
8009  q = 0;
8010 
8011  n_in_queue = 0;
8012 
8013  }
8014 
8015  active.resize(model->size(), 0);
8016 
8017 }
8018 
8019 template<typename TSeq>
8020 inline bool Queue<TSeq>::operator==(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const
8021 {
8022  if (active.size() != other.active.size())
8023  return false;
8024 
8025  for (size_t i = 0u; i < active.size(); ++i)
8026  {
8027  if (active[i] != other.active[i])
8028  return false;
8029  }
8030 
8031  return true;
8032 }
8033 
8034 #endif
8035 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
8037 
8038  End of -include/epiworld/queue-bones.hpp-
8039 
8042 
8043 
8044

8047 
8048  Start of -include/epiworld/globalevent-bones.hpp-
8049 
8052

8056 
8057 // template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>

8059 
8066 template<typename TSeq>
8067 class GlobalEvent
8068 {
8069 private:
8070  GlobalFun<TSeq> fun = nullptr;
8071  std::string name = "A global action";
8072  int day = -99;
8073 public:
8074

8076 
8084  GlobalEvent(GlobalFun<TSeq> fun, std::string name, int day = -99);
8085 
8086  ~GlobalEvent() {};

8088  void operator()(Model<TSeq> * m, int day);
8089 
8090  void set_name(std::string name);
8091  std::string get_name() const;
8092 
8093  void set_day(int day);
8094  int get_day() const;
8095 
8096  void print() const;
8097

8099  bool operator==(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const;
8100  bool operator!=(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const;
8101 
8102 };

8126 #define EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENT_MEAT_HPP
8127 
8128 template<typename TSeq>
8129 inline GlobalEvent<TSeq>::GlobalEvent(
8130  GlobalFun<TSeq> fun,
8131  std::string name,
8132  int day
8133  )
8134 {
8135  this->fun = fun;
8136  this->name = name;
8137  this->day = day;
8138 }
8139 
8140 template<typename TSeq>
8141 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator()(Model<TSeq> * m, int day)
8142 {
8143 
8144  if (this->fun == nullptr)
8145  return;
8146 
8147  // events apply if day is negative or if day is equal to the day of the action
8148  if (this->day < 0 || this->day == day)
8149  this->fun(m);
8150 
8151  return;
8152 
8153 }
8154 
8155 template<typename TSeq>
8156 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
8157 {
8158  this->name = name;
8159 }
8160 
8161 template<typename TSeq>
8162 inline std::string GlobalEvent<TSeq>::get_name() const
8163 {
8164  return this->name;
8165 }
8166 
8167 template<typename TSeq>
8168 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::set_day(int day)
8169 {
8170  this->day = day;
8171 }
8172 
8173 template<typename TSeq>
8174 inline int GlobalEvent<TSeq>::get_day() const
8175 {
8176  return this->day;
8177 }
8178 
8179 template<typename TSeq>
8180 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::print() const
8181 {
8182  printf_epiworld(
8183  "Global action: %s\n"
8184  " - Day: %i\n",
8185  this->name.c_str(),
8186  this->day
8187  );
8188 }
8189 
8190 template<typename TSeq>
8191 inline bool GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator==(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const
8192 {
8193  return (this->name == other.name) && (this->day == other.day);
8194 }
8195 
8196 template<typename TSeq>
8197 inline bool GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator!=(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const
8198 {
8199  return !(*this == other);
8200 }
8201 
8202 #endif
