8300 // class ToolPtr;
8301 
8311 template<typename TSeq>
8312 class Model {
8313  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
8314  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
8315  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
8316  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
8317 protected:
8318 
8319  std::string name = ""; ///< Name of the model
8320 
8321  DataBase<TSeq> db = DataBase<TSeq>(*this);
8322 
8323  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population = {};
8324 
8325  bool using_backup = true;
8326  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population_backup = {};
8327 
8337  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
8338  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
8339  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
8340  size_t population_left_n = 0u;
8342 
8352  double * agents_data = nullptr;
8353  size_t agents_data_ncols = 0u;
8355 
8356  bool directed = false;
8357 
8358  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > viruses = {};
8359  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools = {};
8360 
8361  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities = {};
8362  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities_backup = {};
8363 
8364  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
8365 
8366  std::uniform_real_distribution<> runifd =
8367  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
8368  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
8369  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
8370  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
8371  std::gamma_distribution<>();
8372  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
8373  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
8374  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
8375  std::exponential_distribution<>();
8376  std::binomial_distribution<> rbinomd =
8377  std::binomial_distribution<>();
8378  std::negative_binomial_distribution<> rnbinomd =
8379  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();
8380  std::geometric_distribution<> rgeomd =
8381  std::geometric_distribution<>();
8382  std::poisson_distribution<> rpoissd =
8383  std::poisson_distribution<>();
8384 
8385  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> rewire_fun;
8386  epiworld_double rewire_prop = 0.0;
8387 
8388  std::map<std::string, epiworld_double > parameters;
8389  epiworld_fast_uint ndays = 0;
8390  Progress pb;
8391 
8392  std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > state_fun = {}; ///< Functions to update states
8393  std::vector< std::string > states_labels = {}; ///< Labels of the states
8394 
8396  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> initial_states_fun = [](Model<TSeq> * /**/)
8397  -> void {};
8398 
8399  epiworld_fast_uint nstates = 0u;
8400 
8401  bool verbose = true;
8402  int current_date = 0;
8403 
8404  void dist_tools();
8405  void dist_virus();
8406  void dist_entities();
8407 
8408  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_start;
8409  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_end;
8410 
8411  // std::chrono::milliseconds
8412  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> time_elapsed =
8413  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
8414  epiworld_fast_uint n_replicates = 0u;
8415  void chrono_start();
8416  void chrono_end();
8417 
8418  std::vector<GlobalEvent<TSeq>> globalevents;
8419 
8420  Queue<TSeq> queue;
8421  bool use_queuing = true;
8422 
8427  std::vector< Event<TSeq> > events = {};
8428  epiworld_fast_uint nactions = 0u;
8429 
8443  void events_add(
8444  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
8445  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
8446  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
8447  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
8448  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
8449  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
8450  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
8451  int idx_agent_,
8452  int idx_object_
8453  );
8454 
8464  MixerFun<TSeq> susceptibility_reduction_mixer = susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8465  MixerFun<TSeq> transmission_reduction_mixer = transmission_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8466  MixerFun<TSeq> recovery_enhancer_mixer = recovery_enhancer_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8467  MixerFun<TSeq> death_reduction_mixer = death_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8468 
8474  virtual Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
8475 
8476 public:
8477 
8478 
8479  std::vector<epiworld_double> array_double_tmp;
8480  std::vector<Virus<TSeq> * > array_virus_tmp;
8481 
8482  Model();
8483  Model(const Model<TSeq> & m);
8484  Model(Model<TSeq> & m);
8485  Model(Model<TSeq> && m);
8486  Model<TSeq> & operator=(const Model<TSeq> & m);
8487

9019 #endif
9020 
9021 // In case the user has a way to stop the program
9022 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
9023 // passed the simulation number.
9024 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
9025  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)
9026 #endif
9027 
9028 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS
9029  #define EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS 1048576
9030 #endif
9031 
9032 #if defined(_OPENMP) || defined(__OPENMP)
9033  #include <omp.h>
9034 // #else
9035 // #define omp_get_thread_num() 0
9036 // #define omp_set_num_threads() 1
9037 #endif
9038 
9039 #ifndef epiworld_double
9040  #define epiworld_double float
9041 #endif
9042 
9043 #ifndef epiworld_fast_int
9044  #define epiworld_fast_int int
9045 #endif
9046 
9047 #ifndef epiworld_fast_uint
9048  #define epiworld_fast_uint unsigned long long int
9049 #endif
9050 
9051 #define EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ int
9052 
9053 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9054 class Model;
9055 
9056 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9057 class Agent;
9058 
9059 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9060 class PersonTools;
9061 
9062 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9063 class Virus;
9064 
9065 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9066 class Viruses;
9067 
9068 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9069 class Viruses_const;
9070 
9071 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9072 class Tool;
9073 
9074 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9075 class Tools;
9076 
9077 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9078 class Tools_const;
9079 
9080 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9081 class Entity;
9082 
9083 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9084 using VirusPtr = std::shared_ptr< Virus< TSeq > >;
9085 
9086 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9087 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;
9088 
9089 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9090 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9091 
9092 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9093 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9094 
9095 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9096 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9097 
9098 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9099 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9100 
9101 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9102 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9103 
9104 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9105 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9106 
9107 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9108 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
9109 
9110 template<typename TSeq>
9111 struct Event;
9112 
9113 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9114 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9115 
9119 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9120 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9121 
9125 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9126 using ToolToAgentFun = std::function<void(Tool<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9127 
9131 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9132 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9133 
9139 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9140 struct Event {
9141  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
9142  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
9143  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
9144  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
9145  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
9146  epiworld_fast_int queue;
9147  EventFun<TSeq> call;
9148  int idx_agent;
9149  int idx_object;
9150 public:
9167  Event(
9168  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
9169  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
9170  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
9171  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
9172  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
9173  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
9174  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
9175  int idx_agent_,
9176  int idx_object_
9177  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
9178  new_state(new_state_),
9179  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
9180  return;
9181  };
9182 };

9193 #endif

9196  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION 0.0

9209 #endif

9211 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY

9213 #endif

9223 
9224 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9225  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
9226 
9227  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
9228  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
9229 
9230  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
9231  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
9232 
9233  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
9234  for (auto & v : vect) \
9235  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
9236  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
9237 
9238  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
9239  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
9240  for (auto & v : vect) \
9241  { \
9242  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
9243  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
9244  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
9245  }
9246 
9247  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
9248  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
9249  for (auto & v : vect) \
9250  { \
9251  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
9252  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
9253  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
9254  }
9255 
9256  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
9257  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
9258  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
9259  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
9260  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
9261  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
9262  }\
9263  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
9264  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
9265  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
9266  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
9267  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
9268  { \
9269  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
9270  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
9271  _j, \
9272  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
9273  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
9274  } \
9275  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
9276  }
9277 
9278  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
9279  if (a) \
9280  {\
9281  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
9282  }
9283 
9284  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
9285 #else
9286  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
9287  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
9288  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
9289  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
9290  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
9291  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
9292  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
9293  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
9294  if (a) \
9295  return false;
9296  #define epiexception(a) a
9297 #endif
9298 
9299 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
9300  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
9301 #else
9302  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
9303 #endif
9304 
9305 #endif
9306 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9308 
9309  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
9310

9323 
9324 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
9325 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
9326 
9327 template<typename TSeq>
9328 class Model;
9329 
9330 template<typename TSeq>
9331 class DataBase;
9332 
9338 template<typename TSeq>
9339 class UserData
9340 {
9341  friend class Model<TSeq>;
9342  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
9343 
9344 private:
9345  Model<TSeq> * model;
9346 
9347  std::vector< std::string > data_names;
9348  std::vector< int > data_dates;
9349  std::vector< epiworld_double > data_data;
9350 
9351  epiworld_fast_uint k = 0u;
9352  epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u;
9353 
9354  int last_day = -1;
9355 
9356 public:
9357 
9358  UserData() = delete;
9359  UserData(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m) {};
9360  UserData(Model<TSeq> * m) : model(m) {};
9361 
9368  UserData(std::vector< std::string > names);
9369 
9377  void add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x);
9378  void add(
9379  epiworld_fast_uint j,
9380  epiworld_double x
9381  );

9393  epiworld_fast_uint i,
9394  epiworld_fast_uint j
9395  );
9396

9398  epiworld_fast_uint i,
9399  std::string name
9400  );

9403  std::vector< std::string > & get_names();
9404 
9405  std::vector< int > & get_dates();
9406 
9407  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_data();
9408 
9409  void get_all(
9410  std::vector< std::string > * names = nullptr,
9411  std::vector< int > * date = nullptr,
9412  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data = nullptr
9413  );
9414

9416  epiworld_fast_uint ncol() const;
9417

9419  void print() const;

9421 };

9445 class AdjList {

9449  bool directed;

9451  epiworld_fast_uint E = 0;

9469  const std::vector< int > & source,
9470  const std::vector< int > & target,
9471  int size,
9472  bool directed
9473  );

9477  AdjList& operator=(const AdjList& a);

9491  std::string fn,
9492  int size,
9493  int skip = 0,
9494  bool directed = true
9495  );

9498  epiworld_fast_uint i
9499  ) const;
9500 
9501  void print(epiworld_fast_uint limit = 20u) const;
9502  size_t vcount() const; ///< Number of vertices/nodes in the network.
9503  size_t ecount() const; ///< Number of edges/arcs/ties in the network.
9504 
9505  std::vector<std::map<int,int>> & get_dat() {
9506  return dat;
9507  };
9508

9623 template<typename TSeq>
9624 class Model {
9625  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
9626  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
9627  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
9628  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
9629 protected:
9630 
9631  std::string name = ""; ///< Name of the model
9632 
9633  DataBase<TSeq> db = DataBase<TSeq>(*this);
9634 
9635  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population = {};
9636 
9637  bool using_backup = true;
9638  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population_backup = {};
9639 
9649  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
9650  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
9651  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
9652  size_t population_left_n = 0u;
9654 
9664  double * agents_data = nullptr;
9665  size_t agents_data_ncols = 0u;
9667 
9668  bool directed = false;

9671  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools = {};
9672 
9673  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities = {};
9674  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities_backup = {};
9675 
9676  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
9677 
9678  std::uniform_real_distribution<> runifd =
9679  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
9680  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
9681  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
9682  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
9683  std::gamma_distribution<>();
9684  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
9685  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
9686  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
9687  std::exponential_distribution<>();
9688  std::binomial_distribution<> rbinomd =
9689  std::binomial_distribution<>();
9690  std::negative_binomial_distribution<> rnbinomd =
9691  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();
9692  std::geometric_distribution<> rgeomd =
9693  std::geometric_distribution<>();
9694  std::poisson_distribution<> rpoissd =
9695  std::poisson_distribution<>();
9696 
9697  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> rewire_fun;
9698  epiworld_double rewire_prop = 0.0;

9701  epiworld_fast_uint ndays = 0;

9709  -> void {};

10298 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10300 
10301  Start of -include/epiworld//entities-bones.hpp-
10302 
10305 
10306 
10307 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
10308 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
10309 
10310 template<typename TSeq>
10311 class Virus;
10312 
10313 template<typename TSeq>
10314 class Agent;
10315 
10316 
10322 template<typename TSeq>
10323 class Entities {
10324  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
10325  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10326 private:
10327  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
10328  const size_t n_entities;
10329 
10330 public:
10331 
10332  Entities() = delete;
10333  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
10334 
10335  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
10336  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
10337 
10338  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
10339  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
10340 
10341  size_t size() const noexcept;
10342 
10343  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
10344 
10345 };
10346 
10347 template<typename TSeq>
10348 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
10349  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
10350 {
10351 
10352  dat.reserve(n_entities);
10353  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
10354  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
10355 
10356 }
10357 
10358 template<typename TSeq>
10359 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
10360 {
10361 
10362  if (n_entities == 0u)
10363  return dat.end();
10364 
10365  return dat.begin();
10366 }
10367 
10368 template<typename TSeq>
10369 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
10370 {
10371 
10372  return begin() + n_entities;
10373 }
10374 
10375 template<typename TSeq>
10376 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
10377 {
10378 
10379  if (i >= n_entities)
10380  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
10381 
10382  return *dat[i];
10383 
10384 }
10385 
10386 template<typename TSeq>
10387 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
10388 {
10389 
10390  return *dat[i];
10391 
10392 }
10393 
10394 template<typename TSeq>
10395 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
10396 {
10397  return n_entities;
10398 }
10399 
10400 template<typename TSeq>
10401 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
10402 {
10403 
10404  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
10405  return false;
10406 
10407  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
10408  {
10409  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
10410  return false;
10411  }
10412 
10413  return true;
10414 }
10415 
10421 template<typename TSeq>
10422 class Entities_const {
10423  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
10424  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10425 private:
10426  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
10427  const size_t n_entities;
10428 
10429 public:
10430 
10431  Entities_const() = delete;
10432  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
10433 
10434  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
10435  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
10436 
10437  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
10438  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
10439 
10440  size_t size() const noexcept;
10441 
10442  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
10443 
10444 };
10445 
10446 template<typename TSeq>
10447 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
10448  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
10449 {
10450 
10451  dat.reserve(n_entities);
10452  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
10453  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
10454 
10455 }
10456 
10457 template<typename TSeq>
10458 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
10459 
10460  if (n_entities == 0u)
10461  return dat.end();
10462 
10463  return dat.begin();
10464 }
10465 
10466 template<typename TSeq>
10467 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
10468 
10469  return begin() + n_entities;
10470 }
10471 
10472 template<typename TSeq>
10473 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
10474 {
10475 
10476  if (i >= n_entities)
10477  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
10478 
10479  return *dat[i];
10480 
10481 }
10482 
10483 template<typename TSeq>
10484 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
10485 {
10486 
10487  return *dat[i];
10488 
10489 }
10490 
10491 template<typename TSeq>
10492 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
10493 {
10494  return n_entities;
10495 }
10496 
10497 template<typename TSeq>
10498 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
10499 {
10500 
10501  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
10502  return false;
10503 
10504  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
10505  {
10506  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
10507  return false;
10508  }
10509 
10510  return true;
10511 }
10512 
10513 
10514 #endif
10515 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10517 
10518  End of -include/epiworld//entities-bones.hpp-
10519

10534 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP
10535 
10536 template<typename TSeq>
10537 class Agent;
10538 
10539 template<typename TSeq>
10540 class Virus;
10541 
10542 template<typename TSeq>
10543 class Model;
10544 
10545 template<typename TSeq>
10546 class VirusFunctions {
10547 public:
10548  MutFun<TSeq> mutation = nullptr;
10549  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> post_recovery = nullptr;
10550  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_infecting = nullptr;
10551  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_recovery = nullptr;
10552  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_death = nullptr;
10553  VirusFun<TSeq> incubation = nullptr;
10554 
10555  // Information about how distribution works
10556  VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
10557 
10558  VirusFunctions() = default;
10559 
10560 };
10561 
10572 template<typename TSeq>
10573 class Virus {
10574  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10575  friend class Model<TSeq>;
10576  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
10577  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10578  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10579 private:
10580 
10581  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
10582 
10583  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) baseline_sequence =
10584  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)();
10585 
10586  std::string virus_name = "unknown virus";
10587  int date = -99;
10588  int id = -99;
10589  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
10590  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
10591  epiworld_fast_int state_removed = -99; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
10592 
10593  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
10594  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
10595  epiworld_fast_int queue_removed = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
10596 
10597  std::shared_ptr< VirusFunctions<TSeq> > virus_functions =
10598  std::make_shared< VirusFunctions<TSeq> >();
10599 
10600 public:
10601 
10602  Virus();
10603 
10604  Virus(std::string name = "unknown virus");
10605 
10606  Virus(
10607  std::string name,
10608  epiworld_double prevalence,
10609  bool as_proportion
10610  );
10611

10613  void set_mutation(MutFun<TSeq> fun);
10614 
10615  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
10616  void set_sequence(TSeq sequence);
10617 
10618  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
10619  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p);
10620 
10621  void set_date(int d);
10622  int get_date() const;
10623 
10624  void set_id(int idx);
10625  int get_id() const;
10626 
10636  epiworld_double get_prob_infecting(Model<TSeq> * model);
10637  epiworld_double get_prob_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
10638  epiworld_double get_prob_death(Model<TSeq> * model);
10639  epiworld_double get_incubation(Model<TSeq> * model);
10640 
10641  void post_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
10642  void set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun);
10643  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double prob);
10644  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double * prob);
10645 
10646  void set_prob_infecting_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10647  void set_prob_recovery_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10648  void set_prob_death_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10649  void set_incubation_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10650 
10651  void set_prob_infecting(const epiworld_double * prob);
10652  void set_prob_recovery(const epiworld_double * prob);
10653  void set_prob_death(const epiworld_double * prob);
10654  void set_incubation(const epiworld_double * prob);
10655 
10656  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double prob);
10657  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double prob);
10658  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double prob);
10659  void set_incubation(epiworld_double prob);
10661 
10662 
10663  void set_name(std::string name);
10664  std::string get_name() const;
10665 
10679  void set_state(
10680  epiworld_fast_int init,
10681  epiworld_fast_int end,
10682  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
10683  );
10684 
10685  void set_queue(
10686  epiworld_fast_int init,
10687  epiworld_fast_int end,
10688  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
10689  );
10690 
10691  void get_state(
10692  epiworld_fast_int * init,
10693  epiworld_fast_int * end,
10694  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
10695  );
10696 
10697  void get_queue(
10698  epiworld_fast_int * init,
10699  epiworld_fast_int * end,
10700  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
10701  );
10703 
10704  bool operator==(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const;
10705  bool operator!=(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
10706 
10707  void print() const;
10708

10714  void set_distribution(VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> fun);
10716 
10717 
10718 };

10803 template<typename TSeq>
10804 class Agent {
10805  friend class Model<TSeq>;
10806  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
10807  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
10808  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
10809  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
10810  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
10811  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
10812  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
10813  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10814  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10815  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10816  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10817  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10818  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10819  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10820 private:
10821 
10822  Model<TSeq> * model;
10823 
10824  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
10825  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
10826  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
10827 
10828  std::vector< size_t > entities;
10829  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
10830  size_t n_entities = 0u;
10831 
10832  unsigned int state = 0u;
10833  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
10834 
10835  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
10836  int id = -1;
10837 
10838  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
10839 
10840  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
10841  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
10842 
10843 public:
10844 
10845  Agent();
10846  Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p);
10847  Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
10848  Agent<TSeq> & operator=(const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent);
10849  ~Agent();
10850 
10862  void add_tool(
10863  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
10864  Model<TSeq> * model,
10865  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
10866  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10867  );

10870  Tool<TSeq> tool,
10871  Model<TSeq> * model,
10872  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
10873  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10874  );

10877  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,

10880  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10881  );

10884  Virus<TSeq> virus,
10885  Model<TSeq> * model,
10886  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
10887  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10888  );

10929  );

11031

11041 
11044 
11045 
11046 
11065 template<typename TSeq>
11066 inline std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> make_save_run(
11067  std::string fmt,
11068  bool total_hist,
11069  bool virus_info,
11070  bool virus_hist,
11071  bool tool_info,
11072  bool tool_hist,
11073  bool transmission,
11074  bool transition,
11075  bool reproductive,
11076  bool generation
11077  )
11078 {
11079 
11080  // Counting number of %
11081  int n_fmt = 0;
11082  for (auto & f : fmt)
11083  if (f == '%')
11084  n_fmt++;
11085 
11086  if (n_fmt != 1)
11087  throw std::logic_error("The -fmt- argument must have only one \"%\" symbol.");
11088 
11089  // Listting things to save
11090  std::vector< bool > what_to_save = {
11091  virus_info,
11092  virus_hist,
11093  tool_info,
11094  tool_hist,
11095  total_hist,
11096  transmission,
11097  transition,
11098  reproductive,
11099  generation
11100  };
11101 
11102  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> saver = [fmt,what_to_save](
11103  size_t niter, Model<TSeq> * m
11104  ) -> void {
11105 
11106  std::string virus_info = "";
11107  std::string virus_hist = "";
11108  std::string tool_info = "";
11109  std::string tool_hist = "";
11110  std::string total_hist = "";
11111  std::string transmission = "";
11112  std::string transition = "";
11113  std::string reproductive = "";
11114  std::string generation = "";
11115 
11116  char buff[1024u];
11117  if (what_to_save[0u])
11118  {
11119  virus_info = fmt + std::string("_virus_info.csv");
11120  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), virus_info.c_str(), niter);
11121  virus_info = buff;
11122  }
11123  if (what_to_save[1u])
11124  {
11125  virus_hist = fmt + std::string("_virus_hist.csv");
11126  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), virus_hist.c_str(), niter);
11127  virus_hist = buff;
11128  }
11129  if (what_to_save[2u])
11130  {
11131  tool_info = fmt + std::string("_tool_info.csv");
11132  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_info.c_str(), niter);
11133  tool_info = buff;
11134  }
11135  if (what_to_save[3u])
11136  {
11137  tool_hist = fmt + std::string("_tool_hist.csv");
11138  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_hist.c_str(), niter);
11139  tool_hist = buff;
11140  }
11141  if (what_to_save[4u])
11142  {
11143  total_hist = fmt + std::string("_total_hist.csv");
11144  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), total_hist.c_str(), niter);
11145  total_hist = buff;
11146  }
11147  if (what_to_save[5u])
11148  {
11149  transmission = fmt + std::string("_transmission.csv");
11150  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transmission.c_str(), niter);
11151  transmission = buff;
11152  }
11153  if (what_to_save[6u])
11154  {
11155  transition = fmt + std::string("_transition.csv");
11156  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transition.c_str(), niter);
11157  transition = buff;
11158  }
11159  if (what_to_save[7u])
11160  {
11161 
11162  reproductive = fmt + std::string("_reproductive.csv");
11163  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), reproductive.c_str(), niter);
11164  reproductive = buff;
11165 
11166  }
11167  if (what_to_save[8u])
11168  {
11169 
11170  generation = fmt + std::string("_generation.csv");
11171  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), generation.c_str(), niter);
11172  generation = buff;
11173 
11174  }
11175 
11176 
11177  m->write_data(
11178  virus_info,
11179  virus_hist,
11180  tool_info,
11181  tool_hist,
11182  total_hist,
11183  transmission,
11184  transition,
11185  reproductive,
11186  generation
11187  );
11188 
11189  };
11190 
11191  return saver;
11192 }
11193 
11194 
11195 template<typename TSeq>
11196 inline void Model<TSeq>::events_add(
11197  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
11198  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
11199  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
11200  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
11201  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
11202  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
11203  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
11204  int idx_agent_,
11205  int idx_object_
11206 ) {
11207 
11208  ++nactions;
11209 
11210  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11211  if (nactions == 0)
11212  throw std::logic_error("Events cannot be zero!!");
11213  #endif
11214 
11215  if (nactions > events.size())
11216  {
11217 
11218  events.emplace_back(
11219  Event<TSeq>(
11220  agent_, virus_, tool_, entity_, new_state_, queue_, call_,
11221  idx_agent_, idx_object_
11222  ));
11223 
11224  }
11225  else
11226  {
11227 
11228  Event<TSeq> & A = events.at(nactions - 1u);
11229 
11230  A.agent = agent_;
11231  A.virus = virus_;
11232  A.tool = tool_;
11233  A.entity = entity_;
11234  A.new_state = new_state_;
11235  A.queue = queue_;
11236  A.call = call_;
11237  A.idx_agent = idx_agent_;
11238  A.idx_object = idx_object_;
11239 
11240  }
11241 
11242  return;
11243 
11244 }
11245 
11246 template<typename TSeq>
11247 inline void Model<TSeq>::events_run()
11248 {
11249  // Making the call
11250  size_t nevents_tmp = 0;
11251  while (nevents_tmp < nactions)
11252  {
11253 
11254  Event<TSeq> & a = events[nevents_tmp++];
11255  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
11256 
11257  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11258  if (a.new_state >= static_cast<epiworld_fast_int>(nstates))
11259  {
11260  throw std::range_error(
11261  "The proposed state " + std::to_string(a.new_state) + " is out of range. " +
11262  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstates - 1) + " states.");
11263 
11264  }
11265  else if ((a.new_state != -99) && (a.new_state < 0))
11266  {
11267  throw std::range_error(
11268  "The proposed state " + std::to_string(a.new_state) + " is out of range. " +
11269  "The state cannot be negative.");
11270  }
11271  #endif
11272 
11273  // Undoing the change in the transition matrix
11274  if (
11275  (a.new_state != -99) &&
11276  (p->state_last_changed == today()) &&
11277  (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state)
11278  )
11279  {
11280  // Undoing state change in the transition matrix
11281  // The previous state is already recorded
11282  db.update_state(p->state_prev, p->state, true);
11283 
11284  } else if (p->state_last_changed != today())
11285  p->state_prev = p->state; // Recording the previous state
11286 
11287  // Applying function after the fact. This way, if there were
11288  // updates, they can be recorded properly, before losing the information
11289  if (a.call)
11290  {
11291  a.call(a, this);
11292  }
11293 
11294  if (a.new_state != -99)
11295  p->state = a.new_state;
11296 
11297  // Registering that the last change was today
11298  p->state_last_changed = today();
11299 
11300 
11301  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11302  if (static_cast<int>(p->state) >= static_cast<int>(nstates))
11303  throw std::range_error(
11304  "The new state " + std::to_string(p->state) + " is out of range. " +
11305  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstates - 1) + " states.");
11306  #endif
11307 
11308  // Updating queue
11309  if (use_queuing && a.queue != -99)
11310  {
11311 
11312  if (a.queue == Queue<TSeq>::Everyone)
11313  queue += p;
11314  else if (a.queue == -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone)
11315  queue -= p;
11316  else if (a.queue == Queue<TSeq>::OnlySelf)
11317  queue[p->get_id()]++;
11318  else if (a.queue == -Queue<TSeq>::OnlySelf)
11319  queue[p->get_id()]--;
11320  else if (a.queue != Queue<TSeq>::NoOne)
11321  throw std::logic_error(
11322  "The proposed queue change is not valid. Queue values can be {-2, -1, 0, 1, 2}."
11323  );
11324 
11325  }
11326 
11327  }
11328 
11329  // Go back to square 1
11330  nactions = 0u;
11331 
11332  return;
11333 
11334 }
11335 
11344 template<typename TSeq>
11345 inline epiworld_double susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default(
11346  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11347  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11348  Model<TSeq> * m
11349 )
11350 {
11351  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11352  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11353  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m));
11354 
11355  return 1.0 - total;
11356 
11357 }
11358 
11359 template<typename TSeq>
11360 inline epiworld_double transmission_reduction_mixer_default(
11361  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11362  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11363  Model<TSeq>* m
11364 )
11365 {
11366  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11367  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11368  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_transmission_reduction(v, m));
11369 
11370  return (1.0 - total);
11371 
11372 }
11373 
11374 template<typename TSeq>
11375 inline epiworld_double recovery_enhancer_mixer_default(
11376  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11377  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11378  Model<TSeq>* m
11379 )
11380 {
11381  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11382  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11383  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
11384 
11385  return 1.0 - total;
11386 
11387 }
11388 
11389 template<typename TSeq>
11390 inline epiworld_double death_reduction_mixer_default(
11391  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11392  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11393  Model<TSeq>* m
11394 ) {
11395 
11396  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11397  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11398  {
11399  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_death_reduction(v, m));
11400  }
11401 
11402  return 1.0 - total;
11403 
11404 }
11406 
11407 template<typename TSeq>
11408 inline Model<TSeq> * Model<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
11409 {
11410  // Everything is copied
11411  Model<TSeq> * ptr = new Model<TSeq>(*dynamic_cast<const Model<TSeq>*>(this));
11412 
11413  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11414  if (*this != *ptr)
11415  throw std::logic_error("Model::clone_ptr The copies of the model don't match.");
11416  #endif
11417 
11418  return ptr;
11419 }
11420 
11421 template<typename TSeq>
11422 inline Model<TSeq>::Model()
11423 {
11424  db.model = this;
11425  db.user_data = this;
11426  if (use_queuing)
11427  queue.model = this;
11428 }
11429 
11430 template<typename TSeq>
11431 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(const Model<TSeq> & model) :
11432  name(model.name),
11433  db(model.db),
11434  population(model.population),
11435  population_backup(model.population_backup),
11436  directed(model.directed),
11437  viruses(model.viruses),
11438  tools(model.tools),
11439  entities(model.entities),
11440  entities_backup(model.entities_backup),
11441  rewire_fun(model.rewire_fun),
11442  rewire_prop(model.rewire_prop),
11443  parameters(model.parameters),
11444  ndays(model.ndays),
11445  pb(model.pb),
11446  state_fun(model.state_fun),
11447  states_labels(model.states_labels),
11448  initial_states_fun(model.initial_states_fun),
11449  nstates(model.nstates),
11450  verbose(model.verbose),
11451  current_date(model.current_date),
11452  globalevents(model.globalevents),
11453  queue(model.queue),
11454  use_queuing(model.use_queuing),
11455  array_double_tmp(model.array_double_tmp.size()),
11456  array_virus_tmp(model.array_virus_tmp.size())
11457 {
11458 
11459 
11460  // Removing old neighbors
11461  for (auto & p : population)
11462  p.model = this;
11463 
11464  // Pointing to the right place. This needs
11465  // to be done afterwards since the state zero is set as a function
11466  // of the population.
11467  db.model = this;
11468  db.user_data.model = this;
11469 
11470  if (use_queuing)
11471  queue.model = this;
11472 
11473  agents_data = model.agents_data;
11474  agents_data_ncols = model.agents_data_ncols;
11475 
11476 }
11477 
11478 template<typename TSeq>
11479 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(Model<TSeq> & model) :
11480  Model(dynamic_cast< const Model<TSeq> & >(model)) {}
11481 
11482 template<typename TSeq>
11483 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(Model<TSeq> && model) :
11484  name(std::move(model.name)),
11485  db(std::move(model.db)),
11486  population(std::move(model.population)),
11487  agents_data(std::move(model.agents_data)),
11488  agents_data_ncols(std::move(model.agents_data_ncols)),
11489  directed(std::move(model.directed)),
11490  // Virus
11491  viruses(std::move(model.viruses)),
11492  // Tools
11493  tools(std::move(model.tools)),
11494  // Entities
11495  entities(std::move(model.entities)),
11496  entities_backup(std::move(model.entities_backup)),
11497  // Pseudo-RNG
11498  engine(std::move(model.engine)),
11499  runifd(std::move(model.runifd)),
11500  rnormd(std::move(model.rnormd)),
11501  rgammad(std::move(model.rgammad)),
11502  rlognormald(std::move(model.rlognormald)),
11503  rexpd(std::move(model.rexpd)),
11504  // Rewiring
11505  rewire_fun(std::move(model.rewire_fun)),
11506  rewire_prop(std::move(model.rewire_prop)),
11507  parameters(std::move(model.parameters)),
11508  // Others
11509  ndays(model.ndays),
11510  pb(std::move(model.pb)),
11511  state_fun(std::move(model.state_fun)),
11512  states_labels(std::move(model.states_labels)),
11513  initial_states_fun(std::move(model.initial_states_fun)),
11514  nstates(model.nstates),
11515  verbose(model.verbose),
11516  current_date(std::move(model.current_date)),
11517  globalevents(std::move(model.globalevents)),
11518  queue(std::move(model.queue)),
11519  use_queuing(model.use_queuing),
11520  array_double_tmp(model.array_double_tmp.size()),
11521  array_virus_tmp(model.array_virus_tmp.size())
11522 {
11523 
11524  db.model = this;
11525  db.user_data.model = this;
11526 
11527  if (use_queuing)
11528  queue.model = this;
11529 
11530 }
11531 
11532 template<typename TSeq>
11533 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::operator=(const Model<TSeq> & m)
11534 {
11535  name = m.name;
11536 
11537  population = m.population;
11538  population_backup = m.population_backup;
11539 
11540  for (auto & p : population)
11541  p.model = this;
11542 
11543  db = m.db;
11544  db.model = this;
11545  db.user_data.model = this;
11546 
11547  directed = m.directed;
11548 
11549  viruses = m.viruses;
11550 
11551  tools = m.tools;
11552 
11553  entities = m.entities;
11554  entities_backup = m.entities_backup;
11555 
11556  rewire_fun = m.rewire_fun;
11557  rewire_prop = m.rewire_prop;
11558 
11559  parameters = m.parameters;
11560  ndays = m.ndays;
11561  pb = m.pb;
11562 
11563  state_fun = m.state_fun;
11564  states_labels = m.states_labels;
11565  initial_states_fun = m.initial_states_fun;
11566  nstates = m.nstates;
11567 
11568  verbose = m.verbose;
11569 
11570  current_date = m.current_date;
11571 
11572  globalevents = m.globalevents;
11573 
11574  queue = m.queue;
11575  use_queuing = m.use_queuing;
11576 
11577  // Making sure population is passed correctly
11578  // Pointing to the right place
11579  db.model = this;
11580  db.user_data.model = this;
11581 
11582  agents_data = m.agents_data;
11583  agents_data_ncols = m.agents_data_ncols;
11584 
11585  // Figure out the queuing
11586  if (use_queuing)
11587  queue.model = this;
11588 
11589  array_double_tmp.resize(static_cast<size_t>(1024u), 0.0);
11590  array_virus_tmp.resize(1024u);
11591 
11592  return *this;
11593 
11594 }
11595 
11596 template<typename TSeq>
11597 inline DataBase<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_db()
11598 {
11599  return db;
11600 }
11601 
11602 template<typename TSeq>
11603 inline const DataBase<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_db() const
11604 {
11605  return db;
11606 }
11607 
11608 
11609 template<typename TSeq>
11610 inline std::vector<Agent<TSeq>> & Model<TSeq>::get_agents()
11611 {
11612  return population;
11613 }
11614 
11615 template<typename TSeq>
11616 inline Agent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_agent(size_t i)
11617 {
11618  return population[i];
11619 }
11620 
11621 template<typename TSeq>
11622 inline std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_states() const
11623 {
11624  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > states(population.size());
11625  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11626  states[i] = population[i].get_state();
11627 
11628  return states;
11629 }
11630 
11631 template<typename TSeq>
11632 inline std::vector< Viruses_const<TSeq> > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_viruses() const
11633 {
11634 
11635  std::vector< Viruses_const<TSeq> > viruses(population.size());
11636  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11637  viruses[i] = population[i].get_virus();
11638 
11639  return viruses;
11640 
11641 }
11642 
11643 // Same as before, but the non const version
11644 template<typename TSeq>
11645 inline std::vector< Viruses<TSeq> > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_viruses()
11646 {
11647 
11648  std::vector< Viruses<TSeq> > viruses(population.size());
11649  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11650  viruses[i] = population[i].get_virus();
11651 
11652  return viruses;
11653 
11654 }
11655 
11656 template<typename TSeq>
11657 inline std::vector<Entity<TSeq>> & Model<TSeq>::get_entities()
11658 {
11659  return entities;
11660 }
11661 
11662 template<typename TSeq>
11663 inline Entity<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i, int * entity_pos)
11664 {
11665 
11666  for (size_t j = 0u; j < entities.size(); ++j)
11667  if (entities[j].get_id() == static_cast<int>(i))
11668  {
11669 
11670  if (entity_pos)
11671  *entity_pos = j;
11672 
11673  return entities[j];
11674 
11675  }
11676 
11677  throw std::range_error("The entity with id " + std::to_string(i) + " was not found.");
11678 
11679 }
11680 
11681 template<typename TSeq>
11682 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::agents_smallworld(
11683  epiworld_fast_uint n,
11684  epiworld_fast_uint k,
11685  bool d,
11686  epiworld_double p
11687 )
11688 {
11689  agents_from_adjlist(
11690  rgraph_smallworld(n, k, p, d, *this)
11691  );
11692 
11693  return *this;
11694 }
11695 
11696 template<typename TSeq>
11697 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_empty_graph(
11698  epiworld_fast_uint n
11699 )
11700 {
11701 
11702  // Resizing the people
11703  population.clear();
11704  population.resize(n, Agent<TSeq>());
11705 
11706  // Filling the model and ids
11707  size_t i = 0u;
11708  for (auto & p : population)
11709  {
11710  p.id = i++;
11711  p.model = this;
11712  }
11713 
11714 
11715 }
11716 
11717 template<typename TSeq>
11718 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
11719 {
11720  rgammad = std::gamma_distribution<>(alpha,beta);
11721 }
11722 
11723 template<typename TSeq>
11724 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_norm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd)
11725 {
11726  rnormd = std::normal_distribution<>(mean, sd);
11727 }
11728 
11729 template<typename TSeq>
11730 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_unif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b)
11731 {
11732  runifd = std::uniform_real_distribution<>(a, b);
11733 }
11734 
11735 template<typename TSeq>
11736 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_lognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape)
11737 {
11738  rlognormald = std::lognormal_distribution<>(mean, shape);
11739 }
11740 
11741 template<typename TSeq>
11742 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_exp(epiworld_double lambda)
11743 {
11744  rexpd = std::exponential_distribution<>(lambda);
11745 }
11746 
11747 template<typename TSeq>
11748 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(int n, epiworld_double p)
11749 {
11750  rbinomd = std::binomial_distribution<>(n, p);
11751 }
11752 
11753 template<typename TSeq>
11754 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_nbinom(int n, epiworld_double p)
11755 {
11756  rnbinomd = std::negative_binomial_distribution<>(n, p);
11757 }

11760 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_geom(epiworld_double p)
11761 {
11762  rgeomd = std::geometric_distribution<>(p);
11763 }
