11766 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_poiss(epiworld_double lambda)
11767 {
11768  rpoissd = std::poisson_distribution<>(lambda);
11769 }
11770 
11771 template<typename TSeq>
11772 inline epiworld_double & Model<TSeq>::operator()(std::string pname) {
11773 
11774  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
11775  throw std::range_error("The parameter '"+ pname + "' is not in the model.");
11776 
11777  return parameters[pname];
11778 
11779 }
11780 
11781 template<typename TSeq>
11782 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::size() const {
11783  return population.size();
11784 }
11785 
11786 template<typename TSeq>
11787 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_virus()
11788 {
11789 
11790  for (auto & v: viruses)
11791  {
11792 
11793  v->distribute(this);
11794 
11795  // Apply the events
11796  events_run();
11797  }
11798 
11799 }
11800 
11801 template<typename TSeq>
11802 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_tools()
11803 {
11804 
11805  for (auto & tool: tools)
11806  {
11807 
11808  tool->distribute(this);
11809 
11810  // Apply the events
11811  events_run();
11812 
11813  }
11814 
11815 }
11816 
11817 template<typename TSeq>
11818 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_entities()
11819 {
11820 
11821  for (auto & entity: entities)
11822  {
11823 
11824  entity.distribute(this);
11825 
11826  // Apply the events
11827  events_run();
11828 
11829  }
11830 
11831 }
11832 
11833 template<typename TSeq>
11834 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_start() {
11835  time_start = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
11836 }
11837 
11838 template<typename TSeq>
11839 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_end() {
11840  time_end = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
11841  time_elapsed += (time_end - time_start);
11842  n_replicates++;
11843 }
11844 
11845 template<typename TSeq>
11846 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_backup()
11847 {
11848 
11849  if (population_backup.size() == 0u)
11850  population_backup = std::vector< Agent<TSeq> >(population);
11851 
11852  if (entities_backup.size() == 0u)
11853  entities_backup = std::vector< Entity<TSeq> >(entities);
11854 
11855 }
11856 
11857 template<typename TSeq>
11858 inline std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & Model<TSeq>::get_rand_endgine()
11859 {
11860  return engine;
11861 }
11862 
11863 template<typename TSeq>
11864 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif() {
11865  // CHECK_INIT()
11866  return runifd(*engine);
11867 }
11868 
11869 template<typename TSeq>
11870 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b) {
11871  // CHECK_INIT()
11872  return runifd(*engine) * (b - a) + a;
11873 }
11874 
11875 template<typename TSeq>
11876 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm() {
11877  // CHECK_INIT()
11878  return rnormd(*engine);
11879 }
11880 
11881 template<typename TSeq>
11882 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd) {
11883  // CHECK_INIT()
11884  return rnormd(*engine) * sd + mean;
11885 }
11886 
11887 template<typename TSeq>
11888 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma() {
11889  return rgammad(*engine);
11890 }
11891 
11892 template<typename TSeq>
11893 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta) {
11894  auto old_param = rgammad.param();
11895  rgammad.param(std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta));
11896  epiworld_double ans = rgammad(*engine);
11897  rgammad.param(old_param);
11898  return ans;
11899 }
11900 
11901 template<typename TSeq>
11902 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp() {
11903  return rexpd(*engine);
11904 }
11905 
11906 template<typename TSeq>
11907 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp(epiworld_double lambda) {
11908  auto old_param = rexpd.param();
11909  rexpd.param(std::exponential_distribution<>::param_type(lambda));
11910  epiworld_double ans = rexpd(*engine);
11911  rexpd.param(old_param);
11912  return ans;
11913 }
11914 
11915 template<typename TSeq>
11916 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal() {
11917  return rlognormald(*engine);
11918 }
11919 
11920 template<typename TSeq>
11921 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape) {
11922  auto old_param = rlognormald.param();
11923  rlognormald.param(std::lognormal_distribution<>::param_type(mean, shape));
11924  epiworld_double ans = rlognormald(*engine);
11925  rlognormald.param(old_param);
11926  return ans;
11927 }
11928 
11929 template<typename TSeq>
11930 inline int Model<TSeq>::rbinom() {
11931  return rbinomd(*engine);
11932 }
11933 
11934 template<typename TSeq>
11935 inline int Model<TSeq>::rbinom(int n, epiworld_double p) {
11936  auto old_param = rbinomd.param();
11937  rbinomd.param(std::binomial_distribution<>::param_type(n, p));
11938  epiworld_double ans = rbinomd(*engine);
11939  rbinomd.param(old_param);
11940  return ans;
11941 }
11942 
11943 template<typename TSeq>
11944 inline int Model<TSeq>::rnbinom() {
11945  return rnbinomd(*engine);
11946 }
11947 
11948 template<typename TSeq>
11949 inline int Model<TSeq>::rnbinom(int n, epiworld_double p) {
11950  auto old_param = rnbinomd.param();
11951  rnbinomd.param(std::negative_binomial_distribution<>::param_type(n, p));
11952  int ans = rnbinomd(*engine);
11953  rnbinomd.param(old_param);
11954  return ans;
11955 }
11956 
11957 template<typename TSeq>
11958 inline int Model<TSeq>::rgeom() {
11959  return rgeomd(*engine);
11960 }
11961 
11962 template<typename TSeq>
11963 inline int Model<TSeq>::rgeom(epiworld_double p) {
11964  auto old_param = rgeomd.param();
11965  rgeomd.param(std::geometric_distribution<>::param_type(p));
11966  int ans = rgeomd(*engine);
11967  rgeomd.param(old_param);
11968  return ans;
11969 }
11970 
11971 template<typename TSeq>
11972 inline int Model<TSeq>::rpoiss() {
11973  return rpoissd(*engine);
11974 }
11975 
11976 template<typename TSeq>
11977 inline int Model<TSeq>::rpoiss(epiworld_double lambda) {
11978  auto old_param = rpoissd.param();
11979  rpoissd.param(std::poisson_distribution<>::param_type(lambda));
11980  int ans = rpoissd(*engine);
11981  rpoissd.param(old_param);
11982  return ans;
11983 }
11984 
11985 template<typename TSeq>
11986 inline void Model<TSeq>::seed(size_t s) {
11987  this->engine->seed(s);
11988 }
11989 
11990 template<typename TSeq>
11991 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_virus(
11992  Virus<TSeq> & v
11993  )
11994 {
11995 
11996  // Checking the state
11997  epiworld_fast_int init_, post_, rm_;
11998  v.get_state(&init_, &post_, &rm_);
11999 
12000  if (init_ == -99)
12001  throw std::logic_error(
12002  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -init- state."
12003  );
12004  else if (post_ == -99)
12005  throw std::logic_error(
12006  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -post- state."
12007  );
12008 
12009  // Recording the variant
12010  db.record_virus(v);
12011 
12012  // Adding new virus
12013  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(v));
12014 
12015 }
12016 
12017 template<typename TSeq>
12018 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t)
12019 {
12020 
12021 
12022  db.record_tool(t);
12023 
12024  // Adding the tool to the model (and database.)
12025  tools.push_back(std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(t));
12026 
12027 }
12028 
12029 template<typename TSeq>
12030 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_entity(Entity<TSeq> e)
12031 {
12032 
12033  e.id = entities.size();
12034  entities.push_back(e);
12035 
12036 }
12037 
12038 template<typename TSeq>
12039 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_entity(size_t entity_id)
12040 {
12041 
12042  int entity_pos = 0;
12043  auto & entity = this->get_entity(entity_id, &entity_pos);
12044 
12045  // First, resetting the entity
12046  entity.reset();
12047 
12048  // How should
12049  if (entity_pos != (static_cast<int>(entities.size()) - 1))
12050  std::swap(entities[entity_pos], entities[entities.size() - 1]);
12051 
12052  entities.pop_back();
12053 }
12054 
12055 template<typename TSeq>
12056 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_virus(size_t virus_pos)
12057 {
12058 
12059  if (viruses.size() <= virus_pos)
12060  throw std::range_error(
12061  std::string("The specified virus (") +
12062  std::to_string(virus_pos) +
12063  std::string(") is out of range. ") +
12064  std::string("There are only ") +
12065  std::to_string(viruses.size()) +
12066  std::string(" viruses.")
12067  );
12068 
12069  // Flipping with the last one
12070  std::swap(viruses[virus_pos], viruses[viruses.size() - 1]);
12071  viruses.pop_back();
12072 
12073  return;
12074 
12075 }
12076 
12077 template<typename TSeq>
12078 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_tool(size_t tool_pos)
12079 {
12080 
12081  if (tools.size() <= tool_pos)
12082  throw std::range_error(
12083  std::string("The specified tool (") +
12084  std::to_string(tool_pos) +
12085  std::string(") is out of range. ") +
12086  std::string("There are only ") +
12087  std::to_string(tools.size()) +
12088  std::string(" tools.")
12089  );
12090 
12091  // Flipping with the last one
12092  std::swap(tools[tool_pos], tools[tools.size() - 1]);
12093 
12094  /* There's an error on windows:
12095  https://github.com/UofUEpiBio/epiworldR/actions/runs/4801482395/jobs/8543744180#step:6:84
12096 
12097  More clear here:
12098  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/58660207/why-doesnt-stdswap-work-on-vectorbool-elements-under-clang-win
12099  */
12100 
12101  tools.pop_back();
12102 
12103  return;
12104 
12105 }
12106 
12107 template<typename TSeq>
12108 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12109  std::string fn,
12110  int skip
12111  )
12112 {
12113 
12114  int i,j;
12115  std::ifstream filei(fn);
12116 
12117  if (!filei)
12118  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
12119 
12120  int linenum = 0;
12121  std::vector< std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > > target_(entities.size());
12122 
12123  target_.reserve(1e5);
12124 
12125  while (!filei.eof())
12126  {
12127 
12128  if (linenum++ < skip)
12129  continue;
12130 
12131  filei >> i >> j;
12132 
12133  // Looking for exceptions
12134  if (filei.bad())
12135  throw std::logic_error(
12136  "I/O error while reading the file " +
12137  fn
12138  );
12139 
12140  if (filei.fail())
12141  break;
12142 
12143  if (i >= static_cast<int>(this->size()))
12144  throw std::range_error(
12145  "The agent["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
12146  " is above the max id " + std::to_string(this->size() - 1)
12147  );
12148 
12149  if (j >= static_cast<int>(this->entities.size()))
12150  throw std::range_error(
12151  "The entity["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
12152  " is above the max id " + std::to_string(this->entities.size() - 1)
12153  );
12154 
12155  target_[j].push_back(i);
12156 
12157  population[i].add_entity(entities[j], nullptr);
12158 
12159  }
12160 
12161  return;
12162 
12163 }
12164 
12165 template<typename TSeq>
12166 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12167  const std::vector< int > & agents_ids,
12168  const std::vector< int > & entities_ids
12169 ) {
12170 
12171  // Checking the size
12172  if (agents_ids.size() != entities_ids.size())
12173  throw std::length_error(
12174  std::string("The size of agents_ids (") +
12175  std::to_string(agents_ids.size()) +
12176  std::string(") and entities_ids (") +
12177  std::to_string(entities_ids.size()) +
12178  std::string(") must be the same.")
12179  );
12180 
12181  return this->load_agents_entities_ties(
12182  agents_ids.data(),
12183  entities_ids.data(),
12184  agents_ids.size()
12185  );
12186 
12187 }
12188 
12189 template<typename TSeq>
12190 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12191  const int * agents_ids,
12192  const int * entities_ids,
12193  size_t n
12194 ) {
12195 
12196  auto get_agent = [agents_ids](int i) -> int {
12197  return *(agents_ids + i);
12198  };
12199 
12200  auto get_entity = [entities_ids](int i) -> int {
12201  return *(entities_ids + i);
12202  };
12203 
12204  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
12205  {
12206 
12207  if (get_agent(i) < 0)
12208  throw std::length_error(
12209  std::string("agents_ids[") +
12210  std::to_string(i) +
12211  std::string("] = ") +
12212  std::to_string(get_agent(i)) +
12213  std::string(" is negative.")
12214  );
12215 
12216  if (get_entity(i) < 0)
12217  throw std::length_error(
12218  std::string("entities_ids[") +
12219  std::to_string(i) +
12220  std::string("] = ") +
12221  std::to_string(get_entity(i)) +
12222  std::string(" is negative.")
12223  );
12224 
12225  int pop_size = static_cast<int>(this->population.size());
12226  if (get_agent(i) >= pop_size)
12227  throw std::length_error(
12228  std::string("agents_ids[") +
12229  std::to_string(i) +
12230  std::string("] = ") +
12231  std::to_string(get_agent(i)) +
12232  std::string(" is out of range (population size: ") +
12233  std::to_string(pop_size) +
12234  std::string(").")
12235  );
12236 
12237  int ent_size = static_cast<int>(this->entities.size());
12238  if (get_entity(i) >= ent_size)
12239  throw std::length_error(
12240  std::string("entities_ids[") +
12241  std::to_string(i) +
12242  std::string("] = ") +
12243  std::to_string(get_entity(i)) +
12244  std::string(" is out of range (entities size: ") +
12245  std::to_string(ent_size) +
12246  std::string(").")
12247  );
12248 
12249  // Adding the entity to the agent
12250  this->population[get_agent(i)].add_entity(
12251  this->entities[get_entity(i)],
12252  nullptr /* Immediately add it to the agent */
12253  );
12254 
12255  }
12256 
12257  return;
12258 
12259 
12260 }
12261 
12262 template<typename TSeq>
12263 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(
12264  std::string fn,
12265  int size,
12266  int skip,
12267  bool directed
12268  ) {
12269 
12270  AdjList al;
12271  al.read_edgelist(fn, size, skip, directed);
12272  this->agents_from_adjlist(al);
12273 
12274 }
12275 
12276 template<typename TSeq>
12277 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_edgelist(
12278  const std::vector< int > & source,
12279  const std::vector< int > & target,
12280  int size,
12281  bool directed
12282 ) {
12283 
12284  AdjList al(source, target, size, directed);
12285  agents_from_adjlist(al);
12286 
12287 }
12288 
12289 template<typename TSeq>
12290 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(AdjList al) {
12291 
12292  // Resizing the people
12293  agents_empty_graph(al.vcount());
12294 
12295  const auto & tmpdat = al.get_dat();
12296 
12297  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tmpdat.size(); ++i)
12298  {
12299 
12300  // population[i].id = i;
12301  population[i].model = this;
12302 
12303  for (const auto & link: tmpdat[i])
12304  {
12305 
12306  population[i].add_neighbor(
12307  population[link.first],
12308  true, true
12309  );
12310 
12311  }
12312 
12313  }
12314 
12315  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12316  for (auto & p: population)
12317  {
12318  if (p.id >= static_cast<int>(al.vcount()))
12319  throw std::logic_error(
12320  "Agent's id cannot be negative above or equal to the number of agents!");
12321  }
12322  #endif
12323 
12324 }
12325 
12326 template<typename TSeq>
12327 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_directed() const
12328 {
12329  if (population.size() == 0u)
12330  throw std::logic_error("The population hasn't been initialized.");
12331 
12332  return directed;
12333 }
12334 
12335 template<typename TSeq>
12336 inline int Model<TSeq>::today() const {
12337 
12338  if (ndays == 0)
12339  return 0;
12340 
12341  return this->current_date;
12342 }
12343 
12344 template<typename TSeq>
12345 inline void Model<TSeq>::next() {
12346 
12347  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12348  // Checking all the agents have proper states
12349  for (auto & p : population)
12350  {
12351  if ((p.state >= nstates) || (p.state < 0))
12352  {
12353  throw std::range_error(
12354  "The agent " + std::to_string(p.id) +
12355  " has state " + std::to_string(p.state) +
12356  " which is above the maximum state of " +
12357  std::to_string(nstates - 1) + "."
12358  );
12359  }
12360 
12361  if ((p.state_prev >= nstates) || (p.state_prev < 0))
12362  {
12363  throw std::range_error(
12364  "The agent " + std::to_string(p.id) +
12365  " has previous state " + std::to_string(p.state_prev) +
12366  " which is above the maximum state of " +
12367  std::to_string(nstates - 1) + "."
12368  );
12369  }
12370 
12371  }
12372 
12373  #endif
12374 
12375  db.record();
12376  ++this->current_date;
12377 
12378  // Advancing the progress bar
12379  if ((this->current_date >= 1) && verbose)
12380  pb.next();
12381 
12382  return ;
12383 }
12384 
12385 template<typename TSeq>
12386 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::run(
12387  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
12388  int seed
12389 )
12390 {
12391 
12392  if (size() == 0u)
12393  throw std::logic_error("There are no agents in this model!");
12394 
12395  if (nstates == 0u)
12396  throw std::logic_error(
12397  std::string("No states registered in this model. ") +
12398  std::string("At least one state should be included. See the function -Model::add_state()-")
12399  );
12400 
12401  // Setting up the number of steps
12402  this->ndays = ndays;
12403 
12404  if (seed >= 0)
12405  engine->seed(seed);
12406 
12407  array_double_tmp.resize(std::max(
12408  size(),
12409  static_cast<size_t>(1024)
12410  ));
12411 
12412 
12413  array_virus_tmp.resize(1024);
12414 
12415  // Checking whether the proposed state in/out/removed
12416  // are valid
12417  epiworld_fast_int _init, _end, _removed;
12418  int nstate_int = static_cast<int>(nstates);
12419  for (auto & v : viruses)
12420  {
12421  v->get_state(&_init, &_end, &_removed);
12422 
12423  // Negative unspecified state
12424  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstate_int))
12425  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12426  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12427 
12428  // Negative unspecified state
12429  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstate_int))
12430  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12431  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12432 
12433  if (((_removed != -99) && (_removed < 0)) || (_removed >= nstate_int))
12434  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12435  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12436 
12437  }
12438 
12439  for (auto & t : tools)
12440  {
12441  t->get_state(&_init, &_end);
12442 
12443  // Negative unspecified state
12444  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstate_int))
12445  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12446  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12447 
12448  // Negative unspecified state
12449  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstate_int))
12450  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12451  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12452 
12453  }
12454 
12455  // Starting first infection and tools
12456  reset();
12457 
12458  // Initializing the simulation
12459  chrono_start();
12460  EPIWORLD_RUN((*this))
12461  {
12462 
12463  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12464  db.n_transmissions_potential = 0;
12465  db.n_transmissions_today = 0;
12466  #endif
12467 
12468  // We can execute these components in whatever order the
12469  // user needs.
12470  this->update_state();
12471 
12472  // We start with the Global events
12473  this->run_globalevents();
12474 
12475  // In this case we are applying degree sequence rewiring
12476  // to change the network just a bit.
12477  this->rewire();
12478 
12479  // This locks all the changes
12480  this->next();
12481 
12482  // Mutation must happen at the very end of all
12483  this->mutate_virus();
12484 
12485  }
12486 
12487  // The last reaches the end...
12488  this->current_date--;
12489 
12490  chrono_end();
12491 
12492  return *this;
12493 
12494 }
12495 
12496 template<typename TSeq>
12497 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_multiple(
12498  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
12499  epiworld_fast_uint nexperiments,
12500  int seed_,
12501  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
12502  bool reset,
12503  bool verbose,
12504  #ifdef _OPENMP
12505  int nthreads
12506  #else
12507  int
12508  #endif
12509 )
12510 {
12511 
12512  if (seed_ >= 0)
12513  this->seed(seed_);
12514 
12515  // Seeds will be reproducible by default
12516  std::vector< int > seeds_n(nexperiments);
12517  for (auto & s : seeds_n)
12518  {
12519  s = static_cast<int>(
12520  std::floor(
12521  runif() * static_cast<double>(std::numeric_limits<int>::max())
12522  )
12523  );
12524  }
12525  // #endif
12526 
12527  EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
12528 
12529  bool old_verb = this->verbose;
12530  verbose_off();
12531 
12532  // Setting up backup
12533  if (reset)
12534  set_backup();
12535 
12536  #ifdef _OPENMP
12537 
12538  omp_set_num_threads(nthreads);
12539 
12540  // Not more than the number of experiments
12541  nthreads =
12542  static_cast<size_t>(nthreads) > nexperiments ? nexperiments : nthreads;
12543 
12544  // Generating copies of the model
12545  std::vector< Model<TSeq> * > these(
12546  std::max(nthreads - 1, 0)
12547  );
12548 
12549  #pragma omp parallel for shared(these, nthreads)
12550  for (size_t i = 0u; i < static_cast<size_t>(nthreads); ++i)
12551  {
12552 
12553  if (i == 0)
12554  continue;
12555 
12556  these[i - 1] = clone_ptr();
12557 
12558  }
12559 
12560 
12561  // Figuring out how many replicates
12562  std::vector< size_t > nreplicates(nthreads, 0);
12563  std::vector< size_t > nreplicates_csum(nthreads, 0);
12564  size_t sums = 0u;
12565  for (int i = 0; i < nthreads; ++i)
12566  {
12567  nreplicates[i] = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
12568  std::floor(nexperiments/nthreads)
12569  );
12570 
12571  // This takes the cumsum
12572  nreplicates_csum[i] = sums;
12573 
12574  sums += nreplicates[i];
12575 
12576  }
12577 
12578  if (sums < nexperiments)
12579  nreplicates[nthreads - 1] += (nexperiments - sums);
12580 
12581  Progress pb_multiple(
12582  nreplicates[0u],
12583  EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
12584  );
12585 
12586  if (verbose)
12587  {
12588 
12589  printf_epiworld(
12590  "Starting multiple runs (%i) using %i thread(s)\n",
12591  static_cast<int>(nexperiments),
12592  static_cast<int>(nthreads)
12593  );
12594 
12595  pb_multiple.start();
12596 
12597  }
12598 
12599  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12600  // Checking the initial state of all the models. Throw an
12601  // exception if they are not the same.
12602  for (size_t i = 1; i < static_cast<size_t>(std::max(nthreads - 1, 0)); ++i)
12603  {
12604 
12605  if (db != these[i]->db)
12606  {
12607  throw std::runtime_error(
12608  "The initial state of the models is not the same"
12609  );
12610  }
12611  }
12612  #endif
12613 
12614  #pragma omp parallel shared(these, nreplicates, nreplicates_csum, seeds_n) \
12615  firstprivate(nexperiments, nthreads, fun, reset, verbose, pb_multiple, ndays) \
12616  default(shared)
12617  {
12618 
12619  auto iam = omp_get_thread_num();
12620 
12621  for (size_t n = 0u; n < nreplicates[iam]; ++n)
12622  {
12623  size_t sim_id = nreplicates_csum[iam] + n;
12624  if (iam == 0)
12625  {
12626 
12627  // Checking if the user interrupted the simulation
12628  EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(n);
12629 
12630  // Initializing the seed
12631  run(ndays, seeds_n[sim_id]);
12632 
12633  if (fun)
12634  fun(n, this);
12635 
12636  // Only the first one prints
12637  if (verbose)
12638  pb_multiple.next();
12639 
12640  } else {
12641 
12642  // Initializing the seed
12643  these[iam - 1]->run(ndays, seeds_n[sim_id]);
12644 
12645  if (fun)
12646  fun(sim_id, these[iam - 1]);
12647 
12648  }
12649 
12650 
12651 
12652  }
12653 
12654  }
12655 
12656  // Adjusting the number of replicates
12657  n_replicates += (nexperiments - nreplicates[0u]);
12658 
12659  #pragma omp parallel for shared(these)
12660  for (int i = 1; i < nthreads; ++i)
12661  {
12662  delete these[i - 1];
12663  }
12664 
12665  #else
12666  // if (reset)
12667  // set_backup();
12668 
12669  Progress pb_multiple(
12670  nexperiments,
12671  EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
12672  )
12673  ;
12674  if (verbose)
12675  {
12676 
12677  printf_epiworld(
12678  "Starting multiple runs (%i)\n",
12679  static_cast<int>(nexperiments)
12680  );
12681 
12682  pb_multiple.start();
12683 
12684  }
12685 
12686  for (size_t n = 0u; n < nexperiments; ++n)
12687  {
12688 
12689  // Checking if the user interrupted the simulation
12690  EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(n);
12691 
12692  run(ndays, seeds_n[n]);
12693 
12694  if (fun)
12695  fun(n, this);
12696 
12697  if (verbose)
12698  pb_multiple.next();
12699 
12700  }
12701  #endif
12702 
12703  if (verbose)
12704  pb_multiple.end();
12705 
12706  if (old_verb)
12707  verbose_on();
12708 
12709  return;
12710 
12711 }
12712 
12713 template<typename TSeq>
12714 inline void Model<TSeq>::update_state() {
12715 
12716  // Next state
12717  if (use_queuing)
12718  {
12719  int i = -1;
12720  for (auto & p: population)
12721  if (queue[++i] > 0)
12722  {
12723  if (state_fun[p.state])
12724  state_fun[p.state](&p, this);
12725  }
12726 
12727  }
12728  else
12729  {
12730 
12731  for (auto & p: population)
12732  if (state_fun[p.state])
12733  state_fun[p.state](&p, this);
12734 
12735  }
12736 
12737  events_run();
12738 
12739 }
12740 
12741 template<typename TSeq>
12742 inline void Model<TSeq>::mutate_virus() {
12743 
12744  // Checking if any virus has mutation
12745  size_t nmutates = 0u;
12746  for (const auto & v: viruses)
12747  if (v->virus_functions->mutation)
12748  nmutates++;
12749 
12750  if (nmutates == 0u)
12751  return;
12752 
12753  if (use_queuing)
12754  {
12755 
12756  int i = -1;
12757  for (auto & p: population)
12758  {
12759 
12760  if (queue[++i] == 0)
12761  continue;
12762 
12763  if (p.virus != nullptr)
12764  p.virus->mutate(this);
12765 
12766  }
12767 
12768  }
12769  else
12770  {
12771 
12772  for (auto & p: population)
12773  {
12774 
12775  if (p.virus != nullptr)
12776  p.virus->mutate(this);
12777 
12778  }
12779 
12780  }
12781 
12782 
12783 }
12784 
12785 template<typename TSeq>
12786 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_viruses() const {
12787  return db.size();
12788 }
12789 
12790 template<typename TSeq>
12791 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const {
12792  return tools.size();
12793 }
12794 
12795 template<typename TSeq>
12796 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_ndays() const {
12797  return ndays;
12798 }
12799 
12800 template<typename TSeq>
12801 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_n_replicates() const
12802 {
12803  return n_replicates;
12804 }
12805 
12806 template<typename TSeq>
12807 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_entities() const {
12808  return entities.size();
12809 }
12810 
12811 template<typename TSeq>
12812 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_ndays(epiworld_fast_uint ndays) {
12813  this->ndays = ndays;
12814 }
12815 
12816 template<typename TSeq>
12817 inline bool Model<TSeq>::get_verbose() const {
12818  return verbose;
12819 }
12820 
12821 template<typename TSeq>
12822 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::verbose_on() {
12823  verbose = true;
12824  return *this;
12825 }
12826 
12827 template<typename TSeq>
12828 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::verbose_off() {
12829  verbose = false;
12830  return *this;
12831 }
12832 
12833 template<typename TSeq>
12834 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_fun(
12835  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> fun
12836  ) {
12837  rewire_fun = fun;
12838 }
12839 
12840 template<typename TSeq>
12841 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_prop(epiworld_double prop)
12842 {
12843 
12844  if (prop < 0.0)
12845  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be negative.");
12846 
12847  if (prop > 1.0)
12848  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be above 1.0.");
12849 
12850  rewire_prop = prop;
12851 }
12852 
12853 template<typename TSeq>
12854 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_rewire_prop() const {
12855  return rewire_prop;
12856 }
12857 
12858 template<typename TSeq>
12859 inline void Model<TSeq>::rewire() {
12860 
12861  if (rewire_fun)
12862  rewire_fun(&population, this, rewire_prop);
12863 }
12864 
12865 
12866 template<typename TSeq>
12867 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_data(
12868  std::string fn_virus_info,
12869  std::string fn_virus_hist,
12870  std::string fn_tool_info,
12871  std::string fn_tool_hist,
12872  std::string fn_total_hist,
12873  std::string fn_transmission,
12874  std::string fn_transition,
12875  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
12876  std::string fn_generation_time
12877  ) const
12878 {
12879 
12880  db.write_data(
12881  fn_virus_info, fn_virus_hist,
12882  fn_tool_info, fn_tool_hist,
12883  fn_total_hist, fn_transmission, fn_transition,
12884  fn_reproductive_number, fn_generation_time
12885  );
12886 
12887 }
12888 
12889 template<typename TSeq>
12890 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_edgelist(
12891  std::string fn
12892  ) const
12893 {
12894 
12895  // Figuring out the writing sequence
12896  std::vector< const Agent<TSeq> * > wseq(size());
12897  for (const auto & p: population)
12898  wseq[p.id] = &p;
12899 
12900  std::ofstream efile(fn, std::ios_base::out);
12901  efile << "source target\n";
12902  if (this->is_directed())
12903  {
12904 
12905  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12906  {
12907 
12908  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12909  continue;
12910 
12911  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12912  efile << p->id << " " << n << "\n";
12913  }
12914 
12915  } else {
12916 
12917  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12918  {
12919 
12920  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12921  continue;
12922 
12923  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12924  if (static_cast<int>(p->id) <= static_cast<int>(n))
12925  efile << p->id << " " << n << "\n";
12926  }
12927 
12928  }
12929 
12930 }
12931 
12932 template<typename TSeq>
12933 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_edgelist(
12934 std::vector< int > & source,
12935 std::vector< int > & target
12936 ) const {
12937 
12938  // Figuring out the writing sequence
12939  std::vector< const Agent<TSeq> * > wseq(size());
12940  for (const auto & p: population)
12941  wseq[p.id] = &p;
12942 
12943  if (this->is_directed())
12944  {
12945 
12946  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12947  {
12948  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12949  continue;
12950 
12951  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12952  {
12953  source.push_back(static_cast<int>(p->id));
12954  target.push_back(static_cast<int>(n));
12955  }
12956  }
12957 
12958  } else {
12959 
12960  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12961  {
12962 
12963  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12964  continue;
12965 
12966  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors) {
12967  if (static_cast<int>(p->id) <= static_cast<int>(n)) {
12968  source.push_back(static_cast<int>(p->id));
12969  target.push_back(static_cast<int>(n));
12970  }
12971  }
12972  }
12973 
12974  }
12975 
12976 
12977 }
12978 
12979 template<typename TSeq>
12980 inline std::map<std::string,epiworld_double> & Model<TSeq>::params()
12981 {
12982  return parameters;
12983 }
12984 
12985 template<typename TSeq>
12986 inline void Model<TSeq>::reset() {
12987 
12988  // Restablishing people
12989  pb = Progress(ndays, 80);
12990 
12991  if (population_backup.size())
12992  {
12993  population = population_backup;
12994 
12995  // Ensuring the population is poiting to the model
12996  for (auto & p : population)
12997  p.model = this;
12998 
12999  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13000  for (size_t i = 0; i < population.size(); ++i)
13001  {
13002 
13003  if (population[i] != (population_backup)[i])
13004  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset population doesn't match.");
13005 
13006  }
13007  #endif
13008 
13009  }
13010 
13011  for (auto & p : population)
13012  p.reset();
13013 
13014  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13015  for (auto & a: population)
13016  {
13017  if (a.get_state() != 0u)
13018  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset population doesn't match."
13019  "Some agents are not in the baseline state.");
13020  }
13021  #endif
13022 
13023  if (entities_backup.size())
13024  {
13025  entities = entities_backup;
13026 
13027  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13028  for (size_t i = 0; i < entities.size(); ++i)
13029  {
13030 
13031  if (entities[i] != (entities_backup)[i])
13032  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset entities don't match.");
13033 
13034  }
13035  #endif
13036 
13037  }
13038 
13039  for (auto & e: entities)
13040  e.reset();
13041 
13042  current_date = 0;
13043 
13044  db.reset();
13045 
13046  // This also clears the queue
13047  if (use_queuing)
13048  queue.reset();
13049 
13050  // Re distributing tools and virus
13051  dist_virus();
13052  dist_tools();
13053  dist_entities();
13054 
13055  // Distributing initial state, if specified
13056  initial_states_fun(this);
13057 
13058  // Recording the original state (at time 0) and advancing
13059  // to time 1
13060  next();
13061 
13062 
13063 }
13064 
13065 // Too big to keep here
13066 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13068 
13069  Start of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
13070 
13073 
13074 
13075 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
13076 #define EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
13077 
13078 template<typename TSeq>
13079 inline const Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::print(bool lite) const
13080 {
13081 
13082  // Horizontal line
13083  std::string line = "";
13084  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
13085  line += "_";
13086 
13087  // Prints a message if debugging is on
13088  EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
13089 
13090  printf_epiworld("%s\n",line.c_str());
13091 
13092  if (lite)
13093  {
13094  // Printing the name of the model
13095  printf_epiworld("%s", name.c_str());
13096 
13097  // Printing the number of agents, viruses, and tools
13098  printf_epiworld(
13099  "\nIt features %i agents, %i virus(es), and %i tool(s).\n",
13100  static_cast<int>(size()),
13101  static_cast<int>(get_n_viruses()),
13102  static_cast<int>(get_n_tools())
13103  );
13104 
13105  printf_epiworld(
13106  "The model has %i states.",
13107  static_cast<int>(nstates)
13108  );
13109 
13110  if (today() != 0)
13111  {
13112  printf_epiworld(
13113  "\nThe final distribution is: "
13114  );
13115 
13116  int nstate_int = static_cast<int>(nstates);
13117 
13118  for (int i = 0u; i < nstate_int; ++i)
13119  {
13120  printf_epiworld(
13121  "%i %s%s",
13122  static_cast<int>(db.today_total[ i ]),
13123  states_labels[i].c_str(),
13124  (
13125  i == (nstate_int - 2)
13126  ) ? ", and " : (
13127  (i == (nstate_int - 1)) ? ".\n" : ", "
13128  )
13129  );
13130  }
13131  } else {
13132  printf_epiworld(" The model hasn't been run yet.\n");
13133  }
13134 
13135  return *this;
13136  }
13137 
13138  printf_epiworld("%s\n%s\n\n",line.c_str(), "SIMULATION STUDY");
13139 
13140  printf_epiworld("Name of the model : %s\n", (this->name == "") ? std::string("(none)").c_str() : name.c_str());
13141  printf_epiworld("Population size : %i\n", static_cast<int>(size()));
13142 
13143  auto ncols = get_agents_data_ncols();
13144 
13145  if (ncols > 0)
13146  {
13147  printf_epiworld("Agents' data loaded : yes (%i columns/features)\n", static_cast<int>(ncols));
13148  }
13149  else
13150  {
13151  printf_epiworld("Agents' data : (none)\n");
13152  }
13153 
13154  printf_epiworld("Number of entities : %i\n", static_cast<int>(entities.size()));
13155  printf_epiworld("Days (duration) : %i (of %i)\n", today(), static_cast<int>(ndays));
13156  printf_epiworld("Number of viruses : %i\n", static_cast<int>(db.get_n_viruses()));
13157  if (n_replicates > 0u)
13158  {
13159  std::string abbr;
13160  epiworld_double elapsed;
13161  epiworld_double total;
13162  get_elapsed("auto", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
13163  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : %.2f%s\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
13164  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13165  {
13166  printf_epiworld("Total elapsed t : %.2f%s (%i runs)\n", total, abbr.c_str(), static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
13167  }
13168 
13169  // Elapsed time in speed
13170  get_elapsed("microseconds", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
13171  printf_epiworld("Last run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
13172  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
13173  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) /
13174  static_cast<double>(elapsed)
13175  );
13176  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13177  {
13178  printf_epiworld("Average run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
13179  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
13180  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) *
13181  static_cast<double>(n_replicates) /
13182  static_cast<double>(total)
13183  );
13184  }
13185 
13186  } else {
13187  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : -\n");
13188  }
13189 
13190 
13191  if (rewire_fun)
13192  {
13193  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : on (%.2f)\n\n", rewire_prop);
13194  } else {
13195  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : off\n\n");
13196  }
13197 
13198  // Printing Global events
13199  printf_epiworld("Global events:\n");
13200  for (auto & a : globalevents)
13201  {
13202  if (a.get_day() < 0)
13203  {
13204  printf_epiworld(" - %s (runs daily)\n", a.get_name().c_str());
13205  } else {
13206  printf_epiworld(" - %s (day %i)\n", a.get_name().c_str(), a.get_day());
13207  }
13208  }
13209 
13210  if (globalevents.size() == 0u)
13211  {
13212  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13213  }
13214 
13215  printf_epiworld("\nVirus(es):\n");
13216  size_t n_viruses_model = viruses.size();
13217  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_viruses_model; ++i)
13218  {
13219 
13220 
13221  const auto & virus = viruses[i];
13222  if ((n_viruses_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
13223  {
13224  printf_epiworld(" ...and %i more viruses...\n",
13225  static_cast<int>(n_viruses_model) -
13226  static_cast<int>(i)
13227  );
13228  break;
13229  }
13230 
13231  if (i < n_viruses_model)
13232  {
13233 
13234  printf_epiworld(
13235  " - %s\n",
13236  virus->get_name().c_str()
13237  );
13238 
13239  } else {
13240 
13241  printf_epiworld(
13242  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
13243  virus->get_name().c_str()
13244  );
13245 
13246  }
13247 
13248  }
13249 
13250  auto nvariants = db.get_n_viruses() - n_viruses_model;
13251  if (nvariants > 0)
13252  {
13253 
13254  printf_epiworld(" ...and %i more variants...\n", static_cast<int>(nvariants));
13255 
13256  }
13257 
13258  if (viruses.size() == 0u)
13259  {
13260  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13261  }
13262 
13263  printf_epiworld("\nTool(s):\n");
13264  size_t n_tools_model = tools.size();
13265  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tools.size(); ++i)
13266  {
13267  const auto & tool = tools[i];
13268 
13269  if ((n_tools_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
13270  {
13271  printf_epiworld(
13272  " ...and %i more tools...\n",
13273  static_cast<int>(n_tools_model) - static_cast<int>(i)
13274  );
13275  break;
13276  }
13277 
13278  if (i < n_tools_model)
13279  {
13280  printf_epiworld(
13281  " - %s\n",
13282  tool->get_name().c_str()
13283  );
13284 
13285 
13286  } else {
13287 
13288  printf_epiworld(
13289  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
13290  tool->get_name().c_str()
13291  );
13292 
13293  }
13294 
13295 
13296  }
13297 
13298  if (tools.size() == 0u)
13299  {
13300  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13301  }
13302 
13303  // Information about the parameters included
13304  printf_epiworld("\nModel parameters:\n");
13305  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
13306  for (auto & p : parameters)
13307  if (p.first.length() > nchar)
13308  nchar = p.first.length();
13309 
13310  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1) + "s: ";
13311  for (auto & p : parameters)
13312  {
13313  std::string fmt_tmp = fmt;
13314  if (std::fabs(p.second) < 0.0001)
13315  fmt_tmp += "%.1e\n";
13316  else
13317  fmt_tmp += "%.4f\n";
13318 
13319  printf_epiworld(
13320  fmt_tmp.c_str(),
13321  p.first.c_str(),
13322  p.second
13323  );
13324 
13325  }
13326 
13327  if (parameters.size() == 0u)
13328  {
13329  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13330  }
13331 
13332  nchar = 0u;
13333  for (auto & p : states_labels)
13334  if (p.length() > nchar)
13335  nchar = p.length();
13336 
13337 
13338 
13339  if (today() != 0)
13340  {
13341  fmt =
13342  std::string(" - (%") +
13343  std::to_string(std::to_string(nstates).length()) +
13344  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) +
13345  std::string("s : %") +
13346  std::to_string(std::to_string(size()).length()) +
13347  std::string("i -> %i\n");
13348  } else {
13349  fmt =
13350  std::string(" - (%") +
13351  std::to_string(std::to_string(nstates).length()) +
13352  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) +
13353  std::string("s : %i\n");
13354  }
13355 
13356  if (today() != 0)
13357  {
13358  printf_epiworld("\nDistribution of the population at time %i:\n", today());
13359  for (size_t s = 0u; s < nstates; ++s)
13360  {
13361 
13362  printf_epiworld(
13363  fmt.c_str(),
13364  s,
13365  states_labels[s].c_str(),
13366  db.hist_total_counts[s],
13367  db.today_total[ s ]
13368  );
13369 
13370  }
13371  }
13372 
13373  if (today() != 0)
13374  (void) db.get_transition_probability(true);
13375 
13376  return *this;
13377 
13378 }
13379 
13380 #endif
13381 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13383 
13384  End of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
13385 
13388 
13389 
13390 
13391 
13392 template<typename TSeq>
13393 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_state(
13394  std::string lab,
13395  UpdateFun<TSeq> fun
13396 )
13397 {
13398 
13399  // Checking it doesn't match
13400  for (auto & s : states_labels)
13401  if (s == lab)
13402  throw std::logic_error("state \"" + s + "\" already registered.");
13403 
13404  states_labels.push_back(lab);
13405  state_fun.push_back(fun);
13406  nstates++;
13407 
13408 }
13409 
13410 
13411 template<typename TSeq>
13412 inline const std::vector< std::string > &
13413 Model<TSeq>::get_states() const
13414 {
13415  return states_labels;
13416 }
13417 
13418 template<typename TSeq>
13419 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_states() const
13420 {
13421  return nstates;
13422 }
13423 
13424 template<typename TSeq>
13425 inline const std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > &
13426 Model<TSeq>::get_state_fun() const
13427 {
13428  return state_fun;
13429 }
13430 
13431 template<typename TSeq>
13432 inline void Model<TSeq>::print_state_codes() const
13433 {
13434 
13435  // Horizontal line
13436  std::string line = "";
13437  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
13438  line += "_";
13439 
13440  printf_epiworld("\n%s\nstates CODES\n\n", line.c_str());
13441 
13442  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
13443  for (auto & p : states_labels)
13444  if (p.length() > nchar)
13445  nchar = p.length();
13446 
13447  std::string fmt = " %2i = %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1 + 4) + "s\n";
13448  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < nstates; ++i)
13449  {
13450 
13451  printf_epiworld(
13452  fmt.c_str(),
13453  i,
13454  (states_labels[i] + " (S)").c_str()
13455  );
13456 
13457  }
13458 
13459 }
13460 
13461 
13462 
13463 template<typename TSeq>
13464 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::add_param(
13465  epiworld_double initial_value,
13466  std::string pname,
13467  bool overwrite
13468  ) {
13469 
13470  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13471  parameters[pname] = initial_value;
13472  else if (!overwrite)
13473  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " already exists.");
13474  else
13475  parameters[pname] = initial_value;
13476 
13477  return initial_value;
13478 
13479 }
13480 
13481 template<typename TSeq>
13482 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::read_params(std::string fn, bool overwrite)
13483 {
13484 
13485  auto params_map = read_yaml<epiworld_double>(fn);
13486 
13487  for (auto & p : params_map)
13488  add_param(p.second, p.first, overwrite);
13489 
13490  return *this;
13491 
13492 }
13493 
13494 template<typename TSeq>
13495 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_param(std::string pname)
13496 {
13497  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13498  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13499 
13500  return parameters[pname];
13501 }
13502 
13503 template<typename TSeq>
13504 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_param(std::string pname, epiworld_double value)
13505 {
13506  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13507  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13508 
13509  parameters[pname] = value;
13510 
13511  return;
13512 
13513 }
13514 
13515 // // Same as before but using the size_t method
13516 // template<typename TSeq>
13517 // inline void Model<TSeq>::set_param(size_t k, epiworld_double value)
13518 // {
13519 // if (k >= parameters.size())
13520 // throw std::logic_error("The parameter index " + std::to_string(k) + " does not exists.");
13521 
13522 // // Access the k-th element of the std::unordered_map parameters
13523 
13524 
13525 // *(parameters.begin() + k) = value;
13526 
13527 // return;
13528 // }
13529 
13530 template<typename TSeq>
13531 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::par(std::string pname) const
13532 {
13533  const auto iter = parameters.find(pname);
13534  if (iter == parameters.end())
13535  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13536  return iter->second;
13537 }
13538 
13539 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
13540  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
13541  time_end - time_start).count(); \
13542  elapsed_total = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(time_elapsed).count(); \
13543  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
13544 
13545 template<typename TSeq>
13546 inline void Model<TSeq>::get_elapsed(
13547  std::string unit,
13548  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
13549  epiworld_double * total_elapsed,
13550  std::string * unit_abbr,
13551  bool print
13552 ) const {
13553 
13554  // Preparing the result
13555  epiworld_double elapsed, elapsed_total;
13556  std::string abbr_unit;
13557 
13558  // Figuring out the length
13559  if (unit == "auto")
13560  {
13561 
13562  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
13563  static_cast<int>(floor(time_elapsed.count()))
13564  ).length();
13565 
13566  if (tlength <= 1)
13567  unit = "nanoseconds";
13568  else if (tlength <= 3)
13569  unit = "microseconds";
13570  else if (tlength <= 6)
13571  unit = "milliseconds";
13572  else if (tlength <= 8)
13573  unit = "seconds";
13574  else if (tlength <= 9)
13575  unit = "minutes";
13576  else
13577  unit = "hours";
13578 
13579  }
13580 
13581  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
13582  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
13583  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
13584  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
13585  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
13586  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
13587  else
13588  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
13589 
13590 
13591  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
13592  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
13593  if (total_elapsed != nullptr)
13594  *total_elapsed = elapsed_total;
13595  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
13596  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
13597 
13598  if (!print)
13599  return;
13600 
13601  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13602  {
13603  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13604  elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
13605  printf_epiworld("total elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13606  elapsed_total, abbr_unit.c_str());
13607  printf_epiworld("total runs : %i\n",
13608  static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
13609  printf_epiworld("mean run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13610  elapsed_total/static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_replicates), abbr_unit.c_str());
13611 
13612  } else {
13613  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
13614  }
13615 }
13616 
13617 template<typename TSeq>
13618 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names)
13619 {
13620  db.set_user_data(names);
13621 }
13622 
13623 template<typename TSeq>
13624 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_user_data(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x)
13625 {
13626  db.add_user_data(j, x);
13627 }
13628 
13629 template<typename TSeq>
13630 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_user_data(std::vector<epiworld_double> x)
13631 {
13632  db.add_user_data(x);
13633 }
13634 
13635 template<typename TSeq>
13636 inline UserData<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_user_data()
13637 {
13638  return db.get_user_data();
13639 }
13640 
13641 template<typename TSeq>
13642 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_globalevent(
13643  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
13644  std::string name,
13645  int date
13646 )
13647 {
13648 
13649  globalevents.push_back(
13650  GlobalEvent<TSeq>(
13651  fun,
13652  name,
13653  date
13654  )
13655  );
13656 
13657 }
13658 
13659 template<typename TSeq>
13660 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_globalevent(
13661  GlobalEvent<TSeq> action
13662 )
13663 {
13664  globalevents.push_back(action);
13665 }
13666 
13667 template<typename TSeq>
13668 GlobalEvent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_globalevent(
13669  std::string name
13670 )
13671 {
13672 
13673  for (auto & a : globalevents)
13674  if (a.name == name)
13675  return a;
13676 
13677  throw std::logic_error("The global action " + name + " was not found.");
13678 
13679 }
13680 
13681 template<typename TSeq>
13682 GlobalEvent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_globalevent(
13683  size_t index
13684 )
13685 {
13686 
13687  if (index >= globalevents.size())
13688  throw std::range_error("The index " + std::to_string(index) + " is out of range.");
13689 
13690  return globalevents[index];
13691 
13692 }
13693 
13694 // Remove implementation
13695 template<typename TSeq>
13696 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_globalevent(
13697  std::string name
13698 )
13699 {
13700 
13701  for (auto it = globalevents.begin(); it != globalevents.end(); ++it)
13702  {
13703  if (it->get_name() == name)
13704  {
13705  globalevents.erase(it);
13706  return;
13707  }
13708  }
13709 
13710  throw std::logic_error("The global action " + name + " was not found.");
13711 
13712 }
13713 
13714 // Same as above, but the index implementation
13715 template<typename TSeq>
13716 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_globalevent(
13717  size_t index
13718 )
13719 {
13720 
13721  if (index >= globalevents.size())
13722  throw std::range_error("The index " + std::to_string(index) + " is out of range.");
13723 
13724  globalevents.erase(globalevents.begin() + index);
13725 
13726 }
13727 
13728 template<typename TSeq>
13729 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_globalevents()
13730 {
13731 
13732  for (auto & action: globalevents)
13733  {
13734  action(this, today());
13735  events_run();
13736  }
13737 
13738 }
13739 
13740 template<typename TSeq>
13741 inline void Model<TSeq>::queuing_on()
13742 {
13743  use_queuing = true;
13744 }
13745 
13746 template<typename TSeq>
13747 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::queuing_off()
13748 {
13749  use_queuing = false;
13750  return *this;
13751 }
13752 
13753 template<typename TSeq>
13754 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_queuing_on() const
13755 {
13756  return use_queuing;
13757 }
13758 
13759 template<typename TSeq>
13760 inline Queue<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_queue()
13761 {
13762  return queue;
13763 }
13764 
13765 template<typename TSeq>
13766 inline const std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > & Model<TSeq>::get_viruses() const
13767 {
13768  return viruses;
13769 }
13770 
13771 template<typename TSeq>
13772 const std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > & Model<TSeq>::get_tools() const
13773 {
13774  return tools;
13775 }
13776 
13777 template<typename TSeq>
13778 inline Virus<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_virus(size_t id)
13779 {
13780 
13781  if (viruses.size() <= id)
13782  throw std::length_error("The specified id for the virus is out of range");
13783 
13784  return *viruses[id];
13785 
13786 }
13787 
13788 template<typename TSeq>
13789 inline Tool<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_tool(size_t id)
13790 {
13791 
13792  if (tools.size() <= id)
13793  throw std::length_error("The specified id for the tools is out of range");
13794 
13795  return *tools[id];
13796 
13797 }
13798 
13799 
13800 template<typename TSeq>
13801 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_agents_data(double * data_, size_t ncols_)
13802 {
13803  agents_data = data_;
13804  agents_data_ncols = ncols_;
13805 }
13806 
13807 template<typename TSeq>
13808 inline double * Model<TSeq>::get_agents_data() {
13809  return this->agents_data;
13810 }
13811 
13812 template<typename TSeq>
13813 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_agents_data_ncols() const {
13814  return this->agents_data_ncols;
13815 }

13819 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
13820 {
13821  this->name = name;
13822 }
13823 
13824 template<typename TSeq>
13825 inline std::string Model<TSeq>::get_name() const
13826 {
13827  return this->name;
13828 }
13829 
13830 #define VECT_MATCH(a, b, c) \
13831  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a.size() != b.size(), c) \
13832  for (size_t __i = 0u; __i < a.size(); ++__i) \
13833  {\
13834  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a[__i] != b[__i], c) \
13835  }
13836 
13837 template<typename TSeq>
13838 inline bool Model<TSeq>::operator==(const Model<TSeq> & other) const
13839 {
13840  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(name != other.name, "names don't match")
13841  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(db != other.db, "database don't match")
13842 
13843  VECT_MATCH(population, other.population, "population doesn't match")
13844 
13845  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13846  using_backup != other.using_backup,
13847  "Model:: using_backup don't match"
13848  )
13849 
13850  if ((population_backup.size() != 0) & (other.population_backup.size() != 0))
13851  {
13852 
13853  // False is population_backup.size() != other.population_backup.size()
13854  if (population_backup.size() != other.population_backup.size())
13855  return false;
13856 
13857  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population_backup.size(); ++i)
13858  {
13859  if (population_backup[i] != other.population_backup[i])
13860  return false;
13861  }
13862 
13863  } else if ((population_backup.size() == 0) & (other.population_backup.size() != 0)) {
13864  return false;
13865  } else if ((population_backup.size() != 0) & (other.population_backup.size() == 0))
13866  {
13867  return false;
13868  }
13869 
13870  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13871  agents_data != other.agents_data,
13872  "Model:: agents_data don't match"
13873  )
13874 
13875  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13876  agents_data_ncols != other.agents_data_ncols,
13877  "Model:: agents_data_ncols don't match"
13878  )
13879 
13880  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13881  directed != other.directed,
13882  "Model:: directed don't match"
13883  )
13884 
13885  // Viruses -----------------------------------------------------------------
13886  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13887  viruses.size() != other.viruses.size(),
13888  "Model:: viruses.size() don't match"
13889  )
13890 
13891  for (size_t i = 0u; i < viruses.size(); ++i)
13892  {
13893  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13894  *viruses[i] != *other.viruses[i],
13895  "Model:: *viruses[i] don't match"
13896  )
13897 
13898  }
13899 
13900  // Tools -------------------------------------------------------------------
13901  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13902  tools.size() != other.tools.size(),
13903  "Model:: tools.size() don't match"
13904  )
13905 
13906  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tools.size(); ++i)
13907  {
13908  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13909  *tools[i] != *other.tools[i],
13910  "Model:: *tools[i] don't match"
13911  )
13912 
13913  }
13914 
13915  VECT_MATCH(
13916  entities,
13917  other.entities,
13918  "entities don't match"
13919  )
13920 
13921  if ((entities_backup.size() != 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() != 0))
13922  {
13923 
13924  for (size_t i = 0u; i < entities_backup.size(); ++i)
13925  {
13926 
13927  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13928  entities_backup[i] != other.entities_backup[i],
13929  "Model:: entities_backup[i] don't match"
13930  )
13931 
13932  }
13933 
13934  } else if ((entities_backup.size() == 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() != 0)) {
13935  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(true, "entities_backup don't match")
13936  } else if ((entities_backup.size() != 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() == 0))
13937  {
13938  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(true, "entities_backup don't match")
13939  }
13940 
13941  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13942  rewire_prop != other.rewire_prop,
13943  "Model:: rewire_prop don't match"
13944  )
13945 
13946  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13947  parameters.size() != other.parameters.size(),
13948  "Model:: () don't match"
13949  )
13950 
13951  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13952  parameters != other.parameters,
13953  "Model:: parameters don't match"
13954  )
13955 
13956  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13957  ndays != other.ndays,
13958  "Model:: ndays don't match"
13959  )
13960 
13961  VECT_MATCH(
13962  states_labels,
13963  other.states_labels,
13964  "state labels don't match"
13965  )
13966 
13967  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13968  nstates != other.nstates,
13969  "Model:: nstates don't match"
13970  )
13971 
13972  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13973  verbose != other.verbose,
13974  "Model:: verbose don't match"
13975  )
13976 
13977  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13978  current_date != other.current_date,
13979  "Model:: current_date don't match"
13980  )
13981 
13982  VECT_MATCH(globalevents, other.globalevents, "global action don't match");
13983 
13984  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13985  queue != other.queue,
13986  "Model:: queue don't match"
13987  )
13988 
13989 
13990  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13991  use_queuing != other.use_queuing,
13992  "Model:: use_queuing don't match"
13993  )
13994 
13995  return true;
13996 
13997 }
13998 
13999 template<typename TSeq>
14000 inline void Model<TSeq>::draw(
14001  DiagramType diagram_type,
14002  const std::string & fn_output,
14003  bool self
14004 ) {
14005 
14006  ModelDiagram diagram;
14007 
14008  diagram.draw_from_data(
14009  diagram_type,
14010  this->get_states(),
14011  this->get_db().get_transition_probability(false),
14012  fn_output,
14013  self
14014  );
14015 
14016  return;
14017 
14018 }
14019 
14020 #undef VECT_MATCH
14021 #undef DURCAST
14022 #undef CASES_PAR
14023 #undef CASE_PAR
14024 #undef CHECK_INIT
14025 #endif
14026 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14028 
14029  End of -include/epiworld/model-meat.hpp-
14030 
14033 
14034 
14035 
14036 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14038 
14039  Start of -include/epiworld/viruses-bones.hpp-
14040 
14043 
14044 
14045 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
14046 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
14047 
14048 template<typename TSeq>
14049 class Virus;
14050 
14051 template<typename TSeq>
14052 class Agent;
14053 
14059 template<typename TSeq>
14060 class Viruses {
14061  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
14062  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14063 private:
14064  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
14065  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
14066 
14067 public:
14068 
14069  Viruses() = delete;
14070  Viruses(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
14071 
14072  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator begin();
14073  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator end();
14074 
14075  VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
14076  VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
14077 
14078  size_t size() const noexcept;
14079 
14080  void print() const noexcept;
14081 
14082 };
14083 
14084 template<typename TSeq>
14085 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::begin()
14086 {
14087 
14088  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14089  return dat->end();
14090 
14091  return dat->begin();
14092 }
14093 
14094 template<typename TSeq>
14095 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::end()
14096 {
14097 
14098  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14099  if (dat->size() < *n_viruses)
14100  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "Viruses:: The end of the virus is out of range");
14101  #endif
14102 
14103  return begin() + *n_viruses;
14104 }
14105 
14106 template<typename TSeq>
14107 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
14108 {
14109 
14110  if (i >= *n_viruses)
14111  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
14112 
14113  return dat->operator[](i);
14114 
14115 }
14116 
14117 template<typename TSeq>
14118 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
14119 {
14120 
14121  return dat->operator[](i);
14122 
14123 }
14124 
14125 template<typename TSeq>
14126 inline size_t Viruses<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
14127 {
14128  return *n_viruses;
14129 }
14130 
14131 template<typename TSeq>
14132 inline void Viruses<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
14133 {
14134 
14135  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14136  {
14137  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (none)\n");
14138  return;
14139  }
14140 
14141  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (%i): ", *n_viruses);
14142 
14143  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
14144  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_viruses; ++i)
14145  {
14146  if (i == *n_viruses - 1u)
14147  {
14148  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14149  } else
14150  {
14151  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14152  }
14153  }
14154 
14155  printf_epiworld("\n");
14156 
14157 }
14158 
14164 template<typename TSeq>
14165 class Viruses_const {
14166  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
14167  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14168 private:
14169  const std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
14170  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
14171 
14172 public:
14173 
14174  Viruses_const() = delete;
14175  Viruses_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
14176 
14177  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator begin() const;
14178  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator end() const;
14179 
14180  const VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
14181  const VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
14182 
14183  size_t size() const noexcept;
14184 
14185  void print() const noexcept;
14186 
14187 };
14188 
14189 template<typename TSeq>
14190 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
14191 
14192  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14193  return dat->end();
14194 
14195  return dat->begin();
14196 }
14197 
14198 template<typename TSeq>
14199 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::end() const {
14200 
14201  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14202  if (dat->size() < *n_viruses)
14203  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "Viruses_const:: The end of the virus is out of range");
14204  #endif
14205  return begin() + *n_viruses;
14206 }
14207 
14208 template<typename TSeq>
14209 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
14210 {
14211 
14212  if (i >= *n_viruses)
14213  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
14214 
14215  return dat->operator[](i);
14216 
14217 }
14218 
14219 template<typename TSeq>
14220 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
14221 {
14222 
14223  return dat->operator[](i);
14224 
14225 }
14226 
14227 template<typename TSeq>
14228 inline size_t Viruses_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
14229 {
14230  return *n_viruses;
14231 }
14232 
14233 template<typename TSeq>
14234 inline void Viruses_const<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
14235 {
14236 
14237  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14238  {
14239  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (none)\n");
14240  return;
14241  }
14242 
14243  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (%i): ", *n_viruses);
14244 
14245  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
14246  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_viruses; ++i)
14247  {
14248  if (i == *n_viruses - 1u)
14249  {
14250  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14251  } else
14252  {
14253  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14254  }
14255  }
14256 
14257  printf_epiworld("\n");
14258 
14259 }
14260 
14261 
14262 #endif
14263 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14265

14283 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP

14285 template<typename TSeq>
14286 class Agent;
14287 
14288 template<typename TSeq>
14289 class Virus;
14290 
14291 template<typename TSeq>
14292 class Model;
14293 
14294 template<typename TSeq>
14295 class VirusFunctions {
14296 public:
14297  MutFun<TSeq> mutation = nullptr;
14298  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> post_recovery = nullptr;
14299  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_infecting = nullptr;
14300  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_recovery = nullptr;
14301  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_death = nullptr;
14302  VirusFun<TSeq> incubation = nullptr;
14303 
14304  // Information about how distribution works
14305  VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
14306 
14307  VirusFunctions() = default;
14308 
14309 };
14310 
14321 template<typename TSeq>
14322 class Virus {
14323  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14324  friend class Model<TSeq>;
14325  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
14326  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
14327  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
14328 private:
14329 
14330  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
14331 
14332  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) baseline_sequence =
14333  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)();
14334 
14335  std::string virus_name = "unknown virus";
14336  int date = -99;
14337  int id = -99;
14338  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
14339  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
14340  epiworld_fast_int state_removed = -99; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
14341 
14342  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
14343  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
14344  epiworld_fast_int queue_removed = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
14345 
14346  std::shared_ptr< VirusFunctions<TSeq> > virus_functions =
14347  std::make_shared< VirusFunctions<TSeq> >();
14348 
14349 public:
14350 
14351  Virus();
14352 
14353  Virus(std::string name = "unknown virus");
14354 
14355  Virus(
14356  std::string name,
14357  epiworld_double prevalence,
14358  bool as_proportion
14359  );
14360 
14361  void mutate(Model<TSeq> * model);
14362  void set_mutation(MutFun<TSeq> fun);
14363 
14364  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
14365  void set_sequence(TSeq sequence);
14366 
14367  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
14368  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p);
14369 
14370  void set_date(int d);
14371  int get_date() const;
14372 
14373  void set_id(int idx);
14374  int get_id() const;
14375 
14385  epiworld_double get_prob_infecting(Model<TSeq> * model);
14386  epiworld_double get_prob_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
14387  epiworld_double get_prob_death(Model<TSeq> * model);
14388  epiworld_double get_incubation(Model<TSeq> * model);
14389 
14390  void post_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
14391  void set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun);
14392  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double prob);
14393  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double * prob);
14394 
14395  void set_prob_infecting_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14396  void set_prob_recovery_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14397  void set_prob_death_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14398  void set_incubation_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14399 
14400  void set_prob_infecting(const epiworld_double * prob);
14401  void set_prob_recovery(const epiworld_double * prob);
14402  void set_prob_death(const epiworld_double * prob);
14403  void set_incubation(const epiworld_double * prob);
14404 
14405  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double prob);
14406  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double prob);
14407  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double prob);
14408  void set_incubation(epiworld_double prob);
14410

14412  void set_name(std::string name);
14413  std::string get_name() const;
14414 
14428  void set_state(
14429  epiworld_fast_int init,
14430  epiworld_fast_int end,
14431  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
14432  );
14433 
14434  void set_queue(
14435  epiworld_fast_int init,
14436  epiworld_fast_int end,
14437  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
14438  );
14439 
14440  void get_state(
14441  epiworld_fast_int * init,
14442  epiworld_fast_int * end,
14443  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
14444  );
14445 
14446  void get_queue(
14447  epiworld_fast_int * init,
14448  epiworld_fast_int * end,
14449  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
14450  );
14452

14454  bool operator!=(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
14455 
14456  void print() const;

14478 
14479 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14481 
14482  Start of -include/epiworld/virus-distribute-meat.hpp-
14483 
14486 
14487 
14488 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUS_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
14489 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
14490 
14503 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14504 inline VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_virus_to_set(
14505  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids
14506 ) {
14507 
14508  return [agents_ids](
14509  Virus<TSeq> & virus, Model<TSeq> * model
14510  ) -> void
14511  {
14512  // Adding action
14513  for (auto i: agents_ids)
14514  {
14515  model->get_agent(i).set_virus(
14516  virus,
14517  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
14518  );
14519  }
14520  };
14521 
14522 }
14523 
14534 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14535 inline VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_virus_randomly(
14536  epiworld_double prevalence,
14537  bool prevalence_as_proportion = true,
14538  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids = {}
14539 ) {
14540 
14541  auto agents_ids_ptr = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(agents_ids);
14542 
14543  return [prevalence,prevalence_as_proportion,agents_ids_ptr](
14544  Virus<TSeq> & virus, Model<TSeq> * model
14545  ) -> void
14546  {
14547 
14548  // Figuring out how what agents are available
14549  bool use_set = agents_ids_ptr->size() > 0;
14550  std::vector< size_t > idx;
14551  if (use_set)
14552  {
14553  for (const auto & agent: *agents_ids_ptr)
14554  if (model->get_agent(agent).get_virus() == nullptr)
14555  idx.push_back(agent);
14556  }
14557  else
14558  {
14559  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
14560  if (agent.get_virus() == nullptr)
14561  idx.push_back(agent.get_id());
14562  }
14563 
14564  // Picking how many
14565  int n = use_set ?
14566  static_cast<int>(idx.size()) :
14567  static_cast<int>(model->size())
14568  ;
14569 
14570  int n_available = static_cast<int>(idx.size());
14571  int n_to_sample;
14572  if (prevalence_as_proportion)
14573  {
14574  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(std::floor(
14575  prevalence * static_cast< epiworld_double >(n)
14576  ));
14577 
14578  // Correcting for possible overflow
14579  if (n_to_sample > n)
14580  n_to_sample = n;
14581  }
14582  else
14583  {
14584  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
14585  }
14586 
14587  if (n_to_sample > n_available)
14588  throw std::range_error(
14589  "There are only " + std::to_string(n_available) +
14590  " individuals with no virus in the population. " +
14591  "Cannot add the virus to " +
14592  std::to_string(n_to_sample)
14593  );
14594 
14595  auto & population = model->get_agents();
14596  for (int i = 0; i < n_to_sample; ++i)
14597  {
14598 
14599  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
14600  floor(model->runif() * (n_available--))
14601  );
14602 
14603  // Correcting for possible overflow
14604  if ((loc > 0) && (loc >= n_available))
14605  loc = n_available - 1;
14606 
14607  Agent<TSeq> & agent = population[idx[loc]];
14608 
14609  // Adding action
14610  agent.set_virus(
14611  virus,
14612  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
14613  );
14614 
14615  // Adjusting sample
14616  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_available]);
14617 
14618  }
14619 
14620  };
14621 
14622 }
14623 
14624 #endif
14625 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14627 
14628  End of -include/epiworld/virus-distribute-meat.hpp-
14629

14659  #define printf_epiworld fflush(stdout);printf
14660 #endif
14661 
14662 // In case the user has a way to stop the program
14663 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
14664 // passed the simulation number.
14665 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
14666  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)
14667 #endif
14668 
14669 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS
14670  #define EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS 1048576
14671 #endif
14672 
14673 #if defined(_OPENMP) || defined(__OPENMP)
14674  #include <omp.h>
14675 // #else
14676 // #define omp_get_thread_num() 0
14677 // #define omp_set_num_threads() 1
14678 #endif
14679 
14680 #ifndef epiworld_double
14681  #define epiworld_double float
14682 #endif
14683 
14684 #ifndef epiworld_fast_int
14685  #define epiworld_fast_int int
14686 #endif
14687 
14688 #ifndef epiworld_fast_uint
14689  #define epiworld_fast_uint unsigned long long int
14690 #endif
14691

14693

14695 class Model;

14698 class Agent;

14728 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;

14731 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;

14733 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14734 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14735 
14736 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14737 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14738 
14739 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14740 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14741 
14742 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14743 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14744

14746 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14747 
14748 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14749 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
14750 
14751 template<typename TSeq>
14752 struct Event;
14753 
14754 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14755 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14756 
14760 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14761 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14762 
14766 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14767 using ToolToAgentFun = std::function<void(Tool<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14768 
14772 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14773 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14774 
14780 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14781 struct Event {
14782  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
14783  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
14784  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
14785  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
14786  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
14787  epiworld_fast_int queue;
14788  EventFun<TSeq> call;
14789  int idx_agent;
14790  int idx_object;
14791 public:
14808  Event(
14809  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
14810  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
14811  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
14812  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
14813  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
14814  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
14815  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
14816  int idx_agent_,
14817  int idx_object_
14818  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
14819  new_state(new_state_),
14820  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
14821  return;
14822  };
14823 };
14824 
14832 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION
14833  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION 0.0
14834 #endif

14836 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION
14837  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION 0.0
14838 #endif
14839

14841  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER 0.0
14842 #endif
14843 
14844 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION
14845  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION 0.0
14846 #endif
