14848 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION
14849  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION 1.0
14850 #endif
14851 
14852 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY
14853  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY 0.1428
14854 #endif
14855 
14856 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH
14857  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH 0.0
14858 #endif
14859 
14860 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS
14861  #define EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS 7.0
14862 #endif
14864 
14865 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14866  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
14867 
14868  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
14869  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
14870 
14871  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
14872  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
14873 
14874  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
14875  for (auto & v : vect) \
14876  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
14877  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
14878 
14879  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
14880  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
14881  for (auto & v : vect) \
14882  { \
14883  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
14884  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
14885  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
14886  }
14887 
14888  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
14889  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
14890  for (auto & v : vect) \
14891  { \
14892  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
14893  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
14894  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
14895  }
14896 
14897  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
14898  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
14899  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
14900  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
14901  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
14902  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
14903  }\
14904  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
14905  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
14906  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
14907  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
14908  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
14909  { \
14910  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
14911  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
14912  _j, \
14913  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
14914  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
14915  } \
14916  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
14917  }
14918 
14919  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
14920  if (a) \
14921  {\
14922  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
14923  }
14924 
14925  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
14926 #else
14927  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
14928  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
14929  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
14930  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
14931  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
14932  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
14933  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
14934  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
14935  if (a) \
14936  return false;
14937  #define epiexception(a) a
14938 #endif
14939 
14940 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
14941  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
14942 #else
14943  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
14944 #endif
14945 
14946 #endif
14947 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14949 
14950  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
14951 
14954 
14955 
14956 
14965 template<typename TSeq>
14966 inline VirusFun<TSeq> virus_fun_logit(
14967  std::vector< int > vars,
14968  std::vector< double > coefs,
14969  Model<TSeq> * model,
14970  bool logit = true
14971 ) {
14972 
14973  // Checking that there are features
14974  if (coefs.size() == 0u)
14975  throw std::logic_error(
14976  "The -coefs- argument should feature at least one element."
14977  );
14978 
14979  if (coefs.size() != vars.size())
14980  throw std::length_error(
14981  std::string("The length of -coef- (") +
14982  std::to_string(coefs.size()) +
14983  std::string(") and -vars- (") +
14984  std::to_string(vars.size()) +
14985  std::string(") should match. ")
14986  );
14987 
14988  // Checking that there are variables in the model
14989  if (model != nullptr)
14990  {
14991 
14992  size_t K = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
14993  for (const auto & var: vars)
14994  {
14995  if ((var >= static_cast<int>(K)) | (var < 0))
14996  throw std::range_error(
14997  std::string("The variable ") +
14998  std::to_string(var) +
14999  std::string(" is out of range.") +
15000  std::string(" The agents only feature ") +
15001  std::to_string(K) +
15002  std::string("variables (features).")
15003  );
15004  }
15005 
15006  }
15007 
15008  std::vector< epiworld_double > coefs_f;
15009  for (auto c: coefs)
15010  coefs_f.push_back(static_cast<epiworld_double>(c));
15011 
15012  VirusFun<TSeq> fun_infect = [coefs_f,vars](
15013  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
15014  Virus<TSeq> &,
15015  Model<TSeq> *
15016  ) -> epiworld_double {
15017 
15018  size_t K = coefs_f.size();
15019  epiworld_double res = 0.0;
15020 
15021  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
15022  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:res)
15023  #endif
15024  for (size_t i = 0u; i < K; ++i)
15025  res += agent->operator[](vars.at(i)) * coefs_f.at(i);
15026 
15027  return 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-res));
15028 
15029  };
15030 
15031  return fun_infect;
15032 
15033 }
15034 
15035 template<typename TSeq>
15036 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus()
15037 {
15038 
15039  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15040  {
15041  baseline_sequence = -1;
15042  }
15043  else
15044  {
15045  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15046  }
15047 
15048 }
15049 
15050 template<typename TSeq>
15051 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(
15052  std::string name
15053  ) {
15054 
15055  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15056  {
15057  baseline_sequence = -1;
15058  }
15059  else
15060  {
15061  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15062  }
15063 
15064  set_name(name);
15065 }
15066 
15067 template<typename TSeq>
15068 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(
15069  std::string name,
15070  epiworld_double prevalence,
15071  bool prevalence_as_proportion
15072  ) {
15073 
15074  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15075  {
15076  baseline_sequence = -1;
15077  }
15078  else
15079  {
15080  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15081  }
15082 
15083  set_name(name);
15084  set_distribution(
15085  distribute_virus_randomly<TSeq>(
15086  prevalence,
15087  prevalence_as_proportion
15088  )
15089  );
15090 }
15091 
15092 template<typename TSeq>
15093 inline void Virus<TSeq>::mutate(
15094  Model<TSeq> * model
15095 ) {
15096 
15097  if (virus_functions->mutation)
15098  if (virus_functions->mutation(agent, *this, model))
15099  model->get_db().record_virus(*this);
15100 
15101  return;
15102 
15103 }
15104 
15105 template<typename TSeq>
15106 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_mutation(
15107  MutFun<TSeq> fun
15108 ) {
15109  virus_functions->mutation = MutFun<TSeq>(fun);
15110 }
15111 
15112 template<typename TSeq>
15113 inline EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) Virus<TSeq>::get_sequence()
15114 {
15115 
15116  return baseline_sequence;
15117 
15118 }
15119 
15120 template<typename TSeq>
15121 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_sequence(TSeq sequence)
15122 {
15123 
15124  baseline_sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(sequence);
15125  return;
15126 
15127 }
15128 
15129 template<>
15130 inline void Virus<int>::set_sequence(int sequence)
15131 {
15132 
15133  baseline_sequence = sequence;
15134  return;
15135 
15136 }

15189  Model<TSeq> * model
15190 )
15191 {
15192 
15193  if (virus_functions->probability_of_infecting)
15194  return virus_functions->probability_of_infecting(agent, *this, model);
15195 
15196  return EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION;
15197

15209  return virus_functions->probability_of_recovery(agent, *this, model);
15210

15212

15224  return virus_functions->probability_of_death(agent, *this, model);

15227

15237  return virus_functions->incubation(agent, *this, model);

15267 template<typename TSeq>
15268 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_prob_infecting(const epiworld_double * prob)
15269 {
15270  VirusFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15271  [prob](Agent<TSeq> *, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> *)
15272  {
15273  return *prob;
15274  };
15275 
15276  virus_functions->probability_of_infecting = tmpfun;
15277 }

15281 {
15282  VirusFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15283  [prob](Agent<TSeq> *, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> *)
15284  {

15362 
15363 template<typename TSeq>
15364 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun)
15365 {
15366  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15367  {
15368  printf_epiworld(
15369  "Warning: a PostRecoveryFun is alreay in place (overwriting)."
15370  );
15371  }
15372 
15373  virus_functions->post_recovery = fun;
15374 }
15375 
15376 template<typename TSeq>
15377 inline void Virus<TSeq>::post_recovery(
15378  Model<TSeq> * model
15379 )
15380 {
15381 
15382  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15383  virus_functions->post_recovery(agent, *this, model);
15384 
15385  return;
15386 
15387 }
15388 
15389 template<typename TSeq>
15390 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
15391  epiworld_double prob
15392 )
15393 {
15394 
15395  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15396  {
15397 
15398  std::string msg =
15399  std::string(
15400  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
15401  ) +
15402  std::string(
15403  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
15404  );
15405 
15406  throw std::logic_error(msg);
15407 
15408  }
15409 
15410  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
15411  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
15412  "Immunity (" + virus_name + ")"
15413  );
15414 
15415  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
15416  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
15417  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
15418  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
15419 
15420  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15421  [__no_reinfect](
15422  Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> * m
15423  )
15424  {
15425 
15426  // Have we registered the tool?
15427  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
15428  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
15429 
15430  p->add_tool(__no_reinfect, m);
15431 
15432  return;
15433 
15434  };
15435 
15436  virus_functions->post_recovery = tmpfun;
15437 
15438 }
15439 
15440 template<typename TSeq>
15441 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
15442  epiworld_double * prob
15443 )
15444 {
15445 
15446  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15447  {
15448 
15449  std::string msg =
15450  std::string(
15451  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
15452  ) +
15453  std::string(
15454  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
15455  );
15456 
15457  throw std::logic_error(msg);
15458 
15459  }
15460 
15461  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
15462  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
15463  "Immunity (" + virus_name + ")"
15464  );
15465 
15466  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
15467  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
15468  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
15469  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
15470 
15471  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15472  [__no_reinfect](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> * m)
15473  {
15474 
15475  // Have we registered the tool?
15476  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
15477  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
15478 
15479  p->add_tool(__no_reinfect, m);
15480 
15481  return;
15482 
15483  };
15484 
15485  virus_functions->post_recovery = tmpfun;
15486 
15487 }
15488 
15489 template<typename TSeq>
15490 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
15491 {
15492 
15493  virus_name = name;
15494 
15495 }
15496 
15497 template<typename TSeq>
15498 inline std::string Virus<TSeq>::get_name() const
15499 {
15500 
15501  return virus_name;
15502 
15503 }
15504 
15505 template<typename TSeq>
15506 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_state(
15507  epiworld_fast_int init,
15508  epiworld_fast_int end,
15509  epiworld_fast_int removed
15510 )
15511 {
15512  state_init = init;
15513  state_post = end;
15514  state_removed = removed;
15515 }
15516 
15517 template<typename TSeq>
15518 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_queue(
15519  epiworld_fast_int init,
15520  epiworld_fast_int end,
15521  epiworld_fast_int removed
15522 )
15523 {
15524 
15525  queue_init = init;
15526  queue_post = end;
15527  queue_removed = removed;
15528 
15529 }
15530 
15531 template<typename TSeq>
15532 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_state(
15533  epiworld_fast_int * init,
15534  epiworld_fast_int * end,
15535  epiworld_fast_int * removed
15536 )
15537 {
15538 
15539  if (init != nullptr)
15540  *init = state_init;
15541 
15542  if (end != nullptr)
15543  *end = state_post;
15544 
15545  if (removed != nullptr)
15546  *removed = state_removed;
15547 
15548 }
15549 
15550 template<typename TSeq>
15551 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_queue(
15552  epiworld_fast_int * init,
15553  epiworld_fast_int * end,
15554  epiworld_fast_int * removed
15555 )
15556 {
15557 
15558  if (init != nullptr)
15559  *init = queue_init;
15560 
15561  if (end != nullptr)
15562  *end = queue_post;
15563 
15564  if (removed != nullptr)
15565  *removed = queue_removed;
15566 
15567 }
15568 
15569 template<>
15570 inline bool Virus<std::vector<int>>::operator==(
15571  const Virus<std::vector<int>> & other
15572  ) const
15573 {
15574 
15575  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15576  baseline_sequence->size() != other.baseline_sequence->size(),
15577  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15578  )
15579 
15580  for (size_t i = 0u; i < baseline_sequence->size(); ++i)
15581  {
15582 
15583  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15584  baseline_sequence->operator[](i) != other.baseline_sequence->operator[](i),
15585  "Virus:: baseline_sequence[i] don't match"
15586  )
15587 
15588  }
15589 
15590  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15591  virus_name != other.virus_name,
15592  "Virus:: virus_name don't match"
15593  )
15594 
15595  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15596  state_init != other.state_init,
15597  "Virus:: state_init don't match"
15598  )
15599 
15600  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15601  state_post != other.state_post,
15602  "Virus:: state_post don't match"
15603  )
15604 
15605  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15606  state_removed != other.state_removed,
15607  "Virus:: state_removed don't match"
15608  )
15609 
15610  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15611  queue_init != other.queue_init,
15612  "Virus:: queue_init don't match"
15613  )
15614 
15615  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15616  queue_post != other.queue_post,
15617  "Virus:: queue_post don't match"
15618  )
15619 
15620  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15621  queue_removed != other.queue_removed,
15622  "Virus:: queue_removed don't match"
15623  )
15624 
15625  return true;
15626 
15627 }
15628 
15629 template<typename TSeq>
15630 inline bool Virus<TSeq>::operator==(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const
15631 {
15632 
15633  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15634  {
15635  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15636  baseline_sequence != other.baseline_sequence,
15637  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15638  )
15639  }
15640  else
15641  {
15642  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15643  baseline_sequence != other.baseline_sequence,
15644  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15645  )
15646  }
15647 
15648  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15649  virus_name != other.virus_name,
15650  "Virus:: virus_name don't match"
15651  )
15652 
15653  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15654  state_init != other.state_init,
15655  "Virus:: state_init don't match"
15656  )
15657 
15658  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15659  state_post != other.state_post,
15660  "Virus:: state_post don't match"
15661  )
15662 
15663  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15664  state_removed != other.state_removed,
15665  "Virus:: state_removed don't match"
15666  )
15667 
15668  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15669  queue_init != other.queue_init,
15670  "Virus:: queue_init don't match"
15671  )
15672 
15673  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15674  queue_post != other.queue_post,
15675  "Virus:: queue_post don't match"
15676  )
15677 
15678  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15679  queue_removed != other.queue_removed,
15680  "Virus:: queue_removed don't match"
15681  )
15682 
15683  return true;
15684 
15685 }
15686 
15687 template<typename TSeq>
15688 inline void Virus<TSeq>::print() const
15689 {
15690 
15691  printf_epiworld("Virus : %s\n", virus_name.c_str());
15692  printf_epiworld("Id : %s\n", (id < 0)? std::string("(empty)").c_str() : std::to_string(id).c_str());
15693  printf_epiworld("state_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_init));
15694  printf_epiworld("state_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_post));
15695  printf_epiworld("state_removed : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_removed));
15696  printf_epiworld("queue_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_init));
15697  printf_epiworld("queue_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_post));
15698  printf_epiworld("queue_removed : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_removed));
15699 
15700 }
15701 
15702 template<typename TSeq>
15703 inline void Virus<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
15704 {
15705 
15706  if (virus_functions->dist)
15707  {
15708 
15709  virus_functions->dist(*this, model);
15710 
15711  }
15712 
15713 }
15714 
15715 template<typename TSeq>
15716 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_distribution(VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
15717 {
15718  virus_functions->dist = fun;
15719 }
15720 
15721 #endif
15722 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15724 
15725  End of -include/epiworld/virus-meat.hpp-
15726 
15729 
15730 
15731 
15732 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15734 
15735  Start of -include/epiworld/tools-bones.hpp-
15736 
15739 
15740 
15741 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
15742 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
15743 
15744 template<typename TSeq>
15745 class Tool;
15746 
15747 template<typename TSeq>
15748 class Agent;
15749 
15750 // #define ToolPtr<TSeq> std::shared_ptr< Tool<TSeq> >
15751 
15757 template<typename TSeq>
15758 class Tools {
15759  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
15760  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
15761 private:
15762  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
15763  const unsigned int * n_tools;
15764 
15765 public:
15766 
15767  Tools() = delete;
15768  Tools(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
15769 
15770  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator begin();
15771  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator end();
15772 
15773  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
15774  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
15775 
15776  size_t size() const noexcept;
15777 
15778  void print() const noexcept;
15779 
15780 };
15781 
15782 template<typename TSeq>
15783 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::begin()
15784 {
15785 
15786  if (*n_tools == 0u)
15787  return dat->end();
15788 
15789  return dat->begin();
15790 }
15791 
15792 template<typename TSeq>
15793 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::end()
15794 {
15795 
15796  return begin() + *n_tools;
15797 }
15798 
15799 template<typename TSeq>
15800 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
15801 {
15802 
15803  if (i >= *n_tools)
15804  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
15805 
15806  return dat->operator[](i);
15807 
15808 }
15809 
15810 template<typename TSeq>
15811 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
15812 {
15813 
15814  return dat->operator[](i);
15815 
15816 }
15817 
15818 template<typename TSeq>
15819 inline size_t Tools<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
15820 {
15821  return *n_tools;
15822 }
15823 
15824 template<typename TSeq>
15825 inline void Tools<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
15826 {
15827  if (*n_tools == 0u)
15828  {
15829  printf_epiworld("List of tools (none)\n");
15830  return;
15831  }
15832 
15833  printf_epiworld("List of tools (%i): ", static_cast<int>(*n_tools));
15834 
15835  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
15836  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_tools; ++i)
15837  {
15838  if (i == *n_tools - 1u)
15839  {
15840  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
15841  } else
15842  {
15843  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
15844  }
15845  }
15846 
15847  printf_epiworld("\n");
15848 
15849 }
15850 
15856 template<typename TSeq>
15857 class Tools_const {
15858  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
15859  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
15860 private:
15861  const std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
15862  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_tools;
15863 
15864 public:
15865 
15866  Tools_const() = delete;
15867  Tools_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
15868 
15869  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator begin() const;
15870  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator end() const;
15871 
15872  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
15873  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
15874 
15875  size_t size() const noexcept;
15876 
15877  void print() const noexcept;
15878 
15879 };
15880 
15881 template<typename TSeq>
15882 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
15883 
15884  if (*n_tools == 0u)
15885  return dat->end();
15886 
15887  return dat->begin();
15888 }
15889 
15890 template<typename TSeq>
15891 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::end() const {
15892 
15893  return begin() + *n_tools;
15894 }
15895 
15896 template<typename TSeq>
15897 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
15898 {
15899 
15900  if (i >= *n_tools)
15901  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
15902 
15903  return dat->operator[](i);
15904 
15905 }
15906 
15907 template<typename TSeq>
15908 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
15909 {
15910 
15911  return dat->operator[](i);
15912 
15913 }
15914 
15915 template<typename TSeq>
15916 inline size_t Tools_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
15917 {
15918  return *n_tools;
15919 }
15920 
15921 template<typename TSeq>
15922 inline void Tools_const<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
15923 {
15924  if (*n_tools == 0u)
15925  {
15926  printf_epiworld("List of tools (none)\n");
15927  return;
15928  }
15929 
15930  printf_epiworld("List of tools (%i): ", *n_tools);
15931 
15932  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
15933  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_tools; ++i)
15934  {
15935  if (i == *n_tools - 1u)
15936  {
15937  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
15938  } else
15939  {
15940  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
15941  }
15942  }
15943 
15944  printf_epiworld("\n");
15945 
15946 }
15947 
15948 
15949 
15950 #endif
15951 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15953 
15954  End of -include/epiworld/tools-bones.hpp-
15955 
15958 
15959 
15960 
15961 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15963 
15964  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-bones.hpp-
15965 
15968 
15969 
15970 
15971 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
15972 #define EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
15973 
15974 template<typename TSeq>
15975 class Virus;
15976 
15977 template<typename TSeq>
15978 class Agent;
15979 
15980 template<typename TSeq>
15981 class Model;
15982 
15983 template<typename TSeq>
15984 class Tool;
15985 
15990 template<typename TSeq>
15991 class ToolFunctions {
15992 public:
15993  ToolFun<TSeq> susceptibility_reduction = nullptr;
15994  ToolFun<TSeq> transmission_reduction = nullptr;
15995  ToolFun<TSeq> recovery_enhancer = nullptr;
15996  ToolFun<TSeq> death_reduction = nullptr;
15997 
15998  ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
15999 
16000  ToolFunctions() = default;
16001 };
16002 
16008 template<typename TSeq>
16009 class Tool {
16010  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
16011  friend class Model<TSeq>;
16012  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16013  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16014 private:
16015 
16016  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
16017  int pos_in_agent = -99; ///< Location in the agent
16018 
16019  int date = -99;
16020  int id = -99;
16021  std::string tool_name;
16022 
16023  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) sequence =
16024  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)(); ///< Sequence of the tool
16025 
16026  std::shared_ptr<ToolFunctions<TSeq>> tool_functions =
16027  std::make_shared< ToolFunctions<TSeq> >();
16028 
16029  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99;
16030  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99;
16031 
16032  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::NoOne; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
16033  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = Queue<TSeq>::NoOne; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
16034 
16035  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, size_t idx);
16036 
16037 public:
16038  Tool();
16039  Tool(std::string name = "unknown tool");
16040  Tool(
16041  std::string name,
16042  epiworld_double prevalence,
16043  bool as_proportion
16044  );
16045 
16046  void set_sequence(TSeq d);
16047  void set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d);
16048  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
16049 
16059  epiworld_double get_susceptibility_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16060  epiworld_double get_transmission_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16061  epiworld_double get_recovery_enhancer(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16062  epiworld_double get_death_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16063 
16064  void set_susceptibility_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16065  void set_transmission_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16066  void set_recovery_enhancer_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16067  void set_death_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16068 
16069  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16070  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16071  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double * prob);
16072  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16073 
16074  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16075  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16076  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double prob);
16077  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16079 
16080  void set_name(std::string name);
16081  std::string get_name() const;
16082 
16083  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
16084  int get_id() const;
16085  void set_id(int id);
16086  void set_date(int d);
16087  int get_date() const;
16088 
16089  void set_state(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16090  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16091  void get_state(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16092  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16093 
16094  bool operator==(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const;
16095  bool operator!=(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
16096 
16097  void print() const;
16098 
16099  void distribute(Model<TSeq> * model);
16100  void set_distribution(ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> fun);
16101 
16102 };
16103 
16104 #endif
16105 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16107 
16108  End of -include/epiworld/tool-bones.hpp-
16109 
16112 
16113 
16114 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16116 
16117  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-distribute-meat.hpp-
16118 
16121 
16122 
16123 #ifndef TOOL_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16124 #define TOOL_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16125 
16141 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
16142 inline ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_tool_to_set(
16143  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids
16144 ) {
16145 
16146  return [agents_ids](
16147  Tool<TSeq> & tool, Model<TSeq> * model
16148  ) -> void
16149  {
16150  // Adding action
16151  for (auto i: agents_ids)
16152  {
16153  model->get_agent(i).add_tool(
16154  tool,
16155  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
16156  );
16157  }
16158  };
16159 
16160 }
16161 
16172 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
16173 inline ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_tool_randomly(
16174  epiworld_double prevalence,
16175  bool as_proportion = true,
16176  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids = {}
16177 ) {
16178 
16179  auto agents_ids_ptr = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(agents_ids);
16180 
16181  return [prevalence,as_proportion,agents_ids_ptr](
16182  Tool<TSeq> & tool, Model<TSeq> * model
16183  ) -> void {
16184 
16185  // Figuring out how what agents are available
16186  bool use_set = agents_ids_ptr->size() > 0;
16187 
16188  // Picking how many
16189  int n_to_distribute;
16190  int n = use_set ?
16191  static_cast<int>(agents_ids_ptr->size()) :
16192  static_cast<int>(model->size());
16193 
16194  if (as_proportion)
16195  {
16196  n_to_distribute = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence * n));
16197 
16198  // Correcting for possible rounding errors
16199  if (n_to_distribute > n)
16200  n_to_distribute = n;
16201 
16202  }
16203  else
16204  {
16205  n_to_distribute = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
16206  }
16207 
16208  if (n_to_distribute > n)
16209  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(n) +
16210  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the tool to " + std::to_string(n_to_distribute));
16211 
16212  std::vector< int > idx(n);
16213  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0);
16214  auto & population = model->get_agents();
16215  for (int i = 0u; i < n_to_distribute; ++i)
16216  {
16217  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
16218  floor(model->runif() * n--)
16219  );
16220 
16221  if ((loc > 0) && (loc == n))
16222  loc--;
16223 
16224  population[idx[loc]].add_tool(
16225  tool,
16226  const_cast< Model<TSeq> * >(model)
16227  );
16228 
16229  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n]);
16230 
16231  }
16232 
16233  };
16234 
16235 }
16236 #endif
16237 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16239 
16240  End of -include/epiworld/tool-distribute-meat.hpp-
16241 
16244 
16245 
16246 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16248 
16249  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-meat.hpp-
16250 
16253 
16254 
16255 
16256 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
16257 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
16258 
16267 template<typename TSeq>
16268 inline ToolFun<TSeq> tool_fun_logit(
16269  std::vector< int > vars,
16270  std::vector< double > coefs,
16271  Model<TSeq> * model
16272 ) {
16273 
16274  // Checking that there are features
16275  if (coefs.size() == 0u)
16276  throw std::logic_error(
16277  "The -coefs- argument should feature at least one element."
16278  );
16279 
16280  if (coefs.size() != vars.size())
16281  throw std::length_error(
16282  std::string("The length of -coef- (") +
16283  std::to_string(coefs.size()) +
16284  std::string(") and -vars- (") +
16285  std::to_string(vars.size()) +
16286  std::string(") should match. ")
16287  );
16288 
16289  // Checking that there are variables in the model
16290  if (model != nullptr)
16291  {
16292 
16293  size_t K = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
16294  for (const auto & var: vars)
16295  {
16296  if ((var >= static_cast<int>(K)) | (var < 0))
16297  throw std::range_error(
16298  std::string("The variable ") +
16299  std::to_string(var) +
16300  std::string(" is out of range.") +
16301  std::string(" The agents only feature ") +
16302  std::to_string(K) +
16303  std::string("variables (features).")
16304  );
16305  }
16306 
16307  }
16308 
16309  std::vector< epiworld_double > coefs_f;
16310  for (auto c: coefs)
16311  coefs_f.push_back(static_cast<epiworld_double>(c));
16312 
16313  ToolFun<TSeq> fun_ = [coefs_f,vars](
16314  Tool<TSeq>& tool,
16315  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
16316  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
16317  Model<TSeq> * model
16318  ) -> epiworld_double {
16319 
16320  size_t K = coefs_f.size();
16321  epiworld_double res = 0.0;
16322 
16323  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
16324  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:res)
16325  #endif
16326  for (size_t i = 0u; i < K; ++i)
16327  res += agent->operator[](vars.at(i)) * coefs_f.at(i);
16328 
16329  return 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-res));
16330 
16331  };
16332 
16333  return fun_;
16334 
16335 }
16336 
16337 template<typename TSeq>
16338 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool()
16339 {
16340  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16341  {
16342  sequence = -1;
16343  }
16344  else
16345  {
16346  sequence = nullptr;
16347  }
16348 
16349  set_name("Tool");
16350 }
16351 
16352 template<typename TSeq>
16353 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(std::string name)
16354 {
16355  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16356  {
16357  sequence = -1;
16358  }
16359  else
16360  {
16361  sequence = nullptr;
16362  }
16363 
16364  set_name(name);
16365 }
16366 
16367 template<typename TSeq>
16368 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(
16369  std::string name,
16370  epiworld_double prevalence,
16371  bool as_proportion
16372  )
16373 {
16374 
16375  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16376  {
16377  sequence = -1;
16378  }
16379  else
16380  {
16381  sequence = nullptr;
16382  }
16383 
16384  set_name(name);
16385 
16386  set_distribution(
16387  distribute_tool_randomly<TSeq>(prevalence, as_proportion)
16388  );
16389 }
16390 
16391 template<typename TSeq>
16392 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(TSeq d) {
16393  sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(d);
16394 }
16395 
16396 template<typename TSeq>
16397 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d) {
16398  sequence = d;
16399 }
16400 
16401 template<>
16402 inline void Tool<int>::set_sequence(int d) {
16403  sequence = d;
16404 }
16405 
16406 template<typename TSeq>
16407 inline EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) Tool<TSeq>::get_sequence() {
16408  return sequence;
16409 }
16410 
16411 template<typename TSeq>
16412 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
16413  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16414  Model<TSeq> * model
16415 )
16416 {
16417 
16418  if (tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction)
16419  return tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction(
16420  *this, this->agent, v, model
16421  );
16422 
16423  return DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION;
16424 
16425 }
16426

16428 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
16429  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16430  Model<TSeq> * model
16431 )
16432 {
16433 
16434  if (tool_functions->transmission_reduction)
16435  return tool_functions->transmission_reduction(
16436  *this, this->agent, v, model
16437  );
16438 
16439  return DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION;
16440 
16441 }
16442

16445  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16446  Model<TSeq> * model
16447 )
16448 {
16449

16451  return tool_functions->recovery_enhancer(*this, this->agent, v, model);
16452 
16453  return DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER;
16454 
16455 }

16505 {

16508  [prob](Tool<TSeq> &, Agent<TSeq> *, VirusPtr<TSeq>, Model<TSeq> *)
16509  {
16510  return *prob;
16511  };
16512 
16513  tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction = tmpfun;
16514 
16515 }

16554  {

16641 
16642 template<typename TSeq>
16643 inline Agent<TSeq> * Tool<TSeq>::get_agent()
16644 {
16645  return this->agent;
16646 }
16647 
16648 template<typename TSeq>
16649 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, size_t idx)
16650 {
16651  agent = p;
16652  pos_in_agent = static_cast<int>(idx);
16653 }
16654 
16655 template<typename TSeq>
16656 inline int Tool<TSeq>::get_id() const {
16657  return id;
16658 }
16659 
16660 
16661 template<typename TSeq>
16662 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_id(int id)
16663 {
16664  this->id = id;
16665 }

16668 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_date(int d)
16669 {
16670  this->date = d;
16671 }

16673 template<typename TSeq>
16674 inline int Tool<TSeq>::get_date() const
16675 {
16676  return date;
16677 }
16678 
16679 template<typename TSeq>
16680 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_state(
16681  epiworld_fast_int init,
16682  epiworld_fast_int end
16683 )
16684 {
16685  state_init = init;
16686  state_post = end;
16687 }

16690 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_queue(
16691  epiworld_fast_int init,
16692  epiworld_fast_int end
16693 )
16694 {
16695  queue_init = init;
16696  queue_post = end;
16697 }

16699 template<typename TSeq>
16700 inline void Tool<TSeq>::get_state(
16701  epiworld_fast_int * init,
16702  epiworld_fast_int * post
16703 )
16704 {
16705  if (init != nullptr)
16706  *init = state_init;
16707 
16708  if (post != nullptr)
16709  *post = state_post;
16710 
16711 }
16712 
16713 template<typename TSeq>
16714 inline void Tool<TSeq>::get_queue(
16715  epiworld_fast_int * init,
16716  epiworld_fast_int * post
16717 )
16718 {
16719  if (init != nullptr)
16720  *init = queue_init;
16721 
16722  if (post != nullptr)
16723  *post = queue_post;
16724 
16725 }
16726 
16727 template<>
16728 inline bool Tool<std::vector<int>>::operator==(
16729  const Tool<std::vector<int>> & other
16730  ) const
16731 {
16732 
16733  if (sequence->size() != other.sequence->size())
16734  return false;
16735 
16736  for (size_t i = 0u; i < sequence->size(); ++i)
16737  {
16738  if (sequence->operator[](i) != other.sequence->operator[](i))
16739  return false;
16740  }
16741 
16742  if (tool_name != other.tool_name)
16743  return false;
16744 
16745  if (state_init != other.state_init)
16746  return false;
16747 
16748  if (state_post != other.state_post)
16749  return false;
16750 
16751  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
16752  return false;
16753 
16754  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
16755  return false;
16756 
16757 
16758  return true;
16759 
16760 }
16761 
16762 template<typename TSeq>
16763 inline bool Tool<TSeq>::operator==(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const
16764 {
16765  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16766  {
16767  if (sequence != other.sequence)
16768  return false;
16769  }
16770  else
16771  {
16772  if (*sequence != *other.sequence)
16773  return false;
16774  }
16775 
16776 
16777  if (tool_name != other.tool_name)
16778  return false;
16779 
16780  if (state_init != other.state_init)
16781  return false;
16782 
16783  if (state_post != other.state_post)
16784  return false;
16785 
16786  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
16787  return false;
16788 
16789  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
16790  return false;
16791 
16792  return true;
16793 
16794 }
16795 
16796 
16797 template<typename TSeq>
16798 inline void Tool<TSeq>::print() const
16799 {
16800 
16801  printf_epiworld("Tool : %s\n", tool_name.c_str());
16802  printf_epiworld("Id : %s\n", (id < 0)? std::string("(empty)").c_str() : std::to_string(id).c_str());
16803  printf_epiworld("state_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_init));
16804  printf_epiworld("state_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_post));
16805  printf_epiworld("queue_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_init));
16806  printf_epiworld("queue_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_post));
16807 
16808 }
16809 
16810 template<typename TSeq>
16811 inline void Tool<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
16812 {
16813 
16814  if (tool_functions->dist)
16815  {
16816 
16817  tool_functions->dist(*this, model);
16818 
16819  }
16820 
16821 }
16822 
16823 template<typename TSeq>
16824 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_distribution(ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
16825 {
16826  tool_functions->dist = fun;
16827 }

16840 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16842 
16843  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
16844

16848 
16849 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
16850 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
16851 
16852 template<typename TSeq>
16853 class Model;
16854 
16855 template<typename TSeq>
16856 class Agent;
16857 
16858 template<typename TSeq>
16859 class AgentsSample;
16860 
16861 template<typename TSeq>
16862 inline void default_add_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16863 
16864 template<typename TSeq>
16865 inline void default_rm_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16866 
16867 template<typename TSeq>
16868 class Entity {
16869  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
16870  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
16871  friend class Model<TSeq>;
16872  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16873  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16874 private:
16875 
16876  int id = -1;
16877  std::vector< size_t > agents; ///< Vector of agents
16878  std::vector< size_t > agents_location; ///< Location where the entity is stored in the agent
16879  size_t n_agents = 0u;
16880 
16881  int max_capacity = -1;
16882  std::string entity_name = "Unnamed entity";
16883 
16884  std::vector< epiworld_double > location = {0.0}; ///< An arbitrary vector for location
16885 
16886  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99;
16887  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99;
16888 
16889  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = 0; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
16890  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = 0; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
16891 
16892  EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> dist_fun = nullptr;
16893 
16894 public:
16895 
16896 
16905  Entity(
16906  std::string name,
16907  EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun = nullptr
16908  ) :
16909  entity_name(name),
16910  dist_fun(fun)
16911  {};
16912 
16913  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> & p, Model<TSeq> * model);
16914  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * model);
16915  void rm_agent(size_t idx, Model<TSeq> * model);
16916  size_t size() const noexcept;
16917  void set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc);
16918  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_location();
16919 
16920  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
16921  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
16922 
16923  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator begin() const;
16924  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator end() const;
16925 
16926  size_t operator[](size_t i);
16927 
16928  int get_id() const noexcept;
16929  const std::string & get_name() const noexcept;
16930 
16931  void set_state(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16932  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16933  void get_state(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16934  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16935 
16936  void reset();
16937 
16938  bool operator==(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const;
16939  bool operator!=(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
16940 
16948  void distribute(Model<TSeq> * model);
16949 
16950  std::vector< size_t > & get_agents();
16951 
16952  void print() const;
16953  void set_distribution(EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun);
16954 
16955 };
16956 
16957 
16958 #endif
16959 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16961 
16962  End of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
16963 
16966 
16967 
16968 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16970 
16971  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-distribute-meat.hpp-
16972 
16975 
16976 
16977 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16978 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16979 
16980 
16981 template <typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
16992 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_randomly(
16993  epiworld_double prevalence,
16994  bool as_proportion,
16995  bool to_unassigned
16996 )
16997 {
16998 
16999  return [prevalence, as_proportion, to_unassigned](
17000  Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m
17001  ) -> void {
17002 
17003 
17004  // Preparing the sampling space
17005  std::vector< size_t > idx;
17006  if (to_unassigned)
17007  {
17008  for (const auto & a: m->get_agents())
17009  if (a.get_n_entities() == 0)
17010  idx.push_back(a.get_id());
17011  }
17012  else
17013  {
17014 
17015  for (const auto & a: m->get_agents())
17016  idx.push_back(a.get_id());
17017 
17018  }
17019 
17020  size_t n = idx.size();
17021 
17022  // Figuring out how many to sample
17023  int n_to_sample;
17024  if (as_proportion)
17025  {
17026  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence * n));
17027 
17028  // Correcting for possible overflow
17029  if (n_to_sample > static_cast<int>(n))
17030  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(n);
17031 
17032  } else
17033  {
17034  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
17035  if (n_to_sample > static_cast<int>(n))
17036  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(n) +
17037  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the entity to " +
17038  std::to_string(n_to_sample));
17039  }
17040 
17041  int n_left = n;
17042  for (int i = 0; i < n_to_sample; ++i)
17043  {
17044  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
17045  floor(m->runif() * n_left--)
17046  );
17047 
17048  // Correcting for possible overflow
17049  if ((loc > 0) && (loc >= n_left))
17050  loc = n_left - 1;
17051 
17052  m->get_agent(idx[loc]).add_entity(e, m);
17053 
17054  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_left]);
17055 
17056  }
17057 
17058  };
17059 
17060 }
17061 
17062 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17073 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_to_range(
17074  int from,
17075  int to,
17076  bool to_unassigned = false
17077  ) {
17078 
17079  if (to_unassigned)
17080  {
17081 
17082  return [from, to](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17083 
17084  auto & agents = m->get_agents();
17085  for (size_t i = from; i < to; ++i)
17086  {
17087  if (agents[i].get_n_entities() == 0)
17088  e.add_agent(&agents[i], m);
17089  else
17090  throw std::logic_error(
17091  "Agent " + std::to_string(i) + " already has an entity."
17092  );
17093  }
17094 
17095  return;
17096 
17097  };
17098 
17099  }
17100  else
17101  {
17102 
17103  return [from, to](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17104 
17105  auto & agents = m->get_agents();
17106  for (size_t i = from; i < to; ++i)
17107  {
17108  e.add_agent(&agents[i], m);
17109  }
17110 
17111  return;
17112 
17113  };
17114 
17115  }
17116 }
17117 
17118 
17119 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17120 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_to_set(
17121  std::vector< size_t > & idx
17122  ) {
17123 
17124  auto idx_shared = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(idx);
17125 
17126  return [idx_shared](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17127 
17128  for (const auto & i: *idx_shared)
17129  {
17130  e.add_agent(&m->get_agent(i), m);
17131  }
17132 
17133  };
17134 
17135 }
17136 
17137 #endif
17138 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17140 
17141  End of -include/epiworld/entity-distribute-meat.hpp-
17142

17157 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_MEAT_HPP
17158 
17159 template<typename TSeq>
17160 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(
17161  Agent<TSeq> & p,
17162  Model<TSeq> * model
17163  )
17164 {
17165 
17166  // Need to add it to the events, through the individual
17167  p.add_entity(*this, model);
17168 
17169 }
17170 
17171 template<typename TSeq>
17172 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(
17173  Agent<TSeq> * p,
17174  Model<TSeq> * model
17175  )
17176 {
17177  p->add_entity(*this, model);
17178 }
17179 
17180 template<typename TSeq>
17181 inline void Entity<TSeq>::rm_agent(size_t idx, Model<TSeq> * model)
17182 {
17183  if (idx >= n_agents)
17184  throw std::out_of_range(
17185  "Trying to remove agent "+ std::to_string(idx) +
17186  " out of " + std::to_string(n_agents)
17187  );
17188 
17189  model->get_agents()[agents[idx]].rm_entity(*this, model);
17190 
17191  return;
17192 }
17193 
17194 template<typename TSeq>
17195 inline size_t Entity<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17196 {
17197  return n_agents;
17198 }
17199 
17200 template<typename TSeq>
17201 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc)
17202 {
17203  location = loc;
17204 }
17205 
17206 template<typename TSeq>
17207 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & Entity<TSeq>::get_location()
17208 {
17209  return location;
17210 }
17211 
17212 template<typename TSeq>
17213 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin()
17214 {
17215 
17216  if (n_agents == 0)
17217  return agents.end();
17218 
17219  return agents.begin();
17220 
17221 }
17222 
17223 template<typename TSeq>
17224 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::end()
17225 {
17226  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
17227 }
17228 
17229 template<typename TSeq>
17230 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin() const
17231 {
17232 
17233  if (n_agents == 0)
17234  return agents.end();
17235 
17236  return agents.begin();
17237 
17238 }
17239 
17240 template<typename TSeq>
17241 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::end() const
17242 {
17243  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
17244 }
17245 
17246 template<typename TSeq>
17247 size_t Entity<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
17248 {
17249  if (n_agents <= i)
17250  throw std::logic_error(
17251  "There are not that many agents in this entity. " +
17252  std::to_string(n_agents) + " <= " + std::to_string(i)
17253  );
17254 
17255  return i;
17256 }
17257

17259 inline int Entity<TSeq>::get_id() const noexcept
17260 {
17261  return id;
17262 }
17263

17265 inline const std::string & Entity<TSeq>::get_name() const noexcept
17266 {
17267  return entity_name;
17268 }

17311  *init = queue_init;
17312 
17313  if (post != nullptr)
17314  *post = queue_post;

17318 template<typename TSeq>
17319 inline void Entity<TSeq>::reset()
17320 {
17321 
17322  this->agents.clear();
17323  this->n_agents = 0u;
17324  this->agents_location.clear();
17325 
17326  return;
17327 
17328 }
17329 
17330 template<typename TSeq>
17331 inline bool Entity<TSeq>::operator==(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const
17332 {
17333 
17334  if (id != other.id)
17335  return false;
17336 
17337  if (n_agents != other.n_agents)
17338  return false;
17339 
17340  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_agents; ++i)
17341  {
17342  if (agents[i] != other.agents[i])
17343  return false;
17344  }
17345 
17346 
17347  if (max_capacity != other.max_capacity)
17348  return false;
17349 
17350  if (entity_name != other.entity_name)
17351  return false;
17352 
17353  if (location.size() != other.location.size())
17354  return false;
17355 
17356  for (size_t i = 0u; i < location.size(); ++i)
17357  {
17358 
17359  if (location[i] != other.location[i])
17360  return false;
17361 
17362  }
17363 
17364  if (state_init != other.state_init)
17365  return false;
17366 
17367  if (state_post != other.state_post)
17368  return false;
17369 
17370  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
17371  return false;
17372 
17373  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
17374  return false;
17375 
17376  return true;
17377 
17378 }
17379 
17380 template<typename TSeq>
17381 inline void Entity<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
17382 {
17383 
17384  if (dist_fun)
17385  {
17386 
17387  dist_fun(*this, model);
17388 
17389  }
17390 
17391 }
17392 
17393 template<typename TSeq>
17394 inline std::vector< size_t > & Entity<TSeq>::get_agents()
17395 {
17396  return agents;
17397 }
17398 
17399 template<typename TSeq>
17400 inline void Entity<TSeq>::print() const
17401 {
17402 
17403  printf_epiworld(
17404  "Entity '%s' (id %i) with %i agents.\n",
17405  this->entity_name.c_str(),
17406  static_cast<int>(id),
17407  static_cast<int>(n_agents)
17408  );
17409 }

17413 {
17414  dist_fun = fun;
17415 }

17436 
17437 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
17438 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
17439 
17440 template<typename TSeq>
17441 class Virus;
17442 
17443 template<typename TSeq>
17444 class Agent;
17445 
17446 
17452 template<typename TSeq>
17453 class Entities {
17454  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
17455  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
17456 private:
17457  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
17458  const size_t n_entities;
17459 
17460 public:
17461 
17462  Entities() = delete;
17463  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
17464 
17465  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
17466  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
17467 
17468  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
17469  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
17470 
17471  size_t size() const noexcept;
17472 
17473  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
17474 
17475 };
17476 
17477 template<typename TSeq>
17478 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
17479  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
17480 {
17481 
17482  dat.reserve(n_entities);
17483  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
17484  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
17485 
17486 }
17487 
17488 template<typename TSeq>
17489 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
17490 {
17491 
17492  if (n_entities == 0u)
17493  return dat.end();
17494 
17495  return dat.begin();
17496 }
17497 
17498 template<typename TSeq>
17499 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
17500 {
17501 
17502  return begin() + n_entities;
17503 }
17504 
17505 template<typename TSeq>
17506 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
17507 {
17508 
17509  if (i >= n_entities)
17510  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
17511 
17512  return *dat[i];
17513 
17514 }
17515 
17516 template<typename TSeq>
17517 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
17518 {
17519 
17520  return *dat[i];
17521 
17522 }
17523 
17524 template<typename TSeq>
17525 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17526 {
17527  return n_entities;
17528 }
17529 
17530 template<typename TSeq>
17531 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
17532 {
17533 
17534  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
17535  return false;
17536 
17537  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
17538  {
17539  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
17540  return false;
17541  }
17542 
17543  return true;
17544 }
17545 
17551 template<typename TSeq>
17552 class Entities_const {
17553  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
17554  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
17555 private:
17556  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
17557  const size_t n_entities;
17558 
17559 public:
17560 
17561  Entities_const() = delete;
17562  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
17563 
17564  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
17565  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
17566 
17567  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
17568  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
17569 
17570  size_t size() const noexcept;
17571 
17572  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
17573 
17574 };
17575 
17576 template<typename TSeq>
17577 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
17578  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
17579 {
17580 
17581  dat.reserve(n_entities);
17582  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
17583  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
17584 
17585 }
17586 
17587 template<typename TSeq>
17588 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
17589 
17590  if (n_entities == 0u)
17591  return dat.end();
17592 
17593  return dat.begin();
17594 }
17595 
17596 template<typename TSeq>
17597 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
17598 
17599  return begin() + n_entities;
17600 }
17601 
17602 template<typename TSeq>
17603 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
17604 {
17605 
17606  if (i >= n_entities)
17607  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
17608 
17609  return *dat[i];
17610 
17611 }
17612 
17613 template<typename TSeq>
17614 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
17615 {
17616 
17617  return *dat[i];
17618 
17619 }
17620 
17621 template<typename TSeq>
17622 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17623 {
17624  return n_entities;
17625 }
17626 
17627 template<typename TSeq>
17628 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
17629 {
17630 
17631  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
17632  return false;
17633 
17634  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
17635  {
17636  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
17637  return false;
17638  }
17639 
17640  return true;
17641 }
17642 
17643 
17644 #endif
17645 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17647 
17648  End of -include/epiworld/entities-bones.hpp-
17649 
17652 
17653 
17654 
17655 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17657 
17658  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
17659 
17662 
17663 
17664 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
17665 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
17666 
17671 namespace sampler {
17672 
17686 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17687 inline std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_update_susceptible(
17688  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
17689  )
17690 {
17691 
17692 
17693  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
17694  {
17695 
17696  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
17697  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
17698  {
17699 
17700  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17701  throw std::logic_error(
17702  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17703  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17704  std::string(" has a virus.")
17705  );
17706 
17707  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17708  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17709  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17710  {
17711 
17712  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17713  if (v == nullptr)
17714  continue;
17715 
17716  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17717  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17718  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17719  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17720  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17721  ;
17722 
17723  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17724 
17725  }
17726 
17727  // No virus to compute
17728  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17729  return;
17730 
17731  // Running the roulette
17732  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
17733 
17734  if (which < 0)
17735  return;
17736 
17737  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
17738 
17739  return;
17740  };
17741 
17742  return sampler;
17743 
17744  } else {
17745 
17746  // Making room for the query
17747  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
17748  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
17749 
17750  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
17751  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
17752 
17753  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
17754  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
17755  {
17756 
17757  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
17758  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
17759  {
17760 
17761  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
17762  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
17763  {
17764  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
17765  throw std::logic_error(
17766  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
17767  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
17768  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
17769  std::string(" states in the model.")
17770  );
17771 
17772  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
17773 
17774  }
17775 
17776  }
17777 
17778  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17779  throw std::logic_error(
17780  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17781  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17782  std::string(" has a virus.")
17783  );
17784 
17785  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17786  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17787  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17788  {
17789 
17790  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
17791  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
17792  continue;
17793 
17794  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17795  if (v == nullptr)
17796  continue;
17797 
17798 
17799  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17800  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17801  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17802  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17803  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17804  ;
17805 
17806  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17807 
17808  }
17809 
17810  // No virus to compute
17811  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17812  return;
17813 
17814  // Running the roulette
17815  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
17816 
17817  if (which < 0)
17818  return;
17819 
17820  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
17821 
17822  return;
17823 
17824  };
17825 
17826  return sampler;
17827 
17828  }
17829 
17830 }
17831 
17845 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17846 inline std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(
17847  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
17848 )
17849 {
17850  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
17851  {
17852 
17853  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
17854  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
17855 
17856  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17857  throw std::logic_error(
17858  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17859  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17860  std::string(" has a virus.")
17861  );
17862 
17863  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17864  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17865  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17866  {
17867 
17868  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
17869  continue;
17870 
17871  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17872 
17873  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
17874  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
17875  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
17876  #endif
17877 
17878  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17879  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17880  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17881  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17882  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17883  ;
17884 
17885  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17886 
17887  }
17888 
17889  // No virus to compute
17890  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17891  return nullptr;
17892 
17893  // Running the roulette
17894  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
17895 
17896  if (which < 0)
17897  return nullptr;
17898 
17899  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
17900 
17901  };
17902 
17903  return res;
17904 
17905 
17906  } else {
17907 
17908  // Making room for the query
17909  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
17910  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
17911 
17912  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
17913  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
17914 
17915 
17916  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
17917  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
17918 
17919  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
17920  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
17921  {
17922 
17923  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
17924  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
17925  {
17926  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
17927  throw std::logic_error(
17928  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
17929  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
17930  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
17931  std::string(" states in the model.")
17932  );
17933 
17934  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
17935 
17936  }
17937 
17938  }
17939 
17940  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17941  throw std::logic_error(
17942  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17943  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17944  std::string(" has a virus.")
17945  );
17946 
17947  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17948  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17949  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17950  {
17951 
17952  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
17953  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
17954  continue;
17955 
17956  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
17957  continue;
17958 
17959  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17960 
17961  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
17962  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
17963  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
17964  #endif
17965 
17966  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17967  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17968  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17969  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17970  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17971  ;
17972 
17973  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17974 
17975  }
17976 
17977  // No virus to compute
17978  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17979  return nullptr;
17980 
17981  // Running the roulette
17982  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
17983 
17984  if (which < 0)
17985  return nullptr;
17986 
17987  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
17988 
17989  };
17990 
17991  return res;
17992 
17993  }
17994 
17995 }
17996 
18013 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
18014 inline Virus<TSeq> * sample_virus_single(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m)
18015 {
18016 
18017  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
18018  throw std::logic_error(
18019  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense!") +
18020  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
18021  std::string(" has a virus.")
18022  );
18023 
18024  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
18025  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
18026  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
18027  {
18028  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18029  int _vcount_neigh = 0;
18030  #endif
18031 
18032  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
18033  continue;
18034 
18035  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
18036 
18037  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18038  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
18039  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
18040  #endif
18041 
18042  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
18043  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
18044  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
18045  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
18046  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
18047  ;
18048 
18049  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
18050 
18051  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18052  if (
18053  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] < 0.0) |
18054  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] > 1.0)
18055  )
18056  {
18057  printf_epiworld(
18058  "[epi-debug] Agent %i's virus %i has transmission prob outside of [0, 1]: %.4f!\n",
18059  static_cast<int>(neighbor->get_id()),
18060  static_cast<int>(_vcount_neigh++),
18061  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1]
18062  );
18063  }
18064  #endif
18065 
18066  }
18067 
18068 
18069  // No virus to compute
18070  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
18071  return nullptr;
18072 
18073  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18074  m->get_db().n_transmissions_potential++;
18075  #endif
18076 
18077  // Running the roulette
18078  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18079 
18080  if (which < 0)
18081  return nullptr;
18082 
18083  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18084  m->get_db().n_transmissions_today++;
18085  #endif
18086 
18087  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
18088 
18089 }
18090 
18091 }
18092 
18093 #endif
18094 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
18096 
18097  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
18098 
18101 
18102

18105 
18106  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-state.hpp-
18107 
18110 
18111 
18112 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATE_HPP
18113 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATE_HPP
18114 
18115 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
18117 
18118  Start of -include/epiworld//model-bones.hpp-
18119 
18122 
18123 
18124 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODEL_BONES_HPP
18125 #define EPIWORLD_MODEL_BONES_HPP
18126

18131 class AgentsSample;
18132

18134 class Virus;
18135 
18136 template<typename TSeq>
18137 class Viruses;

18148 class DataBase;

18154 struct Event;

18157 class GlobalEvent;

18159 template<typename TSeq>
18160 inline epiworld_double susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default(
18161  Agent<TSeq>* p,
18162  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
18163  Model<TSeq>* m
18164  );
18165 template<typename TSeq>
18166 inline epiworld_double transmission_reduction_mixer_default(
18167  Agent<TSeq>* p,
18168  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
18169  Model<TSeq>* m
18170  );

18172 inline epiworld_double recovery_enhancer_mixer_default(
18173  Agent<TSeq>* p,
18174  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
18175  Model<TSeq>* m
18176  );

18184 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
18185 inline std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> make_save_run(
18186  std::string fmt = "%03lu-episimulation.csv",
18187  bool total_hist = true,
18188  bool virus_info = false,
18189  bool virus_hist = false,
18190  bool tool_info = false,
18191  bool tool_hist = false,
18192  bool transmission = false,
18193  bool transition = false,
18194  bool reproductive = false,
18195  bool generation = false
18196  );
18197 
18198 // template<typename TSeq>
18199 // class VirusPtr;
18200 
18201 // template<typename TSeq>
18202 // class ToolPtr;
18203 
18213 template<typename TSeq>
18214 class Model {
18215  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
18216  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
18217  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
18218  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
18219 protected:
18220 
18221  std::string name = ""; ///< Name of the model
18222 
18223  DataBase<TSeq> db = DataBase<TSeq>(*this);
18224 
18225  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population = {};
18226 
18227  bool using_backup = true;
18228  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population_backup = {};
18229 
18239  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
18240  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
18241  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
18242  size_t population_left_n = 0u;
18244 
18254  double * agents_data = nullptr;
18255  size_t agents_data_ncols = 0u;
18257 
18258  bool directed = false;
18259 
18260  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > viruses = {};
18261  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools = {};
18262 
18263  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities = {};
18264  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities_backup = {};
18265 
18266  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
18267 
18268  std::uniform_real_distribution<> runifd =
18269  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
18270  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
18271  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
18272  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
18273  std::gamma_distribution<>();
18274  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
18275  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
18276  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
18277  std::exponential_distribution<>();
18278  std::binomial_distribution<> rbinomd =
18279  std::binomial_distribution<>();
18280  std::negative_binomial_distribution<> rnbinomd =
18281  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();
18282  std::geometric_distribution<> rgeomd =
18283  std::geometric_distribution<>();
18284  std::poisson_distribution<> rpoissd =
18285  std::poisson_distribution<>();
18286 
18287  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> rewire_fun;
18288  epiworld_double rewire_prop = 0.0;
18289 
18290  std::map<std::string, epiworld_double > parameters;
18291  epiworld_fast_uint ndays = 0;
18292  Progress pb;
18293 
18294  std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > state_fun = {}; ///< Functions to update states
18295  std::vector< std::string > states_labels = {}; ///< Labels of the states
18296 
18298  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> initial_states_fun = [](Model<TSeq> * /**/)
18299  -> void {};
18300

18304  int current_date = 0;

18315  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
