18888 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
18890 
18891  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
18892 
18895 
18896 
18897 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
18898 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
18899 
18904 namespace sampler {
18905 
18919 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
18920 inline std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_update_susceptible(
18921  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
18922  )
18923 {
18924 
18925 
18926  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
18927  {
18928 
18929  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
18930  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
18931  {
18932 
18933  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
18934  throw std::logic_error(
18935  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
18936  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
18937  std::string(" has a virus.")
18938  );
18939 
18940  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
18941  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
18942  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
18943  {
18944 
18945  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
18946  if (v == nullptr)
18947  continue;
18948 
18949  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
18950  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
18951  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
18952  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
18953  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
18954  ;
18955 
18956  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
18957 
18958  }
18959 
18960  // No virus to compute
18961  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
18962  return;
18963 
18964  // Running the roulette
18965  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18966 
18967  if (which < 0)
18968  return;
18969 
18970  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
18971 
18972  return;
18973  };
18974 
18975  return sampler;
18976 
18977  } else {
18978 
18979  // Making room for the query
18980  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
18981  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
18982 
18983  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
18984  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
18985 
18986  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
18987  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
18988  {
18989 
18990  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
18991  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
18992  {
18993 
18994  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
18995  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
18996  {
18997  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
18998  throw std::logic_error(
18999  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
19000  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
19001  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
19002  std::string(" states in the model.")
19003  );
19004 
19005  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
19006 
19007  }
19008 
19009  }
19010 
19011  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19012  throw std::logic_error(
19013  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19014  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19015  std::string(" has a virus.")
19016  );
19017 
19018  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19019  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19020  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19021  {
19022 
19023  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
19024  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
19025  continue;
19026 
19027  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19028  if (v == nullptr)
19029  continue;
19030 
19031 
19032  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19033  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19034  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19035  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19036  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19037  ;
19038 
19039  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19040 
19041  }
19042 
19043  // No virus to compute
19044  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19045  return;
19046 
19047  // Running the roulette
19048  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19049 
19050  if (which < 0)
19051  return;
19052 
19053  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
19054 
19055  return;
19056 
19057  };
19058 
19059  return sampler;
19060 
19061  }
19062 
19063 }
19064 
19078 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19079 inline std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(
19080  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
19081 )
19082 {
19083  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
19084  {
19085 
19086  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
19087  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
19088 
19089  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19090  throw std::logic_error(
19091  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19092  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19093  std::string(" has a virus.")
19094  );
19095 
19096  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19097  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19098  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19099  {
19100 
19101  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19102  continue;
19103 
19104  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19105 
19106  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19107  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
19108  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19109  #endif
19110 
19111  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19112  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19113  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19114  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19115  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19116  ;
19117 
19118  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19119 
19120  }
19121 
19122  // No virus to compute
19123  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19124  return nullptr;
19125 
19126  // Running the roulette
19127  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19128 
19129  if (which < 0)
19130  return nullptr;
19131 
19132  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19133 
19134  };
19135 
19136  return res;
19137 
19138 
19139  } else {
19140 
19141  // Making room for the query
19142  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
19143  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
19144 
19145  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
19146  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
19147 
19148 
19149  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
19150  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
19151 
19152  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
19153  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
19154  {
19155 
19156  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
19157  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
19158  {
19159  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
19160  throw std::logic_error(
19161  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
19162  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
19163  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
19164  std::string(" states in the model.")
19165  );
19166 
19167  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
19168 
19169  }
19170 
19171  }
19172 
19173  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19174  throw std::logic_error(
19175  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19176  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19177  std::string(" has a virus.")
19178  );
19179 
19180  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19181  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19182  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19183  {
19184 
19185  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
19186  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
19187  continue;
19188 
19189  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19190  continue;
19191 
19192  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19193 
19194  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19195  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
19196  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19197  #endif
19198 
19199  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19200  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19201  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19202  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19203  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19204  ;
19205 
19206  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19207 
19208  }
19209 
19210  // No virus to compute
19211  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19212  return nullptr;
19213 
19214  // Running the roulette
19215  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19216 
19217  if (which < 0)
19218  return nullptr;
19219 
19220  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19221 
19222  };
19223 
19224  return res;
19225 
19226  }
19227 
19228 }
19229 
19246 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19247 inline Virus<TSeq> * sample_virus_single(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m)
19248 {
19249 
19250  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19251  throw std::logic_error(
19252  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense!") +
19253  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19254  std::string(" has a virus.")
19255  );
19256 
19257  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19258  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19259  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19260  {
19261  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19262  int _vcount_neigh = 0;
19263  #endif
19264 
19265  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19266  continue;
19267 
19268  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19269 
19270  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19271  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
19272  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19273  #endif
19274 
19275  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19276  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19277  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19278  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19279  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19280  ;
19281 
19282  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19283 
19284  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19285  if (
19286  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] < 0.0) |
19287  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] > 1.0)
19288  )
19289  {
19290  printf_epiworld(
19291  "[epi-debug] Agent %i's virus %i has transmission prob outside of [0, 1]: %.4f!\n",
19292  static_cast<int>(neighbor->get_id()),
19293  static_cast<int>(_vcount_neigh++),
19294  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1]
19295  );
19296  }
19297  #endif
19298 
19299  }
19300 
19301 
19302  // No virus to compute
19303  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19304  return nullptr;
19305 
19306  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19307  m->get_db().n_transmissions_potential++;
19308  #endif
19309 
19310  // Running the roulette
19311  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19312 
19313  if (which < 0)
19314  return nullptr;
19315 
19316  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19317  m->get_db().n_transmissions_today++;
19318  #endif
19319 
19320  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19321 
19322 }
19323 
19324 }
19325 
19326 #endif
19327 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19329 
19330  End of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
19331 
19334 
19335 
19336 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19338 
19339  Start of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
19340

19346 #define EPIWORLD_CONFIG_HPP
19347 
19348 #ifndef printf_epiworld
19349  #define printf_epiworld fflush(stdout);printf
19350 #endif
19351 
19352 // In case the user has a way to stop the program
19353 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
19354 // passed the simulation number.
19355 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
19356  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)
19357 #endif
19358 
19359 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS
19360  #define EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS 1048576
19361 #endif
19362 
19363 #if defined(_OPENMP) || defined(__OPENMP)
19364  #include <omp.h>
19365 // #else
19366 // #define omp_get_thread_num() 0
19367 // #define omp_set_num_threads() 1
19368 #endif
19369 
19370 #ifndef epiworld_double
19371  #define epiworld_double float
19372 #endif
19373

19375  #define epiworld_fast_int int
19376 #endif
19377

19380 #endif

19418 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;

19421 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;

19424 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19425

19427 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19428 
19429 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19430 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

19433 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19434

19436 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19437 
19438 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19439 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;

19441 template<typename TSeq>
19442 struct Event;

19445 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

19451 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

19470 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19471 struct Event {
19472  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
19473  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
19474  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
19475  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
19476  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
19477  epiworld_fast_int queue;
19478  EventFun<TSeq> call;
19479  int idx_agent;
19480  int idx_object;
19481 public:
19498  Event(
19499  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
19500  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
19501  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
19502  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
19503  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
19504  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
19505  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
19506  int idx_agent_,
19507  int idx_object_
19508  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
19509  new_state(new_state_),
19510  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
19511  return;
19512  };
19513 };
19514 
19522 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION
19523  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION 0.0
19524 #endif
19525 
19526 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION
19527  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION 0.0
19528 #endif
19529 
19530 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER
19531  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER 0.0
19532 #endif
19533 
19534 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION
19535  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION 0.0
19536 #endif
19537 
19538 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION
19539  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION 1.0
19540 #endif
19541 
19542 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY
19543  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY 0.1428
19544 #endif
19545 
19546 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH
19547  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH 0.0
19548 #endif
19549 
19550 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS
19551  #define EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS 7.0
19552 #endif
19554 
19555 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19556  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
19557 
19558  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
19559  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
19560 
19561  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
19562  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
19563 
19564  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
19565  for (auto & v : vect) \
19566  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
19567  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
19568 
19569  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
19570  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
19571  for (auto & v : vect) \
19572  { \
19573  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
19574  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
19575  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
19576  }
19577 
19578  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
19579  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
19580  for (auto & v : vect) \
19581  { \
19582  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
19583  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
19584  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
19585  }
19586 
19587  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
19588  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
19589  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
19590  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
19591  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
19592  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
19593  }\
19594  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
19595  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
19596  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
19597  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
19598  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
19599  { \
19600  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
19601  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
19602  _j, \
19603  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
19604  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
19605  } \
19606  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
19607  }
19608 
19609  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
19610  if (a) \
19611  {\
19612  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
19613  }
19614 
19615  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
19616 #else
19617  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
19618  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
19619  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
19620  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
19621  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
19622  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
19623  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
19624  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
19625  if (a) \
19626  return false;
19627  #define epiexception(a) a
19628 #endif
19629 
19630 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
19631  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
19632 #else
19633  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
19634 #endif
19635 
19636 #endif
19637 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19639 
19640  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
19641 
19644 
19645 
19646 
19658 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19659 inline void default_update_susceptible(
19660  Agent<TSeq> * p,
19661  Model<TSeq> * m
19662  )
19663 {
19664 
19665  Virus<TSeq> * virus = sampler::sample_virus_single<TSeq>(p, m);
19666 
19667  if (virus == nullptr)
19668  return;
19669 
19670  p->set_virus(*virus, m);
19671 
19672  return;
19673 
19674 }
19675 
19676 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19677 inline void default_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) {
19678 
19679  if (p->get_virus() == nullptr)
19680  throw std::logic_error(
19681  std::string("Using the -default_update_exposed- on agents WITHOUT viruses makes no sense! ") +
19682  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) + std::string(" has no virus registered.")
19683  );
19684 
19685  // Die
19686  auto & virus = p->get_virus();
19687  m->array_double_tmp[0u] =
19688  virus->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(virus, m));
19689 
19690  // Recover
19691  m->array_double_tmp[1u] =
19692  1.0 - (1.0 - virus->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(virus, m));
19693 
19694 
19695  // Running the roulette
19696  int which = roulette(2u, m);
19697 
19698  if (which < 0)
19699  return;
19700 
19701  // Which roulette happen?
19702  if (which == 0u) // If odd
19703  {
19704 
19705  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
19706 
19707  } else {
19708 
19709  p->rm_virus(m);
19710 
19711  }
19712 
19713  return ;
19714 
19715 };
19716 
19717 #endif
19718 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19720 
19721  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-state.hpp-
19722 
19725 
19726

19729 
19730  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-bones.hpp-
19731 
19734 
19735

19737 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_BONES_HPP
19738

19800 template<typename TSeq>
19801 class Agent {
19802  friend class Model<TSeq>;
19803  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
19804  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
19805  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
19806  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
19807  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
19808  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
19809  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
19810  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19811  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19812  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19813  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19814  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19815  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19816  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19817 private:
19818 
19819  Model<TSeq> * model;
19820 
19821  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
19822  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
19823  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
19824 
19825  std::vector< size_t > entities;
19826  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
19827  size_t n_entities = 0u;
19828 
19829  unsigned int state = 0u;
19830  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
19831 
19832  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
19833  int id = -1;
19834 
19835  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
19836 
19837  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
19838  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
19839

19841 
19842  Agent();
19843  Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p);

19846  ~Agent();
19847

19860  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
19861  Model<TSeq> * model,
19862  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
19863  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19864  );

19867  Tool<TSeq> tool,
19868  Model<TSeq> * model,
19869  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
19870  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19871  );

19874  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
19875  Model<TSeq> * model,
19876  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
19877  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19878  );

19881  Virus<TSeq> virus,
19882  Model<TSeq> * model,
19883  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
19884  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19885  );
19886

19888  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
19889  Model<TSeq> * model,

19891  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19892  );

19895  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
19896  Model<TSeq> * model,

19898  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
19899  );

19902  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
19903  Model<TSeq> * model,

19906  );

19959  );

19995 
19996  void print(bool compressed = false) const;
19997 
20014  double & operator()(size_t j);
20015  double & operator[](size_t j);
20016  double operator()(size_t j) const;
20017  double operator[](size_t j) const;
20019 
20020  Entities<TSeq> get_entities();
20021  const Entities_const<TSeq> get_entities() const;
20022  const Entity<TSeq> & get_entity(size_t i) const;
20023  Entity<TSeq> & get_entity(size_t i);
20024  size_t get_n_entities() const;
20025 
20026  bool operator==(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const;
20027  bool operator!=(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
20028 
20029 };

20075 // passed the simulation number.

20191 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
20192 struct Event {
20193  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
20194  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
20195  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
20196  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
20197  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
20198  epiworld_fast_int queue;
20199  EventFun<TSeq> call;
20200  int idx_agent;
20201  int idx_object;
20202 public:
20219  Event(
20220  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
20221  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
20222  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
20223  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
20224  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
20225  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
20226  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
20227  int idx_agent_,
20228  int idx_object_
20229  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
20230  new_state(new_state_),
20231  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
20232  return;
20233  };
20234 };

20276 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
20277  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
20278 
20279  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
20280  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
20281 
20282  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
20283  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
20284 
20285  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
20286  for (auto & v : vect) \
20287  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
20288  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
20289 
20290  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
20291  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
20292  for (auto & v : vect) \
20293  { \
20294  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
20295  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
20296  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
20297  }
20298 
20299  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
20300  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
20301  for (auto & v : vect) \
20302  { \
20303  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
20304  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
20305  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
20306  }
20307 
20308  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
20309  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
20310  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
20311  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
20312  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
20313  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
20314  }\
20315  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
20316  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
20317  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
20318  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
20319  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
20320  { \
20321  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
20322  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
20323  _j, \
20324  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
20325  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
20326  } \
20327  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
20328  }
20329 
20330  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
20331  if (a) \
20332  {\
20333  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
20334  }
20335 
20336  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
20337 #else
20338  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
20339  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
20340  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
20341  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
20342  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
20343  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
20344  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
20345  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
20346  if (a) \
20347  return false;
20348  #define epiexception(a) a
20349 #endif
20350 
20351 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
20352  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
20353 #else
20354  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
20355 #endif
20356 
20357 #endif

20454  { \

20456  } \

20484 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
20485 // and the pointer is not needed
20486 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
20487  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
20488  tseq, \
20489  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
20490  >::type
20491

20493  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
20494 
20495 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
20496  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
20497  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
20498  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
20499  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}

20520 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP

20523 template<typename TSeq>

20529 
20535 template<typename TSeq>
20536 class Entities {
20537  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
20538  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
20539 private:
20540  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
20541  const size_t n_entities;
20542 
20543 public:
20544 
20545  Entities() = delete;
20546  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
20547 
20548  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
20549  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
20550 
20551  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
20552  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
20553 
20554  size_t size() const noexcept;
20555 
20556  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
20557 
20558 };
20559 
20560 template<typename TSeq>
20561 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
20562  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
20563 {
20564 
20565  dat.reserve(n_entities);
20566  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
20567  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
20568 
20569 }
20570 
20571 template<typename TSeq>
20572 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
20573 {
20574 
20575  if (n_entities == 0u)
20576  return dat.end();
20577 
20578  return dat.begin();
20579 }
20580 
20581 template<typename TSeq>
20582 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
20583 {
20584 
20585  return begin() + n_entities;
20586 }
20587 
20588 template<typename TSeq>
20589 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
20590 {
20591 
20592  if (i >= n_entities)
20593  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
20594 
20595  return *dat[i];
20596 
20597 }
20598 
20599 template<typename TSeq>
20600 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
20601 {
20602 
20603  return *dat[i];
20604 
20605 }
20606 
20607 template<typename TSeq>
20608 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
20609 {
20610  return n_entities;
20611 }
20612 
20613 template<typename TSeq>
20614 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
20615 {
20616 
20617  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
20618  return false;
20619 
20620  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
20621  {
20622  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
20623  return false;
20624  }
20625 
20626  return true;
20627 }
20628 
20634 template<typename TSeq>
20635 class Entities_const {
20636  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
20637  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
20638 private:
20639  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
20640  const size_t n_entities;
20641 
20642 public:
20643 
20644  Entities_const() = delete;
20645  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
20646 
20647  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
20648  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
20649 
20650  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
20651  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
20652 
20653  size_t size() const noexcept;
20654 
20655  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
20656 
20657 };
20658 
20659 template<typename TSeq>
20660 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
20661  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
20662 {
20663 
20664  dat.reserve(n_entities);
20665  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
20666  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
20667 
20668 }
20669 
20670 template<typename TSeq>
20671 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
20672 
20673  if (n_entities == 0u)
20674  return dat.end();
20675 
20676  return dat.begin();
20677 }
20678 
20679 template<typename TSeq>
20680 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
20681 
20682  return begin() + n_entities;
20683 }
20684 
20685 template<typename TSeq>
20686 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
20687 {
20688 
20689  if (i >= n_entities)
20690  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
20691 
20692  return *dat[i];
20693 
20694 }
20695 
20696 template<typename TSeq>
20697 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
20698 {
20699 
20700  return *dat[i];
20701 
20702 }
20703 
20704 template<typename TSeq>
20705 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
20706 {
20707  return n_entities;
20708 }
20709 
20710 template<typename TSeq>
20711 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
20712 {
20713 
20714  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
20715  return false;
20716 
20717  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
20718  {
20719  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
20720  return false;
20721  }
20722 
20723  return true;
20724 }
20725 
20726 
20727 #endif
20728 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

20810 template<typename TSeq>
20811 class Agent {
20812  friend class Model<TSeq>;
20813  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
20814  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
20815  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
20816  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
20817  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
20818  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
20819  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
20820  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20821  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20822  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20823  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20824  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20825  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20826  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20827 private:
20828 
20829  Model<TSeq> * model;
20830 
20831  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
20832  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
20833  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
20834 
20835  std::vector< size_t > entities;
20836  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
20837  size_t n_entities = 0u;
20838 
20839  unsigned int state = 0u;
20840  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
20841 
20842  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
20843  int id = -1;
20844 
20845  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
20846 
20847  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
20848  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
20849 
20850 public:
20851 
20852  Agent();
20853  Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p);
20854  Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
20855  Agent<TSeq> & operator=(const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent);
20856  ~Agent();
20857 
20869  void add_tool(
20870  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
20871  Model<TSeq> * model,
20872  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20873  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20874  );
20875 
20876  void add_tool(
20877  Tool<TSeq> tool,
20878  Model<TSeq> * model,
20879  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20880  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20881  );
20882 
20883  void set_virus(
20884  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
20885  Model<TSeq> * model,
20886  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20887  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20888  );
20889 
20890  void set_virus(
20891  Virus<TSeq> virus,
20892  Model<TSeq> * model,
20893  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20894  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20895  );
20896 
20897  void add_entity(
20898  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
20899  Model<TSeq> * model,
20900  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20901  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20902  );
20903 
20904  void rm_tool(
20905  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
20906  Model<TSeq> * model,
20907  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20908  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20909  );
20910 
20911  void rm_tool(
20912  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
20913  Model<TSeq> * model,
20914  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20915  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20916  );
20917 
20918  void rm_virus(
20919  Model<TSeq> * model,
20920  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20921  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20922  );
20923 
20924  void rm_entity(
20925  epiworld_fast_uint entity_idx,
20926  Model<TSeq> * model,
20927  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20928  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20929  );

20932  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
20933  Model<TSeq> * model,
20934  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20935  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20936  );

20940 
20948  epiworld_double get_susceptibility_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
20949  epiworld_double get_transmission_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
20950  epiworld_double get_recovery_enhancer(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
20951  epiworld_double get_death_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
20953

20955

20958

20960  Tools<TSeq> get_tools();

20969  );

20991  );

21000  bool has_virus(epiworld_fast_uint t) const;
21001  bool has_virus(std::string name) const;
21002  bool has_virus(const Virus<TSeq> & v) const;
21003  bool has_entity(epiworld_fast_uint t) const;
21004  bool has_entity(std::string name) const;
21005 
21006  void print(bool compressed = false) const;
21007 
21024  double & operator()(size_t j);
21025  double & operator[](size_t j);
21026  double operator()(size_t j) const;
21027  double operator[](size_t j) const;
21029

21032  const Entity<TSeq> & get_entity(size_t i) const;

21034  size_t get_n_entities() const;
21035 
21036  bool operator==(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const;
21037  bool operator!=(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
21038 
21039 };

21053 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21055 
21056  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-events-meat.hpp-

21061 
21062 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_EVENTS_MEAT_HPP
21063 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_EVENTS_MEAT_HPP
21064 
21065 
21066 template<typename TSeq>
21067 inline void default_add_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21068 {
21069 
21070  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21071  VirusPtr<TSeq> v = a.virus;
21072 
21073  m->get_db().record_transmission(
21074  v->get_agent() ? v->get_agent()->get_id() : -1,
21075  p->get_id(),
21076  v->get_id(),
21077  v->get_date()
21078  );
21079 
21080  p->virus = std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(*v);
21081  p->virus->set_date(m->today());
21082  p->virus->set_agent(p);
21083 
21084  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21085  // tools.
21086  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21087  {
21088  auto & db = m->get_db();
21089  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21090 
21091  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21092  db.update_tool(
21093  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21094  p->state_prev,
21095  a.new_state
21096  );
21097  }
21098 
21099  // Lastly, we increase the daily count of the virus
21100  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21101  m->get_db().today_virus.at(v->get_id()).at(
21102  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21103  )++;
21104  #else
21105  m->get_db().today_virus[v->get_id()][
21106  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21107  ]++;
21108  #endif
21109 
21110 }
21111 
21112 template<typename TSeq>
21113 inline void default_add_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21114 {
21115 
21116  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21117  ToolPtr<TSeq> t = a.tool;
21118 
21119  // Update tool accounting
21120  p->n_tools++;
21121  size_t n_tools = p->n_tools;
21122 
21123  if (n_tools <= p->tools.size())
21124  p->tools[n_tools - 1] = std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(*t);
21125  else
21126  p->tools.push_back(std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(*t));
21127 
21128  n_tools--;
21129 
21130  p->tools[n_tools]->set_date(m->today());
21131  p->tools[n_tools]->set_agent(p, n_tools);
21132 
21133  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21134  // tools.
21135  if ((a.new_state != -99) && static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state)
21136  {
21137  auto & db = m->get_db();
21138  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21139 
21140  if (p->virus)
21141  db.update_virus(
21142  p->virus->get_id(),
21143  p->state_prev,
21144  a.new_state
21145  );
21146  }
21147 
21148  m->get_db().today_tool[t->get_id()][
21149  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21150  ]++;
21151 
21152 
21153 }
21154 
21155 template<typename TSeq>
21156 inline void default_rm_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * model)
21157 {
21158 
21159  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21160  VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = a.virus;
21161 
21162  // Calling the virus action over the removed virus
21163  v->post_recovery(model);
21164 
21165  p->virus = nullptr;
21166 
21167  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21168  // tools.
21169  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21170  {
21171  auto & db = model->get_db();
21172  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21173 
21174  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21175  db.update_tool(
21176  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21177  p->state_prev,
21178  a.new_state
21179  );
21180  }
21181 
21182  // The counters of the virus only needs to decrease.
21183  // We use the previous state of the agent as that was
21184  // the state when the virus was added.
21185  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21186  model->get_db().today_virus.at(v->get_id()).at(p->state_prev)--;
21187  #else
21188  model->get_db().today_virus[v->get_id()][p->state_prev]--;
21189  #endif
21190 
21191 
21192  return;
21193 
21194 }
21195 
21196 template<typename TSeq>
21197 inline void default_rm_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21198 {
21199 
21200  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21201  ToolPtr<TSeq> & t = a.agent->tools[a.tool->pos_in_agent];
21202 
21203  if (--p->n_tools > 0)
21204  {
21205  p->tools[p->n_tools]->pos_in_agent = t->pos_in_agent;
21206  std::swap(
21207  p->tools[t->pos_in_agent],
21208  p->tools[p->n_tools]
21209  );
21210  }
21211 
21212  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21213  // tools.
21214  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21215  {
21216  auto & db = m->get_db();
21217  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21218 
21219  if (p->virus)
21220  db.update_virus(
21221  p->virus->get_id(),
21222  p->state_prev,
21223  a.new_state
21224  );
21225  }
21226 
21227  // Lastly, we increase the daily count of the tool.
21228  // Like rm_virus, we use the previous state of the agent
21229  // as that was the state when the tool was added.
21230  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21231  m->get_db().today_tool.at(t->get_id()).at(p->state_prev)--;
21232  #else
21233  m->get_db().today_tool[t->get_id()][p->state_prev]--;
21234  #endif
21235 
21236  return;
21237 
21238 }
21239 
21240 template<typename TSeq>
21241 inline void default_change_state(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21242 {
21243 
21244  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21245 
21246  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21247  {
21248  auto & db = m->get_db();
21249  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21250 
21251  if (p->virus)
21252  db.update_virus(
21253  p->virus->get_id(), p->state_prev, a.new_state
21254  );
21255 
21256  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21257  db.update_tool(
21258  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21259  p->state_prev,
21260  a.new_state
21261  );
21262 
21263  }
21264 
21265 }
21266 
21267 template<typename TSeq>
21268 inline void default_add_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> *)
21269 {
21270 
21271  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21272  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
21273 
21274  // Checking the agent and the entity are not linked
21275  if ((p->get_n_entities() > 0) && (e->size() > 0))
21276  {
21277 
21278  if (p->get_n_entities() > e->size()) // Slower search through the agent
21279  {
21280  for (size_t i = 0u; i < e->size(); ++i)
21281  if(static_cast<int>(e->operator[](i)) == p->get_id())
21282  throw std::logic_error("An entity cannot be reassigned to an agent.");
21283  }
21284  else // Slower search through the entity
21285  {
21286  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->get_n_entities(); ++i)
21287  if(p->get_entity(i).get_id() == e->get_id())
21288  throw std::logic_error("An entity cannot be reassigned to an agent.");
21289  }
21290 
21291  // It means that agent and entity were not associated.
21292  }
21293 
21294  // Adding the entity to the agent
21295  if (++p->n_entities <= p->entities.size())
21296  {
21297 
21298  p->entities[p->n_entities - 1] = e->get_id();
21299  p->entities_locations[p->n_entities - 1] = e->n_agents;
21300 
21301  } else
21302  {
21303  p->entities.push_back(e->get_id());
21304  p->entities_locations.push_back(e->n_agents);
21305  }
21306 
21307  // Adding the agent to the entity
21308  // Adding the entity to the agent
21309  if (++e->n_agents <= e->agents.size())
21310  {
21311 
21312  e->agents[e->n_agents - 1] = p->get_id();
21313  // Adjusted by '-1' since the list of entities in the agent just grew.
21314  e->agents_location[e->n_agents - 1] = p->n_entities - 1;
21315 
21316  } else
21317  {
21318  e->agents.push_back(p->get_id());
21319  e->agents_location.push_back(p->n_entities - 1);
21320  }
21321 
21322  // Today was the last modification
21323  // e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
21324 
21325 }
21326 
21327 template<typename TSeq>
21328 inline void default_rm_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21329 {
21330 
21331  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21332  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
21333  size_t idx_agent_in_entity = a.idx_agent;
21334  size_t idx_entity_in_agent = a.idx_object;
21335 
21336  if (--p->n_entities > 0)
21337  {
21338 
21339  // When we move the end entity to the new location, the
21340  // moved entity needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
21341  // entity will now be located in the agent
21342  size_t agent_location_in_last_entity =
21343  p->entities_locations[p->n_entities];
21344 
21345  Entity<TSeq> * last_entity =
21346  &m->get_entity(p->entities[p->n_entities]); ///< Last entity of the agent
21347 
21348  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
21349  last_entity->agents_location[agent_location_in_last_entity] =
21350  idx_entity_in_agent;
21351 
21352  // We now make the swap
21353  std::swap(
21354  p->entities[p->n_entities],
21355  p->entities[idx_entity_in_agent]
21356  );
21357 
21358  }
21359 
21360  if (--e->n_agents > 0)
21361  {
21362 
21363  // When we move the end agent to the new location, the
21364  // moved agent needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
21365  // agent will now be located in the entity
21366  size_t entity_location_in_last_agent = e->agents_location[e->n_agents];
21367 
21368  Agent<TSeq> * last_agent =
21369  &m->get_agents()[e->agents[e->n_agents]]; ///< Last agent of the entity
21370 
21371  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
21372  last_agent->entities_locations[entity_location_in_last_agent] =
21373  idx_agent_in_entity;
21374 
21375  // We now make the swap
21376  std::swap(
21377  e->agents[e->n_agents],
21378  e->agents[idx_agent_in_entity]
21379  );
21380 
21381  }
21382 
21383  // Setting the date of the last removal
21384  // e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
21385 
21386  return;
21387 
21388 };
21389 
21390 #endif
21391 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21393 
21394  End of -include/epiworld//agent-events-meat.hpp-
21395 
21398 
21399 
21400 
21401 // To large to add directly here
21402 
21403 template<typename TSeq>
21404 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent() {}
21405 
21406 template<typename TSeq>
21407 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p) :
21408  model(p.model),
21409  neighbors(std::move(p.neighbors)),
21410  neighbors_locations(std::move(p.neighbors_locations)),
21411  n_neighbors(p.n_neighbors),
21412  entities(std::move(p.entities)),
21413  entities_locations(std::move(p.entities_locations)),
21414  n_entities(p.n_entities),
21415  state(p.state),
21416  state_prev(p.state_prev),
21417  state_last_changed(p.state_last_changed),
21418  id(p.id),
21419  tools(std::move(p.tools)), /// Needs to be adjusted
21420  n_tools(p.n_tools)
21421 {
21422 
21423  state = p.state;
21424  id = p.id;
21425 
21426  // Dealing with the virus
21427  if (p.virus != nullptr)
21428  {
21429  virus = std::move(p.virus);
21430  virus->set_agent(this);
21431  }
21432 
21433  int loc = 0;
21434  for (auto & t : tools)
21435  {
21436 
21437  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
21438  // the virus code
21439  t->agent = this;
21440  t->pos_in_agent = loc++;
21441 
21442  }
21443 
21444 }
21445 
21446 template<typename TSeq>
21447 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
21448  model(p.model),
21449  neighbors(nullptr),
21450  neighbors_locations(nullptr),
21451  n_neighbors(p.n_neighbors),
21452  entities(p.entities),
21453  entities_locations(p.entities_locations),
21454  n_entities(p.n_entities)
21455 {
21456 
21457  if (n_neighbors > 0u)
21458  {
21459  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >(*p.neighbors);
21460  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >(*p.neighbors_locations);
21461  }
21462 
21463  state = p.state;
21464  id = p.id;
21465 
21466  // Dealing with the virus
21467  if (p.virus != nullptr)
21468  {
21469  virus = std::make_shared<Virus<TSeq>>(*p.virus);
21470  virus->set_agent(this);
21471  }
21472 
21473 
21474  tools.reserve(p.get_n_tools());
21475  n_tools = tools.size();
21476  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
21477  {
21478 
21479  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
21480  // the virus code
21481  tools.emplace_back(std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(*p.tools[i]));
21482  tools.back()->set_agent(this, i);
21483 
21484  }
21485 
21486 }
21487 
21488 template<typename TSeq>
21489 inline Agent<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::operator=(
21490  const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent
21491 )
21492 {
21493 
21494  model = other_agent.model;
21495 
21496  n_neighbors = other_agent.n_neighbors;
21497  if (neighbors != nullptr)
21498  {
21499  delete neighbors;
21500  delete neighbors_locations;
21501  }
21502 
21503  if (other_agent.n_neighbors > 0u)
21504  {
21505  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >(*other_agent.neighbors);
21506  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >(*other_agent.neighbors_locations);
21507  }
21508  else
21509  {
21510  neighbors = nullptr;
21511  neighbors_locations = nullptr;
21512  }
21513 
21514  entities = other_agent.entities;
21515  entities_locations = other_agent.entities_locations;
21516  n_entities = other_agent.n_entities;
21517 
21518  state = other_agent.state;
21519  state_prev = other_agent.state_prev;
21520  state_last_changed = other_agent.state_last_changed;
21521  id = other_agent.id;
21522 
21523  if (other_agent.virus != nullptr)
21524  {
21525  virus = std::make_shared<Virus<TSeq>>(*other_agent.virus);
21526  virus->set_agent(this);
21527  } else
21528  virus = nullptr;
21529 
21530  n_tools = other_agent.n_tools;
21531  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
21532  {
21533  tools[i] = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(*other_agent.tools[i]);
21534  tools[i]->set_agent(this, i);
21535  }
21536 
21537  return *this;
21538 
21539 }
21540 
21541 template<typename TSeq>
21542 inline Agent<TSeq>::~Agent()
21543 {
21544 
21545  if (neighbors != nullptr)
21546  {
21547  delete neighbors;
21548  delete neighbors_locations;
21549  }
21550 
21551 }
21552 
21553 template<typename TSeq>
21554 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
21555  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
21556  Model<TSeq> * model,
21557  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21558  epiworld_fast_int queue
21559 ) {
21560 
21561  // Checking the virus exists
21562  if (tool->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_tools()))
21563  throw std::range_error("The tool with id: " + std::to_string(tool->get_id()) +
21564  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_tools()) +
21565  " included in the model.");
21566 
21567  model->events_add(
21568  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_add_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21569  );
21570 
21571 }
21572 
21573 template<typename TSeq>
21574 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
21575  Tool<TSeq> tool,
21576  Model<TSeq> * model,
21577  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21578  epiworld_fast_int queue
21579 )
21580 {
21581  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_ptr = std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(tool);
21582  add_tool(tool_ptr, model, state_new, queue);
21583 }
21584 
21585 template<typename TSeq>
21586 inline void Agent<TSeq>::set_virus(
21587  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
21588  Model<TSeq> * model,
21589  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21590  epiworld_fast_int queue
21591 )
21592 {
21593 
21594  // Checking the virus exists
21595  if (virus->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_viruses()))
21596  throw std::range_error("The virus with id: " + std::to_string(virus->get_id()) +
21597  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_viruses()) +
21598  " included in the model.");
21599 
21600  if (state_new == -99)
21601  virus->get_state(&state_new, nullptr, nullptr);
21602 
21603  if (queue == -99)
21604  virus->get_queue(&queue, nullptr, nullptr);
21605 
21606  model->events_add(
21607  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_add_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
21608  );
21609 
21610 }
21611 
21612 template<typename TSeq>
21613 inline void Agent<TSeq>::set_virus(
21614  Virus<TSeq> virus,
21615  Model<TSeq> * model,
21616  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21617  epiworld_fast_int queue
21618 )
21619 {
21620  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_ptr = std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(virus);
21621  set_virus(virus_ptr, model, state_new, queue);
21622 }
21623 
21624 template<typename TSeq>
21625 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_entity(
21626  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
21627  Model<TSeq> * model,
21628  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21629  epiworld_fast_int queue
21630 )
21631 {
21632 
21633  if (model != nullptr)
21634  {
21635 
21636  model->events_add(
21637  this, nullptr, nullptr, &entity, state_new, queue, default_add_entity<TSeq>, -1, -1
21638  );
21639 
21640  }
21641  else // If no model is passed, then we assume that we only need to add the
21642  // model entity
21643  {
21644 
21645  Event<TSeq> a(
21646  this, nullptr, nullptr, &entity, state_new, queue, default_add_entity<TSeq>,
21647  -1, -1
21648  );
21649 
21650  default_add_entity(a, model); /* passing model makes nothing */
21651 
21652  }
21653 
21654 }
21655 
21656 template<typename TSeq>
21657 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
21658  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
21659  Model<TSeq> * model,
21660  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21661  epiworld_fast_int queue
21662 )
21663 {
21664 
21665  if (tool_idx >= n_tools)
21666  throw std::range_error(
21667  "The Tool you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21668  std::to_string(n_tools) + " tools."
21669  );
21670 
21671  model->events_add(
21672  this, nullptr, tools[tool_idx], nullptr, state_new, queue, default_rm_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21673  );
21674 
21675 }
21676 
21677 template<typename TSeq>
21678 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
21679  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
21680  Model<TSeq> * model,
21681  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21682  epiworld_fast_int queue
21683 )
21684 {
21685 
21686  if (tool->agent != this)
21687  throw std::logic_error("Cannot remove a virus from another agent!");
21688 
21689  model->events_add(
21690  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_rm_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21691  );
21692 
21693 }
21694 
21695 template<typename TSeq>
21696 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_virus(
21697  Model<TSeq> * model,
21698  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21699  epiworld_fast_int queue
21700 )
21701 {
21702 
21703  if (virus == nullptr)
21704  throw std::logic_error(
21705  "There is no virus to remove here!"
21706  );
21707 
21708  if (state_new == -99)
21709  virus->get_state(nullptr, &state_new, nullptr);
21710 
21711  if (queue == -99)
21712  virus->get_queue(nullptr, &queue, nullptr);
21713 
21714  model->events_add(
21715  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr,
21716  state_new,
21717  queue,
21718  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
21719  );
21720 
21721 }
21722 
21723 template<typename TSeq>
21724 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
21725  epiworld_fast_uint entity_idx,
21726  Model<TSeq> * model,
21727  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21728  epiworld_fast_int queue
21729 )
21730 {
21731 
21732  if (entity_idx >= n_entities)
21733  throw std::range_error(
21734  "The Entity you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21735  std::to_string(n_entities) + " entitites."
21736  );
21737  else if (n_entities == 0u)
21738  throw std::logic_error(
21739  "There is entity to remove here!"
21740  );
21741 
21742  model->events_add(
21743  this,
21744  nullptr,
21745  nullptr,
21746  &model->get_entity(entity_idx),
21747  state_new,
21748  queue,
21749  default_rm_entity<TSeq>,
21750  entities_locations[entity_idx],
21751  entity_idx
21752  );
21753 }
21754 
21755 template<typename TSeq>
21756 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
21757  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
21758  Model<TSeq> * model,
21759  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21760  epiworld_fast_int queue
21761 )
21762 {
21763 
21764  // Looking for entity location in the agent
21765  int entity_idx = -1;
21766  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
21767  {
21768  if (static_cast<int>(entities[i]) == entity.get_id())
21769  {
21770  entity_idx = i;
21771  break;
21772  }
21773  }
21774 
21775  if (entity_idx == -1)
21776  throw std::logic_error(
21777  std::string("The agent ") +
21778  std::to_string(id) +
21779  std::string(" is not associated with entity \"") +
21780  entity.get_name() +
21781  std::string("\".")
21782  );
21783 
21784  model->events_add(
21785  this,
21786  nullptr,
21787  nullptr,
21788  &model->entities[entity.get_id()],
21789  state_new,
21790  queue,
21791  default_rm_entity<TSeq>,
21792  entities_locations[entity_idx],
21793  entity_idx
21794  );
21795 }
21796 
21797 template<typename TSeq>
21798 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_agent_by_virus(
21799  Model<TSeq> * model
21800 )
21801 {
21802 
21803  model->events_add(
21804  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr,
21805  virus->state_removed,
21806  virus->queue_removed,
21807  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
21808  );
21809 
21810 }
21811 
21812 template<typename TSeq>
21813 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
21814  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
21815  Model<TSeq> * model
21816 ) {
21817 
21818  return model->susceptibility_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
21819 }
21820

21822 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
21823  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
21824  Model<TSeq> * model
21825 ) {
21826  return model->transmission_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
21827 }

21829 template<typename TSeq>
21830 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_recovery_enhancer(
21831  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
21832  Model<TSeq> * model
21833 ) {
21834  return model->recovery_enhancer_mixer(this, v, model);
21835 }

21838 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_death_reduction(

21841 ) {
21842  return model->death_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
21843 }

21846 inline int Agent<TSeq>::get_id() const
21847 {
21848  return id;
21849 }

21852 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_virus() {
21853  return virus;
21854 }

21857 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_virus() const {
21858  return virus;
21859 }

21863 inline Tools<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_tools() {
21864  return Tools<TSeq>(*this);
21865 }
21866
