21868 inline const Tools_const<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_tools() const {
21869  return Tools_const<TSeq>(*this);
21870 }
21871 
21872 template<typename TSeq>
21873 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_tool(int i)
21874 {
21875  return tools.at(i);
21876 }
21877 
21878 template<typename TSeq>
21879 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const noexcept
21880 {
21881  return n_tools;
21882 }
21883 
21884 template<typename TSeq>
21885 inline void Agent<TSeq>::mutate_virus()
21886 {
21887 
21888  virus->mutate();
21889 
21890 }
21891 
21892 template<typename TSeq>
21893 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_neighbor(
21894  Agent<TSeq> & p,
21895  bool check_source,
21896  bool check_target
21897 ) {
21898  // Can we find the neighbor?
21899  bool found = false;
21900 
21901  if (neighbors == nullptr)
21902  {
21903  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >();
21904  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >();
21905  }
21906 
21907  if (check_source && neighbors)
21908  {
21909 
21910  for (auto & n: *neighbors)
21911  if (static_cast<int>(n) == p.get_id())
21912  {
21913  found = true;
21914  break;
21915  }
21916 
21917  }
21918 
21919  // Three things going on here:
21920  // - Where in the neighbor will this be
21921  // - What is the neighbor's id
21922  // - Increasing the number of neighbors
21923  if (!found)
21924  {
21925 
21926  neighbors_locations->push_back(p.get_n_neighbors());
21927  neighbors->push_back(p.get_id());
21928  n_neighbors++;
21929 
21930  }
21931 
21932 
21933  found = false;
21934  if (check_target && p.neighbors)
21935  {
21936 
21937  for (auto & n: *p.neighbors)
21938  if (static_cast<int>(n) == id)
21939  {
21940  found = true;
21941  break;
21942  }
21943 
21944  }
21945 
21946  if (!found)
21947  {
21948 
21949  if (p.neighbors == nullptr)
21950  {
21951  p.neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >();
21952  p.neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >();
21953  }
21954 
21955  p.neighbors_locations->push_back(n_neighbors - 1);
21956  p.neighbors->push_back(id);
21957  p.n_neighbors++;
21958 
21959  }
21960 
21961 
21962 }
21963 
21964 template<typename TSeq>
21965 inline void Agent<TSeq>::swap_neighbors(
21966  Agent<TSeq> & other,
21967  size_t n_this,
21968  size_t n_other
21969 )
21970 {
21971 
21972  if (n_this >= n_neighbors)
21973  throw std::range_error(
21974  "The neighbor you want to swap is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21975  std::to_string(n_neighbors) + " neighbors."
21976  );
21977  if (n_other >= other.n_neighbors)
21978  throw std::range_error(
21979  "The neighbor you want to swap is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21980  std::to_string(other.n_neighbors) + " neighbors."
21981  );
21982 
21983  // Getting the agents
21984  auto & pop = model->population;
21985  auto & neigh_this = pop[(*neighbors)[n_this]];
21986  auto & neigh_other = pop[(*other.neighbors)[n_other]];
21987 
21988  // Getting the locations in the neighbors
21989  size_t loc_this_in_neigh = (*neighbors_locations)[n_this];
21990  size_t loc_other_in_neigh = (*other.neighbors_locations)[n_other];
21991 
21992  // Changing ids
21993  std::swap((*neighbors)[n_this], (*other.neighbors)[n_other]);
21994 
21995  if (!model->directed)
21996  {
21997  std::swap(
21998  (*neigh_this.neighbors)[loc_this_in_neigh],
21999  (*neigh_other.neighbors)[loc_other_in_neigh]
22000  );
22001 
22002  // Changing the locations
22003  std::swap((*neighbors_locations)[n_this], (*other.neighbors_locations)[n_other]);
22004 
22005  std::swap(
22006  (*neigh_this.neighbors_locations)[loc_this_in_neigh],
22007  (*neigh_other.neighbors_locations)[loc_other_in_neigh]
22008  );
22009  }
22010 
22011 }
22012 
22013 template<typename TSeq>
22014 inline std::vector< Agent<TSeq> *> Agent<TSeq>::get_neighbors()
22015 {
22016  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > res(n_neighbors, nullptr);
22017  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_neighbors; ++i)
22018  res[i] = &model->population[(*neighbors)[i]];
22019 
22020  return res;
22021 }
22022 
22023 template<typename TSeq>
22024 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_neighbors() const
22025 {
22026  return n_neighbors;
22027 }
22028 
22029 template<typename TSeq>
22030 inline void Agent<TSeq>::change_state(
22031  Model<TSeq> * model,
22032  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
22033  epiworld_fast_int queue
22034  )
22035 {
22036 
22037  model->events_add(
22038  this, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, new_state, queue,
22039  default_change_state<TSeq>, -1, -1
22040  );
22041 
22042  return;
22043 
22044 }
22045 
22046 template<typename TSeq>
22047 inline const unsigned int & Agent<TSeq>::get_state() const {
22048  return state;
22049 }
22050 
22051 template<typename TSeq>
22052 inline void Agent<TSeq>::reset()
22053 {
22054 
22055  this->virus = nullptr;
22056 
22057  this->tools.clear();
22058  n_tools = 0u;
22059 
22060  this->entities.clear();
22061  this->entities_locations.clear();
22062  this->n_entities = 0u;
22063 
22064  this->state = 0u;
22065  this->state_prev = 0u;
22066 
22067  this->state_last_changed = -1;
22068 
22069 }
22070 
22071 template<typename TSeq>
22072 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22073 {
22074 
22075  for (auto & tool : tools)
22076  if (tool->get_id() == static_cast<int>(t))
22077  return true;
22078 
22079  return false;
22080 
22081 }
22082 
22083 template<typename TSeq>
22084 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(std::string name) const
22085 {
22086 
22087  for (auto & tool : tools)
22088  if (tool->get_name() == name)
22089  return true;
22090 
22091  return false;
22092 
22093 }
22094 
22095 template<typename TSeq>
22096 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(const Tool<TSeq> & tool) const
22097 {
22098 
22099  return has_tool(tool.get_id());
22100 
22101 }
22102 
22103 template<typename TSeq>
22104 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22105 {
22106  if (virus->get_id() == static_cast<int>(t))
22107  return true;
22108 
22109  return false;
22110 }
22111 
22112 template<typename TSeq>
22113 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(std::string name) const
22114 {
22115 
22116  if (virus->get_name() == name)
22117  return true;
22118 
22119  return false;
22120 
22121 }
22122 
22123 template<typename TSeq>
22124 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(const Virus<TSeq> & virus) const
22125 {
22126 
22127  return has_virus(virus.get_id());
22128 
22129 }
22130 
22131 template<typename TSeq>
22132 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_entity(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22133 {
22134 
22135  for (auto & entity : entities)
22136  if (entity == t)
22137  return true;
22138 
22139  return false;
22140 
22141 }
22142 
22143 template<typename TSeq>
22144 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_entity(std::string name) const
22145 {
22146 
22147  for (auto & entity : entities)
22148  if (model->get_entity(entity).get_name() == name)
22149  return true;
22150 
22151  return false;
22152 
22153 }
22154 
22155 template<typename TSeq>
22156 inline void Agent<TSeq>::print(
22157  bool compressed
22158  ) const
22159 {
22160 
22161  if (compressed)
22162  {
22163  printf_epiworld(
22164  "Agent: %i, state: %s (%i), Has virus: %s, NTools: %ii NNeigh: %i\n",
22165  static_cast<int>(id),
22166  model->states_labels[state].c_str(),
22167  static_cast<int>(state),
22168  virus == nullptr ? std::string("no").c_str() : std::string("yes").c_str(),
22169  static_cast<int>(n_tools),
22170  static_cast<int>(n_neighbors)
22171  );
22172  }
22173  else {
22174 
22175  printf_epiworld("Information about agent id %i\n",
22176  static_cast<int>(this->id));
22177  printf_epiworld(" State : %s (%i)\n",
22178  model->states_labels[state].c_str(), static_cast<int>(state));
22179  printf_epiworld(" Has virus : %s\n", virus == nullptr ?
22180  std::string("no").c_str() : std::string("yes").c_str());
22181  printf_epiworld(" Tool count : %i\n", static_cast<int>(n_tools));
22182  printf_epiworld(" Neigh. count : %i\n", static_cast<int>(n_neighbors));
22183 
22184  size_t nfeats = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
22185  if (nfeats > 0)
22186  {
22187 
22188  printf_epiworld(
22189  "This model includes features (%i): [ ",
22190  static_cast<int>(nfeats)
22191  );
22192 
22193  int max_to_show = static_cast<int>((nfeats > 10)? 10 : nfeats);
22194 
22195  for (int k = 0; k < max_to_show; ++k)
22196  {
22197  printf_epiworld("%.2f", this->operator[](k));
22198 
22199  if (k != (max_to_show - 1))
22200  {
22201  printf_epiworld(", ");
22202  } else {
22203  printf_epiworld(" ]\n");
22204  }
22205 
22206  }
22207 
22208  }
22209 
22210  }
22211 
22212  return;
22213 
22214 }
22215 
22216 template<typename TSeq>
22217 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator()(size_t j)
22218 {
22219 
22220  if (model->agents_data_ncols <= j)
22221  throw std::logic_error("The requested feature of the agent is out of range.");
22222 
22223  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22224 
22225 }
22226 
22227 template<typename TSeq>
22228 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator[](size_t j)
22229 {
22230  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22231 }
22232 
22233 template<typename TSeq>
22234 inline double Agent<TSeq>::operator()(size_t j) const
22235 {
22236 
22237  if (model->agents_data_ncols <= j)
22238  throw std::logic_error("The requested feature of the agent is out of range.");
22239 
22240  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22241 
22242 }
22243 
22244 template<typename TSeq>
22245 inline double Agent<TSeq>::operator[](size_t j) const
22246 {
22247  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22248 }
22249 
22250 template<typename TSeq>
22251 inline Entities<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_entities()
22252 {
22253  return Entities<TSeq>(*this);
22254 }
22255 
22256 template<typename TSeq>
22257 inline const Entities_const<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_entities() const
22258 {
22259  return Entities_const<TSeq>(*this);
22260 }
22261 
22262 template<typename TSeq>
22263 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i) const
22264 {
22265  if (n_entities == 0)
22266  throw std::range_error("Agent id " + std::to_string(id) + " has no entities.");
22267 
22268  if (i >= n_entities)
22269  throw std::range_error("Trying to get to an agent's entity outside of the range.");
22270 
22271  return model->get_entity(entities[i]);
22272 }
22273 
22274 template<typename TSeq>
22275 inline Entity<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i)
22276 {
22277  if (n_entities == 0)
22278  throw std::range_error("Agent id " + std::to_string(id) + " has no entities.");
22279 
22280  if (i >= n_entities)
22281  throw std::range_error("Trying to get to an agent's entity outside of the range.");
22282 
22283  return model->get_entity(entities[i]);
22284 }
22285 
22286 template<typename TSeq>
22287 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_entities() const
22288 {
22289  return n_entities;
22290 }
22291 
22292 template<typename TSeq>
22293 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::operator==(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const
22294 {
22295 
22296  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22297  n_neighbors != other.n_neighbors,
22298  "Agent:: n_eighbors don't match"
22299  )
22300 
22301 
22302  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_neighbors; ++i)
22303  {
22304  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22305  (*neighbors)[i] != (*other.neighbors)[i],
22306  "Agent:: neighbor[i] don't match"
22307  )
22308  }
22309 
22310  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22311  n_entities != other.n_entities,
22312  "Agent:: n_entities don't match"
22313  )
22314 
22315 
22316  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
22317  {
22318  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22319  entities[i] != other.entities[i],
22320  "Agent:: entities[i] don't match"
22321  )
22322  }
22323 
22324  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22325  state != other.state,
22326  "Agent:: state don't match"
22327  )
22328 
22329 
22330  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22331  state_prev != other.state_prev,
22332  "Agent:: state_prev don't match"
22333  )
22334 
22335 
22336  // EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22337  // state_last_changed != other.state_last_changed,
22338  // "Agent:: state_last_changed don't match"
22339  // ) ///< Last time the agent was updated.
22340 
22341  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22342  ((virus == nullptr) && (other.virus != nullptr)) ||
22343  ((virus != nullptr) && (other.virus == nullptr)),
22344  "Agent:: virus don't match"
22345  )
22346 
22347  if ((virus != nullptr) && (other.virus != nullptr))
22348  {
22349  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22350  *virus != *other.virus,
22351  "Agent:: virus doesn't match"
22352  )
22353  }
22354 
22355  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(n_tools != other.n_tools, "Agent:: n_tools don't match")
22356 
22357  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
22358  {
22359 
22360  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22361  tools[i] != other.tools[i],
22362  "Agent:: tools[i] don't match"
22363  )
22364 
22365  }
22366 
22367  return true;
22368 
22369 }
22370 
22371 #endif
22372 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22374 
22375  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat.hpp-
22376 
22379 
22380 
22381 
22382 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22384 
22385  Start of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
22386 
22389 
22390 
22391 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
22392 #define EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
22393 
22394 class SAMPLETYPE {
22395 public:
22396  static const int MODEL = 0;
22397  static const int ENTITY = 1;
22398  static const int AGENT = 2;
22399 };
22400 
22401 // template<typename TSeq>
22402 // class Agent;
22403 
22404 // template<typename TSeq>
22405 // class Model;
22406 
22407 // template<typename TSeq>
22408 // class Entity;
22409 
22417 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
22418 class AgentsSample {
22419 private:
22420 
22421  size_t sample_size = 0u;
22422 
22423  std::vector< Agent<TSeq>* >* agents = nullptr; ///< Pointer to sample of agents
22424  size_t * agents_n = nullptr; ///< Size of sample of agents
22425 
22426  std::vector< size_t >* agents_left = nullptr; ///< Pointer to agents left (iota)
22427  size_t * agents_left_n = nullptr; ///< Size of agents left
22428 
22429  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr; ///< Extracts runif() and (if the case) population.
22430  Entity<TSeq> * entity = nullptr; ///
22431  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
22432 
22433  int sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
22434  std::vector< size_t > states = {};
22435 
22436  void sample_n(size_t n); ///< Backbone function for sampling
22437 
22438 
22439 public:
22440 
22441  // Not available (for now)
22442  AgentsSample() = delete; ///< Default constructor
22443  AgentsSample(const AgentsSample<TSeq> & a) = delete; ///< Copy constructor
22444  AgentsSample(AgentsSample<TSeq> && a) = delete; ///< Move constructor
22445 
22446  AgentsSample(
22447  Model<TSeq> & model_, size_t n,
22448  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22449  bool truncate = false
22450  );
22451 
22452  AgentsSample(
22453  Model<TSeq> * model,
22454  Entity<TSeq> & entity_,
22455  size_t n,
22456  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22457  bool truncate = false
22458  );
22459 
22460  AgentsSample(
22461  Model<TSeq> * model,
22462  Agent<TSeq> & agent_,
22463  size_t n,
22464  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22465  bool truncate = false
22466  );
22467 
22468  ~AgentsSample();
22469 
22470  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
22471  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
22472 
22473  Agent<TSeq> * operator[](size_t n);
22474  Agent<TSeq> * operator()(size_t n);
22475  size_t size() const noexcept;
22476 
22477 };
22478 
22479 template<typename TSeq>
22480 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22481  Model<TSeq> & model_,
22482  size_t n,
22483  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22484  bool truncate
22485  ) {
22486 
22487  states = states_;
22488 
22489  if (truncate)
22490  {
22491 
22492  if (n > model_.size())
22493  n = model_.size();
22494 
22495  } else if (n > model_.size())
22496  throw std::logic_error(
22497  "There are only " + std::to_string(model_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
22498  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
22499 
22500  sample_size = n;
22501  model = &model_;
22502  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::MODEL;
22503 
22504  agents = &model_.sampled_population;
22505  agents_n = &model_.sampled_population_n;
22506 
22507  agents_left = &model_.population_left;
22508  agents_left_n = &model_.population_left_n;
22509 
22510  sample_n(n);
22511 
22512  return;
22513 
22514 }
22515 
22516 template<typename TSeq>
22517 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22518  Model<TSeq> * model,
22519  Entity<TSeq> & entity_,
22520  size_t n,
22521  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22522  bool truncate
22523  ) {
22524 
22525  states = states_;
22526 
22527  if (truncate)
22528  {
22529 
22530  if (n > entity_.size())
22531  n = entity_.size();
22532 
22533  } else if (n > entity_.size())
22534  throw std::logic_error(
22535  "There are only " + std::to_string(entity_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
22536  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
22537 
22538  sample_size = n;
22539  model = &entity_.model;
22540  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY;
22541 
22542  agents = &entity_.sampled_agents;
22543  agents_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_n;
22544 
22545  agents_left = &entity_.sampled_agents_left;
22546  agents_left_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_left_n;
22547 
22548  sample_n(n);
22549 
22550  return;
22551 
22552 }
22553 
22566 template<typename TSeq>
22567 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22568  Model<TSeq> * model,
22569  Agent<TSeq> & agent_,
22570  size_t n,
22571  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22572  bool truncate
22573  )
22574 {
22575 
22576  states = states_;
22577  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
22578 
22579  agent = &agent_;
22580 
22581  agents = &agent_.sampled_agents;
22582  agents_n = &agent_.sampled_agents_n;
22583 
22584  // Computing the cumulative sum of counts across entities
22585  size_t agents_in_entities = 0;
22586  Entities<TSeq> entities_a = agent->get_entities();
22587 
22588  std::vector< size_t > cum_agents_count(entities_a.size(), 0);
22589  int idx = -1;
22590  for (auto & e : entities_a)
22591  {
22592  if (++idx == 0)
22593  cum_agents_count[idx] = (e->size() - 1u);
22594  else
22595  cum_agents_count[idx] = (
22596  (e->size() - 1u) +
22597  cum_agents_count[idx - 1]
22598  );
22599 
22600  agents_in_entities += (e->size() - 1u);
22601  }
22602 
22603  if (truncate)
22604  {
22605 
22606  if (n > agents_in_entities)
22607  n = agents_in_entities;
22608 
22609  } else if (n > agents_in_entities)
22610  throw std::logic_error(
22611  "There are only " + std::to_string(agents_in_entities) +
22612  " agents. You cannot " +
22613  "sample " + std::to_string(n)
22614  );
22615 
22616  sample_size = n;
22617 
22618  if (agents->size() < n)
22619  agents->resize(n);
22620 
22621  size_t i_obs = 0u;
22622  for (size_t i = 0u; i < sample_size; ++i)
22623  {
22624 
22625  // Sampling a single agent from the set of entities
22626  int jth = std::floor(model->runif() * agents_in_entities);
22627  for (size_t e = 0u; e < cum_agents_count.size(); ++e)
22628  {
22629 
22630  // Are we in the limit?
22631  if (jth <= cum_agents_count[e])
22632  {
22633  size_t agent_idx = 0u;
22634  if (e == 0) // From the first group
22635  agent_idx = entities_a[e][jth]->get_id();
22636  else
22637  agent_idx = entities_a[e][jth - cum_agents_count[e - 1]]->get_id();
22638 
22639 
22640  // Checking if states was specified
22641  if (states.size())
22642  {
22643 
22644  // Getting the state
22645  size_t state = model->population[agent_idx].get_state();
22646 
22647  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), state) != states.end())
22648  continue;
22649 
22650  }
22651 
22652  agents->operator[](i_obs++) = &(model->population[agent_idx]);
22653 
22654  break;
22655  }
22656 
22657  }
22658  }
22659 
22660  return;
22661 
22662 }
22663 
22664 template<typename TSeq>
22665 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::~AgentsSample() {}
22666 
22667 template<typename TSeq>
22668 inline size_t AgentsSample<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
22669 {
22670  return this->sample_size;
22671 }
22672 
22673 template<typename TSeq>
22674 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
22675 {
22676 
22677  return agents->operator[](i);
22678 
22679 }
22680 
22681 template<typename TSeq>
22682 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
22683 {
22684 
22685  if (i >= this->sample_size)
22686  throw std::range_error("The requested agent is out of range.");
22687 
22688  return agents->operator[](i);
22689 
22690 }
22691 
22692 template<typename TSeq>
22693 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::begin()
22694 {
22695 
22696  if (sample_size > 0u)
22697  return agents->begin();
22698  else
22699  return agents->end();
22700 
22701 }
22702 
22703 template<typename TSeq>
22704 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::end()
22705 {
22706 
22707  return agents->begin() + sample_size;
22708 
22709 }
22710 
22711 template<typename TSeq>
22712 inline void AgentsSample<TSeq>::sample_n(size_t n)
22713 {
22714 
22715  // Reducing size
22716  if (states.size())
22717  {
22718 
22719  // Getting the number of agents left
22720  agents_left->clear();
22721 
22722  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22723  {
22724 
22725  // Making some room
22726  agents_left->reserve(model->size());
22727 
22728  // Iterating through the agents in the population
22729  for (size_t a_i = 0u; a_i < model->population.size(); ++a_i)
22730  {
22731 
22732  // If the agent is within the selected set of states,
22733  // then we add it to the list of agents left
22734  size_t s = model->population[a_i].get_state();
22735  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), s) != states.end())
22736  agents_left->push_back(a_i);
22737 
22738  }
22739 
22740  }
22741  else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY)
22742  {
22743 
22744  // Making room
22745  agents_left->reserve(entity->size());
22746 
22747  // Iterating through the agents in the entity
22748  for (size_t a_i = 0u; a_i < entity->size(); ++a_i)
22749  {
22750  size_t s = model->population[entity->agents[a_i]].get_state();
22751  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), s) != states.end())
22752  agents_left->push_back(a_i);
22753 
22754  }
22755 
22756  }
22757 
22758  } else {
22759 
22760  // Checking if the size of the entity has changed (or hasn't been initialized)
22761  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22762  {
22763 
22764  if (model->size() != agents_left->size())
22765  {
22766  agents_left->resize(model->size(), 0u);
22767  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
22768  }
22769 
22770  } else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY) {
22771 
22772  if (entity->size() != agents_left->size())
22773  {
22774 
22775  agents_left->resize(entity->size(), 0u);
22776  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
22777 
22778  }
22779 
22780  }
22781 
22782  }
22783 
22784  // Restart the counter of agents left
22785  *agents_left_n = agents_left->size();
22786 
22787  // Making sure we have enough room for the sample of agents
22788  if (agents->size() < sample_size)
22789  agents->resize(sample_size, nullptr);
22790 
22791  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22792  {
22793 
22794  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
22795  std::vector< bool > __sampled(model->size(), true);
22796  for (auto & a_i: *agents_left)
22797  __sampled[a_i] = false;
22798  #endif
22799 
22800  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
22801  {
22802 
22803  // Sampling from 0 to (agents_left_n - 1)
22804  size_t ith_ = static_cast<size_t>(model->runif() * ((*agents_left_n)--));
22805 
22806  // Getting the id of the agent and adding it to the list of agents
22807  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](ith_);
22808  agents->operator[](i) = &model->population[ith];
22809 
22810  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
22811  if (__sampled[ith])
22812  throw std::logic_error("The same agent was sampled twice.");
22813  else
22814  __sampled[ith] = true;
22815  #endif
22816 
22817  // Updating list
22818  std::swap(
22819  agents_left->operator[](ith_),
22820  agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n)
22821  );
22822 
22823  }
22824 
22825 
22826  }
22827  else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY)
22828  {
22829 
22830  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
22831  std::vector< bool > __sampled(entity->size(), true);
22832  for (auto & a_i: *agents_left)
22833  __sampled[a_i] = false;
22834  #endif
22835 
22836  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
22837  {
22838 
22839  size_t ith_ = static_cast<size_t>(model->runif() * ((*agents_left_n)--));
22840  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](ith_);
22841  agents->operator[](i) = &model->population[entity->agents[ith]];
22842 
22843  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
22844  if (__sampled[ith])
22845  throw std::logic_error("The same agent was sampled twice.");
22846  else
22847  __sampled[ith] = true;
22848  #endif
22849 
22850  // Updating list
22851  std::swap(agents_left->operator[](ith_), agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n));
22852 
22853  }
22854 
22855  }
22856 
22857  return;
22858 
22859 }
22860 
22861 #endif
22862 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22864 
22865  End of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
22866 
22869 
22870 
22871 
22872 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22874 
22875  Start of -include/epiworld/models/models.hpp-
22876 
22879 
22880 
22881 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
22882 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
22883 
22884 namespace epimodels {
22885 
22886 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22888 
22889  Start of -include/epiworld//models/init-functions.hpp-
22890 
22893 
22894 
22895 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_INIT_FUNCTIONS_HPP
22896 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_INIT_FUNCTIONS_HPP
22897 
22902 template<typename TSeq>
22903 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_sir(
22904  std::vector< double > proportions_
22905 ) {
22906 
22907  // Checking widths
22908  if (proportions_.size() != 1u)
22909  throw std::invalid_argument(
22910  "The vector of proportions must have a single element."
22911  );
22912 
22913  // Proportion should be within [0, 1]
22914  if ((proportions_[0] < 0.0) || (proportions_[0] > 1.0))
22915  throw std::invalid_argument(
22916  "The proportion must be within (0, 1)."
22917  );
22918 
22919  double prop = proportions_[0u];
22920 
22921  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
22922  [prop] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
22923 
22924  // Figuring out information about the viruses
22925  double tot = 0.0;
22926  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
22927  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
22928  {
22929  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
22930  tot += 1.0;
22931  }
22932  tot /= n;
22933 
22934  // Putting the total into context
22935  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
22936 
22937  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
22938  // we only need to change recovered
22939  size_t nrecovered = prop * tot_left * n;
22940 
22941  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample(
22942  *model,
22943  nrecovered,
22944  {0u},
22945  true
22946  );
22947 
22948  // Setting up the initial states
22949  for (auto & agent : sample)
22950  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
22951 
22952  // Running the events
22953  model->events_run();
22954 
22955  return;
22956 
22957  };
22958 
22959  return fun;
22960 
22961 }
22962 
22967 template<typename TSeq>
22968 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_sird(
22969  std::vector< double > prop
22970 ) {
22971 
22972  // Check length of prop equals two
22973  if (prop.size() != 2u)
22974  throw std::invalid_argument(
22975  "The vector of proportions must have two elements."
22976  );
22977 
22978  // Check elements in prop are within [0, 1] and sum up to 1
22979  double tot = 0.0;
22980  for (auto & v : prop)
22981  {
22982  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
22983  throw std::invalid_argument(
22984  "The proportion must be within (0, 1)."
22985  );
22986  tot += v;
22987  }
22988 
22989  if (tot >= 1.0)
22990  throw std::invalid_argument(
22991  "The proportions must sum up to 1."
22992  );
22993 
22994  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
22995  [prop] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
22996 
22997  // Figuring out information about the viruses
22998  double tot = 0.0;
22999  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23000  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23001  {
23002  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23003  tot += 1.0;
23004  }
23005  tot /= n;
23006 
23007  // Putting the total into context
23008  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23009 
23010  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23011  // we only need to change recovered
23012  size_t nrecovered = prop[0u] * tot_left * n;
23013  size_t ndeceased = prop[01] * tot_left * n;
23014 
23015  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_recover(
23016  *model,
23017  nrecovered,
23018  {0u},
23019  true
23020  );
23021 
23022  // Setting up the initial states
23023  for (auto & agent : sample_recover)
23024  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23025 
23026  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_deceased(
23027  *model,
23028  ndeceased,
23029  {0u},
23030  true
23031  );
23032 
23033  // Setting up the initial states
23034  for (auto & agent : sample_deceased)
23035  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23036 
23037  // Running the events
23038  model->events_run();
23039 
23040  return;
23041 
23042  };
23043 
23044  return fun;
23045 
23046 }
23047 
23048 
23053 template<typename TSeq>
23054 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_seir(
23055  std::vector< double > proportions_
23056 ) {
23057 
23058  // Checking widths
23059  if (proportions_.size() != 2u) {
23060  throw std::invalid_argument("-proportions_- must have two entries.");
23061  }
23062 
23063  // proportions_ are values between 0 and 1, otherwise error
23064  for (auto & v : proportions_)
23065  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
23066  throw std::invalid_argument(
23067  "-proportions_- must have values between 0 and 1."
23068  );
23069 
23070 
23071  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23072  [proportions_] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23073 
23074  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23075  double tot = 0.0;
23076  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23077  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23078  {
23079  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23080  tot += 1.0;
23081  }
23082  tot /= n;
23083 
23084  // Putting the total into context
23085  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23086 
23087  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23088  // we only need to change recovered
23089  size_t nexposed = proportions_[0u] * tot * n;
23090  size_t nrecovered = proportions_[1u] * tot_left * n;
23091 
23092  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_suscept(
23093  *model,
23094  nrecovered,
23095  {0u},
23096  true
23097  );
23098 
23099  // Setting up the initial states
23100  for (auto & agent : sample_suscept)
23101  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23102 
23103  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_exposed(
23104  *model,
23105  nexposed,
23106  {1u},
23107  true
23108  );
23109 
23110  // Setting up the initial states
23111  for (auto & agent : sample_exposed)
23112  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23113 
23114  // Running the events
23115  model->events_run();
23116 
23117  return;
23118 
23119  };
23120 
23121  return fun;
23122 
23123 }
23124 
23129 template<typename TSeq>
23130 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_seird(
23131  std::vector< double > proportions_
23132 ) {
23133 
23134  // Checking widths
23135  if (proportions_.size() != 3u) {
23136  throw std::invalid_argument("-proportions_- must have three entries.");
23137  }
23138 
23139  // proportions_ are values between 0 and 1, otherwise error
23140  for (auto & v : proportions_)
23141  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
23142  throw std::invalid_argument(
23143  "-proportions_- must have values between 0 and 1."
23144  );
23145 
23146  // Last first two terms shouldn't add up to more than 1
23147  if ((proportions_[1u] + proportions_[2u]) > 1.0)
23148  throw std::invalid_argument(
23149  "The last two terms of -proportions_- must add up to less than 1."
23150  );
23151 
23152  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23153  [proportions_] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23154 
23155  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23156  double tot = 0.0;
23157  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23158 
23159  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23160  {
23161  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23162  tot += 1.0;
23163  }
23164  tot /= n;
23165 
23166  // Putting the total into context
23167  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23168 
23169  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23170  // we only need to change recovered
23171  size_t nexposed = proportions_[0u] * tot * n;
23172  size_t nrecovered = proportions_[1u] * tot_left * n;
23173  size_t ndeceased = proportions_[2u] * tot_left * n;
23174 
23175  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_suscept(
23176  *model,
23177  nrecovered,
23178  {0u},
23179  true
23180  );
23181 
23182  // Setting up the initial states
23183  for (auto & agent : sample_suscept)
23184  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23185 
23186  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_exposed(
23187  *model,
23188  nexposed,
23189  {1u},
23190  true
23191  );
23192 
23193  // Setting up the initial states
23194  for (auto & agent : sample_exposed)
23195  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23196 
23197  // Running the events
23198  model->events_run();
23199 
23200  // Setting the initial states for the deceased
23201  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_deceased(
23202  *model,
23203  ndeceased,
23204  {0u},
23205  true
23206  );
23207 
23208  // Setting up the initial states
23209  for (auto & agent : sample_deceased)
23210  agent->change_state(model, 4, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23211 
23212  // Running the events
23213  model->events_run();
23214 
23215  return;
23216 
23217  };
23218 
23219  return fun;
23220 
23221 }
23222 
23223 
23224 #endif
23225 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23227 
23228  End of -include/epiworld//models/init-functions.hpp-
23229 
23232 
23233 
23234 
23235 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23237 
23238  Start of -include/epiworld//models/globalevents.hpp-
23239 
23242 
23243 
23244 #ifndef EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENTS_HPP
23245 #define EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENTS_HPP
23246 
23247 // This function creates a global action that distributes a tool
23248 // to agents with probability p.
23257 template<typename TSeq>
23258 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_tool(
23259  Tool<TSeq> & tool,
23260  double p
23261 ) {
23262 
23263  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [p,&tool](
23264  Model<TSeq> * model
23265  ) -> void {
23266 
23267  for (auto & agent : model->get_agents())
23268  {
23269 
23270  // Check if the agent has the tool
23271  if (agent.has_tool(tool))
23272  continue;
23273 
23274  // Adding the tool
23275  if (model->runif() < p)
23276  agent.add_tool(tool, model);
23277 
23278 
23279  }
23280 
23281  #ifdef EPIWORLD_DEBUG
23282  tool.print();
23283  #endif
23284 
23285  return;
23286 
23287 
23288  };
23289 
23290  return fun;
23291 
23292 }
23293 
23294 // Same function as above, but p is now a function of a vector of coefficients
23295 // and a vector of variables.
23306 template<typename TSeq>
23307 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_tool_logit(
23308  Tool<TSeq> & tool,
23309  std::vector< size_t > vars,
23310  std::vector< double > coefs
23311 ) {
23312 
23313  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [coefs,vars,&tool](
23314  Model<TSeq> * model
23315  ) -> void {
23316 
23317  for (auto & agent : model->get_agents())
23318  {
23319 
23320  // Check if the agent has the tool
23321  if (agent.has_tool(tool))
23322  continue;
23323 
23324  // Computing the probability using a logit. Uses OpenMP reduction
23325  // to sum the coefficients.
23326  double p = 0.0;
23327  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
23328  #pragma omp parallel for reduction(+:p)
23329  #endif
23330  for (size_t i = 0u; i < coefs.size(); ++i)
23331  p += coefs.at(i) * agent(vars[i]);
23332 
23333  p = 1.0 / (1.0 + std::exp(-p));
23334 
23335  // Adding the tool
23336  if (model->runif() < p)
23337  agent.add_tool(tool, model);
23338 
23339 
23340  }
23341 
23342  #ifdef EPIWORLD_DEBUG
23343  tool.print();
23344  #endif
23345 
23346  return;
23347 
23348 
23349  };
23350 
23351  return fun;
23352 
23353 }
23354 
23355 // A global action that updates a parameter in the model.
23364 template<typename TSeq>
23365 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_set_param(
23366  std::string param,
23367  double value
23368 ) {
23369 
23370  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [value,param](
23371  Model<TSeq> * model
23372  ) -> void {
23373 
23374  model->set_param(param, value);
23375 
23376  return;
23377 
23378 
23379  };
23380 
23381  return fun;
23382 
23383 }
23384 #endif
23385 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23387 
23388  End of -include/epiworld//models/globalevents.hpp-
23389 
23392 
23393

23396 
23397  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sis.hpp-
23398

23404 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIS_HPP
23405 
23414 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23415 class ModelSIS : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
23416 {
23417 
23418 public:
23419 
23420  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
23421  static const int INFECTED = 1;
23422 
23423  ModelSIS() {};
23424 
23425  ModelSIS(
23426  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
23427  const std::string & vname,
23428  epiworld_double prevalence,
23429  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23430  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23431  );
23432 
23433  ModelSIS(
23434  const std::string & vname,
23435  epiworld_double prevalence,
23436  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23437  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23438  );
23439 
23440 };
23441 
23442 template<typename TSeq>
23443 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
23444  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
23445  const std::string & vname,
23446  epiworld_double prevalence,
23447  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23448  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23449  )
23450 {
23451 
23452  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible (SIS)");
23453 
23454  // Adding statuses
23455  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23456  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
23457 
23458  // Setting up parameters
23459  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23460  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23461 
23462  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23463  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23464  virus.set_state(ModelSIS<TSeq>::INFECTED, ModelSIS<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE, ModelSIS<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE);
23465 
23466  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23467  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23468  virus.set_prob_death(0.0);
23469 
23470  model.add_virus(virus);
23471 
23472  return;
23473 
23474 }
23475

23477 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
23478  const std::string & vname,
23479  epiworld_double prevalence,
23480  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23481  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23482  )
23483 {
23484 
23485  ModelSIS<TSeq>(
23486  *this,
23487  vname,
23488  prevalence,
23489  transmission_rate,
23490  recovery_rate
23491  );
23492 
23493  return;

23495 }

23548  );

23562 template<typename TSeq>
23563 inline ModelSIR<TSeq>::ModelSIR(
23564  ModelSIR<TSeq> & model,
23565  const std::string & vname,
23566  epiworld_double prevalence,
23567  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23568  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23569  )
23570 {
23571 
23572  // Adding statuses
23573  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23574  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
23575  model.add_state("Recovered");
23576 
23577  // Setting up parameters
23578  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23579  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23580 
23581  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23582  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23583  virus.set_state(1,2,2);
23584 
23585  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23586  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23587 
23588  model.add_virus(virus);
23589 
23590  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Recovered (SIR)");
23591 
23592  return;
23593 
23594 }

23617 template<typename TSeq>

23621 ) {

23624  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)

23641 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23643 
23644  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seir.hpp-
23645 
23648 
23649 
23650 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
23651 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
23652 
23663 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23664 class ModelSEIR : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
23665 {
23666 
23667 public:
23668  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
23669  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
23670  static const int INFECTED = 2;
23671  static const int REMOVED = 3;
23672 
23673  ModelSEIR() {};
23674 
23675  ModelSEIR(
23676  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
23677  const std::string & vname,
23678  epiworld_double prevalence,
23679  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23680  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23681  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23682  );
23683 
23684  ModelSEIR(
23685  const std::string & vname,
23686  epiworld_double prevalence,
23687  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23688  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23689  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23690  );
23691 
23692  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_seir = [](
23693  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
23694  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
23695  ) -> void {
23696 
23697  // Getting the virus
23698  auto v = p->get_virus();
23699 
23700  // Does the agent become infected?
23701  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
23702  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::INFECTED);
23703 
23704  return;
23705  };
23706 
23707 
23708  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected_seir = [](
23709  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
23710  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
23711  ) -> void {
23712  // Does the agent recover?
23713  if (m->runif() < (m->par("Recovery rate")))
23714  p->rm_virus(m);
23715 
23716  return;
23717  };
23718 
23725  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & initial_states(
23726  std::vector< double > proportions_,
23727  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
23728  );
23729 
23730 };
23731 
23732 
23733 template<typename TSeq>
23734 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
23735  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
23736  const std::string & vname,
23737  epiworld_double prevalence,
23738  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23739  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23740  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23741  )
23742 {
23743 
23744  // Adding statuses
23745  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23746  model.add_state("Exposed", model.update_exposed_seir);
23747  model.add_state("Infected", model.update_infected_seir);
23748  model.add_state("Removed");
23749 
23750  // Setting up parameters
23751  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23752  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Incubation days");
23753  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23754 
23755  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23756  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23757  virus.set_state(ModelSEIR<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED);
23758 
23759  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23760  virus.set_incubation(&model("Incubation days"));
23761  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23762 
23763  // Adding the tool and the virus
23764  model.add_virus(virus);
23765 
23766  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR)");
23767 
23768  return;
23769 
23770 }
23771 
23772 template<typename TSeq>
23773 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
23774  const std::string & vname,
23775  epiworld_double prevalence,
23776  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23777  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23778  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23779  )
23780 {
23781 
23782  ModelSEIR<TSeq>(
23783  *this,
23784  vname,
23785  prevalence,
23786  transmission_rate,
23787  avg_incubation_days,
23788  recovery_rate
23789  );
23790 
23791  return;
23792 
23793 }
23794 
23795 template<typename TSeq>
23796 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq> & ModelSEIR<TSeq>::initial_states(
23797  std::vector< double > proportions_,
23798  std::vector< int > /**/
23799 ) {
23800 
23801  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
23802  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
23803  ;
23804 
23805  return *this;
23806 
23807 }

23819 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
