23822  Start of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
23823 
23826 
23827 
23828 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
23829 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
23830 
23831 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23832 class ModelSURV : public epiworld::Model<TSeq> {
23833 
23834 private:
23835  // state
23836  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
23837  static const int LATENT = 1;
23838  static const int SYMPTOMATIC = 2;
23839  static const int SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 3; // sampled and discovered
23840  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC = 4;
23841  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 5;
23842  static const int RECOVERED = 6;
23843  static const int REMOVED = 7;
23844 
23845 public:
23846 
23851  std::vector< epiworld_double > days_latent_and_infectious;
23852 
23894  ModelSURV() {};
23895 
23896  ModelSURV(
23897  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
23898  const std::string & vname,
23899  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
23900  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
23901  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
23902  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
23903  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
23904  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
23905  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
23906  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
23907  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
23908  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
23909  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
23910  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
23911  );
23912 
23913  ModelSURV(
23914  const std::string & vname,
23915  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
23916  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
23917  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
23918  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
23919  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
23920  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
23921  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
23922  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
23923  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
23924  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
23925  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
23926  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
23927  );
23929 
23930  void reset();
23931 
23932 };
23933 
23934 template<typename TSeq>
23935 inline void ModelSURV<TSeq>::reset()
23936 {
23937  epiworld::Model<TSeq>::reset();
23938 
23939  days_latent_and_infectious.clear();
23940  days_latent_and_infectious.resize(
23941  2u * epiworld::Model<TSeq>::size(),
23942  -1.0
23943  );
23944 }
23945 
23946 template<typename TSeq>
23947 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
23948  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
23949  const std::string & vname,
23950  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
23951  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
23952  epiworld_double latent_period,
23953  epiworld_double infect_period,
23954  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
23955  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
23956  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
23957  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
23958  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
23959  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
23960  epiworld_double prob_death,
23961  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
23962  )
23963 {
23964 
23965  EPI_NEW_UPDATEFUN_LAMBDA(surveillance_update_susceptible, TSeq) {
23966 
23967  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
23968  epiworld_fast_uint nviruses_tmp = 0u;
23969  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
23970  {
23971 
23972  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
23973 
23974  if (v == nullptr)
23975  continue;
23976 
23977  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
23978  epiworld_double tmp_transmission =
23979  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
23980  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
23981  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
23982  ;
23983 
23984  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] = tmp_transmission;
23985  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
23986  }
23987 
23988  // No virus to compute on
23989  if (nviruses_tmp == 0)
23990  return;
23991 
23992  // Running the roulette
23993  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
23994 
23995  if (which < 0)
23996  return;
23997 
23998  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
23999  return;
24000 
24001  };
24002 
24003 
24004  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> surveillance_update_exposed =
24005  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
24006  {
24007 
24008  // Dynamically getting the ModelSURV
24009  ModelSURV<TSeq> * model_surv = dynamic_cast<ModelSURV<TSeq> *>(m);
24010 
24011  epiworld::VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = p->get_virus();
24012  epiworld_double p_die = v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
24013 
24014  epiworld_fast_uint days_since_exposed = m->today() - v->get_date();
24015  epiworld_fast_uint state = p->get_state();
24016 
24017  // Figuring out latent period
24018  auto & dat = model_surv->days_latent_and_infectious;
24019  if (dat[p->get_id()] < 0)
24020  {
24021  epiworld_double latent_days = m->rgamma(
24022  m->par("Latent period"), 1.0
24023  );
24024 
24025  dat[p->get_id() * 2u] = latent_days;
24026 
24027  dat[p->get_id() * 2u + 1u] =
24028  m->rgamma(m->par("Infect period"), 1.0) +
24029  latent_days;
24030  }
24031 
24032  // If still latent, nothing happens
24033  if (days_since_exposed <= dat[p->get_id() * 2u])
24034  return;
24035 
24036  // If past days infected + latent, then bye.
24037  if (days_since_exposed >= dat[p->get_id() * 2u + 1u])
24038  {
24039  p->rm_virus(m);
24040  return;
24041  }
24042 
24043  // If it is infected, then it can be asymptomatic or symptomatic
24044  if (state == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
24045  {
24046 
24047  // Will be symptomatic?
24048  if (EPI_RUNIF() < m->par("Prob of symptoms"))
24049  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC);
24050  else
24051  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC);
24052 
24053  return;
24054 
24055  }
24056 
24057  // Otherwise, it can be removed
24058  if (EPI_RUNIF() < p_die)
24059  {
24060  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::REMOVED, -1);
24061  return;
24062  }
24063 
24064  return;
24065 
24066  };
24067 
24068  std::vector< unsigned int > exposed_state = {
24069  SYMPTOMATIC,
24070  SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
24071  ASYMPTOMATIC,
24072  ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
24073  LATENT
24074  };
24075 
24076  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> surveillance_program =
24077  [exposed_state](
24078  epiworld::Model<TSeq>* m
24079  ) -> void
24080  {
24081 
24082  // How many will we find
24083  std::binomial_distribution<> bdist(m->size(), m->par("Surveilance prob."));
24084  int nsampled = bdist(*m->get_rand_endgine());
24085 
24086  int to_go = nsampled + 1;
24087 
24088  epiworld_double ndetected = 0.0;
24089  epiworld_double ndetected_asympt = 0.0;
24090 
24091  auto & pop = m->get_agents();
24092  std::vector< bool > sampled(m->size(), false);
24093 
24094  while (to_go-- > 0)
24095  {
24096 
24097  // Who is the lucky one
24098  epiworld_fast_uint i = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(std::floor(EPI_RUNIF() * m->size()));
24099 
24100  if (sampled[i])
24101  continue;
24102 
24103  sampled[i] = true;
24104  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p = &pop[i];
24105 
24106  // If still exposed for the next term
24107  if (epiworld::IN(p->get_state(), exposed_state ))
24108  {
24109 
24110  ndetected += 1.0;
24111  if (p->get_state() == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC)
24112  {
24113  ndetected_asympt += 1.0;
24114  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
24115  }
24116  else
24117  {
24118  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
24119  }
24120 
24121  }
24122 
24123  }
24124 
24125  // Writing the user data
24126  std::vector< int > totals;
24127  m->get_db().get_today_total(nullptr,&totals);
24128  m->add_user_data(
24129  {
24130  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nsampled),
24131  ndetected,
24132  ndetected_asympt,
24133  static_cast<epiworld_double>(totals[ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC])
24134  }
24135  );
24136 
24137 
24138  };
24139 
24140  model.add_state("Susceptible", surveillance_update_susceptible);
24141  model.add_state("Latent", surveillance_update_exposed);
24142  model.add_state("Symptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
24143  model.add_state("Symptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
24144  model.add_state("Asymptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
24145  model.add_state("Asymptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
24146  model.add_state("Recovered");
24147  model.add_state("Removed");
24148 
24149  // General model parameters
24150  model.add_param(latent_period, "Latent period");
24151  model.add_param(infect_period, "Infect period");
24152  model.add_param(prob_symptoms, "Prob of symptoms");
24153  model.add_param(surveillance_prob, "Surveilance prob.");
24154  model.add_param(efficacy_vax, "Vax efficacy");
24155  model.add_param(prop_vax_redux_transm, "Vax redux transmission");
24156  model.add_param(prob_transmission, "Prob of transmission");
24157  model.add_param(prob_death, "Prob. death");
24158  model.add_param(prob_noreinfect, "Prob. no reinfect");
24159 
24160  // Virus ------------------------------------------------------------------
24161  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> covid("Covid19", prevalence, false);
24162  covid.set_state(LATENT, RECOVERED, REMOVED);
24163  covid.set_post_immunity(&model("Prob. no reinfect"));
24164  covid.set_prob_death(&model("Prob. death"));
24165 
24166  epiworld::VirusFun<TSeq> ptransmitfun = [](
24167  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
24168  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> &,
24169  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24170  ) -> epiworld_double
24171  {
24172  // No chance of infecting
24173  epiworld_fast_uint s = p->get_state();
24174  if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
24175  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24176  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
24177  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24178  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
24179  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24180 
24181  // Otherwise
24182  return m->par("Prob of transmission");
24183  };
24184 
24185  covid.set_prob_infecting_fun(ptransmitfun);
24186 
24187  model.add_virus(covid);
24188 
24189  model.set_user_data({"nsampled", "ndetected", "ndetected_asympt", "nasymptomatic"});
24190  model.add_globalevent(surveillance_program, "Surveilance program", -1);
24191 
24192  // Vaccine tool -----------------------------------------------------------
24193  epiworld::Tool<TSeq> vax("Vaccine", prop_vaccinated, true);
24194  vax.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
24195  vax.set_transmission_reduction(&model("Vax redux transmission"));
24196 
24197  model.add_tool(vax);
24198 
24199  model.set_name("Surveillance");
24200 
24201  return;
24202 
24203 }
24204 
24205 template<typename TSeq>
24206 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
24207  const std::string & vname,
24208  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
24209  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
24210  epiworld_double latent_period,
24211  epiworld_double infect_period,
24212  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
24213  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
24214  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
24215  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
24216  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
24217  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
24218  epiworld_double prob_death,
24219  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
24220  )
24221 {
24222 
24223  ModelSURV(
24224  *this,
24225  vname,
24226  prevalence,
24227  efficacy_vax,
24228  latent_period,
24229  infect_period,
24230  prob_symptoms,
24231  prop_vaccinated,
24232  prop_vax_redux_transm,
24233  prop_vax_redux_infect,
24234  surveillance_prob,
24235  prob_transmission,
24236  prob_death,
24237  prob_noreinfect
24238  );
24239 
24240  return;
24241 
24242 }
24243 
24244 #endif
24245 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24247 
24248  End of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
24249 
24252 
24253 
24254 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24256 
24257  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
24258 
24261 
24262 
24263 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
24264 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
24265 
24266 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
24267 class ModelSIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
24268 {
24269 
24270 private:
24271 
24272  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
24273  void update_infected();
24274 
24275 public:
24276 
24277  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
24278  static const int INFECTED = 1;
24279  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
24280 
24281 
24282  ModelSIRCONN() {};
24283 
24284  ModelSIRCONN(
24285  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24286  const std::string & vname,
24287  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24288  epiworld_double prevalence,
24289  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24290  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24291  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24292  );
24293 
24294  ModelSIRCONN(
24295  const std::string & vname,
24296  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24297  epiworld_double prevalence,
24298  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24299  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24300  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24301  );
24302 
24303  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & run(
24304  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24305  int seed = -1
24306  );
24307 
24308  void reset();
24309 
24310  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
24311 
24317  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
24318  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24319  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
24320  );
24321 
24326  size_t get_n_infected() const
24327  {
24328  return infected.size();
24329  }
24330 
24331  /***
24332  * @brief Compute expected generation time
24333  * @param max_days Maximum number of days.
24334  * @param max_contacts Maximum number of contacts.
24335  */
24336  std::vector< double > generation_time_expected(
24337  int max_days = 200,
24338  int max_contacts = 200
24339  ) const;
24340 
24341 };
24342 
24343 template<typename TSeq>
24344 inline void ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
24345 {
24346 
24347  infected.clear();
24348  infected.reserve(this->size());
24349 
24350  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
24351  {
24352  if (p.get_state() == ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24353  {
24354  infected.push_back(&p);
24355  }
24356  }
24357 
24358  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
24359  this->get_n_infected(),
24360  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
24361  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
24362  );
24363 
24364  return;
24365 
24366 }
24367 
24368 template<typename TSeq>
24369 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::run(
24370  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24371  int seed
24372 )
24373 {
24374 
24375  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
24376  return *this;
24377 
24378 }
24379 
24380 template<typename TSeq>
24381 inline void ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::reset()
24382 {
24383 
24384  Model<TSeq>::reset();
24385 
24386  this->update_infected();
24387 
24388  return;
24389 
24390 }
24391 
24392 template<typename TSeq>
24393 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
24394 {
24395 
24396  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>(
24397  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
24398  );
24399 
24400  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
24401 
24402 }
24403 
24414 template<typename TSeq>
24415 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
24416  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24417  const std::string & vname,
24418  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24419  epiworld_double prevalence,
24420  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24421  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24422  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24423  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
24424  )
24425 {
24426 
24427  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
24428  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24429  ) -> void
24430  {
24431 
24432  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
24433 
24434  if (ndraw == 0)
24435  return;
24436 
24437  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
24438  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
24439 
24440  // Drawing from the set
24441  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
24442  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
24443  {
24444  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
24445  int which = static_cast<int>(
24446  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
24447  );
24448 
24449  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
24450  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
24451  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
24452  * And the reported bug in GCC:
24453  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
24454  *
24455  */
24456  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
24457  --which;
24458 
24459  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
24460 
24461  // Can't sample itself
24462  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
24463  continue;
24464 
24465  // The neighbor is infected because it is on the list!
24466  if (neighbor.get_virus() == nullptr)
24467  continue;
24468 
24469  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
24470 
24471  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24472  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
24473  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
24474  #endif
24475 
24476  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
24477  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
24478  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
24479  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
24480  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
24481  ;
24482 
24483  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
24484 
24485  }
24486 
24487  // No virus to compute
24488  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
24489  return;
24490 
24491  // Running the roulette
24492  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
24493 
24494  if (which < 0)
24495  return;
24496 
24497  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
24498 
24499  return;
24500 
24501  };
24502 
24503 
24504  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
24505  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24506  ) -> void {
24507 
24508  auto state = p->get_state();
24509 
24510  if (state == ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24511  {
24512 
24513 
24514  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
24515  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
24516  // Recover
24517  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
24518  1.0 - (1.0 - p->get_virus()->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
24519  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(p->get_virus(), m));
24520 
24521  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24522  if (n_events == 0u)
24523  {
24524  printf_epiworld(
24525  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
24526  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
24527  );
24528  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
24529  }
24530  #else
24531  if (n_events == 0u)
24532  return;
24533  #endif
24534 
24535 
24536  // Running the roulette
24537  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
24538 
24539  if (which < 0)
24540  return;
24541 
24542  // Which roulette happen?
24543  p->rm_virus(m);
24544 
24545  return ;
24546 
24547  } else
24548  throw std::logic_error(
24549  "This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)"
24550  ) ;
24551 
24552  return;
24553 
24554  };
24555 
24556  // state
24557  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
24558  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
24559  model.add_state("Recovered");
24560 
24561  // Setting up parameters
24562  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
24563  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
24564  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
24565  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
24566 
24567  // Adding update function
24568  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
24569  {
24570  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
24571  model->update_infected();
24572 
24573  return;
24574  };
24575 
24576  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
24577 
24578  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
24579  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
24580  virus.set_state(1, 2, 2);
24581  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
24582  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
24583 
24584  model.add_virus(virus);
24585 
24586  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
24587 
24588  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
24589 
24590  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) (connected)");
24591 
24592  return;
24593 
24594 }
24595 
24596 template<typename TSeq>
24597 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
24598  const std::string & vname,
24599  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24600  epiworld_double prevalence,
24601  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24602  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24603  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24604  )
24605 {
24606 
24607  ModelSIRCONN(
24608  *this,
24609  vname,
24610  n,
24611  prevalence,
24612  contact_rate,
24613  transmission_rate,
24614  recovery_rate
24615  );
24616 
24617  return;
24618 
24619 }
24620 
24621 template<typename TSeq>
24622 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
24623  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24624  std::vector< int >
24625 ) {
24626 
24627  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
24628  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)
24629  ;
24630 
24631  return *this;
24632 
24633 }
24634 
24635 template<typename TSeq>
24636 inline std::vector< double > ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::generation_time_expected(
24637  int max_days,
24638  int max_contacts
24639 ) const
24640 {
24641 
24642  // Retrieving total counts
24643  std::vector< int > h_date;
24644  std::vector< std::string > h_state;
24645  std::vector< int > h_counts;
24646  const auto this_const = dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(this);
24647  this_const->get_db().get_hist_total(
24648  &h_date,
24649  &h_state,
24650  &h_counts
24651  );
24652 
24653  // Retrieving information on susceptibles
24654  std::vector< double > S(this_const->get_ndays(), 0.0);
24655  for (size_t i = 0; i < h_date.size(); ++i)
24656  {
24657  if (h_state[i] == "Susceptible")
24658  S[h_date[i]] += h_counts[i];
24659  }
24660 
24661  // The generation time in the SIR model starts from 1, as agents
24662  // spend at least one day in the infected state before starting
24663  // transmitting.
24664  std::vector< double > gen_times(this_const->get_ndays(), 1.0);
24665  double p_c = this_const->par("Contact rate")/this_const->size();
24666  double p_i = this_const->par("Transmission rate");
24667  double p_r = this_const->par("Recovery rate");
24668  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this_const->get_ndays(); ++i)
24669  {
24670  gen_times[i] = gen_int_mean(
24671  S[i],
24672  p_c,
24673  p_i,
24674  p_r,
24675  max_days,
24676  max_contacts
24677  );
24678 
24679  }
24680 
24681  return gen_times;
24682 
24683 }
24684 
24685 #endif
24686 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24688 
24689  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
24690 
24693 
24694 
24695 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24697 
24698  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
24699 
24702 
24703 
24704 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
24705 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
24706 
24707 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
24708 class ModelSEIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
24709 {
24710 private:
24711  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
24712  void update_infected();
24713 
24714 public:
24715 
24716  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
24717  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
24718  static const int INFECTED = 2;
24719  static const int RECOVERED = 3;
24720 
24721 
24722  ModelSEIRCONN() {};
24723 
24724  ModelSEIRCONN(
24725  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24726  const std::string & vname,
24727  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24728  epiworld_double prevalence,
24729  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24730  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24731  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
24732  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24733  );
24734 
24735  ModelSEIRCONN(
24736  const std::string & vname,
24737  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24738  epiworld_double prevalence,
24739  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24740  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24741  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
24742  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24743  );
24744 
24745  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & run(
24746  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24747  int seed = -1
24748  );
24749 
24750  void reset();
24751 
24752  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
24753 
24759  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
24760  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24761  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
24762  );
24763 
24764  size_t get_n_infected() const { return infected.size(); }
24765 
24766  /***
24767  * @brief Compute expected generation time
24768  * @param max_days Maximum number of days.
24769  * @param max_contacts Maximum number of contacts.
24770  */
24771  std::vector< double > generation_time_expected(
24772  int max_days = 200,
24773  int max_contacts = 200
24774  ) const;
24775 
24776 };
24777 
24778 template<typename TSeq>
24779 inline void ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
24780 {
24781 
24782  infected.clear();
24783  infected.reserve(this->size());
24784 
24785  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
24786  {
24787  if (p.get_state() == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24788  {
24789  infected.push_back(&p);
24790  }
24791  }
24792 
24793  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
24794  this->get_n_infected(),
24795  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
24796  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
24797  );
24798 
24799  return;
24800 
24801 }
24802 
24803 template<typename TSeq>
24804 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::run(
24805  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24806  int seed
24807 )
24808 {
24809 
24810  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
24811 
24812  return *this;
24813 
24814 }
24815 
24816 template<typename TSeq>
24817 inline void ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::reset()
24818 {
24819 
24820  Model<TSeq>::reset();
24821  this->update_infected();
24822 
24823  return;
24824 
24825 }
24826 
24827 template<typename TSeq>
24828 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
24829 {
24830 
24831  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>(
24832  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
24833  );
24834 
24835  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
24836 
24837 }
24838 
24849 template<typename TSeq>
24850 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
24851  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24852  const std::string & vname,
24853  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24854  epiworld_double prevalence,
24855  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24856  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24857  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
24858  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24859  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
24860  )
24861 {
24862 
24863  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
24864  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24865  ) -> void
24866  {
24867 
24868  // Sampling how many individuals
24869  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
24870 
24871  if (ndraw == 0)
24872  return;
24873 
24874  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
24875  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
24876 
24877  // Drawing from the set
24878  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
24879  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
24880  {
24881  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
24882  int which = static_cast<int>(
24883  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
24884  );
24885 
24886  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
24887  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
24888  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
24889  * And the reported bug in GCC:
24890  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
24891  *
24892  */
24893  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
24894  --which;
24895 
24896  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
24897 
24898  // Can't sample itself
24899  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
24900  continue;
24901 
24902  // The neighbor is infected by construction
24903  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
24904 
24905  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24906  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
24907  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
24908  #endif
24909 
24910  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
24911  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
24912  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
24913  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
24914  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
24915  ;
24916 
24917  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
24918 
24919  }
24920 
24921  // No virus to compute
24922  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
24923  return;
24924 
24925  // Running the roulette
24926  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
24927 
24928  if (which < 0)
24929  return;
24930 
24931  p->set_virus(
24932  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
24933  m,
24934  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED
24935  );
24936 
24937  return;
24938 
24939  };
24940 
24941  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
24942  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24943  ) -> void {
24944 
24945  auto state = p->get_state();
24946 
24947  if (state == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
24948  {
24949 
24950  // Getting the virus
24951  auto & v = p->get_virus();
24952 
24953  // Does the agent become infected?
24954  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
24955  {
24956 
24957  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED);
24958  return;
24959 
24960  }
24961 
24962 
24963  } else if (state == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24964  {
24965 
24966 
24967  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
24968  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
24969  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
24970 
24971  // Recover
24972  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
24973  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
24974 
24975  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24976  if (n_events == 0u)
24977  {
24978  printf_epiworld(
24979  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
24980  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
24981  );
24982  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
24983  }
24984  #else
24985  if (n_events == 0u)
24986  return;
24987  #endif
24988 
24989 
24990  // Running the roulette
24991  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
24992 
24993  if (which < 0)
24994  return;
24995 
24996  // Which roulette happen?
24997  p->rm_virus(m);
24998 
24999  return ;
25000 
25001  } else
25002  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIR)") ;
25003 
25004  return;
25005 
25006  };
25007 
25008  // Setting up parameters
25009  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
25010  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
25011  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
25012  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
25013 
25014  // state
25015  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
25016  model.add_state("Exposed", update_infected);
25017  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
25018  model.add_state("Recovered");
25019 
25020  // Adding update function
25021  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](
25022  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25023  ) -> void
25024  {
25025 
25026  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
25027 
25028  model->update_infected();
25029 
25030  return;
25031 
25032  };
25033 
25034  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
25035 
25036 
25037  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25038  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25039  virus.set_state(
25040  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
25041  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
25042  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED
25043  );
25044 
25045  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
25046  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
25047  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
25048 
25049  model.add_virus(virus);
25050 
25051  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
25052 
25053  // Adding the empty population
25054  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
25055 
25056  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) (connected)");
25057 
25058  return;
25059 
25060 }
25061 
25062 template<typename TSeq>
25063 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
25064  const std::string & vname,
25065  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25066  epiworld_double prevalence,
25067  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25068  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25069  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25070  epiworld_double recovery_rate
25071  )
25072 {
25073 
25074  ModelSEIRCONN(
25075  *this,
25076  vname,
25077  n,
25078  prevalence,
25079  contact_rate,
25080  transmission_rate,
25081  avg_incubation_days,
25082  recovery_rate
25083  );
25084 
25085  return;
25086 
25087 }
25088 
25089 template<typename TSeq>
25090 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
25091  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25092  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
25093 )
25094 {
25095 
25096  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
25097  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
25098  ;
25099 
25100  return *this;
25101 
25102 }
25103 
25104 template<typename TSeq>
25105 inline std::vector< double > ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::generation_time_expected(
25106  int max_days,
25107  int max_contacts
25108 ) const
25109 {
25110 
25111  // Retrieving total counts
25112  std::vector< int > h_date;
25113  std::vector< std::string > h_state;
25114  std::vector< int > h_counts;
25115  const auto this_const = dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(this);
25116  this_const->get_db().get_hist_total(
25117  &h_date,
25118  &h_state,
25119  &h_counts
25120  );
25121 
25122  // Retrieving information on susceptibles
25123  std::vector< double > S(this_const->get_ndays(), 0.0);
25124  for (size_t i = 0; i < h_date.size(); ++i)
25125  {
25126  if (h_state[i] == "Susceptible")
25127  S[h_date[i]] += h_counts[i];
25128  }
25129 
25130  // Computing the expected number of days in exposed
25131  double days_exposed = this_const->par("Avg. Incubation days");
25132 
25133  // The generation time in the SEIR model starts from 2, as agents
25134  // spend at least one day in the exposed state, and 1 day in the
25135  // infectious state before starting transmitting.
25136  std::vector< double > gen_times(
25137  this_const->get_ndays(), 1.0 + days_exposed
25138  );
25139 
25140  double p_c = this_const->par("Contact rate")/this_const->size();
25141  double p_i = this_const->par("Prob. Transmission");
25142  double p_r = this_const->par("Prob. Recovery");
25143 
25144  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this_const->get_ndays(); ++i)
25145  {
25146  gen_times[i] += gen_int_mean(
25147  S[i],
25148  p_c,
25149  p_i,
25150  p_r,
25151  max_days,
25152  max_contacts
25153  );
25154 
25155  }
25156 
25157  return gen_times;
25158 
25159 }
25160 
25161 #endif
25162 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25164 
25165  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
25166 
25169 
25170 
25171 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25173 
25174  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sird.hpp-
25175 
25178 
25179 
25180 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SIRD_H
25181 #define EPIWORLD_SIRD_H
25182 
25186 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25187 class ModelSIRD : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25188 {
25189 public:
25190 
25191  ModelSIRD() {};
25192 
25193 
25205  ModelSIRD(
25206  ModelSIRD<TSeq> & model,
25207  const std::string & vname,
25208  epiworld_double prevalence,
25209  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25210  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25211  epiworld_double death_rate
25212  );
25213 
25214  ModelSIRD(
25215  const std::string & vname,
25216  epiworld_double prevalence,
25217  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25218  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25219  epiworld_double death_rate
25220  );
25222 
25229  ModelSIRD<TSeq> & initial_states(
25230  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25231  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
25232  );
25233 
25234 };
25235 
25236 template<typename TSeq>
25237 inline ModelSIRD<TSeq>::ModelSIRD(
25238  ModelSIRD<TSeq> & model,
25239  const std::string & vname,
25240  epiworld_double prevalence,
25241  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25242  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25243  epiworld_double death_rate
25244  )
25245 {
25246 
25247  // Adding statuses
25248  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25249  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
25250  model.add_state("Recovered"),
25251  model.add_state("Deceased")
25252  ;
25253 
25254  // Setting up parameters
25255  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25256  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate"),
25257  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25258 
25259  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25260  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25261  virus.set_state(1,2,3);
25262  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25263  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25264  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
25265 
25266  model.add_virus(virus);
25267 
25268  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Recovered-Deceased (SIRD)");
25269 
25270  return;
25271 
25272 }
25273 
25274 template<typename TSeq>
25275 inline ModelSIRD<TSeq>::ModelSIRD(
25276  const std::string & vname,
25277  epiworld_double prevalence,
25278  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25279  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25280  epiworld_double death_rate
25281  )
25282 {
25283 
25284  ModelSIRD<TSeq>(
25285  *this,
25286  vname,
25287  prevalence,
25288  transmission_rate,
25289  recovery_rate,
25290  death_rate
25291  );
25292 
25293  return;
25294 
25295 }
25296 
25297 template<typename TSeq>
25298 inline ModelSIRD<TSeq> & ModelSIRD<TSeq>::initial_states(
25299  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25300  std::vector< int > /**/
25301 ) {
25302 
25303  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
25304  create_init_function_sird<TSeq>(proportions_)
25305  ;
25306 
25307  return *this;
25308 
25309 }
25310 
25311 #endif
25312 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25314 
25315  End of -include/epiworld//models/sird.hpp-
25316 
25319 
25320 
25321 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25323 
25324  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sisd.hpp-
25325 
25328 
25329 
25330 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SISD_HPP
25331 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SISD_HPP
25332 
25342 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25343 class ModelSISD : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25344 {
25345 
25346 public:
25347 
25348  ModelSISD() {};
25349 
25350  ModelSISD(
25351  ModelSISD<TSeq> & model,
25352  const std::string & vname,
25353  epiworld_double prevalence,
25354  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25355  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25356  epiworld_double death_rate
25357  );
25358 
25359  ModelSISD(
25360  const std::string & vname,
25361  epiworld_double prevalence,
25362  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25363  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25364  epiworld_double death_rate
25365  );
25366 
25367 };
25368 
25369 template<typename TSeq>
25370 inline ModelSISD<TSeq>::ModelSISD(
25371  ModelSISD<TSeq> & model,
25372  const std::string & vname,
25373  epiworld_double prevalence,
25374  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25375  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25376  epiworld_double death_rate
25377  )
25378 {
25379 
25380  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible-Deceased (SISD)");
25381 
25382  // Adding statuses
25383  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25384  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
25385  model.add_state("Deceased");
25386 
25387  // Setting up parameters
25388  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
25389  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25390  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25391 
25392  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25393  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25394  virus.set_state(1,0,2);
25395 
25396  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25397  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25398  virus.set_prob_death(0.01);
25399 
25400  model.add_virus(virus);
25401 
25402  return;
25403 
25404 }
25405 
25406 template<typename TSeq>
25407 inline ModelSISD<TSeq>::ModelSISD(
25408  const std::string & vname,
25409  epiworld_double prevalence,
25410  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25411  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25412  epiworld_double death_rate
25413  )
25414 {
25415 
25416  ModelSISD<TSeq>(
25417  *this,
25418  vname,
25419  prevalence,
25420  transmission_rate,
25421  recovery_rate,
25422  death_rate
25423  );
25424 
25425  return;
25426 
25427 }
25428 
25429 #endif
25430 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25432 
25433  End of -include/epiworld//models/sisd.hpp-
25434 
25437 
25438 
25439 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25441 
25442  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seird.hpp-
25443 
25446 
25447 
25448 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRD_HPP
25449 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRD_HPP
25450 
25454 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25455 class ModelSEIRD : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25456 {
25457 
25458 public:
25459  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
25460  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
25461  static const int INFECTED = 2;
25462  static const int REMOVED = 3;
25463  static const int DECEASED = 4;
25464 
25465  ModelSEIRD() {};
25466 
25479  ModelSEIRD(
25480  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & model,
25481  const std::string & vname,
25482  epiworld_double prevalence,
25483  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25484  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25485  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25486  epiworld_double death_rate
25487  );
25488 
25499  ModelSEIRD(
25500  const std::string & vname,
25501  epiworld_double prevalence,
25502  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25503  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25504  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25505  epiworld_double death_rate
25506  );
25507 
25508  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_seir = [](
25509  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
25510  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25511  ) -> void {
25512 
25513  // Getting the virus
25514  auto v = p->get_virus();
25515 
25516  // Does the agent become infected?
25517  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
25518  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::INFECTED);
25519 
25520  return;
25521  };
25522 
25523 
25524  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
25525  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25526  ) -> void {
25527 
25528  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
25529  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
25530 
25531  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
25532 
25533  // Die
25534  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25535  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
25536 
25537  // Recover
25538  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25539  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
25540 
25541 
25542 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25543  if (n_events == 0u)
25544  {
25545  printf_epiworld(
25546  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
25547  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
25548  );
25549  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
25550  }
25551 #else
25552  if (n_events == 0u)
25553  return;
25554 #endif
25555 
25556 
25557  // Running the roulette
25558  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
25559 
25560  if (which < 0)
25561  return;
25562 
25563  // Which roulette happen?
25564  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
25565  {
25566 
25567  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
25568 
25569  } else {
25570 
25571  p->rm_virus(m);
25572 
25573  }
25574 
25575  return ;
25576 
25577 
25578 
25579  return;
25580 
25581  };
25582 
25583  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & initial_states(
25584  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25585  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
25586  );
25587 
25588 };
25589 
25590 
25591 
25592 template<typename TSeq>
25593 inline ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::ModelSEIRD(
25594  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & model,
25595  const std::string & vname,
25596  epiworld_double prevalence,
25597  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25598  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25599  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25600  epiworld_double death_rate
25601 )
25602 {
25603 
25604  // Adding statuses
25605  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25606  model.add_state("Exposed", model.update_exposed_seir);
25607  model.add_state("Infected", model.update_infected);
25608  model.add_state("Removed");
25609  model.add_state("Deceased");
25610 
25611  // Setting up parameters
25612  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
25613  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Incubation days");
25614  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25615  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25616 
25617  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25618  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25619  virus.set_state(ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::REMOVED, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::DECEASED);
25620 
25621  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25622  virus.set_incubation(&model("Incubation days"));
25623  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
25624  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25625 
25626  // Adding the tool and the virus
25627  model.add_virus(virus);
25628 
25629  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SEIRD)");
25630 
25631  return;
25632 
25633 }
25634 
25635 template<typename TSeq>
25636 inline ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::ModelSEIRD(
25637  const std::string & vname,
25638  epiworld_double prevalence,
25639  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25640  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25641  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25642  epiworld_double death_rate
25643 )
25644 {
25645 
25646  ModelSEIRD<TSeq>(
25647  *this,
25648  vname,
25649  prevalence,
25650  transmission_rate,
25651  avg_incubation_days,
25652  recovery_rate,
25653  death_rate
25654  );
25655 
25656  return;
25657 
25658 }

25660 template<typename TSeq>

25662  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25663  std::vector< int > /**/
25664 ) {
25665 
25666  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
25667  create_init_function_seird<TSeq>(proportions_)
25668  ;

25685 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

25688  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirdconnected.hpp-

25694 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRDCONNECTED_HPP
25695 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRDCONNECTED_HPP
25696 
25697 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25698 class ModelSIRDCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25699 {
25700 public:
25701  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
25702  static const int INFECTED = 1;
25703  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
25704  static const int DECEASED = 3;
25705 
25706  ModelSIRDCONN() {
25707 
25708  // tracked_agents_infected.reserve(1e4);
25709  // tracked_agents_infected_next.reserve(1e4);
25710 
25711  };

25732  );
25733 
25734  // Tracking who is infected and who is not
25735  // std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq>* > tracked_agents_infected = {};

25797 
25809 template<typename TSeq>
25810 inline ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRDCONN(
25811  ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
25812  const std::string & vname,
25813  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25814  epiworld_double prevalence,
25815  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25816  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25817  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25818  epiworld_double death_rate
25819  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
25820  )
25821 {
25822 
25823 
25824 
25825  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
25826  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25827  ) -> void
25828  {
25829 
25830  // Sampling how many individuals
25831  m->set_rand_binom(
25832  m->size(),
25833  static_cast<double>(
25834  m->par("Contact rate"))/
25835  static_cast<double>(m->size())
25836  );
25837 
25838  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
25839 
25840  if (ndraw == 0)
25841  return;
25842 
25843  // Drawing from the set
25844  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
25845  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
25846  {
25847  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
25848  int which = static_cast<int>(
25849  std::floor(m->size() * m->runif())
25850  );
25851 
25852  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
25853  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
25854  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
25855  * And the reported bug in GCC:
25856  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
25857  *
25858  */
25859  if (which == static_cast<int>(m->size()))
25860  --which;
25861 
25862  // Can't sample itself
25863  if (which == static_cast<int>(p->get_id()))
25864  continue;
25865 
25866  // If the neighbor is infected, then proceed
25867  auto & neighbor = m->get_agents()[which];
25868  if (neighbor.get_state() == ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
25869  {
25870 
25871  const auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
25872 
25873  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25874  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
25875  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
25876  #endif
25877 
25878  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
25879  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
25880  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
25881  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
25882  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
25883  ;
25884 
25885  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
25886 
25887  }
25888  }
25889 
25890  // No virus to compute
25891  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
25892  return;
25893 
25894  // Running the roulette
25895  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
25896 
25897  if (which < 0)
25898  return;
25899 
25900  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
25901 
25902  return;
25903 
25904  };
25905 
25906 
25907  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
25908  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25909  ) -> void {
25910 
25911  auto state = p->get_state();
25912 
25913  if (state == ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
25914  {
25915 
25916 
25917  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
25918  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
25919  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
25920 
25921  // Die
25922  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25923  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
25924 
25925  // Recover
25926  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25927  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
25928 
25929  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25930  if (n_events == 0u)
25931  {
25932  printf_epiworld(
25933  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
25934  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
25935  );
25936  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
25937  }
25938  #else
25939  if (n_events == 0u)
25940  return;
25941  #endif
25942 
25943 
25944  // Running the roulette
25945  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
25946 
25947  if (which < 0)
25948  return;
25949 
25950  // Which roulette happen?
25951  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
25952  {
25953 
25954  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
25955 
25956  } else {
25957 
25958  p->rm_virus(m);
25959 
25960  }
25961 
25962  return ;
25963 
25964  } else
25965  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)") ;
25966 
25967  return;
25968 
25969  };
25970 
25971  // state
25972  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
25973  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
25974  model.add_state("Recovered");
25975  model.add_state("Deceased");
25976 
25977 
25978  // Setting up parameters
25979  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
25980  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
25981  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25982  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25983  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
25984 
25985  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25986  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25987  virus.set_state(1, 2, 3);
25988  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25989  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25990  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
25991 
25992  model.add_virus(virus);
25993 
25994  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
25995 
25996  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
25997 
25998  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SIRD) (connected)");
25999 
26000  return;
26001 
26002 }
26003 
26004 template<typename TSeq>
26005 inline ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRDCONN(
26006  const std::string & vname,
26007  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26008  epiworld_double prevalence,
26009  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26010  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26011  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26012  epiworld_double death_rate
26013  )
26014 {
26015 
26016  ModelSIRDCONN(
26017  *this,
26018  vname,
26019  n,
26020  prevalence,
26021  contact_rate,
26022  transmission_rate,
26023  recovery_rate,
26024  death_rate
26025  );
26026 
26027  return;
26028 
26029 }
26030 
26031 
26032 #endif
26033 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26035 
26036  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirdconnected.hpp-
26037 
26040 
26041 
26042 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26044 
26045  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirdconnected.hpp-
26046 
26049 
26050 
26051 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRDCONNECTED_HPP
26052 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRDCONNECTED_HPP
26053 
26054 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
26055 class ModelSEIRDCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
26056 {
26057 private:
26058  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
26059  void update_infected();
26060 
26061 public:
26062 
26063  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
26064  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
26065  static const int INFECTED = 2;
26066  static const int REMOVED = 3;
26067  static const int DECEASED = 4;
26068 
26069  ModelSEIRDCONN() {};
26070 
26071  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26072  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
26073  const std::string & vname,
26074  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26075  epiworld_double prevalence,
26076  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26077  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26078  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26079  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26080  epiworld_double death_rate
26081  );
26082 
26083  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26084  const std::string & vname,
26085  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26086  epiworld_double prevalence,
26087  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26088  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26089  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26090  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26091  epiworld_double death_rate
26092  );
26093 
26094  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & run(
26095  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26096  int seed = -1
26097  );
26098 
26099  void reset();
26100 
26101  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
26102 
26109  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
26110  std::vector< double > proportions_,
26111  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
26112  );
26113 
26114  size_t get_n_infected() const
26115  {
26116  return infected.size();
26117  }
26118 
26119 };
26120 
26121 template<typename TSeq>
26122 inline void ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
26123 {
26124  infected.clear();
26125  infected.reserve(this->size());
26126 
26127  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
26128  {
26129  if (p.get_state() == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26130  {
26131  infected.push_back(&p);
26132  }
26133  }
26134 
26135  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
26136  this->get_n_infected(),
26137  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
26138  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
26139  );
26140 
26141  return;
26142 }
26143 
26144 template<typename TSeq>
26145 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::run(
26146  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26147  int seed
26148 )
26149 {
26150 
26151  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
26152 
26153  return *this;
26154 
26155 }
26156 
26157 template<typename TSeq>
26158 inline void ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::reset()
26159 {
26160 
26161  Model<TSeq>::reset();
26162 
26163  this->update_infected();
26164 
26165  return;
26166 
26167 }
26168 
26169 template<typename TSeq>
26170 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
26171 {
26172 
26173  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>(
26174  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
26175  );
26176 
26177  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
26178 
26179 }
26180 
26192 template<typename TSeq>
26193 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRDCONN(
26194  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
26195  const std::string & vname,
26196  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26197  epiworld_double prevalence,
26198  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26199  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26200  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26201  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26202  epiworld_double death_rate
26203  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
26204  )
26205 {
26206 
26207  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
26208  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26209  ) -> void
26210  {
26211 
26212  // Sampling how many individuals
26213  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
26214 
26215  if (ndraw == 0)
26216  return;
26217 
26218  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> *>(
26219  m
26220  );
26221 
26222  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
26223 
26224  // Drawing from the set
26225  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
26226  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
26227  {
26228  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
26229  int which = static_cast<int>(
26230  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
26231  );
26232 
26233  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
26234  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
26235  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
26236  * And the reported bug in GCC:
26237  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
26238  *
26239  */
26240  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
26241  --which;
26242 
26243  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
26244 
26245  // Can't sample itself
26246  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
26247  continue;
26248 
26249  // All neighbors in this set are infected by construction
26250  const auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
26251 
26252  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26253  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
26254  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
26255  #endif
26256 
26257  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26258  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
26259  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26260  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
26261  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
26262  ;
26263 
26264  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
26265  }
26266 
26267  // No virus to compute
26268  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
26269  return;
26270 
26271  // Running the roulette
26272  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
26273 
26274  if (which < 0)
26275  return;
26276 
26277  p->set_virus(
26278  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
26279  m,
26280  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED
26281  );
26282 
26283  return;
26284 
26285  };
26286 
26287  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
26288  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26289  ) -> void {
26290 
26291  auto state = p->get_state();
26292 
26293  if (state == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
26294  {
26295 
26296  // Getting the virus
26297  auto & v = p->get_virus();
26298 
26299  // Does the agent become infected?
26300  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
26301  {
26302 
26303  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED);
26304  return;
26305 
26306  }
26307 
26308 
26309  } else if (state == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26310  {
26311 
26312  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
26313  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
26314  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
26315 
26316  // Die
26317  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26318  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
26319 
26320  // Recover
26321  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26322  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
26323 
26324  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26325  if (n_events == 0u)
26326  {
26327  printf_epiworld(
26328  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
26329  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
26330  );
26331  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
26332  }
26333  #else
26334  if (n_events == 0u)
26335  return;
26336  #endif
26337 
26338 
26339  // Running the roulette
26340  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
26341 
26342  if (which < 0)
26343  return;
26344 
26345  // Which roulette happen?
26346  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
26347  {
26348 
26349  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
26350 
26351  } else {
26352 
26353  p->rm_virus(m);
26354 
26355  }
26356 
26357  return ;
26358 
26359  } else
26360  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIRD)") ;
26361 
26362  return;
26363 
26364  };
26365 
26366  // Setting up parameters
26367  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
26368  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
26369  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
26370  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
26371  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
26372 
26373  // state
26374  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
26375  model.add_state("Exposed", update_infected);
26376  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
26377  model.add_state("Removed");
26378  model.add_state("Deceased");
26379 
26380 
26381  // Adding update function
26382  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
26383  {
26384  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
26385 
26386  if (model == nullptr)
26387  throw std::logic_error(
26388  std::string("Internal error in the ModelSEIRDCONN model: ") +
26389  std::string("The model returns a null pointer.")
26390  );
26391  else
26392  model->update_infected();
26393 
26394  return;
26395  };
26396 
26397  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
26398 
26399 
26400  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
26401  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
26402  virus.set_state(
26403  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
26404  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::REMOVED,
26405  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::DECEASED
26406  );
26407 
26408  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
26409  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
26410  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
26411  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
26412  model.add_virus(virus);
26413 
26414  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
26415 
26416  // Adding the empty population
26417  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
26418 
26419  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SEIRD) (connected)");
26420 
26421  return;
26422 
26423 }
26424 
26425 template<typename TSeq>
26426 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRDCONN(
26427  const std::string & vname,
26428  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26429  epiworld_double prevalence,
26430  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26431  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26432  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26433  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26434  epiworld_double death_rate
26435  )
26436 {
26437 
26438  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26439  *this,
26440  vname,
26441  n,
26442  prevalence,
26443  contact_rate,
26444  transmission_rate,
26445  avg_incubation_days,
26446  recovery_rate,
26447  death_rate
26448  );
26449 
26450  return;
26451 
26452 }
26453 
26454 template<typename TSeq>
26455 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
26456  std::vector< double > proportions_,
26457  std::vector< int >
26458 ) {
26459 
26460  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
26461  create_init_function_seird<TSeq>(proportions_)
26462  ;
26463 
26464  return *this;
26465 
26466 }
26467 
26468 #endif
26469 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26471 
26472  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirdconnected.hpp-
26473 
26476 
26477 
26478 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26480 
26481  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirlogit.hpp-
26482 
26485 
26486 
26487 // #include "../epiworld.hpp"
26488 
26489 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRLOGIT_HPP
26490 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRLOGIT_HPP
26491 
26492 
26520 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
26521 class ModelSIRLogit : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
26522 {
26523 private:
26524  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
26525  static const int INFECTED = 1;
26526  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
26527 
26528 public:
26529 
26530  ModelSIRLogit() {};
26531 
26541  ModelSIRLogit(
26542  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & model,
26543  const std::string & vname,
26544  double * data,
26545  size_t ncols,
26546  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26547  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26548  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26549  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26550  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26551  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26552  epiworld_double prevalence
26553  );
26554 
26555  ModelSIRLogit(
26556  const std::string & vname,
26557  double * data,
26558  size_t ncols,
26559  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26560  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26561  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26562  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26563  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26564  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26565  epiworld_double prevalence
26566  );
26567 
26568  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & run(
26569  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26570  int seed = -1
26571  );
26572 
26573  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
26574 
26575  void reset();
26576 
26577  std::vector< double > coefs_infect;
26578  std::vector< double > coefs_recover;
26579  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols;
26580  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols;
26581 
26582 };
26583 
26584 
26585 
26586 template<typename TSeq>
26587 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::run(
26588  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26589  int seed
26590 )
26591 {
26592 
26593  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
26594  return *this;
26595 
26596 }
26597 
26598 template<typename TSeq>
26599 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
26600 {
26601 
26602  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>(
26603  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(this)
26604  );
26605 
26606  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
26607 
26608 }
26609 
26610 template<typename TSeq>
26611 inline void ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::reset()
26612 {
26613 
26614  /* Checking specified columns in the model */
26615  for (const auto & c : coef_infect_cols)
26616  {
26617  if (c >= Model<TSeq>::agents_data_ncols)
26618  throw std::range_error("Columns specified in coef_infect_cols out of range.");
26619  }
26620 
26621  for (const auto & c : coef_recover_cols)
26622  {
26623  if (c >= Model<TSeq>::agents_data_ncols)
26624  throw std::range_error("Columns specified in coef_recover_cols out of range.");
26625  }
26626 
26627  /* Checking attributes */
26628  if (coefs_infect.size() != (coef_infect_cols.size() + 1u))
26629  throw std::logic_error(
26630  "The number of coefficients (infection) doesn't match the number of features. It must be as many features of the agents plus 1 (exposure.)"
26631  );
26632 
26633  if (coefs_recover.size() != coef_recover_cols.size())
26634  throw std::logic_error(
26635  "The number of coefficients (recovery) doesn't match the number of features. It must be as many features of the agents."
26636  );
26637 
26638  Model<TSeq>::reset();
26639 
26640  return;
26641 
26642 }
26643 
26654 template<typename TSeq>
26655 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::ModelSIRLogit(
26656  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & model,
26657  const std::string & vname,
26658  double * data,
26659  size_t ncols,
26660  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26661  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26662  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26663  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26664  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26665  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26666  epiworld_double prevalence
26667  )
26668 {
26669 
26670  if (coef_infect_cols.size() == 0u)
26671  throw std::logic_error("No columns specified for coef_infect_cols.");
26672 
26673  if (coef_recover_cols.size() == 0u)
26674  throw std::logic_error("No columns specified for coef_recover_cols.");
26675 
26676  // Saving the variables
26677  model.set_agents_data(
26678  data, ncols
26679  );
26680 
26681  model.coefs_infect = coefs_infect;
26682  model.coefs_recover = coefs_recover;
26683  model.coef_infect_cols = coef_infect_cols;
26684  model.coef_recover_cols = coef_recover_cols;
26685 
26686  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
26687  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26688  ) -> void
26689  {
26690 
26691  // Getting the right type
26692  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * _m = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(m);
26693 
26694  // Exposure coefficient
26695  const double coef_exposure = _m->coefs_infect[0u];
26696 
26697  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
26698  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
26699 
26700  double baseline = 0.0;
26701  for (size_t k = 0u; k < _m->coef_infect_cols.size(); ++k)
26702  baseline += p->operator[](k) * _m->coefs_infect[k + 1u];
26703 
26704  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
26705  {
26706 
26707  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
26708  continue;
26709 
26710  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
26711 
26712  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26713  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
26714  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
26715  #endif
26716 
26717  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26718  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
26719  baseline +
26720  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26721  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
26722  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m)) *
26723  coef_exposure
26724  ;
26725 
26726  // Applying the plogis function
26727  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] = 1.0/
26728  (1.0 + std::exp(-m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp]));
26729 
26730  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
26731 
26732  }
26733 
26734  // No virus to compute
26735  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
26736  return;
26737 
26738  // Running the roulette
26739  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
26740 
26741  if (which < 0)
26742  return;
26743 
26744  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
26745 
26746  return;
26747 
26748  };
26749 
26750  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
26751  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26752  ) -> void
26753  {
26754 
26755  // Getting the right type
26756  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * _m = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(m);
26757 
26758  // Computing recovery probability once
26759  double prob = 0.0;
26760  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
26761  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:prob)
26762  #endif
26763  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _m->coefs_recover.size(); ++i)
26764  prob += p->operator[](i) * _m->coefs_recover[i];
26765 
26766  // Computing logis
26767  prob = 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-prob));
26768 
26769  if (prob > m->runif())
26770  p->rm_virus(m);
26771 
26772  return;
26773 
26774  };
26775 
26776  // state
26777  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
26778  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
26779  model.add_state("Recovered");
26780 
26781  // Setting up parameters
26782  // model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
26783  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
26784  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
26785  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
26786 
26787  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
26788  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
26789  virus.set_state(
26790  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::INFECTED,
26791  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
26792  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::RECOVERED
26793  );
26794 
26795  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
26796  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
26797 
26798  // virus.set_prob
26799 
26800  model.add_virus(virus);
26801 
26802  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) (logit)");
26803 
26804  return;
26805 
26806 }
26807 
26808 template<typename TSeq>
26809 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::ModelSIRLogit(
26810  const std::string & vname,
26811  double * data,
26812  size_t ncols,
26813  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26814  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26815  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26816  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26817  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26818  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26819  epiworld_double prevalence
26820  )
26821 {
26822 
26823  ModelSIRLogit(
26824  *this,
26825  vname,
26826  data,
26827  ncols,
26828  coefs_infect,
26829  coefs_recover,
26830  coef_infect_cols,
26831  coef_recover_cols,
26832  transmission_rate,
26833  recovery_rate,
26834  prevalence
26835  );
26836 
26837  return;
26838 
26839 }
26840 
26841 
26842 #endif
26843 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26845 
26846  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirlogit.hpp-
26847 
26850 
26851 
26852 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26854 
26855  Start of -include/epiworld//models/diffnet.hpp-
26856 
26859 
26860 
26861 #ifndef EPIWORLD_DIFFNET_H
26862 #define EPIWORLD_DIFFNET_H
26863 
26873 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
26874 class ModelDiffNet : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
26875 {
26876 private:
26877 public:
26878 
26879  ModelDiffNet() {};
26880 
26881  ModelDiffNet(
26882  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> & model,
26883  const std::string & innovation_name,
26884  epiworld_double prevalence,
26885  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
26886  bool normalize_exposure = true,
26887  double * agents_data = nullptr,
26888  size_t data_ncols = 0u,
26889  std::vector< size_t > data_cols = {},
26890  std::vector< double > params = {}
26891  );
26892 
26893  ModelDiffNet(
26894  const std::string & innovation_name,
26895  epiworld_double prevalence,
26896  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
26897  bool normalize_exposure = true,
26898  double * agents_data = nullptr,
26899  size_t data_ncols = 0u,
26900  std::vector< size_t > data_cols = {},
26901  std::vector< double > params = {}
26902  );
26903 
26904  static const int NONADOPTER = 0;
26905  static const int ADOPTER = 1;
26906 
26907  bool normalize_exposure = true;
26908  std::vector< size_t > data_cols;
26909  std::vector< double > params;
26910 };
26911 
26912 template<typename TSeq>
26913 inline ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ModelDiffNet(
26914  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> & model,
26915  const std::string & innovation_name,
26916  epiworld_double prevalence,
26917  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
26918  bool normalize_exposure,
26919  double * agents_data,
26920  size_t data_ncols,
26921  std::vector< size_t > data_cols,
26922  std::vector< double > params
26923  )
26924 {
26925 
26926  // Adding additional parameters
26927  this->normalize_exposure = normalize_exposure;
26928  this->data_cols = data_cols;
26929  this->params = params;
26930 
26931  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_non_adopters = [](
26932  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26933  ) -> void {
26934 
26935  // Measuring exposure
26936  // If the neighbor is infected, then proceed
26937  size_t nviruses = m->get_n_viruses();
26938  std::vector< Virus<TSeq>* > innovations(nviruses, {});
26939  std::vector< bool > stored(nviruses, false);
26940  std::vector< double > exposure(nviruses, 0.0);
26941 
26942  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> * diffmodel = dynamic_cast<ModelDiffNet<TSeq>*>(m);
26943 
26944  Agent<TSeq> & agent = *p;
26945 
26946  // For each one of the possible innovations, we have to compute
26947  // the adoption probability, which is a function of exposure
26948  for (auto & neighbor: agent.get_neighbors())
26949  {
26950 
26951  if (neighbor->get_state() == ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ADOPTER)
26952  {
26953 
26954  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
26955 
26956  if (v == nullptr)
26957  continue;
26958 
26959  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26960  double p_i =
26961  (1.0 - agent.get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26962  (1.0 - agent.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
26963  ;
26964 
26965  size_t vid = v->get_id();
26966  if (!stored[vid])
26967  {
26968  stored[vid] = true;
26969  innovations[vid] = &(*v);
26970  }
26971  exposure[vid] += p_i;
26972 
26973 
26974  }
26975 
26976  }
26977 
26978  // Computing probability of adoption
26979  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nviruses; ++i)
26980  {
26981 
26982  if (diffmodel->normalize_exposure)
26983  exposure.at(i) /= agent.get_n_neighbors();
26984 
26985  for (auto & j: diffmodel->data_cols)
26986  exposure.at(i) += agent(j) * diffmodel->params.at(j);
26987 
26988  // Baseline probability of adoption
26989  double p = m->get_viruses()[i]->get_prob_infecting(m);
26990  exposure.at(i) += std::log(p) - std::log(1.0 - p);
26991 
26992  // Computing as log
26993  exposure.at(i) = 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-exposure.at(i)));
26994 
26995  }
26996 
26997  // Running the roulette to see is an innovation is adopted
26998  int which = roulette<int>(exposure, m);
26999 
27000  // No innovation was adopted
27001  if (which < 0)
27002  return;
27003 
27004  // Otherwise, it is adopted from any of the neighbors
27005  agent.set_virus(
27006  *innovations.at(which),
27007  m,
27008  ModelDiffNet::ADOPTER
27009  );
27010 
27011  return;
27012 
27013  };
27014 
27015  // Adding agents data
27016  model.set_agents_data(agents_data, data_ncols);
27017 
27018  // Adding statuses
27019  model.add_state("Non adopters", update_non_adopters);
27020  model.add_state("Adopters");
27021 
27022  // Adding parameters
27023  std::string parname = std::string("Prob. Adopting ") + innovation_name;
27024  model.add_param(prob_adopt, parname);
27025 
27026  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
27027  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> innovation(innovation_name, prevalence, true);
27028  innovation.set_state(1,1,1);
27029 
27030  innovation.set_prob_infecting(&model(parname));
27031 
27032  model.add_virus(innovation);
27033 
27034  model.set_name(
27035  std::string("Diffusion of Innovations - ") + innovation_name);
27036 
27037  return;
27038 
27039 }
27040 
27041 template<typename TSeq>
27042 inline ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ModelDiffNet(
27043  const std::string & innovation_name,
27044  epiworld_double prevalence,
27045  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
27046  bool normalize_exposure,
27047  double * agents_data,
27048  size_t data_ncols,
27049  std::vector< size_t > data_cols,
27050  std::vector< double > params
27051  )
27052 {
27053 
27054  ModelDiffNet<TSeq>(
27055  *this,
27056  innovation_name,
27057  prevalence,
27058  prob_adopt,
27059  normalize_exposure,
27060  agents_data,
27061  data_ncols,
27062  data_cols,
27063  params
27064  );
27065 
27066  return;
27067 
27068 }
27069
