27070 #endif
27071 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27073 
27074  End of -include/epiworld//models/diffnet.hpp-
27075 
27078 
27079 
27080 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27082 
27083  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixing.hpp-
27084 
27087 
27088 
27089 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXING_HPP
27090 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXING_HPP
27091 
27092 #define MM(i, j, n) \
27093  j * n + i
27094 
27095 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27096  // C++23 or later
27097  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27098  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27099  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
27100  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
27101  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
27102 #else
27103  // C++17 or C++20
27104  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27105  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27106  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27107 #endif
27108 
27113 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
27114 class ModelSEIRMixing : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
27115 {
27116 private:
27117 
27118  // Vector of vectors of infected agents
27119  std::vector< size_t > infected;
27120 
27121  // Number of infected agents in each group
27122  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
27123 
27124  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
27125  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
27126 
27127  void update_infected_list();
27128  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
27129  size_t sample_agents(
27130  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27131  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27132  );
27133  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
27134  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
27135 
27136  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27137  std::vector< int > sampled_sizes;
27138  #endif
27139 
27140 public:
27141 
27142  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
27143  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
27144  static const int INFECTED = 2;
27145  static const int RECOVERED = 3;
27146 
27147  ModelSEIRMixing() {};
27148 
27163  ModelSEIRMixing(
27164  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27165  const std::string & vname,
27166  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27167  epiworld_double prevalence,
27168  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27169  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27170  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27171  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27172  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27173  );
27174 
27187  ModelSEIRMixing(
27188  const std::string & vname,
27189  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27190  epiworld_double prevalence,
27191  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27192  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27193  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27194  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27195  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27196  );
27197 
27198  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & run(
27199  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27200  int seed = -1
27201  );
27202 
27203  void reset();
27204 
27205  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
27206 
27212  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & initial_states(
27213  std::vector< double > proportions_,
27214  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
27215  );
27216 
27217  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
27218  {
27219  contact_matrix = cmat;
27220  return;
27221  };
27222 
27223 };
27224 
27225 template<typename TSeq>
27226 inline void ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::update_infected_list()
27227 {
27228 
27229  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
27230 
27231  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
27232 
27233  for (auto & a : agents)
27234  {
27235 
27236  if (a.get_state() == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27237  {
27238  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
27239  {
27240  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
27241  infected[
27242  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
27243  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
27244  // Position of the agent in the group
27245  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
27246  ] = a.get_id();
27247 
27248  }
27249  }
27250 
27251  }
27252 
27253  return;
27254 
27255 }
27256 
27257 template<typename TSeq>
27258 inline size_t ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::sample_agents(
27259  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27260  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27261  )
27262 {
27263 
27264  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
27265  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
27266 
27267  int samp_id = 0;
27268  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
27269  {
27270 
27271  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
27272 
27273  // How many from this entity?
27274  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
27275  group_size,
27276  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
27277  MM(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
27278  ]
27279  );
27280 
27281  if (nsamples == 0)
27282  continue;
27283 
27284  // Sampling from the entity
27285  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
27286  {
27287 
27288  // Randomly selecting an agent
27289  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
27290 
27291  // Correcting overflow error
27292  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
27293  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
27294 
27295  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27296  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
27297  #else
27298  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
27299  #endif
27300 
27301  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27302  if (a.get_state() != ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27303  throw std::logic_error(
27304  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
27305  );
27306  #endif
27307 
27308  // Can't sample itself
27309  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
27310  continue;
27311 
27312  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
27313 
27314  }
27315 
27316  }
27317 
27318  return samp_id;
27319 
27320 }
27321 
27322 template<typename TSeq>
27323 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::run(
27324  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27325  int seed
27326 )
27327 {
27328 
27329  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
27330 
27331  return *this;
27332 
27333 }
27334 
27335 template<typename TSeq>
27336 inline void ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::reset()
27337 {
27338 
27339  Model<TSeq>::reset();
27340 
27341  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
27342  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
27343  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
27344  throw std::length_error(
27345  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
27346  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
27347  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
27348  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
27349  std::string(".")
27350  );
27351 
27352  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27353  {
27354  double sum = 0.0;
27355  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
27356  {
27357  if (this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
27358  throw std::range_error(
27359  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
27360  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)]) +
27361  std::string(" < 0.")
27362  );
27363  sum += this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)];
27364  }
27365  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
27366  throw std::range_error(
27367  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
27368  std::to_string(sum) +
27369  std::string(" != 1.")
27370  );
27371  }
27372 
27373  // Do it the first time only
27374  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
27375 
27376  // We only do it once
27377  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
27378  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
27379 
27380  // We are assuming one agent per entity
27381  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
27382  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
27383 
27384  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
27385  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
27386  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
27387  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27388  {
27389 
27390  entity_indices[i] +=
27391  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
27392  entity_indices[i - 1]
27393  ;
27394 
27395  }
27396 
27397  // Adjusting contact rate
27398  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
27399  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
27400 
27401  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27402  {
27403 
27404  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
27405  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
27406  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
27407 
27408 
27409  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
27410  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
27411  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
27412 
27413  }
27414 
27415  this->update_infected_list();
27416 
27417  return;
27418 
27419 }
27420 
27421 template<typename TSeq>
27422 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
27423 {
27424 
27425  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>(
27426  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>*>(this)
27427  );
27428 
27429  #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27430  // C++23 or later
27431  [[assume(ptr != nullptr)]]
27432  #else
27433  // C++17 or C++20
27434  assert(ptr != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27435  #endif
27436 
27437  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
27438 
27439 }
27440 
27441 
27452 template<typename TSeq>
27453 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixing(
27454  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27455  const std::string & vname,
27456  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27457  epiworld_double prevalence,
27458  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27459  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27460  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27461  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27462  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27463  )
27464 {
27465 
27466  // Setting up the contact matrix
27467  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
27468 
27469  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
27470  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
27471  ) -> void
27472  {
27473 
27474  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
27475  return;
27476 
27477  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
27478  // class
27479  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
27480 
27481  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
27482 
27483  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27484  m_down->sampled_sizes.push_back(static_cast<int>(ndraws));
27485  #endif
27486 
27487  if (ndraws == 0u)
27488  return;
27489 
27490  // Drawing from the set
27491  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
27492  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
27493  {
27494 
27495  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
27496 
27497  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
27498 
27499  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27500  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
27501  throw std::logic_error(
27502  "Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range."
27503  );
27504  #endif
27505 
27506  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
27507  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
27508  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
27509  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
27510  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
27511  ;
27512 
27513  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
27514 
27515  }
27516 
27517  // Running the roulette
27518  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
27519 
27520  if (which < 0)
27521  return;
27522 
27523  p->set_virus(
27524  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
27525  m,
27526  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED
27527  );
27528 
27529  return;
27530 
27531  };
27532 
27533  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_and_infected = [](
27534  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
27535  ) -> void {
27536 
27537  auto state = p->get_state();
27538 
27539  if (state == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
27540  {
27541 
27542  // Getting the virus
27543  auto & v = p->get_virus();
27544 
27545  // Does the agent become infected?
27546  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
27547  {
27548 
27549  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED);
27550  return;
27551 
27552  }
27553 
27554 
27555  } else if (state == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27556  {
27557 
27558 
27559  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
27560  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
27561  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
27562 
27563  // Recover
27564  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
27565  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
27566 
27567  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27568  if (n_events == 0u)
27569  {
27570  printf_epiworld(
27571  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
27572  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
27573  );
27574  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
27575  }
27576  #else
27577  if (n_events == 0u)
27578  return;
27579  #endif
27580 
27581 
27582  // Running the roulette
27583  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
27584 
27585  if (which < 0)
27586  return;
27587 
27588  // Which roulette happen?
27589  p->rm_virus(m);
27590 
27591  return ;
27592 
27593  } else
27594  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIR)") ;
27595 
27596  return;
27597 
27598  };
27599 
27600  // Setting up parameters
27601  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
27602  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
27603  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
27604  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
27605 
27606  // state
27607  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
27608  model.add_state("Exposed", update_exposed_and_infected);
27609  model.add_state("Infected", update_exposed_and_infected);
27610  model.add_state("Recovered");
27611 
27612  // Global function
27613  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
27614  {
27615 
27616  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
27617 
27618  m_down->update_infected_list();
27619 
27620  return;
27621 
27622  };
27623 
27624  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
27625 
27626 
27627  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
27628  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
27629  virus.set_state(
27630  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
27631  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
27632  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
27633  );
27634 
27635  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
27636  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
27637  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
27638 
27639  model.add_virus(virus);
27640 
27641  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
27642 
27643  // Adding the empty population
27644  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
27645 
27646  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) with Mixing");
27647 
27648  return;
27649 
27650 }
27651 
27652 template<typename TSeq>
27653 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixing(
27654  const std::string & vname,
27655  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27656  epiworld_double prevalence,
27657  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27658  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27659  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27660  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27661  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27662  )
27663 {
27664 
27665  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
27666 
27667  ModelSEIRMixing(
27668  *this,
27669  vname,
27670  n,
27671  prevalence,
27672  contact_rate,
27673  transmission_rate,
27674  avg_incubation_days,
27675  recovery_rate,
27676  contact_matrix
27677  );
27678 
27679  return;
27680 
27681 }
27682 
27683 template<typename TSeq>
27684 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::initial_states(
27685  std::vector< double > proportions_,
27686  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
27687 )
27688 {
27689 
27690  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
27691  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
27692  ;
27693 
27694  return *this;
27695 
27696 }
27697 #undef MM
27698 #undef GET_MODEL
27699 #endif
27700 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27702 
27703  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixing.hpp-
27704 
27707 
27708 
27709 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27711 
27712  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirmixing.hpp-
27713 
27716 
27717 
27718 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRMIXING_HPP
27719 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRMIXING_HPP
27720 
27721 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27722  // C++23 or later
27723  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27724  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27725  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
27726  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
27727  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
27728 #else
27729  // C++17 or C++20
27730  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27731  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27732  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27733 #endif
27734 
27739 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
27740 class ModelSIRMixing : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
27741 {
27742 private:
27743 
27744  // Vector of infected agents
27745  std::vector< size_t > infected;
27746  size_t n_infected;
27747 
27748  // Number of infected agents in each group
27749  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
27750 
27751  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
27752  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
27753 
27754  void update_infected_list();
27755  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
27756  size_t sample_agents(
27757  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27758  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27759  );
27760 
27761  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
27762  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
27763 
27764  size_t index(size_t i, size_t j, size_t n) {
27765  return j * n + i;
27766  }
27767 
27768 public:
27769 
27770  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
27771  static const int INFECTED = 1;
27772  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
27773 
27774  ModelSIRMixing() {};
27775 
27788  ModelSIRMixing(
27789  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27790  const std::string & vname,
27791  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27792  epiworld_double prevalence,
27793  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27794  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27795  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27796  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27797  );
27798 
27810  ModelSIRMixing(
27811  const std::string & vname,
27812  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27813  epiworld_double prevalence,
27814  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27815  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27816  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27817  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27818  );
27819 
27820  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & run(
27821  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27822  int seed = -1
27823  );
27824 
27825  void reset();
27826 
27827  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
27828 
27834  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & initial_states(
27835  std::vector< double > proportions_,
27836  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
27837  );
27838 
27839  size_t get_n_infected(size_t group) const
27840  {
27841  return n_infected_per_group[group];
27842  }
27843 
27844  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
27845  {
27846  contact_matrix = cmat;
27847  return;
27848  };
27849 
27850 };
27851 
27852 template<typename TSeq>
27853 inline void ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::update_infected_list()
27854 {
27855  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
27856 
27857  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
27858  n_infected = 0;
27859 
27860  for (auto & a : agents)
27861  {
27862  if (a.get_state() == ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27863  {
27864  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
27865  {
27866  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
27867  infected[
27868  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
27869  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
27870  // Position of the agent in the group
27871  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
27872  ] = a.get_id();
27873 
27874  // Incrementing the overall counter
27875  n_infected++;
27876  }
27877  }
27878  }
27879 
27880  return;
27881 }
27882 
27883 template<typename TSeq>
27884 inline size_t ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::sample_agents(
27885  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27886  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27887  )
27888 {
27889 
27890  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
27891  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
27892 
27893  int samp_id = 0;
27894  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
27895  {
27896 
27897  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
27898 
27899  // How many from this entity?
27900  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
27901  group_size,
27902  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
27903  index(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
27904  ]
27905  );
27906 
27907  if (nsamples == 0)
27908  continue;
27909 
27910  // Sampling from the entity
27911  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
27912  {
27913 
27914  // Randomly selecting an agent
27915  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
27916 
27917  // Correcting overflow error
27918  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
27919  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
27920 
27921  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27922  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
27923  #else
27924  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
27925  #endif
27926 
27927  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27928  if (a.get_state() != ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27929  throw std::logic_error(
27930  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
27931  );
27932  #endif
27933 
27934  // Can't sample itself
27935  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
27936  continue;
27937 
27938  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
27939 
27940  }
27941 
27942  }
27943 
27944  return samp_id;
27945 
27946 }
27947 
27948 template<typename TSeq>
27949 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::run(
27950  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27951  int seed
27952 )
27953 {
27954 
27955  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
27956  return *this;
27957 
27958 }
27959 
27960 template<typename TSeq>
27961 inline void ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::reset()
27962 {
27963 
27964  Model<TSeq>::reset();
27965 
27966  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
27967  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
27968  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
27969  throw std::length_error(
27970  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
27971  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
27972  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
27973  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
27974  std::string(".")
27975  );
27976 
27977  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27978  {
27979  double sum = 0.0;
27980  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
27981  {
27982  if (this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
27983  throw std::range_error(
27984  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
27985  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)]) +
27986  std::string(" < 0.")
27987  );
27988  sum += this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)];
27989  }
27990  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
27991  throw std::range_error(
27992  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
27993  std::to_string(sum) +
27994  std::string(" != 1.")
27995  );
27996  }
27997 
27998  // Do it the first time only
27999  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
28000 
28001  // We only do it once
28002  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
28003  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
28004 
28005  // We are assuming one agent per entity
28006  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
28007  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
28008 
28009  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
28010  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
28011  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
28012  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
28013  {
28014  entity_indices[i] +=
28015  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
28016  entity_indices[i - 1]
28017  ;
28018  }
28019 
28020  // Adjusting contact rate
28021  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
28022  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
28023 
28024  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
28025  {
28026  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
28027  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
28028  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
28029 
28030  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
28031  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
28032  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
28033  }
28034 
28035  this->update_infected_list();
28036 
28037  return;
28038 }
28039 
28040 template<typename TSeq>
28041 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
28042 {
28043 
28044  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>(
28045  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>*>(this)
28046  );
28047 
28048  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
28049 
28050 }
28051 
28052 
28063 template<typename TSeq>
28064 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSIRMixing(
28065  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
28066  const std::string & vname,
28067  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28068  epiworld_double prevalence,
28069  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28070  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28071  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
28072  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28073  )
28074 {
28075 
28076  // Setting up the contact matrix
28077  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
28078 
28079  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
28080  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
28081  ) -> void
28082  {
28083 
28084  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
28085  return;
28086 
28087  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
28088  // class
28089  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
28090 
28091  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
28092 
28093  if (ndraws == 0u)
28094  return;
28095 
28096 
28097  // Drawing from the set
28098  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
28099  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
28100  {
28101 
28102  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
28103 
28104  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
28105 
28106  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28107  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
28108  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
28109  #endif
28110 
28111  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
28112  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
28113  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
28114  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
28115  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
28116  ;
28117 
28118  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
28119 
28120  }
28121 
28122  // Running the roulette
28123  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
28124 
28125  if (which < 0)
28126  return;
28127 
28128  p->set_virus(
28129  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
28130  m,
28131  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED
28132  );
28133 
28134  return;
28135 
28136  };
28137 
28138  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
28139  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
28140  ) -> void {
28141 
28142  auto state = p->get_state();
28143 
28144  if (state == ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
28145  {
28146 
28147 
28148  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
28149  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
28150  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
28151 
28152  // Recover
28153  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
28154  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
28155 
28156  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28157  if (n_events == 0u)
28158  {
28159  printf_epiworld(
28160  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
28161  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
28162  );
28163  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in infected.");
28164  }
28165  #else
28166  if (n_events == 0u)
28167  return;
28168  #endif
28169 
28170 
28171  // Running the roulette
28172  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
28173 
28174  if (which < 0)
28175  return;
28176 
28177  // Which roulette happen?
28178  p->rm_virus(m);
28179 
28180  return ;
28181 
28182  } else
28183  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)") ;
28184 
28185  return;
28186 
28187  };
28188 
28189  // Setting up parameters
28190  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
28191  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
28192  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
28193 
28194  // state
28195  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
28196  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
28197  model.add_state("Recovered");
28198 
28199  // Global function
28200  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
28201  {
28202 
28203  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
28204 
28205  m_down->update_infected_list();
28206 
28207  return;
28208 
28209  };
28210 
28211  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
28212 
28213 
28214  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
28215  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
28216  virus.set_state(
28217  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED,
28218  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
28219  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
28220  );
28221 
28222  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
28223  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
28224 
28225  model.add_virus(virus);
28226 
28227  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
28228 
28229  // Adding the empty population
28230  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
28231 
28232  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) with Mixing");
28233 
28234  return;
28235 
28236 }
28237 
28238 template<typename TSeq>
28239 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSIRMixing(
28240  const std::string & vname,
28241  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28242  epiworld_double prevalence,
28243  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28244  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28245  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
28246  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28247  )
28248 {
28249 
28250  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
28251 
28252  ModelSIRMixing(
28253  *this,
28254  vname,
28255  n,
28256  prevalence,
28257  contact_rate,
28258  transmission_rate,
28259  recovery_rate,
28260  contact_matrix
28261  );
28262 
28263  return;
28264 
28265 }
28266 
28267 template<typename TSeq>
28268 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::initial_states(
28269  std::vector< double > proportions_,
28270  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
28271 )
28272 {
28273 
28274  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
28275  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)
28276  ;
28277 
28278  return *this;
28279 
28280 }
28281 
28282 #undef GET_MODEL
28283 #endif
28284 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
28286 
28287  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirmixing.hpp-
28288 
28291 
28292 
28293 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
28295 
28296  Start of -include/epiworld//models/measlesquarantine.hpp-
28297 
28300 
28301 
28302 #ifndef MEASLESQUARANTINE_HPP
28303 #define MEASLESQUARANTINE_HPP
28304 
28305 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
28306  // C++23 or later
28307  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
28308  ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> * output = \
28309  dynamic_cast<ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> *>(model); \
28310  [[assume(output != nullptr)]]
28311 #else
28312  // C++17 or C++20
28313  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
28314  ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> * output = \
28315  dynamic_cast<ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> *>(model); \
28316  assert(output != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
28317 #endif
28318 
28319 #define LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(name) \
28320  template<typename TSeq> \
28321  inline void ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>:: name \
28322  (epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m)
28323 
28324 #define SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(n, ans) \
28325  size_t ans; \
28326  epiworld_double p_total = m->runif(); \
28327  for (ans = 0u; ans < n; ++ans) \
28328  { \
28329  if (p_total < m->array_double_tmp[ans]) \
28330  break; \
28331  m->array_double_tmp[ans + 1] += m->array_double_tmp[ans]; \
28332  }
28333 
28349 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
28350 class ModelMeaslesQuarantine: public Model<TSeq> {
28351 
28352 private:
28353 
28358  static void m_update_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28359  static void m_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28360  static void m_update_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28361  static void m_update_rash(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28362  static void m_update_isolated(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28363  static void m_update_isolated_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28364  static void m_update_q_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28365  static void m_update_q_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28366  static void m_update_q_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28367  static void m_update_q_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28368  static void m_update_hospitalized(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28370 
28376  static void m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
28377 
28378 public:
28379 
28380  static const epiworld_fast_uint SUSCEPTIBLE = 0u;
28381  static const epiworld_fast_uint EXPOSED = 1u;
28382  static const epiworld_fast_uint PRODROMAL = 2u;
28383  static const epiworld_fast_uint RASH = 3u;
28384  static const epiworld_fast_uint ISOLATED = 4u;
28385  static const epiworld_fast_uint ISOLATED_RECOVERED = 5u;
28386  static const epiworld_fast_uint DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED = 6u;
28387  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_EXPOSED = 7u;
28388  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE = 8u;
28389  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL = 9u;
28390  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_RECOVERED = 10u;
28391  static const epiworld_fast_uint HOSPITALIZED = 11u;
28392  static const epiworld_fast_uint RECOVERED = 12u;
28393 
28394  // Default constructor
28395  ModelMeaslesQuarantine() {};
28396 
28416  ModelMeaslesQuarantine(
28417  ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
28418  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28419  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
28420  // Disease parameters
28421  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28422  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28423  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
28424  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
28425  epiworld_double incubation_period,
28426  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
28427  epiworld_double rash_period,
28428  epiworld_double days_undetected,
28429  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
28430  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
28431  // Policy parameters
28432  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
28433  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
28434  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
28435  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
28436  );
28437 
28438  ModelMeaslesQuarantine(
28439  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28440  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
28441  // Disease parameters
28442  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28443  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28444  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
28445  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
28446  epiworld_double incubation_period,
28447  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
28448  epiworld_double rash_period,
28449  epiworld_double days_undetected,
28450  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
28451  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
28452  // Policy parameters
28453  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
28454  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
28455  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
28456  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
28457  );
28459 
28460  std::vector<Agent<TSeq> *> infectious; ///< Agents infectious for contact
28461 
28462  bool system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28463 
28464  std::vector< int > day_flagged; ///< Either detected or started quarantine
28465  std::vector< int > day_rash_onset; ///< Day of rash onset
28466 
28485  void quarantine_agents();
28486 
28487  void reset();
28488  void update_infectious();
28489 
28490  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
28491 
28492 };
28493 
28494 template<typename TSeq>
28495 inline void ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::quarantine_agents() {
28496 
28497  // Iterating through the new cases
28498  if (!system_quarantine_triggered)
28499  return;
28500 
28501  // Quarantine and isolation can be shut off if negative
28502  if (
28503  (this->par("Quarantine period") < 0) &&
28504  (this->par("Isolation period") < 0)
28505  )
28506  return;
28507 
28508  // Capturing the days that matter and the probability of success
28509  epiworld_double willingness = this->par("Quarantine willingness");
28510 
28511  // Iterating through the
28512  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->size(); ++i) {
28513 
28514  auto agent_state = this->get_agent(i).get_state();
28515 
28516  // Already quarantined or isolated
28517  if (agent_state >= RASH)
28518  continue;
28519 
28520  // If the agent has a vaccine, then no need for quarantine
28521  if (this->get_agent(i).get_n_tools() != 0u)
28522  continue;
28523 
28524  // Quarantine will depend on the willingness of the agent
28525  // to be quarantined. If negative, then quarantine never happens.
28526  if (
28527  (this->par("Quarantine period") >= 0) &&
28528  (this->runif() < willingness)
28529  )
28530  {
28531 
28532  if (agent_state == SUSCEPTIBLE)
28533  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE);
28534  else if (agent_state == EXPOSED)
28535  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED);
28536  else if (agent_state == PRODROMAL)
28537  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL);
28538 
28539  // And we add the day of quarantine
28540  this->day_flagged[i] = this->today();
28541 
28542  }
28543 
28544  }
28545 
28546  // Setting the quarantine process off
28547  this->system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28548 
28549  return;
28550 
28551 }
28552 
28553 
28554 template<typename TSeq>
28555 inline void ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m) {
28556 
28557  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28558  model->quarantine_agents();
28559  model->events_run();
28560  model->update_infectious();
28561  return;
28562 
28563 }
28564 
28565 template<typename TSeq>
28566 inline void ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::reset() {
28567 
28568  Model<TSeq>::reset();
28569 
28570  this->system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28571 
28572  this->day_flagged.resize(this->size(), 0);
28573  std::fill(
28574  day_flagged.begin(),
28575  day_flagged.end(),
28576  0);
28577 
28578  this->day_rash_onset.resize(this->size(), 0);
28579  std::fill(
28580  day_rash_onset.begin(),
28581  day_rash_onset.end(),
28582  0);
28583 
28584  this->m_update_model(dynamic_cast<Model<TSeq>*>(this));
28585  return;
28586 
28587 }
28588 
28589 template<typename TSeq>
28590 inline void ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::update_infectious() {
28591 
28592  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28593  // All agents with state >= EXPOSED should have a virus
28594  for (auto & agent: this->get_agents())
28595  {
28596  auto s = agent.get_state();
28597  if (IN(s, {EXPOSED, PRODROMAL, RASH, ISOLATED, DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED, QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL, HOSPITALIZED}))
28598  {
28599  if (agent.get_virus() == nullptr)
28600  throw std::logic_error("The agent has no virus.");
28601  }
28602  }
28603  #endif
28604 
28605  this->infectious.clear();
28606  int n_available = 0;
28607  for (auto & agent: this->get_agents())
28608  {
28609  const auto & s = agent.get_state();
28610  if (s == PRODROMAL)
28611  this->infectious.push_back(&agent);
28612 
28613  if (s < RASH)
28614  ++n_available;
28615 
28616  }
28617 
28618  // Assumes fixed contact rate throughout the simulation
28619  double p_contact = this->par("Contact rate")/
28620  static_cast< epiworld_double >(n_available);
28621 
28622  this->set_rand_binom(
28623  static_cast<int>(this->infectious.size()),
28624  p_contact > 1.0 ? 1.0 : p_contact
28625  );
28626 
28627 }
28628 
28629 template<typename TSeq>
28630 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
28631 {
28632 
28633  ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>(
28634  *dynamic_cast<const ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>*>(this)
28635  );
28636 
28637  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
28638 
28639 }
28640 
28641 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_susceptible) {
28642 
28643  // How many contacts to draw
28644  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
28645 
28646  if (ndraw == 0)
28647  return;
28648 
28649  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28650  size_t n_infectious = model->infectious.size();
28651 
28652  if (n_infectious == 0)
28653  return;
28654 
28655  // Drawing from the set
28656  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
28657  int i = 0;
28658  while (i < ndraw)
28659  {
28660  // Picking the actual contacts
28661  int which = static_cast<int>(std::floor(n_infectious * m->runif()));
28662 
28663  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
28664  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
28665  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
28666  * And the reported bug in GCC:
28667  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
28668  *
28669  */
28670  if (which == static_cast<int>(n_infectious))
28671  --which;
28672 
28673  epiworld::Agent<> & neighbor = *model->infectious[which];
28674 
28675  // Can't sample itself
28676  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
28677  continue;
28678 
28679  // We successfully drew a contact, so we increment the counter
28680  i++;
28681 
28682  // No virus, the error!!
28683  if (neighbor.get_virus() == nullptr)
28684  throw std::logic_error("The neighbor has no virus.");
28685 
28686  // Only prodomal individuals can transmit
28687  if (neighbor.get_state() != model->PRODROMAL)
28688  throw std::logic_error(
28689  "The neighbor is not in the prodromal state. The state is: " +
28690  std::to_string(neighbor.get_state())
28691  );
28692 
28693  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
28694 
28695  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28696  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
28697  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
28698  #endif
28699 
28700  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
28701  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
28702  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
28703  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
28704  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
28705  ;
28706 
28707  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
28708 
28709  }
28710 
28711  // No virus to compute
28712  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
28713  return;
28714 
28715  // Running the roulette
28716  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
28717 
28718  if (which < 0)
28719  return;
28720 
28721  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
28722 
28723  return;
28724 
28725 };
28726 
28727 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_exposed) {
28728 
28729  if (m->runif() < (1.0/p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
28730  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::PRODROMAL);
28731 
28732  return;
28733 
28734 };
28735 
28736 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_prodromal) {
28737 
28738  if (m->runif() < (1.0/m->par("Prodromal period")))
28739  {
28740 
28741  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28742  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
28743  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::RASH);
28744 
28745  }
28746 
28747  return;
28748 
28749 };
28750 
28751 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_rash) {
28752 
28753 
28754  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28755 
28756  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28757  if (static_cast<int>(model->day_flagged.size()) <= p->get_id())
28758  throw std::logic_error(
28759  "The agent is not in the list of quarantined or isolated agents: " +
28760  std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
28761  " vs " +
28762  std::to_string(model->day_flagged.size()) +
28763  ". The model has " + std::to_string(model->size()) + " agents."
28764  );
28765  #endif
28766 
28767  // Checking if the agent will be detected or not
28768  // How many days since detected
28769  bool detected = false;
28770  if (
28771  (m->par("Isolation period") >= 0) &&
28772  (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Days undetected"))
28773  )
28774  {
28775  model->system_quarantine_triggered = true;
28776  detected = true;
28777 
28778  }
28779 
28780  // Probability of Staying in the rash period vs becoming
28781  // hospitalized
28782  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period");
28783  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
28784 
28785  // Sampling from the probabilities
28786  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
28787 
28788  // Recovers
28789  if (which == 2)
28790  {
28791  p->rm_virus(
28792  m,
28793  detected ?
28794  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::ISOLATED_RECOVERED:
28795  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RECOVERED
28796  );
28797  }
28798  else if (which == 1)
28799  {
28800  // If hospitalized, then the agent is removed from the system
28801  // effectively
28802  p->change_state(
28803  m,
28804  detected ?
28805  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED :
28806  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::HOSPITALIZED
28807  );
28808  }
28809  else if (which != 0)
28810  {
28811  throw std::logic_error("The roulette returned an unexpected value.");
28812  }
28813  else if ((which == 0u) && detected)
28814  {
28815  // If the agent is not hospitalized, then it is moved to
28816  // isolation.
28817  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::ISOLATED);
28818  }
28819 
28820 };
28821 
28822 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_isolated) {
28823 
28824  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28825 
28826  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
28827  // if the quarantine period is over.
28828  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
28829 
28830  bool unisolate =
28831  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
28832  true: false;
28833 
28834  // Probability of staying in the rash period vs becoming
28835  // hospitalized
28836  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period");
28837  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
28838 
28839  // Sampling from the probabilities
28840  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
28841 
28842  // Recovers
28843  if (which == 2u)
28844  {
28845  if (unisolate)
28846  {
28847  p->rm_virus(
28848  m,
28849  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RECOVERED
28850  );
28851  }
28852  else
28853  p->rm_virus(
28854  m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
28855  );
28856  }
28857 
28858  // If hospitalized, then the agent is removed from the system
28859  else if (which == 1u)
28860  {
28861  p->change_state(
28862  m,
28863  // HOSPITALIZED
28864  unisolate ?
28865  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::HOSPITALIZED :
28866  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
28867  );
28868  }
28869  // If neither hospitalized nor recovered, then the agent is
28870  // still under isolation, unless the quarantine period is over.
28871  else if ((which == 0u) && unisolate)
28872  {
28873  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RASH);
28874  }
28875 
28876 }
28877 
28878 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_isolated_recovered) {
28879 
28880  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28881 
28882  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
28883  // if the quarantine period is over.
28884  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
28885 
28886  bool unisolate =
28887  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
28888  true: false;
28889 
28890  if (unisolate)
28891  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RECOVERED);
28892 
28893 }
28894 
28895 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_exposed) {
28896 
28897  // How many days since quarantine started
28898  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28899  int days_since =
28900  m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
28901 
28902  bool unquarantine =
28903  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
28904  true: false;
28905 
28906  // Will develop prodromal symptoms?
28907  if (m->runif() < (1.0/p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
28908  {
28909  // If the quarantine period is over, then they are moved to
28910  // the prodromal period. Otherwise, they are moved to the
28911  // quarantined prodromal period.
28912  if (unquarantine)
28913  p-> change_state(
28914  m,
28915  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::PRODROMAL
28916  );
28917  else
28918  p->change_state(
28919  m,
28920  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL
28921  );
28922 
28923  }
28924  else if (unquarantine)
28925  {
28926  p->change_state(
28927  m,
28928  ModelMeaslesQuarantine::EXPOSED
28929  );
28930  }
28931 
28932 }
28933 
28934 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_susceptible) {
28935 
28936  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28937  int days_since =
28938  m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
28939 
28940  if (days_since >= m->par("Quarantine period"))
28941  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::SUSCEPTIBLE);
28942 
28943 }
28944 
28945 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_prodromal) {
28946 
28947  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28948 
28949  // Otherwise, these are moved to the prodromal period, if
28950  // the quanrantine period is over.
28951  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
28952 
28953  bool unquarantine =
28954  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
28955  true: false;
28956 
28957  // Develops rash?
28958  if (m->runif() < (1.0/m->par("Prodromal period")))
28959  {
28960  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
28961  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::ISOLATED);
28962  }
28963  else
28964  {
28965 
28966  if (unquarantine)
28967  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::PRODROMAL);
28968 
28969  }
28970 
28971 }
28972 
28973 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_recovered) {
28974 
28975  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28976  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
28977 
28978  if (days_since >= m->par("Quarantine period"))
28979  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RECOVERED);
28980 
28981 }
28982 
28983 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_hospitalized) {
28984 
28985  // The agent is removed from the system
28986  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Hospitalization period"))
28987  p->rm_virus(m, ModelMeaslesQuarantine::RECOVERED);
28988 
28989  return;
28990 
28991 }
28992 
28993 
28994 template<typename TSeq>
28995 inline ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesQuarantine(
28996  ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
28997  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28998  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
28999  // Disease parameters
29000  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29001  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29002  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
29003  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29004  epiworld_double incubation_period,
29005  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
29006  epiworld_double rash_period,
29007  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29008  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29009  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29010  // Policy parameters
29011  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
29012  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29013  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29014  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29015 ) {
29016 
29017  model.add_state("Susceptible", this->m_update_susceptible);
29018  model.add_state("Exposed", this->m_update_exposed);
29019  model.add_state("Prodromal", this->m_update_prodromal);
29020  model.add_state("Rash", this->m_update_rash);
29021  model.add_state("Isolated", this->m_update_isolated);
29022  model.add_state(
29023  "Isolated Recovered", this->m_update_isolated_recovered
29024  );
29025  model.add_state("Detected Hospitalized", this->m_update_hospitalized);
29026  model.add_state(
29027  "Quarantined Exposed", this->m_update_q_exposed
29028  );
29029 
29030  model.add_state(
29031  "Quarantined Susceptible", this->m_update_q_susceptible
29032  );
29033 
29034  model.add_state(
29035  "Quarantined Prodromal", this->m_update_q_prodromal
29036  );
29037 
29038  model.add_state(
29039  "Quarantined Recovered", this->m_update_q_recovered
29040  );
29041 
29042  model.add_state("Hospitalized", this->m_update_hospitalized);
29043 
29044  model.add_state("Recovered");
29045 
29046  // Adding the model parameters
29047  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
29048  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
29049  model.add_param(incubation_period, "Incubation period");
29050  model.add_param(prodromal_period, "Prodromal period");
29051  model.add_param(rash_period, "Rash period");
29052  model.add_param(days_undetected, "Days undetected");
29053  model.add_param(quarantine_period, "Quarantine period");
29054  model.add_param(
29055  quarantine_willingness, "Quarantine willingness"
29056  );
29057  model.add_param(isolation_period, "Isolation period");
29058  model.add_param(hospitalization_rate, "Hospitalization rate");
29059  model.add_param(hospitalization_period, "Hospitalization period");
29060  model.add_param(prop_vaccinated, "Vaccination rate");
29061  model.add_param(vax_efficacy, "Vax efficacy");
29062  model.add_param(vax_reduction_recovery_rate, "Vax improved recovery");
29063 
29064  // Designing the disease
29065  Virus<> measles("Measles");
29066  measles.set_state(EXPOSED, RECOVERED);
29067  measles.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
29068  measles.set_prob_recovery(&model("Rash period"));
29069  measles.set_incubation(&model("Incubation period"));
29070  measles.set_distribution(
29071  distribute_virus_randomly(n_exposed, false)
29072  );
29073 
29074  model.add_virus(measles);
29075 
29076  // Designing the vaccine
29077  Tool<> vaccine("Vaccine");
29078  vaccine.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
29079  vaccine.set_recovery_enhancer(&model("Vax improved recovery"));
29080  vaccine.set_distribution(
29081  distribute_tool_randomly(prop_vaccinated, true)
29082  );
29083 
29084  model.add_tool(vaccine);
29085 
29086  // Global actions
29087  model.add_globalevent(this->m_update_model, "Update model");
29088  model.queuing_off();
29089 
29090  // Setting the population
29091  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
29092 
29093  return;
29094 
29095 }
29096 
29097 template<typename TSeq>
29098 inline ModelMeaslesQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesQuarantine(
29099  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29100  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
29101  // Disease parameters
29102  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29103  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29104  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
29105  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29106  epiworld_double incubation_period,
29107  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
29108  epiworld_double rash_period,
29109  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29110  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29111  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29112  // Policy parameters
29113  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
29114  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29115  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29116  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29117 
29118 ) {
29119 
29120  ModelMeaslesQuarantine(
29121  *this,
29122  n,
29123  n_exposed,
29124  contact_rate,
29125  transmission_rate,
29126  vax_efficacy,
29127  vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29128  incubation_period,
29129  prodromal_period,
29130  rash_period,
29131  days_undetected,
29132  hospitalization_rate,
29133  hospitalization_period,
29134  prop_vaccinated,
29135  quarantine_period,
29136  quarantine_willingness,
29137  isolation_period
29138  );
29139 
29140  return;
29141 
29142 }
29143 
29144 #undef SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS
29145 #undef LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN
29146 #undef GET_MODEL
29147 #endif
29148 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
29150 
29151  End of -include/epiworld//models/measlesquarantine.hpp-
29152 
29155 
29156 
29157 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
29159 
29160  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixingquarantine.hpp-
29161 
29164 
29165 
29166 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXINGQUARANTINE_HPP
29167 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXINGQUARANTINE_HPP
29168 
29169 using namespace epiworld;
29170 
29171 #define MM(i, j, n) \
29172  j * n + i
29173 
29174 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
29175  // C++23 or later
29176  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
29177  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
29178  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
29179  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
29180  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
29181 #else
29182  // C++17 or C++20
29183  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
29184  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
29185  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
29186 #endif
29187 
29188 #define SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(n, ans) \
29189  size_t ans; \
29190  epiworld_double p_total = m->runif(); \
29191  for (ans = 0u; ans < n; ++ans) \
29192  { \
29193  if (p_total < m->array_double_tmp[ans]) \
29194  break; \
29195  m->array_double_tmp[ans + 1] += m->array_double_tmp[ans]; \
29196  }
29197 
29202 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
29203 class ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine : public Model<TSeq>
29204 {
29205 private:
29206 
29207  // Vector of vectors of infected agents
29208  std::vector< size_t > infected;
29209 
29210  // Number of infected agents in each group
29211  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
29212 
29213  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
29214  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
29215 
29216  void m_update_infected_list();
29217  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
29218  size_t sample_agents(
29219  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
29220  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
29221  );
29222  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
29223  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
29224 
29225  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29226  std::vector< int > sampled_sizes;
29227  #endif
29228 
29229  // Update functions
29230  static void m_update_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29231  static void m_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29232  static void m_update_infected(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29233  static void m_update_isolated(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29234  static void m_update_quarantine_suscep(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29235  static void m_update_quarantine_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29236  static void m_update_hospitalized(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29237  static void m_update_isolated_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29238 
29239  // Data about the quarantine process
29240  std::vector< bool > quarantine_willingness;
29241  std::vector< bool > entity_quarantine_triggered;
29242  std::vector< bool > entity_can_quarantine;
29243  std::vector< int > day_flagged;
29244  std::vector< int > day_onset;
29245  std::vector< int > day_exposed;
29246 
29247  void m_quarantine_process();
29248  static void m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
29249 
29250 public:
29251 
29252  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
29253  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
29254  static const int INFECTED = 2;
29255  static const int ISOLATED = 3;
29256  static const int DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED = 4;
29257  static const int QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE = 5;
29258  static const int QUARANTINED_EXPOSED = 6;
29259  static const int ISOLATED_RECOVERED = 7;
29260  static const int HOSPITALIZED = 8;
29261  static const int RECOVERED = 9;
29262 
29263  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine() {};
29264 
29279  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
29280  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
29281  const std::string & vname,
29282  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29283  epiworld_double prevalence,
29284  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29285  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29286  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
29287  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
29288  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
29289  std::vector< bool > entity_can_quarantine,
29290  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29291  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29292  // Policy parameters
29293  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29294  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29295  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29296  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29297  );
29298 
29311  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
29312  const std::string & vname,
29313  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29314  epiworld_double prevalence,
29315  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29316  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29317  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
29318  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
29319  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
29320  std::vector< bool > entity_can_quarantine,
29321  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29322  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29323  // Policy parameters
29324  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29325  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29326  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29327  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29328  );
29329 
29330  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & run(
29331  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
29332  int seed = -1
29333  );
29334 
29335  void reset();
29336 
29337  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
29338 
29344  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & initial_states(
29345  std::vector< double > proportions_,
29346  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
29347  );
29348 
29349  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
29350  {
29351  contact_matrix = cmat;
29352  return;
29353  };
29354 
29355  void set_entity_can_quarantine(std::vector< bool > can_quarantine)
29356  {
29357  entity_can_quarantine = can_quarantine;
29358  return;
29359  };
29360 
29361  std::vector< double > get_contact_matrix() const
29362  {
29363  return contact_matrix;
29364  };
29365 
29366  std::vector< bool > get_entity_can_quarantine() const
29367  {
29368  return entity_can_quarantine;
29369  };
29370 
29371  std::vector< bool > get_entity_quarantine_triggered() const
29372  {
29373  return entity_quarantine_triggered;
29374  };
29375 
29376  std::vector< bool > get_quarantine_willingness() const
29377  {
29378  return quarantine_willingness;
29379  };
29380 
29381 };
29382 
29383 template<typename TSeq>
29384 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m)
29385 {
29386  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29387  model->m_quarantine_process();
29388  model->events_run();
29389  model->m_update_infected_list();
29390  return;
29391 }
29392 
29393 
29394 template<typename TSeq>
29395 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_infected_list()
29396 {
29397 
29398  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
29399 
29400  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
29401 
29402  for (auto & a : agents)
29403  {
29404 
29405  if (a.get_state() == ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED)
29406  {
29407  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
29408  {
29409  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
29410  infected[
29411  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
29412  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
29413  // Position of the agent in the group
29414  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
29415  ] = a.get_id();
29416 
29417  }
29418  }
29419 
29420  }
29421 
29422  return;
29423 
29424 }
29425 
29426 template<typename TSeq>
29427 inline size_t ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::sample_agents(
29428  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
29429  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
29430  )
29431 {
29432 
29433  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
29434  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
29435 
29436  int samp_id = 0;
29437  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
29438  {
29439 
29440  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
29441 
29442  if (group_size == 0u)
29443  continue;
29444 
29445  // How many from this entity?
29446  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
29447  group_size,
29448  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
29449  MM(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
29450  ]
29451  );
29452 
29453  if (nsamples == 0)
29454  continue;
29455 
29456  // Sampling from the entity
29457  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
29458  {
29459 
29460  // Randomly selecting an agent
29461  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
29462 
29463  // Correcting overflow error
29464  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
29465  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
29466 
29467  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29468  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
29469  #else
29470  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
29471  #endif
29472 
29473  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29474  if (a.get_state() != ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED)
29475  throw std::logic_error(
29476  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
29477  );
29478  #endif
29479 
29480  // Can't sample itself
29481  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
29482  continue;
29483 
29484  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
29485 
29486  }
29487 
29488  }
29489 
29490  return samp_id;
29491 
29492 }
29493 
29494 template<typename TSeq>
29495 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::run(
29496  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
29497  int seed
29498 )
29499 {
29500 
29501  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
29502 
29503  return *this;
29504 
29505 }
29506 
29507 template<typename TSeq>
29508 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::reset()
29509 {
29510 
29511  Model<TSeq>::reset();
29512 
29513  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
29514  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
29515  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
29516  throw std::length_error(
29517  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
29518  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
29519  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
29520  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
29521  std::string(".")
29522  );
29523 
29524 
29525  // Checking the quarantine variable
29526  if (entity_can_quarantine.size() != this->entities.size())
29527  throw std::length_error(
29528  std::string("The entity_can_quarantine vector must have the same size as the number of entities. ") +
29529  std::to_string(entity_can_quarantine.size()) +
29530  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(this->entities.size()) +
29531  std::string(".")
29532  );
29533 
29534  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29535  {
29536  double sum = 0.0;
29537  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
29538  {
29539  if (this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
29540  throw std::range_error(
29541  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
29542  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)]) +
29543  std::string(" < 0.")
29544  );
29545  sum += this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)];
29546  }
29547  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
29548  throw std::range_error(
29549  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
29550  std::to_string(sum) +
29551  std::string(" != 1.")
29552  );
29553  }
29554 
29555  // Do it the first time only
29556  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
29557 
29558  // We only do it once
29559  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
29560  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
29561 
29562  // We are assuming one agent per entity
29563  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
29564  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
29565 
29566  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
29567  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
29568  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
29569  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29570  {
29571 
29572  entity_indices[i] +=
29573  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
29574  entity_indices[i - 1]
29575  ;
29576 
29577  }
29578 
29579  // Adjusting contact rate
29580  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
29581  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
29582 
29583  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29584  {
29585 
29586  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
29587  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
29588  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
29589 
29590 
29591  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
29592  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
29593  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
29594 
29595  }
29596 
29597  this->m_update_infected_list();
29598 
29599  // Setting up the quarantine parameters
29600  quarantine_willingness.resize(this->size(), false);
29601  for (size_t idx = 0; idx < quarantine_willingness.size(); ++idx)
29602  quarantine_willingness[idx] =
29603  Model<TSeq>::runif() < this->par("Quarantine willingness");
29604 
29605  entity_quarantine_triggered.resize(this->size(), false);
29606  std::fill(
29607  entity_quarantine_triggered.begin(),
29608  entity_quarantine_triggered.end(),
29609  false
29610  );
29611 
29612  day_flagged.resize(this->size(), 0);
29613  std::fill(
29614  day_flagged.begin(),
29615  day_flagged.end(),
29616  0
29617  );
29618 
29619  day_onset.resize(this->size(), 0);
29620  std::fill(
29621  day_onset.begin(),
29622  day_onset.end(),
29623  0
29624  );
29625 
29626  day_exposed.resize(this->size(), 0);
29627  std::fill(
29628  day_exposed.begin(),
29629  day_exposed.end(),
29630  0
29631  );
29632 
29633  return;
29634 
29635 }
29636 
29637 template<typename TSeq>
29638 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
29639 {
29640 
29641  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>(
29642  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>*>(this)
29643  );
29644 
29645  #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
29646  // C++23 or later
29647  [[assume(ptr != nullptr)]]
29648  #else
29649  // C++17 or C++20
29650  assert(ptr != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
29651  #endif
29652 
29653  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
29654 
29655 }
29656 
29657 template<typename TSeq>
29658 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_susceptible(
29659  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29660 ) {
29661 
29662  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
29663  return;
29664 
29665  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
29666  // class
29667  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
29668 
29669  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
29670 
29671  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29672  m_down->sampled_sizes.push_back(static_cast<int>(ndraws));
29673  #endif
29674 
29675  if (ndraws == 0u)
29676  return;
29677 
29678  // Drawing from the set
29679  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
29680  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
29681  {
29682 
29683  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
29684 
29685  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
29686 
29687  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29688  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
29689  throw std::logic_error(
29690  "Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range."
29691  );
29692  #endif
29693 
29694  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
29695  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
29696  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
29697  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
29698  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
29699  ;
29700 
29701  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
29702 
29703  }
29704 
29705  // Running the roulette
29706  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
29707 
29708  if (which < 0)
29709  return;
29710 
29711  p->set_virus(
29712  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
29713  m,
29714  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED
29715  );
29716 
29717  return;
29718 
29719 };
29720 
29721 template<typename TSeq>
29722 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_exposed(
29723  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29724 ) {
29725 
29726  // Getting the virus
29727  auto & v = p->get_virus();
29728 
29729  // Does the agent become infected?
29730  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
29731  {
29732 
29733  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED);
29734 
29735  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29736  model->day_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
29737 
29738  return;
29739 
29740  }
29741 
29742  return;
29743 
29744 };
29745 
29746 template<typename TSeq>
29747 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_infected(
29748  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29749 ) {
29750 
29751  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29752 
29753  // Checking if the agent is detected
29754  bool detected = false;
29755  if (
29756  (m->par("Isolation period") >= 0) &&
29757  (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Days undetected")) &&
29758  (p->get_n_entities() != 0u) &&
29759  (model->entity_can_quarantine[p->get_entity(0u).get_id()])
29760  )
29761  {
29762 
29763  model->entity_quarantine_triggered[p->get_entity(0u).get_id()] = true;
29764  detected = true;
29765 
29766  }
29767 
29768  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
29769  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
29770  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
29771  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
29772  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
29773 
29774  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
29775 
29776  if (which == 0) // Recovers
29777  {
29778  if (detected)
29779  {
29780  p->change_state(
29781  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
29782  );
29783  }
29784  else
29785  {
29786  p->rm_virus(
29787  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
29788  );
29789  }
29790 
29791  return;
29792  }
29793  else if (which == 1) // Hospitalized
29794  {
29795 
29796  if (detected)
29797  {
29798  p->change_state(
29799  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
29800  );
29801  }
29802  else
29803  {
29804  p->change_state(
29805  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
29806  );
29807  }
29808 
29809  }
29810  else if ((which == 2) && detected) // Nothing, but detected
29811  {
29812  // If the agent is detected, it goes to isolation
29813  p->change_state(
29814  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED
29815  );
29816 
29817  }
29818 
29819  return ;
29820 
29821 };
29822 
29823 template<typename TSeq>
29824 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_isolated(
29825  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29826 ) {
29827 
29828  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29829 
29830  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
29831  // if the quarantine period is over.
29832  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_onset[p->get_id()];
29833 
29834  bool unisolate =
29835  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
29836  true: false;
29837 
29838  // Sampling from the probabilities of recovery
29839  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0 -
29840  (1.0 - p->get_virus()->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
29841  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(p->get_virus(), m));
29842 
29843  // And hospitalization
29844  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
29845 
29846  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
29847 
29848  // Recovers
29849  if (which == 0)
29850  {
29851  if (unisolate)
29852  {
29853  p->rm_virus(
29854  m,
29855  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
29856  );
29857  }
29858  else
29859  p->rm_virus(
29860  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
29861  );
29862  }
29863  else if (which == 1)
29864  {
29865 
29866  if (unisolate)
29867  {
29868  p->change_state(
29869  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
29870  );
29871  }
29872  else
29873  {
29874  p->change_state(
29875  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
29876  );
29877  }
29878  }
29879  else if ((which == 2) && unisolate)
29880  {
29881  p->change_state(
29882  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED
29883  );
29884  }
29885 
29886 
29887 };
29888 
29889 template<typename TSeq>
29890 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_suscep(
29891  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29892 ) {
29893 
29894  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29895 
29896  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
29897  // if the quarantine period is over.
29898  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29899 
29900  bool unquarantine =
29901  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
29902  true: false;
29903 
29904  if (unquarantine)
29905  {
29906  p->change_state(
29907  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE
29908  );
29909  }
29910 
29911 };
29912 
29913 template<typename TSeq>
29914 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_exposed(
29915  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29916 ) {
29917 
29918  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29919 
29920  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
29921  // if the quarantine period is over.
29922  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29923 
29924  bool unquarantine =
29925  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
29926  true: false;
29927 
29928  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
29929  {
29930 
29931  // Recording the day of onset
29932  model->day_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
29933 
29934  // If the agent is unquarantined, it becomes infected
29935  if (unquarantine)
29936  {
29937  p->change_state(
29938  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED
29939  );
29940  }
29941  else
29942  {
29943  p->change_state(
29944  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED
29945  );
29946  }
29947 
29948  }
29949  else if (unquarantine)
29950  {
29951  p->change_state(
29952  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED
29953  );
29954  }
29955 
29956 };
29957 
29958 template<typename TSeq>
29959 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_isolated_recovered(
29960  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29961 ) {
29962 
29963  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29964 
29965  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
29966  // if the quarantine period is over.
29967  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_onset[p->get_id()];
29968 
29969  bool unisolate =
29970  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
29971  true: false;
29972 
29973  if (unisolate)
29974  {
29975  p->change_state(
29976  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
29977  );
29978  }
29979 
29980 };
29981 
29982 template<typename TSeq>
29983 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_hospitalized(
29984  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29985 ) {
29986 
29987  // The agent is removed from the system
29988  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Hospitalization period"))
29989  p->rm_virus(m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED);
29990 
29991 };
29992 
29993 template<typename TSeq>
29994 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_quarantine_process() {
29995 
29996  int entity_num = -1;
29997  for (auto & entity: Model<TSeq>::get_entities())
29998  {
29999 
30000  // Checking if the quarantine in the entity was triggered
30001  // or not
30002  if (!entity_quarantine_triggered[++entity_num])
30003  return;
30004 
30005  if (
30006  (this->par("Quarantine period") < 0) &&
30007  (this->par("Isolation period") < 0)
30008  )
30009  return;
30010 
30011  for (auto i: entity.get_agents())
30012  {
30013 
30014  auto & agent = Model<TSeq>::get_agent(i);
30015 
30016  if (agent.get_state() > INFECTED)
30017  continue;
30018 
30019  // Agents with some tool won't be quarantined
30020  if (agent.get_n_tools() != 0u)
30021  continue;
30022 
30023  if (
30024  quarantine_willingness[i] &&
30025  (Model<TSeq>::par("Quarantine period") >= 0))
30026  {
30027 
30028  switch (agent.get_state())
30029  {
30030  case SUSCEPTIBLE:
30031  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE);
30032  break;
30033  case EXPOSED:
30034  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED);
30035  break;
30036  case INFECTED:
30037  agent.change_state(this, ISOLATED);
30038  break;
30039  default:
30040  throw std::logic_error(
30041  "The agent is not in a state that can be quarantined."
30042  );
30043  }
30044 
30045  // And we add the day of quarantine
30046  day_flagged[i] = Model<TSeq>::today();
30047 
30048  }
30049  }
