30050 
30051  // Setting the quarantine process off
30052  entity_quarantine_triggered[entity_num] = false;
30053  }
30054 
30055  return;
30056 }
30057 
30068 template<typename TSeq>
30069 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30070  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
30071  const std::string & vname,
30072  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30073  epiworld_double prevalence,
30074  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30075  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30076  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
30077  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
30078  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30079  std::vector< bool > entity_can_quarantine,
30080  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30081  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30082  // Policy parameters
30083  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30084  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30085  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30086  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
30087  )
30088 {
30089 
30090  // Setting up the contact matrix
30091  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
30092  this->entity_can_quarantine = entity_can_quarantine;
30093 
30094  // Setting up parameters
30095  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
30096  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
30097  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
30098  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
30099  model.add_param(hospitalization_rate, "Hospitalization rate");
30100  model.add_param(hospitalization_period, "Hospitalization period");
30101  model.add_param(days_undetected, "Days undetected");
30102  model.add_param(quarantine_period, "Quarantine period");
30103  model.add_param(
30104  quarantine_willingness, "Quarantine willingness"
30105  );
30106  model.add_param(isolation_period, "Isolation period");
30107 
30108  // state
30109  model.add_state("Susceptible", m_update_susceptible);
30110  model.add_state("Exposed", m_update_exposed);
30111  model.add_state("Infected", m_update_infected);
30112  model.add_state("Isolated", m_update_isolated);
30113  model.add_state("Detected Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
30114  model.add_state("Quarantined Susceptible", m_update_quarantine_suscep);
30115  model.add_state("Quarantined Exposed", m_update_quarantine_exposed);
30116  model.add_state("Isolated Recovered", m_update_isolated_recovered);
30117  model.add_state("Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
30118  model.add_state("Recovered");
30119 
30120  // Global function
30121  model.add_globalevent(this->m_update_model, "Update infected individuals");
30122  model.queuing_off();
30123 
30124  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
30125  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
30126  virus.set_state(
30127  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
30128  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
30129  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
30130  );
30131 
30132  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
30133  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
30134  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
30135 
30136  model.add_virus(virus);
30137 
30138  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
30139 
30140  // Adding the empty population
30141  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
30142 
30143  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) with Mixing");
30144 
30145  return;
30146 
30147 }
30148 
30149 template<typename TSeq>
30150 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30151  const std::string & vname,
30152  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30153  epiworld_double prevalence,
30154  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30155  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30156  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
30157  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
30158  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30159  std::vector< bool > entity_can_quarantine,
30160  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30161  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30162  // Policy parameters
30163  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30164  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30165  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30166  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
30167  )
30168 {
30169 
30170  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
30171  this->entity_can_quarantine = entity_can_quarantine;
30172 
30173  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30174  *this,
30175  vname,
30176  n,
30177  prevalence,
30178  contact_rate,
30179  transmission_rate,
30180  avg_incubation_days,
30181  recovery_rate,
30182  contact_matrix,
30183  entity_can_quarantine,
30184  hospitalization_rate,
30185  hospitalization_period,
30186  // Policy parameters
30187  days_undetected,
30188  quarantine_period,
30189  quarantine_willingness,
30190  isolation_period
30191  );
30192 
30193  return;
30194 
30195 }

30199  std::vector< double > proportions_,
30200  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
30201 )
30202 {
30203

30206  ;
30207
